links_Review_Title: Cute little dress for a night out
links_Review_Text: Loved this unique dress! I wore it with sneaks but could easily dress up with heels. The ruching on the side made it really flattering.
This dress is so flattering- I will rent again! It's thin but not see through and forgiving! Short and fun!

links_Review_Title: Amazing colour, dress cut and design
links_Review_Text: This dress was beautiful! The cut hit everywhere perfectly!

At my height, the 2R just swept the floor without shoes on. I think it's best to order Long if you plan to wear heels. Luckily, I was wearing slippers because this was #stayhome event during the pandemic; the length was perfect. Buttons at the back of the neck were too tricky for me to do on my own.

links_Review_Title: Couldn't wear the dress as event was cancelled :(
links_Review_Text: Couldn't wear the dress unfortunately, as the wedding was cancelled due to Coronavirus :( The dress was a bit big on me (size 6R) so for my measurements I think I would've fit better in a 4R. I'm not wearing any shoes in the picture and I'm 5' 4" so would've needed some heels for sure. I liked the style and it seemed very comfortable. The coloring is pretty, nice vibrant pink and does have some stretch. As the style is definitely unique, I'd just make sure its appropriate for the function, but overall very pretty!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, vibrant color, flowy material make for a fun evening of dancing!!
links_Review_Text: This dress is a definite 5 STARS! The color and style of this dress captured my eyes while looking online, and then exceeded my expectations the moment I slipped it on. The material is light weight, and flowy ... perfect for dancing the night away. I received so many compliments throughout the evening, and afterwards in photos. Rent this dress, you'll be happy you did!

links_Review_Title: To be honest, I was bummed when I got to the wedding and another lady had the exact same dress:(
links_Review_Text: Since I’m 5’7 I wasn’t sure if the long would be too long but the 4L was perfect with 3 inch heels. It’s a simple dress but elegant. I felt very comfortable.

links_Review_Title: The color was absolutely beautiful and the material of the garment was super comfortable.

links_Review_Text: Rented this to wear to a gala in New York City. (That's me in the photo) I usually wear a size 4 but this was a 6, ended up lending it to my girlfriend to wear to the event instead and she wears a size 8. Looked great on her! And she was getting compliments all night!

links_Review_Title: WOWZA! What a dress! Show stopper. Wore it for a wedding in Oaxaca!
links_Review_Text: #sexy #perfectweddingguestdress #prettyinpink

This is one of the best dresses I've ever rented! The hot-pink is gorgeous. The cut-out is in just the right spot: it nips in at the natural waist and is mostly around to the back, so it's very flattering. The one-shoulder/collar/cape combo is glamorous and fun. The skirt is forgiving for larger hips, and it drapes beautifully - not clingy at all. I am 5ft-6in tall, and I wore it with 4in heels. It just grazed the floor, wasn't too long or too short. Seriously, a fabulous dress. I wish I had more occasions to wear it!

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a Ball.
links_Review_Text: The dress was very comfortable, petite fit was fine with 1 1/2" and 2 " heels. I did not trip over the dress at all. It is forgiving after a meal and you can dance easily in it. The color is beautiful. I wore stick on silicone bra with a center clasp and would recommend this for ladies with larger chest. Silver or Gold accessories work with this. I wore the 2 petite not the 0 petite. The O petite wasn't even a close fit (way too tight). I'm 5' tall and 115lb. 34C. If your chest is bigger than a 34C I would not try a 2P, move up a size.
Quality was fine and actually liked fit alot, but I did not end up wearing this dress... style was off for me

links_Review_Title: I stood out so much from the sea of black!
links_Review_Text: I am 5'6 and with 3 inch heels the 4R was perfect. The material is a little slinky so you definitely have to wear Spanx to smoothen out any bumps you may have (I definitely have them). The shade of pink is perfect and classy, not too barbie. I absolute loved it and received so many compliments!

links_Review_Title: Absolutely stunning and perfect for my petite height
links_Review_Text: Simple yet unique, very comfortable and flattering. I can't wait to wear it out of the house- possibly for a cabaret I'm performing in valentines week! Length is great for a 0 petite!
Perfect and surprisingly great even for shorter girls. Go for the petite sizing

I rented this dress for a wedding I attended in India. It was perfect for the occasion, super comfortable, and a great color. It was a great alternative to purchasing a traditional outfit for the wedding.
So yeah. This is one of the best dresses ever. Just get it.
Absolutely gorgeous. Comfortable, flattering... eye catching and classy. Long enough to wear more comfortable shoes too!
Got sooo many complements wearing this dress! It was the most comfortable gown I've ever worn! Definitely fit true to size. Would 100% recommend!!
Great fit. No cons.
This has been by far my favorite RTR piece I've worn. Worn with a 4 inch heel and hits the floor perfectly. No bra required. Gorgeous color, perfect fit. Do not wear if you don't like attention ;)
Length was a little too short once I had heels on (which is surprising, because I'm very short), but it was really beautiful and unique.
This dress is GORGEOUS!! It fits in all the right places on my hourglass figure. True to size.
I might have given this dress a go if it fit. Bright color, cut out side, flowing skirt.

I rented this in hopes that my favorite brand (Saloni) would not fail me in the formal department. Unfortunately, I was unimpressed by this dress. The color is not a deep rich pink--it is hot pink. Like....Legally Blonde hot pink. While I am a 6L, the 8L fit only slightly large. The length was great. It just wasn't very mature looking. It would be great for a prom dress, but not well suited for anyone over about 22.

links_Review_Title: I wish I could buy it!
links_Review_Text: Amazing dress. So comfy. Very flattering and great way to make a statement. Fit me very well. Has a bit of stretch

This dress is adorable! I loved the coloring and it was a very flattering fit. I ultimately ended up wearing something else because the cut out was not appropriate for the wedding I was attending, but I would rent again for a different occasion.
Love this jumpsuit. The multiple zippers are a bit of a pain but it helps to avoid the long crotch I think some jumpsuits have. Wore it with strappy heels for a date night and felt great!
160 / 5'6" / 8-10, big breastfeeding boobs - this fit well! It's got some give too it, the waist is elastic, so it doesn't need a perfect fit to look nice.

Loved this jump suit! It's so comfortable and the fit is very flattering. There are 2 zippers and 3 buttons to get it on and off, but I didn't find it too challenging and it certainly was worth it for this great outfit!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous satin top and very comfortable
links_Review_Text: Wore this to work under a blazer. Elastic waist and very comfortable. Absolutely love the satin top portion. A bit long on my 5ft 4 frame. Wore it on the plane and did not wrinkle. Would definitely rent again!
Amazing - so many compliments. Size up. No stretch. Looks super well made and the top has awesome draping.
This suit is amazing. It has two zippers- which can be weird, but it fits and looks great. I wore it to two separate events and it was perfect. The pockets are a great plus as well

Really good length and very stylish and comfortable- I love jumpsuits - my torso is shorter and I have longer legs so it works really well- I really like this piece - could be dressed up or with flats - wore to a wine tasting :)
This jumpsuit fit like a glove! It hugs the curves in all the right places! Brought in 2020 with style! Thanks RTR!

I wore this to work and an event. Super comfortable, super flattering, feminine and not too revealing. I'm 5'4" and the legs were perfect for me so if you are tall you may find it runs short. Tempted to buy this.
Fits so nicely. High quality material. Hugs in all the right spots. True to size
Perfect fit, nice fabric, warm for cold nights!
Good even for tall women. Somehow looks form fitting but still feels airy.

I'm 5 ft and the length wasn't too long ! Fits well , the three buttons on the back of neck make it a little difficult to hook and unhook , especially if you need to use the restroom, take a friend with you to unbutton you

links_Review_Title: First time in a jumpsuit, maybe it's just not for me
links_Review_Text: Classy looking and just dressy enough for my event. The pictures were very accurate in terms of the length of the pants and draping up top. This was my first time in a jumpsuit and basically all my fears were realized: it was weirdly long in the crotch (lots of extra fabric there) and you should just plan not to use the bathroom because getting in and out of it was definitely not the easiest (two zippers, three buttons). Paired it with red pumps and gold jewelry and I looked fine but wasn't too sad to see this go back.
The pants hit me oddly and the top was baggy and the legs were too long. Even if I had sized down, it would have been too large. I'm 5' 3".
flattering, comfortable, finally a woman's pant item with reasonably sized pockets!

It's so sexy, elegant yet comfy but there's a weird design element on the back...the opening between the zippers...that makes it look like a flaw or damage. Still I loved the front so much that I almost wore it w a wrap to cover the back....but the wrap looked silly so I didn't

Love this!! Feels like I'm wearing sweats but looks like a million bucks!! Gorgeous. Once on it fit well..little sketch getting over my hips/butt so if you are hippy maybe size up but it fit well once in place. Really love it.
Fits like a glove- I want to buy it!!
I loved this jumpsuit but didn't wear it. It has three small button and two zippers on the back - too much hassle for me to get it on and off.

links_Review_Title: I loved the black and how well the neckline drapes
links_Review_Text: Fits well but really hard to use the restroom in!

links_Review_Title: Good length and good staple outfit
links_Review_Text: The zipper area was a little weird with one for the bottom and one at the top.
I rented this for a rehearsal dinner. It fit great and was very comfortable. I'm 5'9" and all leg and found the pant length to be perfect. I would highly recommend
I rented this for a party, and the one sleeve and ruffle are very cute, but the body of it runs SUPER small and you could see every roll on my upper body. Not cute and did not end up wearing.
Great for dinner and a night out. Decided to wear with all black and highlights the sleeve and ruffle!

Shirt was great. Rented for a black tie optional wedding. Pros: no bra needed. This is tight (runs a bit small IMO) but kept everything in place. Decent material for a winter wedding. Cons: a little tight. Zipper is on the side so had to have someone else zip it up for me. Overall loved this and would rent again!
Very flattering, fitted, and fun!

I never wear a one-shoulder top and I loved this look. High quality. Zipper is a bit tricky to zip alone since it really needs two hands so make sure you can get someone to zip it for you. Loved this look!
I love this top! I would size down just because I prefer a tighter fit

links_Review_Title: Very small and not my favorite
links_Review_Text: I could have made this work with high waisted jeans, but it was uncomfortable and I didn't like it enough.

links_Review_Title: super cute didnt need a bra- was tight fitting but comfortable
links_Review_Text: this shirt worked great- i could tuck it into pants if i wanted but it wasnt too long to leave out either. side zipper closure was very comfortable!
I wore this with high waisted jeans and boots to a party. It was comfortable all night and I didn't find myself having to adjust the single sleeve.

links_Review_Title: So cute for a night out!
links_Review_Text: Wore this top for a dinner out in NYC and it was perfect! Slightly tighter than I was expecting, but not to the point where I needed another size.

links_Review_Title: Fun too for a night out but runs a little short
links_Review_Text: Fits TTS with stretch. Cute and simple top fun for going out but my only gripe is ran a little short.
Wore with baggy pants. It was fitted under the ruffle. It was very cute. Sexy but still conservative enough. Would rent again.

Reasons I loved this top: 1. I loved how Skinny the sleeve made my arm look 2. I received a ton of compliments 3. I was the first person to wear it. It came with a new tag I will 100% order this top again when I have another occasion for it
Print was unique and neckline was beautiful

links_Review_Title: Perfect for getting ready for spring time
You'll feel like a Barbie doll!
links_Review_Text: 10/10 incredible dress. I didn't want to take it off and felt so beautiful! I wore it to a work presentation and felt it was super appropriate. The waist is 25'' on the size 0, which was slightly too big. Length isn't too short!
Loved everything about this dress. It was a little big I think an 8 would have fit perfect.
The color of the dress is beautiful, but it was just too large overall. I would try it again a size down.
Great for work, nice medium-weight material, fits true to size. Love the slight puff detail on the sleeves.
This dress is so stinking adorable! I loved the fit, fabric, and color!
Wore this out with husband and friends for a nice dinner. I loved the 80s pink color and shoulder details.
This dress was a perfect fit! It was so chic and flattering! I felt like Elle Woods!

I liked the material and color of this dress. If you wear tights, you might see the seam so try to find seamless tights or spanx. The shoulders and arms were a little too big on me. I rolled the sleeves to 3/4 to fit better.

I loved this dress. I usually wear an 8 and got that. Works for either a dressier work environment or an event. I put with black tights and heels but also would work (maybe even better but it's cold out) with bare/nude legs and tan heels. The bottom half is thinner, so it may show with tights or bad underwear
Lovely dress! Runs a little big but very comfortable and cute

It's definitely pink- like pepto pink- but fits nicely and has room. I could have probably sized down but liked having some space. Paired with pearls and pink manicured toes I felt a hint of Reese Witherspoon swag. Not too short for me being 5'9" and didn't wrinkle too badly from sitting at a desk all day.
Flattering cut. The color is indeed very 80's but I decided to own it. Fun dress. Wrinkles easily.
Lots of compliments, liked the puff shoulders, fun bright color

links_Review_Title: Love love love this Barbie dress
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress for a meeting - beautiful color. Did size one up for length. #roomforboobs
So beautiful and elegant. It ran a little big.
Wore for work. Very flattering. Great details for a "simple" dress. Would rent again.
Great piece; easy to wear. Very brightly colored, total standout so less of an every day piece
I got a ton of compliments on how pretty this dress was on me. Lovely Color. Classy feel. Appropriate wear for work

links_Review_Title: Perfect length. Felt comfy. Loved color and detail and puffed shoulders.

links_Review_Text: Great fitting dress- perfect length on my tall figure! Great shade of pink- a bit bolder in person than online.
I felt a little 80s but got tons of compliments. Fun dress.

links_Review_Title: Rented as part of unlimited plan and wore to work.
links_Review_Text: Beautiful fabric and color. I don't think I ahve ever rented a Shoshanna dress that wasn't a 5 star experience. Lovely dress and very flattering.

links_Review_Title: Everyone told me I look amazing and I should keep the dress!
links_Review_Text: This fit perfect up top, but a little large in the bottom for me. I wear a size G bra and I have a tiny butt.

I love this dress! I got comments all day saying I looked like Jackie Kennedy. Wore it to an informal wedding, and will re-wear to work. Great for any occasion (you can dress it up or down). Fun, comfortable and stylish
Got a zero and was all over too large for my frame.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful and comfortable all at once.
links_Review_Text: Very pretty. Added a nice wrap and it went from simple to elegant. Lovely color. And loved that it wasn't too long.
True to size. Received many compliments, gorgeous color.
More HOT PINK then the picture. The threw me off. Fit is fine.

The dress is a lovely color and the sleeve length is perfect for fall/winter and pairs nicely with black tights for those seasons as well. The dress was a slightly baggier than it appears on the model and I most likely would have sized down one size if it was available.
Was a lot of material and could have downsized for best fit. Best on person with larger chest.
Fits well/true to size. A little wide in the hips, but flattering cut. The only issue I had was that the sleeves are very poofy. If you aren't that kind of gal, recommend going w a different dress.
I think this may have run true to size/or a bit big.
Nice, vibrant pink and cute sleeves

links_Review_Title: Color makes this dress pop and style makes it classic but beautiful
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress...wore it for a work conference and just needed to lightly iron it out of my suitcase. It is a thicker material so not best for a hot office or hot day outside, but it looks and feels expensive. Shoshanna knows how to make a woman look feminine yet edgy!
This dress is wonderful and fits true to size. I will be renting again. I got a lot of compliments and it was perfect for work.

links_Review_Title: The pink color is very pretty
links_Review_Text: Fits perfect, got tons of compliments

links_Review_Title: This dress is perfect in every way, except one major flaw...
links_Review_Text: The color and fit of this dress are perfect. But unfortunately, no matter what kind of bra you wear, the stitching around the breast makes it appear as if your nipples are sticking straight out. So...not a classy look at ALL! Couldn't wear it.
Very cute and comfortable dress. Fit great .
Larger sleeves than in photos. Looks like a dress from the 80s. Too bright also to wear to work!

links_Review_Title: Felt like air, beautiful and perfect
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress so much I didn't want to take it off! It was an effortless beauty and looked great in photos. No need for spanks because of the ruched fabric in the front. You'll need to go bra-less or wear pasties as the back is wide open.
I thought this dress ran very small. Would size up for best fit; it was very tight everywhere.
TRue to size

links_Review_Title: Hugs your body in every way....
links_Review_Text: Absolutely loved this rental! One of my favorites so far! The dress hugs your body and it's really flattering because of the flow of the dress. I didn't have any issues with tightness around my shoulders. It was comfortable all the way around. The arms were incredibly comfortable. I wouldn't recommend sizing up because the top of your shoulder area may be too big. I had so many compliments and I was able to wear this dress all night with no issues. Love love love!

Another stunning creation by AMUR, I love wearing sustainability minded designers but this dress was also a piece of art in addition to their valuable commitment to our Earth. The colors and flow were brilliant and well executed.

links_Review_Title: Absolutely stunning. The fabric has such an amazing flow to it!
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a charity event and it was such a huge hit! I can not quantify the amount of compliments I received! While appropriate, it had a touch of sexy to it due to the off the shoulder cut. If you have a larger bust I would suggest sizing up! RENT THIS DRESS!

Loved the off the shoulder. Beautiful fabric and flow. Got so many compliments! Since it's silk the only downfall is that there is no give in the arms, so it was a little constricting across the top given the neckline, but overall I loved it!

I loved this dress but unfortunately, didn't get to wear it. The material is soft and has a lovely drape. I felt it fit true to size and the way the skirt was cut, hid my tummy and hips. Will definitely rent again.

This is a truly stunning dress. The pattern, colors, pleats, swooping shoulder, all come together to make a pretty amazing dress. I got compliments all night long and didn't want to part with it. This is a very delicate dress, and already showed signs of wear from the silk pulling at the seams. It fit me perfectly at the chest, almost a bit tight, and I have a small bust. It was also weirdly static-y and no matter what I did, never went away. I worry that as more people rent this, it won't hold up to continuous wear. Meant to be one of those dresses you pull out for special occasions every so often. So rent it now and buy it if you can and enjoy the heck out of it.
I wish I could have worn this but it was so tight. Needed the 8R which wasn't available. Would definitely rent again, it was gorgeous!

This top is beautiful! So flattering and very comfortable. I wore it to both to work and just for a casual weekend outing. The sleeves are fun and it cinches your waist in a flattering way. Didn't have any problem with the neckline being too low (I have a small bust so this helps). I had to steam the sleeves and ties a bit when it came, but overall it was a great piece to rent.
Love Mara Hoffman but this shirt just wasn't for me.

You really need to be able to commit to these sleeves. I really loved the low wife front. It was sexy without being too low. The material is thick and wrinkled very easily. I have a steamer so I didn't mind.

I loved this top. The ties are a little hard to figure out at first but once I got it they stayed put. It's definitely low cut but not too revealing for women with bigger chests. It's also a heavier material so I wouldn't recommend it for really hot weather!

links_Review_Title: The Meryl Streep of Wrap Tops
links_Review_Text: Seriously — rent this now. Like rent it yesterday. This blouse is STUNNING. The fit was gorgeous, and the material luxurious. You might need a safety pin or fashion tip if you're extra busty! I used a small one for just a little reassurance. I didn't need it though cause this top supported me all damn day with complements and praise. Felt gorgeous in it.
Thus top has a lot of fabric but the fit was great for my smaller chest, I love the neckline and sift fabric! Got tons of compliments
Cute for sure! Definitely awkward to wear around all day because it's hard to wear a bra with and you have to tie tight to ensure no nip slips but I got tons of compliments
This just doesn't work great, almost cropped but oversized and awkward. Really wanted to love it based off the positive reviews!
This top was beautiful but the material was very heavy. Also, if you're a bit busty you may need safety pin or boob tape
LOVE this look. It was so flattering, and absolutely comfortable. I paired it with the matching pants, but it would be just as cute with a pair of white jeans.

links_Review_Title: Super cute, but not very comfortable.
links_Review_Text: Definitely very open in the chest area.

links_Review_Title: Dramatic, but in a cool way
links_Review_Text: This would have fit perfectly, but I have a large bust and the cleavage was a little too much for my taste so I had to pin to avoid being too revealing. If you are chesty I would recommend going up a size because you can always tie the wrap tighter. Otherwise great statement top.
The material is VERY thick and very heavy for what looks like it would be most appropriate to wear in the summer time. It fit true to size but was very uncomfortable and bulky. I didn't wear it.
Really great top. Fit well. I am small chested so will probably have to pin in the middle because it's pretty low on me.

I love Mara Hoffman - this piece (like all her others) is so expertly made and feels luxurious. Unfortunately, this top runs big so it gapped out at the neckline and I couldn't pull the sash any tighter. Could flash my coworkers, so won't get to wear this one but love the concept! Note that it is very heavy - it's lined with lots of fabric in the sleeves, so probably not ideal for 90 degree days anyway.

links_Review_Title: So cute- need a tank underneath
links_Review_Text: So cute. Loved the look but needed a tank under because the girls we OUT.

links_Review_Title: I looked like a fumigation tent.
links_Review_Text: Maybe it's because I got it in a larger size than I normally wear, but this top did nothing for me. The ties are too long, the sleeves are obnoxiously puffy and I'm the length was too short. I didn't end up wearing it, because I couldn't stop laughing at how much it reminded me of a fumigation tent.
Looks beautiful and classy but is quite heavy and too early for linen which I consider s summer fabric.

Very cute top. Wore with jean shorts for a backyard party and it was perfect. It is a little generous in the bust area so if you're on the smaller side (like me) you may need to pin it to keep it from gaping open. I just wore a more padded bra and it was totally fine unpinned.

links_Review_Title: was great with jeans and heels
links_Review_Text: packed well

links_Review_Title: Just felt oversized - not in a good way
links_Review_Text: I really liked this top and how it looked, but felt uncomfortable in it the whole time. I was constantly readjusting it so that I wasn't flashing anyone (since it's nearly impossible to wear a bra with) or because my elbows were getting caught in the sleeves.

links_Review_Title: Felt like wearing a potato sack.
links_Review_Text: fabric was pretty thick and bulky like wearing a potato sack.

I'm a huge fan of Mara Hoffman, but have found some of the rental pieces to be hit or miss. This one is a definite hit. It is comfortable and flattering and makes a statement. Although I wear a S/4 in most brands I typically wear a M/6 in this brand and it fit as expected. Even worked with my bigger chest, good coverage.

links_Review_Title: SO MANY COMPLIMENTS!!! I wore this top three times and no less than 20 people have asked about it.

links_Review_Text: I loved the pattern and thickness of this top. Perfect for spring!

links_Review_Title: Loved the sleeves. Since they were the only part that fit.
links_Review_Text: Not sure how to describe this top. The v of the neck almost reach my belly button. And the material was way too thick. Unfortunately it goes back without wearing it. Adding a size chart for all the brands you carry is something you should definitely look into adding.
This top is fun for a vacation or night out. The shape is a little unusual but ultimately flattering. Size up if you're busty.
It's super puffy. I feel like a cream puff lol
It's not ideal for big boobs, but it's so adorable I wanted to wear it anyway.
Love this dress! I normally wear a 4 but the dress runs quite small so i wore a 6 and it fit great!

I was nervous to rent this dress because of all the sizing issues left in reviews by previous renters. The 10R ended up fitting perfectly and the dress looked beautiful. The only complaint I have is how busty I felt the dress became as the night went on.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful flowing dress for a Wedding
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for a backyard wedding in AZ in feb (70s). I agree with the other reviews to size up since the ribcage is very tight. I am normally a 6/8 and was glad I got the 10R. Will rent again!

The dress looked absolutely stunning! A tiny bit tight I guess I could have sized up but then I don't think it would have sat correctly. The straps gave me bruises from rubbing so much though, the material of the outer dress is a little rough for bare skin.

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on this dress! I wore it on the shoulders (still looked cute)
links_Review_Text: The fit was very tight around the bust area (I am a 32C, 105 lbs, 5'1 inches) so my boobs naturally were pushed up but it looked super good. I also didn't like the dress as much off the shoulder so I pushed the straps on my shoulder and I really liked that look. Perfect for a wedding!

links_Review_Title: I rented this dress for family photos and it was absolutely beautiful!
links_Review_Text: The dress fit beautifully everywhere except for my boobs. It was actually so tight I didn’t zip it all the Way up to give my chest more room. I was able to get away with it because it was pictures but if it were for an event I would have needed a 6

links_Review_Title: Compliments all night - great fit, style and color!
links_Review_Text: This dress was so fun to wear. It fit the boho theme perfectly at this wedding. The color and cut were perfect. The material is light so it wasn't too hot on the dance floor! The only complaint I have is that it was a little right around my hips and waist. I have a pretty small waist so the 4 being small is unusual. Otherwise it was the perfect dress! I'll definitely rent from this designer again.

links_Review_Title: Obsessed I wanted to own it
links_Review_Text: I ordered this dress for my engagement photos and it did not disappoint. My fiancé even offered to buy it for me he liked it so much. Does run small, had to wear my larger back up size and even that required some muscle to zip

I've owned Reformation before, so I knew what to expect. The material has no stretch and is not very forgiving. If you're in between sizes definitely size up! I wasn't able to wear a bra just because the bust was so small. I made it work though! The style is simple, but feminine. Overall a really beautiful dress!

Amazing dress! I usually wear a 4 but had to rent a 2 since it was the closest size available before the event, and it still fit. The 2 was a bit snug but it worked out since its strapless and I never had to adjust the top. Highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: Simple and trendy dress. Lots of compliments.
links_Review_Text: Like other reviews, the dress does fit rather small in the mid-section. I did end up sizing up so it fit just perfect. The dress allows for a strapless bra. The top falls down a bit, so not as ideal for dancing in... Had multiple people ask if it was Reformation; lots of compliments. Would have loved for the black to be available for fall wedding, but the mauve/pink ended up being just fine!
Loved this dress for a late fall wedding. I'm usually an 8, but the 10 fit well. It was a little tight in the chest, but nothing unbearable.
Dress fit like a glove, and ran the slightest bit small, but overall was very flattering. I received lots of compliments and the color and fit!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress just not what I needed
links_Review_Text: I have small boobs. This dress kinda hung funny in that area. But gorgeous dress and flattering.

This dress is stunning, sooo many complements. Only issue is that in my opinion is runs super small. I'm a size 28 jeans and 34C and I was surprised that the 6 was a little tight. Other than that- great!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful if you don't have a large chest
links_Review_Text: Extremely feminine and flattering but absolutely no room in the chest area- even without a bra, it felt like my chest could not breathe. Would recommend if you are A or B cup.

Reformation is one of my favorite brands and this dress did not disappoint! Absolutely loved it and got so many compliments! The 2 fit perfectly and I didn't need to wear a bra, but it might be too snug in the chest area for someone with a larger bust. I wore it to a wedding this past weekend and it was perfect for the beginning of Fall. Highly recommend!!

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a wedding rehearsal and rehearsal dinner in March.
links_Review_Text: Tight but was able to wear it. I also ordered a 2 but preferred the length of the size 0. I am 5’0, and 105 lbs.

As was described by most people - you will need to rent 2 sizes up! I could only rent one size up and the hips/waist fit but it would not zip up over my chest. I'm normally a size 4 and the 6 was too tight in the bust. Definitely a shame because it is REALLY cute.

Someone thought I was a model wearing this dress LOL - very tight in the chest area, not for girls with larger chest and very tight over the ribs but this prevents it from falling down. I have an athletic build and a lot of dresses that run small dont fit my butt but the bottom of the dress has more room than the top. Overall very cute, elegant!
I thought I ordered a large enough size based off the reviews. But I was wrong. Couldn't zip!

I ordered this dress in a 2 and a 6 after reading the reviews (no 4 available). The 2 I couldn't get on at all, the 6 would not zip. I should add that I am 10 weeks pregnant, which likely didn't help. I wish it would have fit because the dress is beautiful. Just order up one or 2 sizes.

I unfortunately couldn't wear this dress because it ran very small (which I had read already in all the other reviews). I ordered my usual size then a size up, but even the larger size felt like two sizes too small. I would STRONGLY recommend you order a size up and then the extra one two sizes up. Don't bother ordering your usual size. Customer service was so helpful though to offer a solution! RTR has the best customer service!
I normally wear a size 8 and based on the reviews I ordered a size up and it was still too small. Beautiful dress, amazing fabric, just didn't fit.

Last year I rented a 4 in the butterfly dress and it was so cute. This year I rented the 6 based on reviews that said it was running really small. It fit like a zero (and sometimes I can wear a zero). I couldn't even zip it up. The 6! So I swapped it for a 10. It was HUGE! Drowning and hideous. These florals look like church lady dresses if the fit is baggy and on this dress too big means the arms don't stay in place and the whole from of the dress falls down. So I am giving up!!!

links_Review_Title: I wore this for a formal wedding.
links_Review_Text: Reformation runs very small, I am normally a size 4 Petite but rented an 8R (no petites were available). The 8R fit perfectly - and despite it not being in Petite it wasn't too long on me which is good because I am 5'0". I could've wore it with or without heels. The dress was comfortable, high quality and flattering - just remember to size up.

links_Review_Title: WAY TOO SMALL. This is made for a stick figure.
links_Review_Text: Not for someone with a large bust or hips. I sized up and it was still too small.

links_Review_Title: Super gorgeous dress... but YOWZA it was small!
links_Review_Text: I couldn't even zip it... I'm planning to rent it again in a size 6R and hope it fits, because it is so beautiful for fall!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous outdoor autumn wedding at the botanical gardens
links_Review_Text: The dress fit perfectly; I know this brand generally runs small so definitely recommend a backup size. I personally needed a strapless bra, but some might be able to get away without. Very lightweight and breezy - got very cold at the end of the night. I received so many compliments throughout the night - highly recommend!
Tight and low cut, but long so doesnt feel OVERLY sexy

links_Review_Title: I did not end up wearing this dress
links_Review_Text: Runs very small, beautiful dress!

links_Review_Title: It is a very cute dress for daytime parties. It might run small for some people on the chest area.
links_Review_Text: I am 5' 5 120lbs. It was a good fit for me. However it will run small on the chest area for most oc the people. Arm area can be a bit uncomfortable too.

links_Review_Title: I didn't end up wearing this dress.
links_Review_Text: I couldn't decide what size to get, and after reading reviews decided to size up to a 12R (though i think the 10R would have been better, it wasn't in stock!). The 12R was just slightly too big all around. Pretty dress, and nice cut/pattern for a fall wedding, but it didn't work for me.

I didn't end up wearing this dress (luckily I had ordered another style) as it runs REALLY small. I usually wear a 4/6, sometimes an 8 - the the 8 was too tight for me. I have a larger chest so that might be why, but definitely size up! Otherwise this dress is really beautiful, the fabric does not stretch though.
Veronica Beard does it again! Love this dress for work - super cute.
Loved wearing this dress. The fit on top is great and the length was perfectly classy however I had to pin the waist as it ran a bit large. Highly recommend for a dressier work day!

links_Review_Title: Just for work and it was a great first impression!
links_Review_Text: Good fit! Just make sure you Snap the sides well! Sometimes they came undone... lovely dress
Runs a bit tight .. but that's the look I tnink
Great dress, lots of compliments. Runs a little big and long. I'm 5'0 so I rolled it a bit under the elastic waist to make it shorter.

I loved this dress! It was a tad big on me which was surprising because other Veronica Beard dresses in this size have required spanx to look good in!! Since this dress was a little roomy I was really comfortable in it and looked too cute with tights and booties. I love the turtleneck aspect to it.
Did not want to sent this back. The fit is so flattering as is cinches your waist and holds you in where you want it to. Gorgeous details and super comfortable! Could not recommend more.
I loved this dress because of the draping details making it a bit asymmetrical, high neck, and festive print for the holidays.
It wasn't bad but it needs to be skin tight to be flattering in any way. I should've gotten a 0/2. 5'6.5 135lbs for ref. I makes you look big in pictures.

links_Review_Title: Totally on trend - lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: A mini dress for tall curvy girls! Yayyyyy!! I loved this.

Loved the details on this dress, like the buttons on the shoulder. I'm a 10-12, mostly a 12 in dresses, so I'd say this runs true to size. I wore this to dinner and everyone loved this dress! I thought it was a little too formal for my office so I returned it, but I wished I had more places to wear it!

links_Review_Title: So cute my Mom borrowed the next day!
links_Review_Text: Fit was awesome- great length even with a heel. The neck is also not too tight! I did struggle with the lining riding up when I was walking all day & I had to keep pulling it down. Overall one of my favorite rentals!!
Very fitted through the hips and tummy but so flattering!! Loved wearing this!
Fit perfect.
Love this dress. Perfect for a dressier work event.
I wore this to a fancy dinner out with OTK boots and it was perfect in the New England winter. The detailing of the dress makes it unique but not overly styled. Would rent again.

Dress is tts. Fabric is soft and comfortable. Wore it to party and got so much compliments. Can be dress up or down. Wore it on a different day with sneakers to a more casual event and got compliments from left and right. Will def be renting this one again in the spring.
I liked this dress! It was appropriate for an office holiday party, and was very comfortable / flattering all night.
Beautiful!!! Design is so elegant and fabric is really good and pretty! Beautiful dress!

Wasn't expecting to like this dress as much as I did! I wore it to a fall wedding in Colorado where the ceremony was outside and the reception inside, so it was nice to have long sleeves. The structure of the top was very flattering. I usually wear a 14 but that wasn't available so I ordered the 16. The 16 fit just fine; it was on the larger side but it looked intentionally loose rather than more fitted. I think you could size up if you want a less fitted look. Great for people with big boobs because you can wear a regular bra and the top is roomy!

Really sexy but sophisticated for a party, wore with black peep toe booties. I will say if you are on the thicker side like myself with wide hips, it rides up which is usually always an issue for me with most dresses but I was still comfortable!
This had a great fit and look. It fit perfectly and loved the details. Would def rent again.

This dress fits very large. I'm 5'5, 150lbs and got a size medium. Had about 2-3 inches of extra fabric and the chest area looked way too big on me. So... size down 2 sizes maybe? I do love the color and the dress is v cute. Casual but could also be dressed down.

links_Review_Title: Cute but small in mid area
links_Review_Text: Need to wear Spanx. Dress was tight in mid section. Overall, cute dress
This dress is both stylish and comfortable. It is a very flattering cut as well. Highly recommend

links_Review_Title: Cute dress, perfect midi length for tall ladies
links_Review_Text: Fit well, great length and I'm 5'9.5". If you are shorter it might be very long for you. Really cute dress.

links_Review_Title: So adorable!!! Tight in the bum.
links_Review_Text: Didnt wear due to ir being tight on my butt ;( Super cute cut and light material.
This dress is fairly fitted, especially in the bust, so keep that in mind. I am a size 4 and ordered the small and it fit well. I am a 34C and it fit just right In this area. Tons of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Cute dress but was not able to wear.
links_Review_Text: Runs small.

links_Review_Title: So cute and comfortable. I received many compliments. The fabric was comfortable and classy.
Surprised how cute it looked Well cut and swingy
links_Review_Text: 5'9 121 lbs Don't usually take xs but this is what came Wore it with a black cropped jacket and knee high black boots to work and a work party Lots of compliments

The fabric, cut, and pattern of this dress are wonderful. The puffed sleeves are a nice touch without being overwhelming on a petite body. Ultimately I wasn't able to wear, it though, because the dress runs large and I usually wear a 0. Definitely size down if you can!
It was a really pretty dress but too tight in the bust.
This top is a LOT in person. Not for me.
I love this top! I'm thinking about buying it. I got tons of compliments. It's super soft and feminine.
I could see this working in casual and even work environments with the right styling. I really liked this blouse. The fabric was soft, and the design was comfortable for traveling and sightseeing.
Loved this top, definitely the puffy big shoulder! Great fabric, pretty green!
Cute top. Good fabric and cut. Good for the Holidays.
Did not wear
For me it just wasn't my style or anything special.
Got so many compliments. The sleeves are just right.
Loved this, would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful and fun too! I bit big on the arms
links_Review_Text: I loved the quality, design and color of this top! I would have given it five stars except it runs a bit large in the shoulders and arms. I didn't mind it too much though since you can wear it under or over so many options. I'll definitely pick it up again!

Wore this to work on a Friday and then proceeded to go out in it! Length of the shirt can be adjusted to make it more or less of a cropped look. Only con was the shoulders were a tad puffier then I expected. Would rent again!

I rented this while it was still semi cold out and found some really great alternative ways to wear it! Its really great by itself but ALSO with a shirt underneath! Follow me for other RTR ideas! @alisa.kahn on instagram!
Probably could have worn SR or MR -- wasn't terribly big but flexible fit

links_Review_Title: This will turn heads - not your average blazer!
links_Review_Text: This is a boyfriend fit so even if you size down it will fit a little oversized. I wore this to a Billy Idol concert in Las Vegas with a black tee & black vegan leather pants. It was perfect!

I ended up not wearing this because of the fit. Very big/slouchy. I'm usually a small to medium in tops and rented the 6 and it looks like it was wearing me. The print is bold and shiny, maybe too adventurous for my taste.

links_Review_Title: The color was perfect, fitted very well and was aewsome for my photo shoot ,

links_Review_Text: Rented the jacket for a trip to Vegas. Wore before trip trip to country club with a pair of black pants and instantly fell in love with it. Great shade of pink, animal print, and a bit of shine, all my favorites. At the last minute decided to rent the pants for Vegas and this outfit did not disappoint! Many compliments all evening from both men and women. YOU MUST RENT BOTH PIECES!!

This suit is absolutely perfect. I have a pretty small waste but very curvy- and this fit perfectly! I also paired it w size 8 pants. Probably could have done a size 10 pant. Truly felt like Harry styles in this and I loved every moment.

links_Review_Title: Incredibly comfy, Like silk pjs , with sparkle that pics don't do justice
links_Review_Text: I wore this for an Elton John party and felt like I was truly live my RTR member potential with the endless compliments for such a unique piece

links_Review_Title: Fun Blazer to Dress Up Your LBD!
links_Review_Text: This is the second time I've rented this incredible blazer. It did not disappoint either time. I never wear a size zero so I'm assuming the sizing of this brand is different. I normally wear a 4 or 6 in a blazer. The zero for perfectly!
Great pop of color against neutrals. I styled it with jeans, a tank and heels for date night. Definitely a loose fit.
The jacket was lightweight and super comfortable. And so fun. I got so many compliments, I was feeling myself.
So fun. So cool. It's a red cheetah metallic jacket. Unforgettably awesome. Don't wear if you don't want to be a badass.
I wore this for work and then out for a birthday brunch. It's even more beautiful in person. I saw it in the RTR store and made a bee line to the rack. It's a fun twist on a classic menswear piece.

So many compliments! This surprisingly light-weight blazer was comfortable and was the life of every party I went to in it. Work holiday party, dinner out, casual holiday party - I got a million compliments from people, and even had people I didn't know come over and comment on it. It runs relatively large - I have broad shoulders, and the 4 was fine even though size 4 sometimes runs tight, especially in blazers. The fit is loose through the body, and it can be dressed up or dressed down with jeans and a t-shirt. One of my favorite rentals ever.
Paired this with a tight black body suit and received tons of compliments, excellent quality and photographs really well

... you MUST rent this with the matching pants and wear it together. I DARE you. I've never received so many compliments on my outfit since I've started doing RTR than I did in this. click over to my review of the pants to see them with glitter boots. fabric is much more of a berry color, very shiny, and this blazer runs large. not huge but definitely try to size down one size. I have broader shoulders and this was a little swimmy on me! enjoy!!!

links_Review_Title: Show stopper but the pants fit a little tight across the hips
links_Review_Text: I didn't end up wearing this suit because the pants were just a little bit tighter than I wanted them to be across the hips. I'm in between sizes, so fitted dress pants can be a challenge if they have no stretch. But I LOVED this suit so much.

Rented for a work holiday party. It was a big hit! The sleeves are short (but they look better rolled up anyway) and it's boxy every where else. I should have sized down, but honestly, the over-sized blazer was a good look.

If you're usually I between sizes, I would actually size down for a more form fit. I went with an oversized look so this worked well. It's actually more magenta than maroon, still v cute. Got tons of compliments!
Sassy for a pop of color. Easy to wear comfort too

links_Review_Title: Adorable jacket but I selected the wrong size for long arms
links_Review_Text: I loved this jacket, but I should have gotten the size 6 instead of the 4. The arms were just too short for me. I could have rolled them up, but the jacket was just too snug overall. I may try the size 6 sometime, but I'm a little worried that even the 6 will fit snug. In the pic, jacket almost looks like it's made of sequins. It's not. It's shiny thread with an animal print. It really is cute. I wanted to wear it with jeans and a black camisole. Maybe next time!
It was big. Not form fitting

Rented this for a night out in Vegas. Was perfect for that, casual snazzy glam but not in your face. I paired it with a pair a light wash skinny jeans, black pumps, black tank top, and some big hoop earrings. I wore the 14 and had the 16 as a back up, in case that was tight. Was NOT tight. HUGE actually. Body of the blazer was very very big and made to hang open, so I wore the 14 and rolled the sleeves up. (They were very very short on my long arms and torso). I'd rent this again, it was fun to have something different!
Fun jacket! Lots of compliments. A little thin and flimsy and runs a little large.
I loved this jacket it was such a statement piece and I got so many compliments.

The deep pink color was vibrant and the leopard print was so fun. However, the cut is boxy and unconstructed and the material is very thin. I wore it with tight, slim leather leggings and tall booties to balance the look. It would also pair nicely with a slim bandage-style dress.

links_Review_Title: Tight in the back, loose in the front
links_Review_Text: This material is sparkly and fun, but very cheap feeling. It's hard for me to believe the retail price. The fit of this jacket is just odd. It's tight in the back, but there is a ton of extra in the front. Something about how the arms attach to the jacket is odd. Cute enough to wear once, but glad I don't own it.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments - fun, stylish blazer
links_Review_Text: I opted for a fun pantsuit look for my work party and so glad I found this blazer. People were loving it! It's so stylish and fun.
Just to large to wear, sent back and exchanged for smaller size

links_Review_Title: I didn't end up wearing this jacket because it was a bit too wide on me and wasn't overly flattering
links_Review_Text: Very pretty color and pattern but it is a bit wide and wasn't the most flattering on me so I didn't end up wearing it.
Was worried based on reviews the 8 would be too big but it's chic when oversized! Can't wait to wear it with and without the matching pants!
I wore this to a cotillion...I got so many compliments. LOVED IT

links_Review_Title: Wanted to like it, but I didn't.
links_Review_Text: Weird sleeve length made this one a no for me. The picture is a true representation of what you get but the fit was weird for me
Beautiful color and fabric. Very sophisticated. Surprisingly, the 8 just swam on me. Got a 4 and it was perfect. Recommended!

Ordered this ahead of time for the holidays. It's truly a WOW piece that could be worn with jeans, black leather/velvet pants or a LBD. I am going to quickly return this and go down a size (my reg size) because the 14 is too big.
I love Figue dresses, this one is no exception. I sized down and paired it with a Gucci belt to make it feel less casual; just wish I had somewhere to wear it...!

Empire waist, loose fitting casual midi length dress. The fabric and details are stunning especially considering it's something that style wise I'd wear at a pool party or to hang around the house. I went to the chiropractor (shorts underneath) and I dropped an RTR garment bag at the UPS Store. Both times the dress was complimented by multiple people. The dress does nothing for me in terms of figure flattery. I'm an hourglass and this thing is hanging like a sack off my widest parts. But I feel so pretty in this fabric that I kind of don't care. I will buy it if I rent again and if the price is a bit lower. If you want to wear something really pretty yet casual when it's hot outside: consider this beautiful dress. If you are between sizes or if you are small in the ribcage: size down.

This dress is super sexy. Hugs curves really well. Fabric has some stretch to it, and the side detail provides a lot of figure hugging ruching that is very flattering. Which is needed because the fabric shows everything (eg every detail of my lace undergarment). The top was super tricky for me - it does not provide much coverage at all, there was serious spillage, and it sat precariously over my nipples. Not made for women with ample breasts.
I love this dress! Very form fitting!

Loved the synched side and the fabric was forgiving enough to flatter my growing pregnant belly but the top cups were weird. The shape allows for side boob which may be flattering for some or just look undone for others. The deep v is too wide to hide a strapless bra. Just wish the cups were thought out a bit better for different body types. Otherwise a pretty dress for VDay !
When I walked or loved the zipper on the side would buckle out and stay that way until I pushed the dress down.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful Dress, but Small in Bust
links_Review_Text: This dress is so pretty and flattering, but small in the bust. The cups are quite small; I don't think they'd fit sizes larger than a B cup. The dress fit great around my hips, but I could not zip it up over my breasts (it has a side zipper).

links_Review_Title: This dress is Palm Springs meets Mrs. Roper multiplied by the power of MCM.
links_Review_Text: 1. This dress fit is based on an internal strapless bra. That's literally the only place it clasps. So choose a size based on that. Runs TTS. 2. I wore it barefoot to play around in the house and change the tail light on my truck. I'm 5'6" and it didn't drag. 3. The dress swings and sways in a way that makes you feel free from the burdens of everyday life. This is how I found myself just wearing it on a work from home day. Once I tried it on I couldn't take it off.

This is a beautiful dress perfect for a tropical vacation. The color is absolutely gorgeous and so vibrant. I have rented a size 2 Acler before, but unfortunately this one was far big for me - I could not get the dress to stay up at all. Really bummed it didn't work out and that they didn't have any smaller sizes, but this dress is perfect otherwise!
Little big around chest

links_Review_Title: Nice change of pace daily wear
links_Review_Text: Cut top. Cool for a change of pace to usual sweaters. The hood is a little awkward and large bust takes away from the overall design. Thick but not heavy. Great for mild and cold weather. #sweater #dailywear
Super cute and unique sweater!!! It just can get a little bit uncomfortable to wear all day because of the buttons!! Otherwise love it!!
Fancy hoody! Looks small out of package but fit true to size. Interesting detail on shoulder and across chest. I liked this and wore several times before returning.
The only reason I didn't give the sweater a 5-star review is because I picked up the wrong size and it was too big for me. But I know I'd like it if fit. I'll be renting this again.

links_Review_Title: Great style BUT, tight under the armpits and hood was weird.
links_Review_Text: Dapite sizing up into the large, the fabric was tight under the armpits. The hood fits very strangely and my friend said I looked a q-tip. Give this a miss.

The sweater looks great in the pictures but was so wrong on. The only plus I have is that the length was great for my long torso. The negatives are: it made my shoulders look so broad and they aren't. The head opening was so small the sweater felt like it was suffocating me. Never ended up wearing it.

links_Review_Title: Not flattering for somewhat broad shoulders.

links_Review_Text: I tried to go through with it but couldn't. The buttons going around the underarms made it so uncomfortable. On top of that, the sweater is knitted and has a more cinched and unforgiving bottom hem that cut into your waist. It seemed like it wasn't given much thought upon construction.

I'm typically a small in tops but sized up because it was a sweater and based on other reviews. The medium was way too big for the top part of my chest. It is a knot sweater so all the extra fabric looked bunched and looked off on me. May try again but in a small.
This top can take you many places. Perfect for casual weekends. Great architectural piece.
The fit is tight but it is a super cute sweater. I received a ton of compliments at the party. Size up!!!
This sweater was super flattering and fit very well. I wish I could've kept it, got lots of compliments!
I didn't love this. The collar with the hood made it a weird fit around the neck. I also didn't love the band around the bottom. Too bad because the buttons were an interesting feature
Very interesting style. Got so many compliments. Perfect for work and weekend.

This dress fit like a glove, I accidentally caught my skin on the zipper when I first tried it on, but it was avoided on the day of. The dress has built in padding so no bra required. The fabric is soft and it flows beautifully. It has two layers of a silk-like fabric under the top layer of fabric, so it's slightly weighted but it felt good! Heels were worn, I'd say they were about 2 in, maybe 2 1/2 in. The fabric was just high enough off the ground. Loved this dress so much!!!

Unfortunately, I was unable to wear the dress for the event as it was too small. I'm typically a 4-6R, and even the 8R was too tight within my rib cage to wear. I lasted a whole ten minutes in it before I had to remove it. Disappointed I was unable to wear it for the event, I wish there had been a recommendation to size up well beyond my standard size. On a lighter note, very content with the delivery given how last minute my order was!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for my COVID - 19 Elopement
links_Review_Text: My fiancé and I had to postpone our wedding due to COVID-19 & wanted to elope but unfortunately my wedding dress was still stuck in alterations. I rented this dress from Hah and it ended up being so perfect for our small, outdoor mountain ceremony. The dress is really stretchy/form fitting so I recommend sizing up if you plan on eating/want it to fit less skin tight. Finally make sure to wear to wear spanx, a snug slip or nude undergarments as it is a bit see through! Highly recommend this dress

This dress runs VERY large!! At almost 5'8 and 125lbs, the small (which I originally got) was HUGE. The sleeves didn't stay up on my shoulders and the waist was really big. This photo is of the XS. Still fit a bit big on top, and the sleeves kept falling down, but they looked cute that ways. The waist was perfect. This dress is super cute, comfy, and has packets!! I loved it!! Definitely go down 2 sizes if possible.

Usually a medium or small but if I rented this dress again I would get the extra small it definitely ran a little large, as love shack fancy tends to do. The tie dye was so pretty and on trend for spring I loved it. Puffy sleeves made me feel so cute and girly. Overall loved this dress !!
Slightly large on the shoulders , super nice and comfy fabric !

links_Review_Title: Live this dress! It just kept falling off my shoulders. I could have sized down.

links_Review_Text: It was huge on top, wouldn't stay on my shoulders. The empire waist was in a weird place, to low to be empire to high to be normal. Sleeves were extremely puffy. It had potential, but it was just a weird fit any in every area. I didn't wear it

links_Review_Title: Big in the waist and bust, going to size down and see how it works!
links_Review_Text: Very cute though

links_Review_Title: So big I double checked the tag
links_Review_Text: I tried this dress on and really wanted to love it but I swear it is at least 2 sizes bigger than the size I ordered (XS). I checked the tag to be sure I wasn't sent another size by mistake but sure enough it says XS. I'm a pretty standard size 2 and this was so loose in the shoulders and bust that the sleeves just fell down (it's a square neck so it's NOT a cute look) & the elasticized waist was loose. Might be fine if you size WAY down!

links_Review_Title: Way too small. Order two sizes up.
links_Review_Text: Dress was beautiful but ran two sizes Too small.
Dress was a little tight from my hips other than that this was a fabulous dress

I was on the fence about this dress because so many reviews said it ran small. I reluctantly got a size 2 and was happy when I was able to put it on - I had a hard time zipping the area around my chest. Once on, and fully zipped, the dress was fab. So flattering and so sexy; my husband LOVED it. I could have gone with a size 4 and would have been happy. I initially felt like a sausage in a casing, but was the only person who knew the dress was in fact tight on me. FYI - material didn't loosen.
I absolutely LOVED this dress. The cut is beautiful and it feels expensive!

links_Review_Title: You gotta work this dress ladies!
links_Review_Text: Curve hugging. I could've probably gone a size bigger to be more comfortable but this made me feel like a bombshell. Also made my small chest look amazing. Didn't need to wear a bra with it. The length made me feel very 50s due to my height, made it a bit more formal that way. Great dress!
I’m 5’5” 125 lbs and wear size 4 in most everything. Ordered size 4 in this dress and sized up to 6 for extra dress based on other reviews. Size 4 was too snug and the 6 was perfect.
My boyfriend actually picked this out for me and of course he loved it lol it fit me like a glove and I got so many compliments!
This fit like a glove! Very flattering. Tons of compliments

This dress runs very true to size, with not much room to move. I often go between a 2-4 and wore the 4 in this dress. The straps do not adjust. The dress does have a full zip back and slit in the rear area. However, I was not able to slide the dress up over my hips to use the restroom...so that was a bit of a bother. Other than that minor detail, this dress was FABULOUS and I got a ton of compliments all night long. It's beautiful on and is great for a party or special event. Loved it and will def rent again. ♥

Received tons of compliments on this dress at my husband's work holiday party! Form fitting, but the structure of the dress makes it very flattering. Runs quite small, as I had to go 2 sizes up. Only complaint would be slight gaping in the chest, as I am only a B-cup.

links_Review_Title: GORGEOUS AND SEXY!! Favorite rental of 2019!
links_Review_Text: It's such an amazing dress, I'm buying it! It's truly such a sexy but profesional dress. My husband couldn't keep his hands off me :-D it does run a tad small so it's ok to size up!

links_Review_Title: I look forward to this annual fundraising event for our children's school.
links_Review_Text: I've had three kids and I'm not as firm as I once was and this dress made my body look fantastic without and spanx! I normally wear a size 4 but saw that this runs small so I ordered a 6. It was very tight but not unwearable, I think it's supposed to fit that tight. I have a 34B bust and the dress made my boobs look amazing. This was my backup dress and I ended up wearing my first choice but I wanted to try this one on so I could give it an accurate review.

links_Review_Title: Great looking dress. Too small for me.
links_Review_Text: I wear a two, I rented a size 2. Too snug of a fit. Never worn.
I wore a dress that was a little more appropriate for the event but I did love this dress.

links_Review_Title: super cute but too small in the bust
links_Review_Text: super cute but too small in the bust

links_Review_Title: This dress is gorgeous, classic, and sexy!
links_Review_Text: GO TWO SIZES UP. I'm normally a true 4 and the 6 took a lot of work to get into. Once it was on, it was superb!

I'm a 6/8, and definitely needed to do the 8. This dress is incredible and very sexy (the length keeps it appropriate for dinner considering how form fitting it is), but if you're between sizes definitely size up.

links_Review_Title: Too long for me to wear. Straps also not adjustable.
links_Review_Text: Too long for my petite height! Otherwise would have worn. Cute dress.
Please size up - I'm usually a 2 but the 2 wouldn't zip over my bust I'll try the 4 next time but it's really a cute sexy dress

links_Review_Title: Runs very small! Recommend going two sizes up
links_Review_Text: The dress is longer than you'd think.

This dress was way too tight! I sized up, but it was a weird fit. Since it was so long and fitted, I had to take it off to use the bathroom and the zipper got stuck. I also couldn't walk properly because it was so tight around the lower legs. I felt like a geisha walking. It was super sexy, but not worth it. Keep looking.

links_Review_Title: Sexy and sophisticated. May be buying this cause i don't want to send back!
links_Review_Text: Felt a little lingerie-ish but once on I felt incredible in this perfect little black dress
This dress runs slightly small. I'm glad I ordered the 10 as the backup size because the dress runs small. The dress was a hit and I received compliments all night.

links_Review_Title: Too small to wear, but loved it
links_Review_Text: I ordered a six because they were out of size eight. I float between the two sizes depending on the dress and this one was definitely a true six. I could fit into it, but it would've been too tight to wear and enjoy my evening. Would love to try it again in a size eight.
Great, dress just ran small.
This dress is sexy, sexy, sexy. It was a bit big on me but size 12 wasn't available so I settled for the 14. Dress hugs all curves, I felt like Jessica Rabbit 😂
The dress was beautiful, but ran too small for me to wear.
It even has pockets! Fits true to size. Gorgeous!
Beautiful jumpsuit in bold color. Fit was great, although I usually shy away from jumpsuits. I included the butt photo because it made even my skinny rear look nice!
Perfect torso length and overall pant length! Loved this. Very comfy and flattering!
Besides the length (I️ used some fashion tape to temporarily hem for the evening), the fit was absolutely perfect. I️ got so many compliments. I️ absolutely loved it!

I want to keep this! I'm 5'3" and rarely find a jumpsuit that works for me. (I still need considerable heels in this one for the length to work, however). The color is vibrant and the fabric is a flowy crepe material. A must rent!

I'm 5'2 and 120lbs...I never know if I should get the 4 short or 4 regular when it comes to outfits like this. My heels were a couple of inches, maybe 3, so hopefully this picture can help other shorty's decide what they would prefer! ; ) On another note, I loved this outfit!!!! Quality, fit, style was excellent!
Flattering fit! I loved the peplum detail and ruffle to one side. The pant length was slightly shorter than expected.

When I first tried it on, I was worried that it was a little too "Barney" in color. The longer I had it on the more I liked it. It was comfortable and fit well. The only con: it was a little big in the top. However, I think a 4 would have been a little snug everywhere else. Definitely recommend.
The length on this is FIRE! Such a cute jumpsuit and super easy to wear. Enjoy RTR friends!
Fit as intended. Perfect length as well.

links_Review_Title: Frustrating that I was sent the wrong size.
links_Review_Text: It runs a little large. I ordered the 0P and was sent the regular 0, so obviously length was an issue. But the overall 0 size felt a bit looser than other 0's.
Loved this! Fit perfectly!

links_Review_Title: Unexpectedly Cute and a Perfect Fit
links_Review_Text: I never wear jumpsuits because I'm self conscious about my wider hips but this fit perfectly and covered my hips and stomach nicely. I'm just under 6'8 and the long was perfect with super tall heels. As with all RTR stuff, I'm a size up (6), but at stores like Banana I'm a 4.

links_Review_Title: Fit me perfect lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: comfy pockets and loved asymmetrical design. length was good with pumps. unique.

links_Review_Title: It was my son's bar mitzvah
links_Review_Text: flattering for curvy girls! great color

links_Review_Title: Really nice piece, but just a little too short
links_Review_Text: I actually ordered the 8 and 10 in this and didn't keep either. I often wear a size bigger on the bottom, so I never know what's going to work. The 8 fit a bit better, but was too short to wear with heels, and just a little snug at my hips. The 10 was roomier, but still not long enough. Fabric and cut were really nice though - it was so close and I really wanted to wear it.

links_Review_Title: The venue, the friends, and the dress.
links_Review_Text: I loved it.

links_Review_Title: Sexy, classy and versatile! Wish I owned this!!
links_Review_Text: I wore this jumpsuit for a weekend out in AC. It was perfect for dinner & drinks, the club and a wedding after party. This jumpsuit fit perfectly, except for the crotch, which was baggy, but barely noticeable. I wore a sticky bra with it. A regular black bra can be wore with it, but will hide the beautiful lace detail on the sides. LOVED the pockets! It was the right amount of sexy and classy! I received a TON of compliments on this. Wish I owned it! Rent it, you won't regret it!
It's very flattering and true to size

links_Review_Title: Perfect for night out in Vegas
links_Review_Text: Loved this! Got so many compliments from people I didn't know. Straps were a little loose and had to pull them up but worth it for the outfit! Def will rent again!

This jumpsuit fits like a glove. No issues with the straps being too long for me with this size. I'm 5'4", but the length was perfect. I got a lot of appreciative stares and compliments with this one!! Very sexy and classy. I'm planning to wear it with a Gucci signature belt when I get one for my birthday. Love!!!

links_Review_Title: So perfect and sassy.. I rented it twice!!
links_Review_Text: Love it!! I wore it to daytime super bowl parties last year and it was so comfy, sassy, & had just the right amount of sex appeal. I also wore it to my birthday celebration (July) in Chicago. I would totally buy this piece if it were for sale!!

links_Review_Title: Wore for NYE. Perfect fit and length. Extremely flattering. Got compliments & felt comfy all night.
links_Review_Text: I cannot say enough good things about this jumpsuit. I was a little nervous because since I'm a bit bustier, I typically size up for fitted clothing like this. My larger backup size wasn't available though, so I had to take the risk and hope my true size would fit. It fit like a glove. Even the length was perfect. They don't offer this jumpsuit in petite lengths, so I was fully prepared for this to be too long, but it cut right at my ankle where it was supposed to and looked fantastic. My only gripe is RTR is now 3 for 3 on messing up my order this year. My first two orders of the year just never made it to me, period. I paid for the 8-day rental on this jumpsuit so I could have it before I left for NYE, and not only did they not have my backup size available, but this got delayed in shipping and ended up getting to me literally as I walked out the door to head for my vacation. I got lucky this time, but more and more I'm feeling like this site isn't worth the risk and the hassle...

links_Review_Title: LOVE this jumpsuit. Comfortable and luxe.
links_Review_Text: This jumpsuit was perfect for the all-black birthday party I attended. The material is high quality and I loved how it fit my curves. I liked this jumpsuit so much I was tempted to wear it to a holiday party the very next night lol. Would absolutely order again :)

links_Review_Title: Be prepared to readjust the straps ALL night!
links_Review_Text: I loved this outfit for my 40th birthday! It's sexy and fun and overall easy to wear. I am 5'9" so this was a crop leg on me but I didn't mind at all. The top is very revealing, (34DDD) but that is the look I was going for. The straps (as mentioned in other reviews) are seriously a PIA... we tried to safety pin them, but they kept coming loose if you did any moving... I eventually gave up and just kept putting the straps back up ALL night... if that could be fixed by the designer... ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Fun and sexy.

links_Review_Title: Super flattering but had to fashion tape it on because the straps were too long
links_Review_Text: I loved this jumpsuit, I got tons of compliments on it. It was great for sitting because then the straps would stay in place. I couldn't wear a bra because it was too low cut so I had to use fashion tape across my breasts and under the straps on top of my shoulders. This worked great for the first couple hours before I had to pee, then I had to retape. Was a total pain. I'm a true B so my boobs filled out the top but the straps were unadjustable and slipped down without tape.
I sized up and was glad. It is a little tight in the chest, so I ended up wearing without a bra. The lace cutouts and lace at the top make it look fairly high end

I had always wanted to try Rent the Runway and finally had an event to use it. I was a little nervous because what if either of the sizes did not fit but was actually happy that both sizes fit (8 and 10) but I went with the 10 for more room to sit down. The straps were big but a little tape and it was all good. I had a lot of compliments about it and will def continue to use RTR
I felt beyond amazing in this jumpsuit. Wore it out while celebrating my 30th birthday in Las Vegas, and could not have loved it more.

links_Review_Title: Bachelorette Party-sexy and fun and comfortable!
links_Review_Text: I rented this for my bachelorette party and I felt sexy and comfortable all night. The only thing is that it is VERY low cut, so I did feel a little uncomfortable with how much cleavage I was showing but that is just me (and I have a lot to show off). I think others mentioned the straps being too long, if I had pinned them that might have helped but they weren't as long on me to where they were slipping off. The cutouts on the side were fun. Great material, comfortable enough in it to do some karaoke leg kicks! Downside: the zipper gets a bit stuck around the belting so I needed help to get it on and off every bathroom trip. Worth it!

links_Review_Title: I got a lot of compliments on my outfit and it was so comfortable!
links_Review_Text: The jumpsuit fit great and the length was perfect. The straps were a little long so I had to pin them but other than that it fit great!

This jumpsuit is very sleek and classic. It was perfect for a charity gala I worked on. As mentioned in the other reviews, the straps are a bit long. I used two safety pins to tighten it up and I felt comfortable and in place for the rest of the night. If it weren't for the straps, it would have been 5 stars, because it's a gorgeous piece! I still highly recommend renting if you don't mind maybe doing a quick fix on the straps before your event.

I am 5'4" and usually wear an 8 or 10 pant and a 6 top/waist, so I usually go for an 8 in dresses or rompers and that worked this time. The legs were snug but doable even with a curvy booty and thighs. The backup size 10 the pants part wasn't much bigger and the rib cage was too big, so the 8 was better for me. I am a 34B and wore a black lace push-up bra underneath and safetypinned the straps a bit. The pants were ankle length. Sexy for a fun bachelorette night out, would rent again or buy!

Loved this jumpsuit for a formal event I was attending for work. Sexy (especially if you are endowed) but still classy. I was able to go braless since i was felt locked in. The 2 size fit really nicely in the pants but was too tight in the bust so i went with a 4. Only downside is it's def one where you may need a hand getting it zipped so hope you have a friend who can go to the bathroom with you!

links_Review_Title: Wore this to a house party.
links_Review_Text: I ordered a size 0R and a 2R. Ended up wearing the 2R, eventhough it was very tight. I needed someone to help me zip it up and needed bathroom partner as well. It was definitely a very hot jumpsuit and would recommend BUT you should size up. The length was perfect considering I'm 5'2. Has the right amount of sexy and classy. Material does not stretch so keep that in mind.

Love this jumpsuit! The straps were a bit long on me & I used fashion tape to keep them in place which worked well. The torso was too short in my usual size, but luckily the backup size fit great. Definitely would recommend and will be renting again!

Wore this to a concert and night out in Vegas, felt extremely comfortable and confident all night! It was a little lower cut than I thought and I found myself pulling up the top a handful of times throughout the night. The jumpsuit had pockets which was a great surprise!! Overall, fun, cute and comfortable party outfit!

links_Review_Title: I wore this for a birthday dinner and enjoyed it. It was fun and comfortable but wish it fit better.
links_Review_Text: I typically wear a 6, but this was made for someone a couple inches taller than me. I would have had to shorten the straps and tape the chest down to comfortably wear this. Instead I went with the size 4, which I had to squeeze into a little bit. The straps and chest fit perfectly, but it was tight in the thighs and hips. Most of the fabric gives a little so it wasn't too bad. However, I ate enough for dinner that I was very uncomfortable afterwards, since the lace had no give. I walked home half unzipped so I could breathe. Up until that point I really enjoyed this. It was a fun jumpsuit that could be dressed up or down. I'd wear it again if it had fit better.
I'm short and this jumper for perfectly. I loved the lace detailing and felt amazing in it

links_Review_Title: Fit my body like a glove!
links_Review_Text: Wore this out in Vegas and it was a showstopper! I'm 5'10" so the pants ended up being more of a cropped cut on me but still looked cute with heels.
Was nervous to order a jumpsuit, have thick legs and didn't want a camel toe situation. Ended up wearing a smaller size, loved the outfit.
This outfit hugged me in all the places, which is so hard to do with a jumpsuit imo. The pace made it sexy as well.

links_Review_Title: This outfit was gorgeous! Perfect for birthday dinner.
links_Review_Text: The straps are long but manageable. I didn’t have any issue with the pant length.

I loved almost everything about this jumpsuit! I felt classy and sexy all night. I did struggle with the overall length of everything, but I'm 5'1" so not too surprising. The straps were super long for me, but double sided tape and safety pins did help some. But seriously considering buying this because I felt so good and would rent again, but was just a pain trying to maintain/adjust the straps

Got a size 4, wanted a 2 but they were out figured it would be fine reading all the reviews. I'm a size 36C. The straps were too big and they kept slipping. The chest fit great however, from the hips down it was too big as well, looked baggy. Still wore it because I it was cute and if I was standing it didn't look too bad.
Loved the fit.

This jumpsuit (with pockets!) is very sexy and I got many compliments. But I wore one size up. This jumpsuit was designed for tall people. The crotch area is long, and the straps are long, so you might need to safety pins to shorten them.

links_Review_Title: Having all my friends with me for my birthday!
