links_Review_Text: The jumpsuit is a banger! It fit in all the right places and showed just enough skin for it to be sexy but classy at the same time. My only complaint is that straps were very long and would fall off my shoulders. They aren’t adjustable so a smaller busted person like myself had a problem with the straps staying on throughout the night. Regardless it was a perfect rental and exactly the outfit I wanted for my birthday.
I loved this outfit! Got so many compliments and felt great. Fit great.

Wore this out in NYC and the outfit was great. It definitely runs on the tight/small side. Tried the 4 on however the straps were too long and the seam of the crotch as well. Having a 34" inseam the outfit wasn't too short on my legs but probably should've pinned the straps on the top to keep them from slipping occasionally. Otherwise great outfit!

links_Review_Title: Classy and a change from the little black dress!
links_Review_Text: Being 5'10" I was not sure I could pull this off. I have never worn a jumpsuit so rented three different ones to find one that would work. As the other reviews say the straps are long. I didn't have to pin them. The fit was comfortable. I wore a bar that attached with sticky sides so as not to show the back which worked fine. I am small on top and the top still looked nice.

links_Review_Title: Way too big but made it work
links_Review_Text: The two and the four both fit, except that the straps and torso were WAY too long. I originally wasn't going to wear either to my event, but I put safety pins on the straps and wore it. The crotch was also pretty low due to the long length. Dealing with the safety pins was a huge pain and I won't rent this again, but on the plus side, I got a ton of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Compliments ALL night- sexy and sophisticated
links_Review_Text: Very classy with a touch of sexy. I wore it to a couple of Super Bowl events and it was perfect. Paired it with a black leather Moto Jacket until I got inside. Would 100% recommend it again!

Fit true to size. I’m 5’7 so I didn’t have a problem with the straps falling like others did, the fit just right for clevage. Only complaint was the zipper was really hard to get past on the thicker seams, so you will probably need a bathroom buddy. Loved this number!

I adore this jumpsuit and highly recommend renting it. For women like me who despise strapless bras, it's pretty easy to just wear a normal black lacy bra. As many others have said, the straps are long so be prepared to pin or tape them. The jumpsuit is very flattering and I felt hot all night :)
I absolutely love how pretty this little sundress is, really might just have to keep this one!!
Romantic summery light pretty perfect dress
I LOVE this dress. It's the perfect length and fit. Made my boobs look great while flattering the rest of my body. It's relatively light material, great for dancing too!

Absolutely loved this dress! If you want to dress it down, pair it up with a leather jacket. A little loose in the chest area but the straps took care of that. Lovely, loose fit allowing space to breathe.
Very comfortable, loved it!!!
Absolutely obsessed wish I could've kept it! Got complements the whole night!
I absolutely loved this dress and received lots of compliments. It's flowy and beautiful. Check out dc_rapunzel for more looks.

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a black tie Valentine's Day party and it worked out well!
links_Review_Text: It was a little big, but that enabled me to wear a strapless bra underneath. It was a tad long, so I lifted it over doorways.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a black tie wedding
links_Review_Text: This was a perfect dress for a black tie wedding the day after Valentine's Day! It was a bit small up top (I don't have a lot of cleavage and didn't wear a bra). It was a perfect length in regular - I am 5'9 and wore 2 inch heels.
Loved this dress. I'm a tall girl and I still had to wear heels. I wear a 6 or 8 usually and wore an 8 but If between sizes go down

I go between a 4 and 6 and the 4 was perfect. I'm 34C and felt semi-exposed but had some boob tape that kept me in. The adjustable straps helped as well. Length is perfect and received so many compliments! Wish I could keep it!

This dress fit me better than any dress I've rented from here. It hit my waist line just right and was secure up top despite being so low cut. I got so many compliments all night, wish I could buy it!!

Fabulous dress! I was very happy with this rental. It didn't fit as snug around the torso/chest as I thought it would but I also just have small boobs so that's probably why. I'm 5'5", 125 lbs and 32b-- usually a size 4 in dresses but I think a 2 might have fit better (I had to buy some inserts for the bust area). The length was perfect with a pair of 4 inch heels. Would recommend!

Loved this dress! I received so many compliments and it was so fun to wear! I am 5'3" and a 6R was fine with 2.5 inch heels. I am a 34C and I would say that any bust larger than that would be uncomfortable in the dress. I did not wear a bra and had to tape myself in (which was a little annoying- hence the 4 star rating). I do wish the top was a little more generous so that I could've worn the dress with a bra. All and all I would recommend but not for super busty beauties.

Got this dress after my first rental didn't fit. I wore a 20. Skirt was perfect length and fullness. You cannot wear a bra with this, especially when plus dove. I wish that the waist hit a little lower and there was more support up top. A few times it felt like my straps were gonna snap. I ended up wearing a lot of pasties to keep everything secure.

I usually wear 6/8, and the 6R fit well- slightly tight getting it zipped up but once on had a comfortable fit in the bodice and beautiful flow in the gown area. I am 5'8'' and the R was long, so I wore 3 inch heels and it hit the floor perfectly. I am not very well-endowed (B cup) but i found myself pulling the top up frequently. Probably wouldn't work for someone with a bigger cup size. I got SO many compliments all night. I'd recommend this dress highly for its flow, color, and classy style!

The dress was long so I was worried that I would trip over it but the heels I had on were high enough that when I walked the dress moved with me. The print on the dress is not black it's really more purple so I suggest wearing a gold, red or pewter shoe & accessories. I would 200% rent it again. It is low cut so if you're not comfortable with the girls making a statement, this may not be the dress for you but it was poppin for me!!!

I wore this for a private film screening and completed the look with a leather jacket. Loved the fit however it runs ridiculously long-- like I'm 5'3", wore 4" heels and still had to pick the dress up to walk around-- kind of long.

I'm 5'4" with a small bust (34Bish) and the 2P fit perfectly with a heel. The dress was super comfortable, and the fabric was very nice. I'd highly recommend to anyone needing something timeless and fun. May not work great if you have a large bust- great for for athletic body types or pear shape (lots of room in the lower body).
Absolutely loved this dress. I received so many compliments I wish I could've kept it!

links_Review_Title: Most repeated compliment was: "that dress looks like it was made for you!"
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress that garnered a lot of compliments all night. I am usually a size 4 and I wore the 6 due to my boob size (34D)... probably could have even worn an 8 if I ordered it. The adjustable straps were great to accommodate different chest sizes. I'm also tall (5'8") and wore 3-4" heels and the dress was plenty long enough. Overall beautiful dress and I'm very happy with this purchase!

Wore it to go see the Nutcracker. LOVED IT! It is very boobie as everyone has mentioned so you have to be okay with it. I wear a 40G and it held my girls up, no bra necessary. I did have to rearrange the straps and my boyfriend made sure to watch the girls to ensure they didn't pop out. This isn't a dress for moving around a lot if you're well endowed and surely not for bending down. I was sitting most of the night so it was perfect. Would buy for my closet.

links_Review_Title: The fitted top makes this dress
links_Review_Text: The perfect amount of support up top and around my waist with plenty of flowy dress to hide my belly. Loved it!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a black tie optional affair.
links_Review_Text: Fits TTS and comfortable to wear. The pattern is beautiful but not distracting. I loved wearing this dress.

Definitely not for anyone that has a large bust, a little tight around my mid section but the length and fit the rest of the way was perfect. I'm on the taller side and felt the length was good so if you're short I don't recommend. Got so many compliments throughout the night and everyone loved the red.

The only reason I wore the bigger size was also because of the bra cups, they are very small and probably wouldn't fit anyone over a big C. Anything smaller than that, your usual size should fit great. It was very comfortable and had a beautiful fit!! Received lots of compliments

Loved this dress and got so many compliments. I'm usually an 8/10 and do have DD chest and the 12 worked for me. It was a bit of cleavage so if you are also larger chested you may not want to go this route. The top is more bra/corset style though so it pulled them up and made them look awesome! Overall so many compliments on this and loving the color outside of a typical black dress for black tie event.

links_Review_Title: Felt great about how I looked!
links_Review_Text: Jfyi this dress is very cleavage forward. I could have fit into the 4R but was a little busty - not much else was dramatically different a size up otherwise, but for better coverage. I'm tall (5'11''), wore this with 2.5 inch heels and still got tripped up on the hem from time to time. Might not recommend for shorter friends. Will say I felt amazing in this - had a blast and took a ton of selfies!

I didn't end up wearing it for my event, as the bust area didn't cover my "girls" enough for my comfort. This dress is soooo beautiful, I was sad It didn't work out. Maybe next time I'll rent it for a hot date 😏

links_Review_Title: Didn't end up wearing but was amazing
links_Review_Text: Fit sooo well. Adjustable straps are clutch and the dress itself is an amazing cut, the pattern just wasn't my thing

This dress was cute except for the very odd bust area - I am a B, and the cups were just oddly proportioned and could not work with a bra. The straps are adjustable but couldn't be pulled up far enough to make it work without cutting into my shoulder painfully. I had to wear the other style I ordered.

The 18 was a bittttttt to small in bust. I wore the 20 bc it fit bust better. As other reviews said, very low so be ready to show the girls off. I wore a black tank top under it with a black leather jacket. Lots of compliments. I loved the dress. Wish I could have kept it!
Runs small in the chest, but TTS everywhere else. I usually wear a 14-16, but sized up to an 18 for my bust (36H).
Almost too sexy if you're busty. Doesn't leave much to the imagination and definitely not work or family event appropriate.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress for Florida wedding — so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Absolutely gorgeous dress, perfect for a wedding no matter the season! I'm a 34B and even though this dress has no padding, I don't think my boobs have ever looked better. Also just feels so luxurious on. You'll definitely need at least 3 inch heels if your 5'4" or shorter though.

i was nervous about renting a dress being a bigger girl, but i was thrilled with the result. the dress was very true to size and fit perfect. a bonus was that it was super comfortable and looked amazing. i will definitely be a repeat customer!
Wish the 16 was available because it might have fit better! The quality was good though

links_Review_Title: Not flattering for me but pretty
links_Review_Text: Loved the color and pattern but did nothing flattering for my body type. I think this would be better on a less curvy body type.
Perfect and figure fitting on top and flows on bottom

links_Review_Title: Very beautiful dress, nice quality fabric, zipper was sturdy.
links_Review_Text: Fit nicely, plenty of room and flexibility with fit. Looked nice when walking.

I loved this dress so much, it was very easy to move around in throughout the night. It is pretty long for my height (5'4"), I had to wear very high heels so I wouldn't trip over the fabric. I'd say it runs true to size also, I'm usually either a 4 or 6 and went with a 6 because I have a wide ribcage that felt restrained by the 4. Order up a size for a backup just in case!

Gorgeous dress but not for anyone over a C cup as the cups on the dress are not "generous." Otherwise this is a fabulous dress, I would have loved to wear. Fit everywhere else was great and loved the adjustable straps.
Had to wear this for a 70s glitz and glamor formal affair. Very stretch yet form fitting. Everyone loved it. Scratchy near your armpits was the only thing.

links_Review_Title: I wore this to my husband's work party and got lots of compliments.
links_Review_Text: I'm a 34DD and a dress size 6 or 8, but the medium was too big. I had to use the small size backup which fit much better. I loved the look, but huge annoyance was how long the straps were so they kept falling throughout the night.
It was a great dress for a birthday. The dress was heavy and kinda uncomfortable under the arms but great length.

This dress was so comfortable and easy to wear. It ran a bit large under the arms on me, but wasn't noticeable. I loved the length on my 5 ft 8 frame. Didn't end up wearing it this time around, as my other dress choice was better suited to the event, but would definitely rent again for a different occasion!
The fit was great and I received so many compliments
This dress was perfect for Vegas! My only complaint is it is very heavy and rubs at your skin. I definitely would avoid this dress if you'll be in a hotter climate!

links_Review_Title: Bombshell sparkles - give this flattering dress a try!
links_Review_Text: I wore this amazing dress to my last Barristers' Ball. First, it is completely covered in gunmetal sequins - this was not obvious to me from the pictures. It is far more sparkly in person, but the gunmetal color is more art deco than showgirl and I loved it. The dress is well-made, lined, and the sequins make it extremely flattering. However, it is a stretchy garment and if you are between sizes, I would go down. Some spanx and two girlfriends to zip you in should do it. I've never received so many compliments! I'm 5'4 139 pounds and the small fit perfectly. Now to the most important part: I wore a regular bra! I HATE strapless bras, and any cocktail dress where I can wear a regular bra is a win in my book. I highly recommend this dress, I felt like a movie star and frankly didn't want to send it back.

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a SB Liv event in Miami and everyone wanted to know where I got this dress!
links_Review_Text: After reading some reviews I went with the XS dress because I didn't want it to be too big on me especially because it didn't have adjustable straps. It was a perfect fit, not too snug or too big! It was extremely comfortable too.

Love this dress! I rented this dress for a cocktail party and it was a hit. It was true to size and very comfortable. The zipper sticks a bit so a friend had to help me, but no big deal. I felt elegant and received compliments all night. Will definitely rent again!

The dress was actually covered in tiny sequins, it was still very pretty for a fancy event, but it itched my underarms so much I couldn’t put my arms down comfortably. If you’re going for comfort, maybe choose something else.
I absolutely loved this dress and received so many compliments! It was sexy but classy and the perfect dress for the occasion. I highly recommend it!
Dressed down with layers and docs. Tight on the chest, best braless.
Great way to ring in 2020! Loved this dress and the fit. Definitely made me feel like a SHOWSTOPPER! Once you try this dress on, you will have no regrets!

Wore this to a work holiday party so I opted for the looser Medium versus Small. It was flattering and forgiving around torso. My only issue was the length of the shoulder straps. They were long so not supportive for large chest. Otherwise loved. Sequins ended up being very classy and not tacky.

links_Review_Title: Does not look like the photo, it is larked sequins
links_Review_Text: Runs large
Liked the dress, but didn't end up wearing it because it was really irritating under the arms. It also felt too formal for the occasion which was a fancy girls dinner.
This was the perfect dress for Vegas. It made me stand out but not in a super obvious way, hugged my curves in all the right ways. I will definitely rent this again for another event!

This was an amazing dress. It is super sexy, classic and glamourous! I had some issues with the top though as the straps were a little too long. If I was wearing this out, I might need to take it in, use fashion tape or a bolero jacket to overcome it, but for a fashion photography shoot, it was perfect. LOVED IT.

links_Review_Title: I got tons of compliments on my dress at the New Year's Eve party!
links_Review_Text: I loved the figure-hugging silhouette and length. My only complaint was that the sequins abraided my inner arms where they brushed the dress.
This dress is very shiny!! Received a ton of compliments while wearing it. Loved the fit. It was a little itchy under the arms, but it didn't bother me all night.
Loved this dress, but it was very tight across the chest and the straps were too long, with no way to adjust. Unfortunately I didn't end up wearing this dress.

links_Review_Title: Cute dress but too large. It was super long and the straps were too.
links_Review_Text: The straps are not adjustable.

I got this for (quarantine) Easter without realizing its backless. A white tank solved that problem, but it's such a pain to get off to go to the bathroom. I know jumpsuits are always annoying, but this one has a button at the back of the neck, a zipper and hook at the waist, plus the tie. Other than that, it's super cute!! Fits true to size. I generally wear a 4 in Ulla, but the 6 was available and worked fine.
Fits well, does ride up around the waste, but didn't find it too obnoxious. Great balance btw flowy and fitted, felt sexy and relaxed at the same time.

Fit well, flattering. Did tend to ride up a little bit and had to pull down. Might pull in this size for women with larger busts (I'm a 34c and it was a little stretched at the top button but not noticeably)

Didn't wear as during shelter in place and fit me strangely. I'd have had to wear a tank top beneath as it was low cut on me. Interesting silhouette it creates. If I'd gotten to go anywhere I would have worn one time.

links_Review_Title: Fit great and SO comfortable. Danced all night and had so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: I liked the idea of adding a blingy belt and it worked out great! The dress is pretty long. I'm 5'6 and I wore a 2 inch heel and it was still long. Overall dress was perfect for my event.
I wore this to a gala and got tons of compliments. It held my girls in place and I didn't need a bra. I usually wear an 8 but the 10 fit perfectly.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a Breast Cancer Ball/Gala
links_Review_Text: The fit of this dress was perfectly true to size for me. The material was snug but not too snug in the rib cage where I am a bit wider. The material did not gap in the chest with the support of a strapless bra underneath as I am small busted. The length was perfect and flowy for my petite stature. The blush ombré is a beautiful peak of color and complimented perfectly against my husband's bright suit!

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress while attending the annual ball for my Dental School.
links_Review_Text: I liked this dress and the 2 fit well (even though I usually wear a 4, the 4R couldn’t be rented that weekend). It was a really pretty dress but I do remember being more stunned when I first saw it online, in the picture where the dress was propped up. It didn’t feel like it had the same wow-factor when I actually wore it, and I’m not sure I would pay $130 again just to have this dress for 4 days. No problem with the dress itself, just with my expectations I guess.
It was the perfect height w/2 inch heels and I'm 5'7. I was a little small for the chest area, but just picked a different bra. I got tons of compliments!

It was way too long in the back even with a 3+inch heel but it looked like an intentional train. I definitely needed a strapless bra and I did need to keep adjusting all night but it was worth it! I felt amazing and got so many compliments at the charity gala I went to.

I wore this to my work Holiday Party and received compliments all night long - from coworkers to employees of the hotel. Everyone loved the ombre look and the way the dress moved when I walked. The top fit perfectly and I didn't need a bra underneath. I danced in the dress and it never felt like it would fall down. I'm on the shorter side so I did need a heel just to keep it off the floor but it wasn't overly long.
Made me look very broad. Probably could have gone down a size to my normal 6.
Fell down a little.

links_Review_Title: This dress was awesome! I rented the size 6R but ended up wearing the size 4L
links_Review_Text: I would say to rent one size smaller than you expect. The zipper catches slightly wear the seam changes in the back so I suggest, putting it on backwards, zipping past the seam change and then having someone Zip the rest. The size 6 I received was a little damaged (I let the customer service know), but the 4 was actually a better fit. I would have rather had it shorter but the L size was the only one left in that size. I really loved this dress a lot and the colors were awesome! I bought a $16 belt off of amazon to add a little flare but I felt beautiful for my 29th birthday! I’m 5 foot 1 inch and about 134lbs so usually a 6 fits well but I opted for the 4.
This dress was great for an evening wedding! I have a large chest and it was supportive even without a bra. The ombré bottom looked so pretty, I got so many compliments.
This dress was stunning! Received many compliments! Loved the cut and ombré effect!

links_Review_Title: The dress was a perfect fit for my body type and personality!
links_Review_Text: The site does not show the elegance of this dress. In person it is simply beautiful and elegant and fits true to size! I received a lot of compliments and no one else was wearing this style at my event.

I was the best dressed guest for formal night on your cruise. This dress was magic. Feels really good. I only wish my bust was a bit bigger to fill out the sweetheart neckline better. Looooved this dress!
Easy to dance in and bodice was secure. I'm 5'4" and wore 4" heels but there was a bit of a train. It looked intentional thanks to the beautiful drape of the dress. Soooo many compliments.

This was awesome fabric and I loved the ombré high low effect. It was just too small in the bust area. I think if you are smaller up top this would be a great look, but alas, it didn't work for me at all.

links_Review_Title: didnt wear it bc this dress had more of a train and dragged on the floor. not a dancing dress
links_Review_Text: was a cool statement dress just not for dancing. the photo doesn't show how long it is in the back. I am 5. 4'
However. If you have boobs and or lats go up at least 2 sizes. And anyone above 5'6" should get a tall

links_Review_Title: Jaw dropping gorgeous! Such a stunning dress, I felt beautiful.
links_Review_Text: The petite was definitely the way to go - I'm 5'2" without the 4 inch heels, and the back was grazing the floor. Had it been regular length, it would have been much too long.

Gorgeous dress, high/low was perfect length on both sides. I wear a size 6 in store sizes (Loft, Ann Taylor) and the 8R was a bit tight. It fit fine, but a 10 might be more comfortable for an entire evening. I ended up wearing something else - would rent again for a different event!

This gown is pretty and I wanted to wear it for a formal event but it was simply too tight up top. I'm small chested, so I imagine this would be a tight squeeze for anyone with a larger chest. The quality isn't as great as some other gowns I've seen from this brand, but it is unique and I like the color.

Being busty (36 H) I normally go up a size when renting. I needed to go up 2. The 14 fit more like 12s normally do, fit my waist but not my bust. I also went with the long bc the regular wasn’t available but it didn’t seem long at all. Length was perfect and I’m 5’7.

links_Review_Title: It was a beautiful black tie wedding and I fit right in with this dress!
links_Review_Text: I had rented another dress that ended up being too big so I was scrambling to find something in shop. This is normally not something I would wear but I ended up falling in love with it. It's great if you're shorter, I didn't have to worry about tripping in the front. It did hit the floor in the back but it looked like a dramatic train. The fabric is so light, it flows out beautifully behind you when you walk. The one downfall is that it definitely fell down through the night. Never to the point where I felt exposed but the only strapless bra I own is white and it definitely showed in some pictures. But I would definitely invest in a different bra and wear this dress again!
I'm a curvy petite. 5'2 with large bottom and small up top. This dress laid perfectly on my shoulders, chest, hips. Not too loose or snug in any of my problem areas. LOVED it.

links_Review_Title: One of my favorite rentals yet
links_Review_Text: Absolutely loved this jumpsuit. I had a coworker call it a "fairy jumpsuit" and that's exactly how I felt wearing it. I only got the chance to wear it once before quarantine hit New York, I would have definitely worn this multiple times. I'm on the smaller chested side so no bra was no problem. The material is quick to wrinkle, when you're sitting down for instance, but the pattern hides it a bit. Will 100% be renting this again once I'm off the couch and out of PJ's!

I ordered this dress for our school's dinner auction. It was the right amount of fun coupled with the right amount of class and a touch of sexy with the cold shoulder. Black tights and black booties competed the look. It did lean more toward a bit of red-orange but it was beautiful nonetheless. The material was geeat--not too heavy. I'm 5"10", 145lb, triathlete, and the medium was perfect. Based on other reviews, I ordered a small as backup but didn't need it. I'd rent this again in a heartbeat!
This dress was way more casual than it looked in the photos and it was too loose and long. Sizing down may have helped, but it just wasn't what I was hoping for. I returned without wearing.
Casual but sexy at the same time. Perfect sweater dress for a chilly evening that you still want to strut in. It's a little short but pairs nicely with nylons.

links_Review_Title: I wore this on a date with Vans & everyone was wild about it! Next day, dressed it down w/ a jacket!
links_Review_Text: This dress is FAB and fits so nicely. Can be classy with heels and youthful with sneakers or boots. I wore it every day I rented it with different layers over it after the original date night look. Love love!

links_Review_Title: Great fit even at 5 months pregnant!
links_Review_Text: I wore this outfit for Valentine's dinner with my husband. The large fit perfectly and the silhouette allowed enough room for my growing baby bump. It's not maternity wear but it was perfect for the night!

This dress was really cute. I love anything one shoulder I think it's really sexy without being inappropriate. I have no complaints about this dress other than the stomach area was a little loose? There was a little bit too much material which could be a little unflattering from certain angles.

I loved this sweater dress. It was sexy and warm for a chilly winter evening. I'm an 8/10, 5'5 and went with the large. It hugged my body without being too tight or short. I thought it was a little scratchy or I would have given it a 5 star ratting.
Wore this for a casual NYE house party ... was comfortable all night, the sweater is light weight soft and the color is a little orangey red not true fire engine red

Loved the soft feel of this sweater dress. Wearing with nylons I was able to adjust the length for a shorter dress with a relaxed fit in the middle, or a form-fitting longer silhouette. The sleeve was a bit long, but it added to the cozy feeling.
I wore this for a pandemic date night at home, but did run out to grab take out. I got a compliment in the 5 minutes I was away from home! Works with a strapless bra

links_Review_Title: Super cute knit one shoulder dress - not too tight!
links_Review_Text: I was surprised at how much I like this dress and its fit. I was worried that being knit, it would be too snug in the wrong places (hips and butt). But it was very flattering, despite being shorter than I expected. I paired it with black tights and black thigh high boots for a sexierr date night look. The sleeve length on the dress is great for people with longer arms like me. I'm pretty small chested, so the chest area did gape a bit, but not too much. Great dress.
No complaints.
I'm still getting compliments on this dress. It is gorgeous!

links_Review_Title: It was the easiest time to choose an outfit for a special family wedding than ever before!
links_Review_Text: This dress was extremely comfortable and very fun to wear....many complements were received!

links_Review_Title: Head turning - one of my favorite ever rentals!
links_Review_Text: Absolutely stunning! Flattering in all the right places. No stretch, but still true to size. Got compliments all night. Have not been able to return it after months and need to just buy it already!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a festive winter wedding
links_Review_Text: This dress fit in a super flattering way and despite having so many ruffles and details was also form fitting. The colors popped perfectly and the dress was attention getting while also being comfortably warm due to having a high neck, long sleeves and midi length, which was welcome on this cool evening.

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress! Classy with a bit of flare
Beautiful. Comfortable. Super happy with this dress
links_Review_Text: The 2 fit nicely- sometimes o wear a 0 but that would not have worked. Felt good and had an excuse to wear gold shoes!

links_Review_Title: Great dress and lots of compliments!
links_Review_Text: I got so many compliments! Really flattering and pretty dress

links_Review_Title: The most perfect dress. I wanted more reasons to wear it.
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a fancy event where my company's CEO was named executive of the year with a guest list of 400. It was seriously the best dress there IMO and based on compliments received). The fit, the colors, the cut, the style, the sleeves, all of it. It was perfect for this event but would also be fabulous for a wedding, cocktail party, fancy night out or even just to play dress up at home. I kept it on as long as possible bc didn't want to take it off and send it back. Get this dress.

Loved this Saloni dress. Wore to a school charity fundraiser I was hosting. Loved the long sleeves and ruffle details. It was super comfortable for running around behind the scenes but fun enough for the party. Received lots of compliments. I'm 5'9, 30-25-36, 130lbs and the 2R was perfect. The size 4R was comfortable but too blousy in the chest for me.
Fit like a glove. Super flattering for people with a defined waist, but generous hips. So many compliments.

Snug at the hips if you've got a booty. Fits fantastic everywhere else. Blue is very blue!! Think electric blue, but oh so pretty in person with the gold foil dots. Ruffles are in the right places and soft. Enclosures can be a pain, but overall, amazing dress! Other positives - you don't need much jewelry at all and a classic gold shoe, which you probably already have, pairs perfect. Fantastic dress!

I got so many compliments in this dress...it was perfect for a wedding : conservative but flattering and the pattern is fun but not flashy. I love how small it makes my waist/midsection look (I was impressed when I looked at the photos). I would wear this again in a heartbeat. It is also easy to wear and requires no fidgeting-with after it is on.

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress! Wish I had a better picture!
links_Review_Text: Loved everything about this dress and will rent again in the future. It is extremely flattering because it is so well tailored. I received many compliments on this dress! It was a fun and different option from the rest of the pack. Does run a bit tight in the hips, so if you are pear shaped you will probably want to size up--I may next time.
Love how classy and fun this dress is!
Perfect for my son's bar mitzvah
LOVED. This dress is stunning and super flattering. It wad a little tight around the hips but OK to sit in. Got tons of compliments. Will definitely wear again

links_Review_Title: One of the best dresses I've ever worn!!
links_Review_Text: I love love loved this dress!! I wish I could wear it a hundred times. It fit me to a T. I'm normally a 10 or 12 in RTR dresses and the 10 was perfect, even with me being bigger chested. I wore this for a semi-formal charity gala during the holidays. I felt so festive and glamorous and got compliments all night long. Extremely flattering on my shape!
Picture doesn't do it justice. The gold circles shimmer beautifully in the light! The cut is very flattering. Item runs small. I'm a size 6 and wore an 8 which was snug.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! So nicely package and well taken care of. I was incredibly impressed!
links_Review_Text: Dress fit perfectly. Was a little loose in the bust but was a show stopper.

links_Review_Title: Amazing fit, so chic and fun
links_Review_Text: I've been a member of RTR for years and this is my hands down most favorite rental - I felt absolutely amazing in this dress, which was actually a step away from my normal style. The pattern and frills added a bit of glitz which was perfect for a holiday party without being overly flashy. The length works great for petites as well (I am 5'2"), which is usually a concern for me with dresses. RENT THIS DRESS!!! You will not regret it.
Loved the fabric and details of this dress. Wore to a cocktail party!
Perfect flowing fit, flowing dress, gorgeous colors

Probably my favorite dress that I've ever rented from RTR. It fit perfectly and I received compliments all night. The perfect dress for a fall outdoor wedding in Texas. Excited that this dress comes in other patterns. Will definitely rent this or another Saloni in the future.

links_Review_Title: The colors are beautiful and unique!
links_Review_Text: The waist is little high and it didn't help with my body figure. I loved the dress but it didn't flatter my figure

Rented for party, got lots of compliments, pictures don't reveal a nice bright blue in the black background. Great details, hid flaws like my tummy, but it may run a little small. I should have sized up.
This dress is stunning. Perfect for an upcoming holiday party as there are little gold foiled dots on the dress. The fit is extremely flattering and material is quality. Fits true to size.
Absolutely stunning dress! You will turn heads and receive so many compliments. I highly recommend this dress.

This dress is one of those magical wardrobe items. It could be worn to work if you're going out for drinks later, worn to a party, and popped out for any semi or very special occasion. It is pretty fussy to put on. There are lots of fabric covered buttons with fabric loops and the metallic threads make the fabric on fabric pretty hard to button. I wouldn't have been deterred by this - I had honestly planned to buy this dress. Unfortunately I have very rosy cool toned skin and the gold was far too gold for me so I had to put her back into the ocean for some other lucky person to catch.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful! Light weight! Fun and classy!
links_Review_Text: I adore this dress and have been trying to snag it for a while. It has incredible utility. The body odor is strong. I'm hanging it in the sun for several hours to see if that might help.
Like all Saloni dresses size up! I loved, loved the pattern and cut of this dress but too tight on my hips. Will rent a size up when available.
This is very elegant dress. I got many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress got so many compliments and fit great!

links_Review_Text: This is a very different and fun dress. I am normally a 0/2 and a size 0 was snug. I had trouble sitting in it. I agree the chest area is tight. Overall, lots of compliments & you will stand out.
the bottom was very tight fitting, not a great dress for curvy girls. the ruffles and gold were a lot in person, not really my style.

This dress was INCREDIBLE. I go between and 6-8 and wore the 8 and it was tight. The most unusual part about this is how tight the arm cuffs are. While I'm a 6/8 I have unusually skinny forearms and it was super tight around my wrists which I thought was weird. Wrist-fit aside, I would totally recommend this!

links_Review_Title: I didn't wear this but is is gorgeous.
links_Review_Text: Fits great and very flattering. A statement dress that is really beautiful.
Rented for a wedding ceremony! Loved this look! The 8R fit me perfect, I'm 5'6", 137 lbs. Great quality and print. Loved.
This dress is so pretty! I wore it to a company formal party and I received a ton of compliments.

I never quite read enough about what i'm renting- so this skirt showed up and every bit of it sparkled. The green stripe in the skirt is much more green i person - so my sweater did actually go with the skirt. Very pretty, very fun and fit true to size.

I rented the top and bottom to this outfit. Easy to wear and loads of compliments. The neck line was really flattering. I did wear a camisole underneath the sweater. Whether I was dancing or having a serious conversation the outfit was perfect.
Fabulous skirt. Received a ton of compliments. Wore with black top and black boots. Will rent again in a smaller size when I lose weight.

links_Review_Title: Direct from the runway with the measurements for a runway model
links_Review_Text: The fabric is as fine as a Hermes scarf and skims over a body like a cloud. The problem is the cut is for a woman with a body built for the runway. I am 5'4" and a natural 32DD which permits some flexibility but the bust seam should be two-inches lower. The bodice won't work with implants larger than a B-cup because the cut and fabric won't adjust. The length is to the floor if you aren't at least 5'6". Try pushing the sleeve cuff up as I did which makes the sleeve more architectural.

The dress is an absolutely incredible print and if it is pretty good it is cut with slightly less curves than my body shape however. So I did size up. There's no stretch in the fabric as other reviewer's have noted which makes it very hard to raise your arms over your head if it's fitted the way it is on me in the pic. However for wearing for a couple of hours it's just fine.

links_Review_Title: I was so comfortable and loved the feel and art/Greek vase print.
links_Review_Text: Fit great in bust and waist. Loved the soft flowiness and cool sleeves. Looked great w a 3/4 sleeve cardi w puffy sleeves out.

links_Review_Title: Very small top and longer than expected
links_Review_Text: With my height, this was trailing on the ground about 5 inches, so I would say the length is actually about 63 inches based on lengths of other dresses I've worn. It was -Extremely-difficult to get into the top half of this dress (sized up one size!) to where I thought at one point it may be impossible, (and I have a flat chest and wear XS tops!) The shoulders/upper sleeves have that thing where it's tight when bringing arms forward. A pity because the fabric is gorgeous.

This dress is beautiful ! Pleats are amazing ! But the top is off . It's small and tight around the The back and breast area . If you are bigger when cup C is a problem . I thought I can pull it off but was very uncomfortable ... sad .

I really wanted to love this dress. It is really beautiful. The top has an odd fit and I don't know if someone with an larger chest could wear it. It was a little loose on me (I'm a 34A) and low cut but could have managed with a little fashion tape. But it was then tight right under the bust line. But the deal breaker was the length. This dress is LONG. I thought it would be more midi length but even with heels it was dragging on the floor a bit. I'm 5'6". Sadly this just won't work for me.

links_Review_Title: Stunning dress with major fit flaw
links_Review_Text: This dress was love at first sight! I immediately bought an extra spot and rented it. Positives first: stunning design and stand out print. I'm sure this dress will bring in endless compliments. However, this is overshadowed by major fit issues. The top portion is badly designed- the bust seams come in too low, cutting off the chest at the most awkward spot. I don't think this dress will work for anyone with larger than a B cup.
5'3 with 5inch heels and the dress was still a little long

links_Review_Title: Surprised me and really liked it!
links_Review_Text: When I measured it when I received it, I thought that the part with the front folds would not look good but when wearing it it looks pretty good and the fabric is quite comfortable.
Perfect fit! I wear a size 12 regularly, but ordered the 14 in this dress so there wasn’t too much Cleavage, (36D), it was so easy to wear

links_Review_Title: Beautiful print and oh so comfortable
links_Review_Text: Loved the colorful print that stood apart from all the usual solid colors. Fit perfect and was comfortable throughout the night. The only reason I didn't give five stars is the dress has some pleats in the back similar to the front that didn't fall very flattering.
This dress was lovely for the night, however a little too long so plan to wear high heals! Other than than the dress was perfect.
The pattern is pretty and looks cute on the model/in the photos, but after trying on it is very ill-fitting. The pleats in the back are not flattering, neither is the general cut.
I rented this for a wedding and while both the 6 and 8 fit my waist, the chest portion was very tight and not flattering. If you have a larger chest I don't recommend this one.
The print of this dress makes it seem more casual and not as pretty as I had imagined.

links_Review_Title: It was too tight on my chest
links_Review_Text: Wasn't great for larger chests.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress but too long for me.
links_Review_Text: I am 5'6" and even with 3" heels this was dragging on the floor. Too bad because the print and style are lovely.

links_Review_Title: Did not wear. Fit but was baggy around waist and was not flattering.
links_Review_Text: Beautiful fabric and vibrant colors.

Gorgeous dress. Loved the print, material, and the waist detail was extremely flattering. However, at 5 ft 8 inches tall, if I had been planning on wearing heels, I would have needed the long. Also, it's a little tight in the chest area, but I'm nitpicking. Got compliments all night long!!

I liked the pattern and quality of the dress it just wasn't flattering on me. The flounce in the front added bulk to my stomach. I'm an apple shape, would likely be more attractive on someone with hips or maybe a smaller size could have helped.

links_Review_Title: This dress was perfect for a formal work event on the beach, easy to move in and very comfortable.
links_Review_Text: I am 5'8 and it went to the ground
It was a little too summery for a winter wedding and runs on the bigger side. It is extremely comfortable and I think would be great for a spring event.

links_Review_Title: Columnar, with too much drapey fabric right at the waist
links_Review_Text: Almost good but not quite. Really unflattering cut, a belly accentuator.

Wore this dress to a ball with a rock and roll theme. The dress fit well but is very revealing in the chest (I wear a D cup). Found a deep plunge bra on Amazon and had to use dress tape to keep everything in place. The dress is long in the back and I am 5'7" and stepped on it a few times. I received many compliments on the dress.

links_Review_Title: Dress was very comfortable and was easy to move in. There is a slight train too, so pretty!
links_Review_Text: It has a pretty deep v in the front so plan undergarments accordingly.
So many complements! This dress is soo flattering for my body type (athletic) and fit perfectly! I wore it for a bridal brunch, but am definitely thinking about renting it again for a wedding.

links_Review_Title: A fun dress to wear for NYE
links_Review_Text: The material was high quality and held up to a night of dancing and getting stepped on numerous times. By reading the reviews, I knew it was going to be low cut, but I was able to remedy this by pinning it. The back of the dress did drag a bit, but as I am short, this is not uncommon and it held up to the abuse quite well.

The fit is slightly large- would have sized down one if it was available. The v neck is quite low and I am high busted so I did need fashion tape and a safety pin or two. Love the length, cut, and fabric itself. Lots of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Fab dress, VERY deep v cut
links_Review_Text: This dress is so great - it's so comfortable and very flattering cut. But beware - the V is VERY DEEP. Like literally below your bottom bra line . I wore a bralette with mine to make it work, but it was very chesty. Perfect for a cool event, not appropriate for a wedding.

Loved the fit and feel of this flowy dress. Fun to move in. Didn't end up wearing because the size I got was a bit too large and ended up not doing much for my hips/body. However, I would certainly rent and wear this dress in a size down! Rented 2 for reference, generally wear a 0 or a 2.

links_Review_Title: Not designed for anyone with cleavage
links_Review_Text: The body fit was nice, but the neckline was a straight up catastrophe. It plunged about 3 inches below the bottom of my bra (way lower than it looked in any pictures) and there was a LOT of cleavage but it was manageable. The major problem came when I sat down and the material bunched up so you could see straight down and sides ways through the neckline. Depending on your comfort level and bust size, you may be able to make this a standing only dress. But def can't sit anywhere in it
Too low cut to wear without a bra so didnt work for me, but very cute!

Loved this dress. Wore for a wedding and got a lot of compliments. I'm a B cup and it was definitely revealing but it wasn't too much. If your cup size is bigger than a B or small C, this might not be the dress for you.

links_Review_Title: Very flattering. Wish I could have worn it but it was too low cut.
links_Review_Text: This dress was super pretty and true to size but I couldn't wear it because my boobs showed too much. It is very low cut and not meant for people with a larger chest.
Fit perfect but found the style frumpy. Not for me! Didn't end up wearing it.
Loved this dress and got rave reviews

Wore this dress to a black-tie optional event and it was perfect. As a plus-size, it was great to have something that fit well and was flattering. Loved that the tapered bottom showed some leg. As others mentioned, the neckline is a VERY deep V-cut. I used clothing tape and a 3-inch navy fabric insert of a similar material that I purchased at Joann Fabric to cover my bra as I did not feel comfortable going without. Very pleased with my RTR experience.
Long I’m 5’4 also deep plunge line to revealing and I’m really busty

links_Review_Title: Dress fit well, but the tail is long, and low cut the front
links_Review_Text: I felt very confortable wearing it, received great compliments about the dress
Fit like a glove. However the chest is cut very low so cleavage tape, camisole, or safety pins are in your future...thank goodness I love a deep V. 💋
Not my style
If you are comfortable showing off the girls, get this dress! But would not recommend for a work party...

Love this dress and will definitely be renting this again. It's a classic and the opening in the arms make it more interesting and give it a fun twist. The bottom is a little tight like other reviews said.

links_Review_Title: Needs a slit in the back
links_Review_Text: This dress is so cute and perfect for work. The length and the longer short sleeve are work appropriate. The only reason I didn't give this dress 5 stars is because it was hard to walk in without a slit. That was definitely a miss on the design cause it was hard to take bigger steps, get in and out of the car or take the stairs.

Dress fit perfectly, loved the sleeves. Felt very Lady Gaga-ish. It was not hard to walk in but I understood previous renters concerns as your steps maybe had to be shortened a little. Would recommend and rent again.

links_Review_Title: Classy, comfy, beautiful & easy dress to accessorize!
links_Review_Text: Loved this classy, tastefully sexy black dress with a fun, unexpected pop of interest with the sleeves for my husband's company Christmas party. Loved that I could wear a normal bra and it was easy to accessorize. It's important to note there's no back slit, with not much stretch to the fabric. Made stepping in into an SUV challenging. Also needed to go up stairs at a slight angle. The 12 would have made it extra hard. Sizing up to the 14 made me much more comfortable! Will rent again!

Hands down one of my favorite work dresses I've gotten from RTR. The amazing sleeves, both the shape at the top and the unique cut at the bottom, made this stand out from being any other black dress. One thing that I need to point out is there is no slit in the back! It forces you to shorten your steps and while it wouldn't deter me from renting it again, because I will, it certainly takes some getting used to! The material is also not stretchy at all, making the lack of a slit more noticeable.

links_Review_Title: Cute but big and cant walk
links_Review_Text: This dress is a professional length(below the knees on me) and the shoulders are a great touch but there is no slit so I was not able to take any stairs today and I walked like a munchkin everywhere because I couldn't take a full step. I ordered a 2 because I like my clothes looser for work (at a bank) but it was too big. I definitely needed the 0 so if you are in between sizes definitely go down. Although then the bottom may be so tight you have to stand still all day.
I love the style of this dress and the fabric. I ordered a size up, and the dress fit everywhere but across the chest (I'm a 38D). It would have been impossible to breathe if I'd tried to wear it.

It's a great dress but if you plan to walk a lot in it, be aware there is no slit so if you're a speed walker like me it might hold ya back :) it's also a bit tough to get up to go to the bathroom if you're curved and have a big toosh. Totally worth the trickiness, so gorgeous

I am curvy/hourglass and loved the fit of this dress. The shoulders elevate the look and this is now one of my RTR faves as it goes from day to night to later night. I usually wear a 12 and go to 14 with Black Halo since I am a 36 E and their line is usually tighter across the chest.
This dress fits like a glove and it has such a modern yet classy design!

links_Review_Title: Great dress, but too long and tight at the bottom.
links_Review_Text: This dress looks great on, but it was really tight at the bottom, so it was hard to walk.
Bottom did not fit well. Way too tight. Fine on top.

links_Review_Title: Special sleeves make this a winner
links_Review_Text: Definitely a fave rental and debating the purchase of this classic black sheath dress with a twist: fun shoulders and sleeves. Showered with compliments. Slenderizing and just perfect. As said in other reviews there is no back slit so strides are a little shorted but worth it for this!

Not great if you're traversing lots of stairs because the skirt portion doesn't allow a lot of wiggle room, but that's part of the overall beauty of the silhouette and shape. Slight stretch to fabric but not much.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for work or date night or anything in between.
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly, hugged curves. Slits on the sleeves are a nice touch, will rent again.

Loved the dramatic sleeve on this black dress. I got a ton of compliments at work. Wore with patterned black tights and heels for the mild California winter. Fit well, just a tad big but not to the point of looking sloppy.
Modern twist on the LBD.

links_Review_Title: I Wanted to Feel Like Olivia Pope, but this was so NOPE
links_Review_Text: PROS Flattering on the arms The fabric was work-professional CONS The zipper is hard to reach Felt uncomfortable to sit. I would suggest sizing up. The tummy area was not flattering because this fabric is very telling NOTE Would only rent again if there's an option to size up.

links_Review_Title: This dress is really cute, but runs small by almost two sizes.
links_Review_Text: This is super cute. The sleeve detail is adorable, but it's definitely small. I ordered an 18, which is already one size up from my usual 16, and I couldn't even zip it! If there was a size bigger, I would try it again because I really did think it would be flattering and perfect for work.

Rented with my unlimited for a fundraiser. I always go size 2 in black halo. This one fit nicely if slightly big in the hips but a 0 would have been too small. Fun sleeves make this otherwise conservative dress.
This dress was too tight and wouldn't have been comfortable to wear

links_Review_Title: Cute but so narrow at bottom that it's a struggle to walk
links_Review_Text: The dress is super cute but not functional. I struggled to walk and had to hike it up to go up stairs.
I've been dying to rent this since I saw they added it to RTR. It's so beautiful but the top is EXTREMELY tight. I typically wear a size 6 top and a 34/36 B bra and the large barely was able to zip.

links_Review_Title: This outfit is absolutely spectacular, will light up a room! Recommend ordering a second free size.
links_Review_Text: At first I was unsure about which size to order because of the reviews, but I decided to order the XS with the Small back-up because it was free, so why not - I’m so glad that I did! The XS skirt was a little loose, I ended up pinning it to fit me and it worked perfectly because the patterns and amazing built-in pocket give wiggle room to make it look like a custom fit. Both the XS and Small top fit - XS was a tighter fit so I ended up wearing the Small which gave me a fuller bust with the built in padding. The dupatta was perfect and so soft. Overall, loved this outfit and will order again!
This was amazing. If your busty it has a built on bra but the top runs a little smaller than the bottoms. It fit me like a glove!!

links_Review_Title: Unwearable because even the Large top is TINY tiny tiny
links_Review_Text: I am an 8/10 and usually wear a medium in tops but this was so small that I could not even get it over my head, but less onto my torso. Such a shame since it is gorgeous. Bottom fits normally so the discrepancy is kind of bewildering honestly.

links_Review_Title: Couldn't wear because top runs too small.

links_Review_Text: I got the medium and thought nothing of it. I literally could barely get the top on nevermind zip it. I know even sizing up would not work. Its so sad because the outfit is beautiful! Definitely size up!

links_Review_Title: Nice updated black class for fall or winter wedding.
links_Review_Text: 4R some wiggle room, strapless bra needed. Tight to lift arms but not impossible. Sheer at waist, hits above ankle. Would wear to fall or winter wedding. Lays flat against stomach.

links_Review_Title: This is BY FAR my favorite RTR rental yet.
links_Review_Text: What an awesome dress! Wore this for a semi formal affair. The style was so rich, the lace was thick, perfect for a fall or winter event. The 12R was true to size, the dress was incredibly comfortable. You can easily wear a strapless bra with no issues, even with the side cutouts. You will feel like a million bucks in this!

This is a lovely piece! I enjoyed wearing this to a gala. You have to either wear a strapless bra or nothing at all. I usually wear a 6, but I wanted room for my chest. The 8 fit really well! The length didn't bother me at all.

links_Review_Title: having a great time with friends, feeling fab!
links_Review_Text: the dress was amazing! received a lot of compliments all night!

links_Review_Title: This dress was gorgeous with a touch of a vintage feel. Perfect style for an evening winter wedding.
links_Review_Text: I sized up, and so glad I did. The full lace on the dress makes it a bit heavy, but not uncomfortable to wear. I’m 5’6” and thought this fell at a good length for me, it may be too long for someone shorter.
I loved the fit mostly, the shoulders were a little tight. I think the dress was very cute for a winter wedding and it was perfect for me!
I rented this for my annual work holiday party. I wore a size 16 and the fit was amazing. I got so many compliments and will definitely consider getting this dress again! Highly recommend!!

links_Review_Title: Customer service always there when you need them!
links_Review_Text: Dress ran small in the bust. I was a little concerned about the sheer middle but it was of no concern. Dress is extremely beautiful.

Loved this dress! Felt like a million bucks. Great quality, almost heavy dress. I did end up sizing up, mainly because the sleeves were tight. Ended up not wearing a bra (bc I forgot a strapless one) and while the dress is not heavily lined, I have a small chest and did not feel uncomfortable at all. It is a LONG dress. Would not rent if I were short.
Got this for a work party and was so happy with it! Felt classy and elegant.

Such a beautiful dress! I received compliments all night long in this dress and I felt like a million bucks! I was surprised at the length-I'm 5'10" and usually dresses are always shorter on me but this one hit just where it was supposed to. The lace was simply stunning.

This dress fit like a glove! It was super flattering, and I felt confident and beautiful! It got so many compliments! It has an a-line bottom from the waist down so I felt like it flattered my hour glass shape. Great rental for a formal wedding!
The dress itself was beautiful. But it definitely had zero give and I was afraid with my broad shoulders that I would bust out of it

I absolutely loved this dress. I received so many compliments and felt so beautiful in it. The fabric and lace is such a nice quality. It is one of my most favorite rentals. You must size up. I'm an every day 14 but after reading others reviews I went with a 16. It was a perfect fit. I highly recommend this dress.

links_Review_Title: Dress was stunning--perfect for the wedding in the museum !
links_Review_Text: The dress was extremely pretty. I was initially worried that I would be uncomfortable with the lace cutouts (as they show skin) but the pattern of cutouts were so beautiful that it added the overall design of the dress. I wore this for a cold evening fall wedding at a museum. So many compliments --even one from the bride! This was my first rent the runway and I will definitely be renting again-the ease of packing and sending back garments was effortless!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful but I recommend being Tall!
links_Review_Text: I received several compliments on this dress. It was very classic and worked perfectly for the formal wedding. It was comfortable but I couldn't raise my hands completely in it. I am normally a 6 and it fit perfectly. Could not wear a bra with it. I am tall and I do not think it would have worked well if I was any shorter. But it was a bit of an interesting Midi length on me. I wish I was a little shorter even with my long legs. It almost looked like it was just too short for my tall self.
Liked the dress. Was perfect for the office. It's very strong so be ready to make an impression. Could have chosen a 0 instead of a 2. Size 2 felt very comfortable (maybe a bit too much)

I wore this to a fairly big work event and got a ton a ton of compliments. But what really made me happy is the dress was so comfortable to wear. I can see how you need to have some height for this dress, but if you do, it's a romantic length. Hands down, would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Compliments galore on this elegant black dress
links_Review_Text: This is a beautifully constructed piece that garners attention despite its modest cut and style. I felt very put together wearing it, and received myriad compliments on the detailing and construction. I'd give it 5 stars but it's just too long. i wore 3.5 inch heels and it was still just a bit too long. i'm 5'6". highly recommend for super tall ladies but if you're my height or shorter, you may not be wild about the length.
ended up wearing something else to the event, but it was a very nice piece. a little too long on me, at 5'4" but wearable if need be.

This is a really beautiful dress but unfortunately it's not for petites. I'm 5'3" and it came to my ankles. I'm a 34C and tried on a size 2, but couldn't even zip up the top. I'm typically between a 2 and 4 but if I couldn't even zip up the 2, I'm sure I'd have limited mobility in the 4. I'd size up for the top and avoid if you're short.

This dress was my second choice. It is classic with gorgeous with lace detail and super high heels. I ordered a 4L - but it was too long and not formal enough for my event. But is on my next list for rent for a party and summer event. Gorgeous

This was a beautiful dress but but I recommend sizing up. I rented my normal size in this but it was too snug in the wrong places with see through midsection. Would have love to wear if larger size was available for my event. May try renting again.
the dress is not that user friendly the top is stiff and the sleeves

It's pretty and discrete, I'm 5'2" and felt the length was right for me. It was a very good choice for a winter wedding, and it helps hide some chubby areas. It felt a little small on the waist and arms, definitely would have loved to try a bigger size but was not available so I took the risk
This dress was perfect for a really nice black tie optional wedding. I received many compliments.
The event has not yet occurred.
This dress fit great and I received a lot of compliments, the only drawback (similar to other reviewers) is that I am 5'4" and the dress was a bit long. More like ankle length than tea length.

links_Review_Title: Pretty dress - not for shorter women
links_Review_Text: I wore a size 4, which fit well, but since I'm 5'4, shorter legs, this was very long on me. Still looked nice, but wish it was just a few inches shorter to be the perfect tea length!

The lace detailing is absolutely stunning. Great dress to wear to feel comfortable, but still sexy. It is a midi fit dress in length, but with the high neck, cut outs along the rib cage, and shot sleeves, it still manages to be sexy. This dress fits true to size. I am too heavy (36G) and while it was snug at my chest, I made it work. Absolutely recommend for any formal event!

links_Review_Title: Such a fun dress to wear to a wedding
links_Review_Text: The dress is beautiful- fits great and has a nice a-line midi fit. Great for a wedding

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress. Perfect for the occasion.
links_Review_Text: I wore this as a music director to conduct my school’s concert. I felt that it was modest, flattering, and comfortable overall. The top does run a little bit tight, as others have mentioned. I don’t usually love the midi length, but felt that the length was fine because the lining under the lace was a bit shorter.
Great material. Very thick and not much stretch so maybe size up. Super cute and lots of compliments

The dress is very flattering. The material is gorgeous with the lace details. I could still move in it to dance. I could not wear a bra with it (did not have one that was not visible in the back), and despite my 32DD bust size it was quite supportive.

links_Review_Title: This dress is gorgeous!!! I got so many compliments!!!
links_Review_Text: Fit perfect. The sheerness of the shoulders and the sides under the rib cage add a little sexiness to the otherwise classically elegant dress

links_Review_Title: This is a very elegant dress that has a flattering fit.
links_Review_Text: If you are looking for a classy dress that does not look like everyone else's lacy, black dress, this is the pick for you!

links_Review_Title: It was a beautiful dress and worked for a semi- formal holiday party.
links_Review_Text: I think it may have run a bit small because I wore my back up size that was one size up. It fit perfectly though with the bigger size. It was super flattering,. The see through part hits perfectly on the waist so it creates a waist line that comes in. I liked the tea length, but imagine you need to be on the taller side for that length to work. It was structured enough to keep my mommy rolls in but didn't feel too heavy. I seriously lived this dress and felt beautiful.

links_Review_Title: Very comfortable, received compliments all night
links_Review_Text: Beautiful well made dress. It is perfect for a winter/fall wedding. I have a larger chest and I didn't need to wear a bra with it. It was exactly what I was looking for.
Really pretty dress and great skirt for dancing but I had to rent two sizes up to fit my chest into this dress. Not for anyone past a B cup.
This fit well but was a bit stiff. Heavy fabric and too long for my frame (5'6"). Very pretty though!
These pants fit so nicely . They are comfy and fun. High waisted and even have belt loops.

These pants are breezy and comfy. They were missing the belt which I think would have pulled everything together. They were a little unflattering on me but I would still wear them again during the summer with a cute black crop top
So sexy for a fancy date night on a winter vacation!

We had to cancel our big plans for my 30th, but I still wanted to make the most out of it, and even though we were at home this dress made me feel awesome! It is super flattering to curves (a little short for me) and the material looked so nice, definitely high-quality! I wore it with a cami bc it is low cut, but its an incredible party dress that I would rent again!
This dress was perfect for a night out. Super comfortable and fun. The color is amazing.

links_Review_Title: Pop of color in a sea of black but too short on an average build
links_Review_Text: The material on this dress is great & I got a lot of compliments from guests and servers. It wasn't too hot for dancing at a February wedding. However, I felt it was too short for me & was tugging it down all night. I had to pin the chest otherwise my entire right boob was out. I'm more modest now since having a baby than I was in college, but I guess this dress was throwing it back to college Maegan at a wedding full of college friends.

This dress was amazing for my February wedding! The color is gorgeous, I could wear a normal bra, and no spanks or sucking it in was necessary thanks to the rouching in front. I did need a little safety pin at the boobs to keep the girls in check, and it was pretty short! I wear a 36G bra tho so I think that might've made it shorter on me. Paired it with tights to makeup for how short it was and I got compliments all night long! I'd def rent this one again!
Loved the color, has some stretch, had to use a safety pin on the cleavage area, in between size 6 and 8 and the 8 fit good

I wore this dress to my friends masquerade birthday party and it rocked!! The party was a bit formal! I had so many complements and the color was so beautiful and popped! I'm 5'4, 152 lbs, I ordered a 10 and 8. I wore the 10. The bust was a tad big but fit perfectly everywhere else (36D my size bust) The 8 fit perfectly although it was a little too short for me for the occasion. 5 Stars from me!
This dress was a gorgeous color and fit and felt amazing! It is a shorter dress, so with being 5’8 and having a bigger bootie I needed to wear black tights.

I wore this for my anniversary dinner. The blue color is amazing, and it was SO incredibly comfy. The ruching also came in handy for hiding my bloated tummy once I finished my huge meal! LOL. The dress is perfect.

Rented this for a fire and ice party and the bright blue was perfect for it! True to size and the gathering on the front allowed me to not wear a spanx and still look flat. You’ll need some double sided boob tape to keep the top together because it comes apart a little too far when you sit down. Besides that, loved it!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful color, too low cut for me
links_Review_Text: Had to do some major pinning (which changed the draping of the dress) in order to reach the boobage level in the photo and not have half of my bra exposed. Which is a shame because the unpinned draping was so much more flattering on the tummy and hips. Might work better for taller/smaller chested gals than for me. But I still loved wearing it because the color/fabric was SO stunning.
Beautiful head turner! My one complaint was one side was much looser, so it kept slipping and showing my bra. Other than that, would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Very nice fit, soft material, would purchase if given the opportunity!
links_Review_Text: Very flattering to my postpartum shape! Worn to a company holiday party. True to size, I am 5'4, 180 lbs. wore with flats and still received many compliments.

The dress fit great except the front was too low I spent $60 on tape and sticky bras to finally just pin it shut. I was very insecure the entire night cause it kept popping open. I wouldn't recommend it if you have larger breasts.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful, rich color. Comfortable. Runs small.
links_Review_Text: Works best with deep V bra.
Rented for NYE. The color pops and the fit is snug in a good way. Only thing is that it's very short and also at times I had to adjust the neckline so my chest didn't pop out!
Very comfy, great shade of blue. Sexy but also warm for winter. I had to pin the front so it didn't show my bra-- that's the only downside

links_Review_Title: The color and feel of this dress are both amazing!
links_Review_Text: I typically wear a size 8 however I wore the size 10 mostly because I felt the 8 was a little short and the 10 gave me a 1/2 an inch more in length. I also used fashion tape to secure the neckline. It was very comfortable and I received many compliments. I would rent this again!

Last minute company holiday party find. Pretty short. I'm short, so it worked but could see the length being a problem for women who vet 5'5 (unless that's what you're going for!) Low cut neckline. I had to pin. Very flattering fit if you have a little tummy. I got compliments ALL NIGHT LONG. I think everyone else was more in love with the dress than I was! lol Completely stretchy and body con.

Super comfortable crushed velvet dress with ample stretch and fully lined. I have a long torso and shorter dresses tend to be too short on me but the length was perfect. I recommend using fashion tape if you want to ensure modesty for the bust area as there is no snap or hook to keep it closed. Received so many compliments and felt great all night!

This dress was super short... like nearly showed my butt short in both the 6 and 8 (usually size 6). I am tall, 5'10", but definitely didn't expect it to be as short as it was. I had to rent other dresses to wear for the weekend.
This dress is absolutely stunning. The blue is perfectly bright and luscious ... Way too short!!! Barely covers my bottom! I really wished it were longer
I was obsessed with this dress except...it was WAY too short. I'm 5'11 and it barely covered my butt, which was so disappointing because the rest of it was perfect.

Pictures do not do this dress justice. The rich blue velvet is comfortable, glamorous and very flattering. The only con is the front kept slipping to the side. It cinches cross body at the waist, but the knot kept moving towards the middle of my waist, which made the front opening to shift, so I was constantly readjusting. Fashion tape could've kept it in place. Would rent again.
Color is gorgeous in person, and looks luxurious. It is very low-cut in the front. I ended up going with an alternative dress for my birthday celebration instead, so did not wear.

links_Review_Title: Runs a little large - but STUNNING!
links_Review_Text: This dress is gorgeous and I ordered it as my primary dress in two sizes. I usually wear a 10 and ordered a 12 and 14 because of my large chest - which usually works for me. Even the 12 was too big in the chest so I couldn't wear either. The royal blue velvet is so rich and vivid - it's a show stopper. I'll try it again in a smaller size, for sure.

links_Review_Title: This dress didn’t make it to the party.
links_Review_Text: This was my first pick, but I didn’t end up wearing the dress. It was shorter than expected and if you are small in the chest you will need double sided tape to hold the top in place. It looks pretty, but just wasn’t for me. I was thankful for my back up dress.

links_Review_Title: i needed the 6, but it wasn't available. super cute dress. tons of compliments
links_Review_Text: the top was a bit big, but again, i got the wrong size
Loose up top for Black Halo and VERY short, but warm and great color for NYE
The dress was really too short to even cover the bum. The fabric was not like the picture, extremely synthetic.

It was so short i couldn't wear it out at all. It's not even close to mid thigh. The material and color is amazing ...if only it was about 12" longer. I'm 5'8", i also had my friend who was 5'6" try it and it was still too short.
I used some fashion tape to keep the neckline from flopping open. I think girls with bigger chests might fill this out better than I did, but despite my tiny girls, the dress worked!

I've been waiting for this dress to come available FOREVER, and I finally got it. It is everything I hoped for: floaty, etherial, and a gorgeous color way. If the covid-19 pandemic ever ends & I have the opportunity to wear this outside of the house, I will definitely need to safety pin the top of the leg slit closed. At 5 ft 9 the slit literally cuts higher than my vagina. Way higher (like hip height). Can't wait to wear this out someday... Not hard to see why it's always sold out ❤️

links_Review_Title: Stunned at a Miami Pre-Super Bowl Party
links_Review_Text: Love, love, loved!!!! Got so many compliments. The fit is flowy and super forgiving but the slit goes VERY (like woah) high!
I would rent it again.
This dress DOES have a high slit, as indicated. Very comfy and looks class. I was 3.5 months pregnant so the forgiving fabric was ideal!
I wore a blue camisole and matching biker shorts so I didn't have to worry about the high and low cuts and could move around the dance floor in flats. I loved wearing this pretty dress.
Great long dress option for tall women even in heels! Small warning: the side of the dress with the slit rides rather high, so be prepared to show a lot of leg!

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress! Loved it so much I wish I would've bought it
links_Review_Text: The fit was true to size and very comfortable. The only cons were the very high slit (i used bobby pin) - other than that - amazing!

links_Review_Title: The most compliments I have ever received on a dress!
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for a guest at a Fall Wedding! It was extremely flattering and comfortable. The colors are beautiful and the material is light and flowy. I have never received so many compliments in person and via social media for a wedding guest dress! I have a bigger chest, so I needed to put the top closed, but it was not noticeable at all and did not take away from the aesthetic of the dress. The slit is also pretty high, but not revealing. You won't regret renting this amazing dress!

links_Review_Title: Classy but sexy, unique, perfect dress
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous ! Want to keep

links_Review_Title: Awesome dress, not perfect for baby bump
links_Review_Text: I ordered this dress thinking it would work well for my 21 week baby bump. I knew the slit was very high but didn't think about how much higher it would get to make the dress fit over the bump! I bought a slip last minute in blue that worked well! I loved the dress, just something to think about if you are pregnant wearing it.
I should have gone down in size, I felt like I was popping out and the dress was super long so I was getting stepped on. Overall it was beautiful but not my favorite
Dress runs large. I would size down for a comfortable fit on top. The slit is high, but not inappropriate. The flow of this dress makes you feel like movie star

I rented this dress for a wedding in Malibu. It was just the right amount of flowy and sexy. The color is beautiful and it fit great. The waistband is elastic so it was easy to drink and dance all night. The only issue was the wind and having to hold the dress closed so I didn't give too much of a show.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress for end of summer vineyard wedding!
links_Review_Text: Rented this for a mid-September wedding and got tons of compliments. Beautiful, flowy sheer print with a high slit on one side. Was in between the XS and S and ultimately wore the S even though the top could have been more fitted. Would highly recommend!
The slit is a little high, but overall this dress was great. Fabric is breezy and overall very comfortable. Would definitely recommend!

links_Review_Title: A woman complimented: "best dress at the wedding"
links_Review_Text: Amazing for an outdoor wedding!! I'm 5'2 130lbs and the small was way to big, needed the XS. Be sure to get fashion tape as you'll need it for the neckline and slit, very revealing without!!

links_Review_Title: Absolutely stunning and different dress. So comfortable too.
links_Review_Text: So many compliments on this stunning dress! Fit and flow of the fabric and design were perfect.

links_Review_Title: Sexy and flowy nighttime boho vibe!
links_Review_Text: I felt like a goddess in this dress. Very sexy but mature. Couple of warnings: the slit is VERY high, and the top is very open and drapey (I pinned it together with a safety pin). But the pop of leg is offset by the long sleeves and flowy skirt. Felt confident and got lots of compliments. Go for it!

This dress was perfect for a late summer wedding. My boyfriend adored me in it and couldn't take his eyes off me all night. I got tons of complements and felt amazing. It is short at the slit so the wind kicked up a few times and I had to hold the dress together. Overall it was one of my favorites so far

links_Review_Title: So much fun for a wedding on a 98 degree day
links_Review_Text: Comfy, worked for breastfeeding and #fire
LOVED THIS DRESS!!! Wore to a wedding. Sooo elegant and feminine, got so many compliments all night! Felt beautiful!
