This dress is gorgeous. It's NSFW though with the slit. I'd recommend it for vacation, a date, a casual party, or weekend wear. It's super comfy and I think it runs TTS but the top gapes. I pinned it and was able to hide the safety pin because of the collar. I typically and between a medium and large but large was the only one available and I'm glad I got the large because the slit is really high. If I had gotten the medium it would have been way too scandalous. The fabric is incredible and flows so beautifully. RENT THIS!

Wore this dress to a rooftop party & felt stunning! The dress is a perfect combination of feminine frills & sex appeal with the thigh high split. My only drawback was the elastic waist which looks frumpy if shown -- I decided to hike it up some to have the top conceal the waistband. You will need fashion tape if you don't mind how exposed your chest will be ...or a safety pin if you don't want your chest exposed at all. Besides that the dress is very lightweight and flow-y. Perfect for a summer night!

links_Review_Title: diaphanous gown with an easy fit
links_Review_Text: This dress has a very high slit, but it manages to stay in the realm of flatteringly tasteful. It's also pretty open on the bust, so wear a nice bra ... people are going to see it "peek-a-boo" style. It also fit my size 12/14 at a size large.

links_Review_Title: This dress is both low key and glamorous at the same time.
links_Review_Text: The fit is as expected. I was surprised at how high the slit. Wore this out to dinner and drinks. It was a big hit.

links_Review_Title: Wish i could give this 6 stars
links_Review_Text: This dress FLOATS atop your body and behind you as you walk. The fabric is thin but the highest quality, and the colors really pop! I paired with wedges and eye earrings to match. Would recommend for anyone - for any event! More on @thanksitsrtr

Didn't love the fit which was so sad because I wanted to love this dress. Big boob gals beware, the wrap top pulls together because of the elastic waste so I didn't get the flowy plunge look that's modeled. Just felt like I was drowning in too much fabric :(
Rent this. It's light weight and stunning in person. It flows beautifully. If you're taller, beware because the inner lining is a little scandalous.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful and easy to wear dress!!
links_Review_Text: Wore a regular bra , I'm 5'4 and wore a 3.25" hill and it was just a tad too long. I also used tape to keep the very high slit closed.
Totally obsessed with this bad boy! I was worried about the bust but I stayed covered perfectly fine!

links_Review_Title: Loved the color and the pull-on style, felt very comfortable on the skin.
links_Review_Text: As other reviewers have mentioned, the slit is verrrry high (a la Reformation) so just be aware! I found the attached lining to not exactly line up perfectly with the rest of the dress, it was sticking out a little bit around the slit which I found annoying. Otherwise, comfortable and the fabric is beautiful. It was a tiny bit long for me with heels, but not unwearable.

links_Review_Title: This dress was so flirty and really accented my curves.
links_Review_Text: This dress was true to size. I added a belt around the waist to give it more definition. The slit is a little high, but doesn't make you feel uncomfortable.

links_Review_Title: It was the perfect dress for a Montauk wedding.
links_Review_Text: It was comfortable, I would rent again

Amazing dress! Super comfortable, and elegant. Lots of compliments. I added a belt which everyone noticed and said was a great accent. I'm 5' 4 1/2" and it was a little long in the back, but since it's shorter in front, that wasn't problem. I usually wear a size 2 or 4. Wore small in this dress. Probably could have worn the extra small, but used fashion tape to hold in place and it worked perfectly. The slit makes it elegant without being too revealing. Highly recommend this one. I will rent it again for an upcoming wedding.

links_Review_Title: GORGEOUS, COMFORTABLE, and SEXY... that doesn't happen often!
links_Review_Text: This dress was fantastic, the fit was perfect and made me feel beautiful for my Birthday night out! The slit is high but easily held close if need be, and the front is low but the draping is perfect to keep things covered. (I am small chested, so could be different for someone with more curves) Got so many compliments, can't wait to rent this one again.
great flowing dress
The slit is higher than expected; the slip under the sheer fabric is really short. It is so beautiful, I wish it had just a little more coverage. Must wear heels if you're 5'3"

I wish I had taken a photo this dress is incredible. I felt like a million box, sexy in a sophisticated way. It's perfect for summer, date night, cocktail party, dress up or down with flats. Fabric is flowy, light, and can't brag enough about it. A must!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! <3

I loved this dress. It was flowy, romantic, breezy. I wish that I would have sized down, as I found the chest area to be too big- it was constantly gaping open. I rented a large and am typically an 8/10 in dresses.

Obsessed with this dress!! It even works for petite girls! I'm 5'2 and typically hesitant to rent a maxi dress but this one didn't drag (wore 4 inch heels). I go between an xs/s and wore a S but easily could have worn an XS too and still been comfortable. The middle has stretch and the cut is forgiving so you can still eat and drink in it. I had so many compliments and it's really versatile. Wore it to a wedding, concert, and sushi dinner. Slit was mid thigh on me so taller girls may want to size up. 100% rent this dress and you won't regret it!

I wore this for a work meeting. It had a bit of a 60s vibe with the boots, but I didn't mind. Very comfortable and not super form fitting. If you want it tighter, you may have to go down a size. I loved it and got several compliments on this dress at my meeting. I would definitely wear it again - it can be casual or work appropriate and was a fun and easy dress to wear.
Very nice shimmery detail and comfortable inner fabric - might be sizing or designers intentions but looked very casual on due to lack of shape.

Unfortunately a large wasn't available, so I chose an XL. It was okay, but a bit large. Very comfortable material and flattering cut. I think a smaller size would've been better, but all in all a lovely dress.

I rented this for my work holiday party and it was so wonderfully festive for the occasion. The length was appropriate (right above the knees) and the short sleeve made it a little extra fun! The material was great, no glitter fell off and it was not scratchy at all! I would wear it again. #holidayparty #golddress

links_Review_Title: This dress fit perfectly and was so comfortable.
links_Review_Text: The dress is fairly stretchy and made of good material. It also was pretty warm for a holiday party with temps in 30s. I liked that it was glittery and festive but not too over the top.

Rented this for a work party but didn't end up wearing it. The size s fit but went with the medium to have a more conservative look. Did wear to church the next day and got a compliment! It's pretty soft very stretchy. The neck itched for a while but then I got used to it. My 4 year old was all about the sparkle
This was an easy dress to wear out, super comfortable. It looked more olive to me in photos, but it is definitely gold metallic- won't work for daytime.

Love this dress. I got it in a small but definitely should have sized down. Great for a party or special night. It's glittery and beautiful but not full on glitter, a little subtle! Will be reordering in the smaller size.
comfortable dress
Fun dress- wanted something fancier than business casual but not real cocktail-y and this did the trick! Lots of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Cute and very nice material, but runs big
links_Review_Text: I really liked this dress, but it was a little big on me. I am usually a 2-4 and the XS would have fit me better. It is A-line so just seemed too big on the bottom for me.
It was perfect for bar hopping on New Year's Eve, not too over-the-top or formal but sparkly enough for the occasion.
I wore this 4 times, twice w boots and twice w strappy heels. Love! Comfortable, great fit. Gold was just the right amount of sparkle.

links_Review_Title: Very blingy and perfect for NYE!
links_Review_Text: While the fit ran true to size, the fabric is very stretchy and was amazingly comfortable. Easy to accessorize and was perfect for NYE.
Really really REALLY soft and comfortable!
Easy fit, no fuss, but still made me feel cute and dressed up. I prob could have gotten in a small, but played it safe. I wore for a holiday party for my husband's company.
This dress is instant happiness. The puff sleeves and midi length with the tight striped waist band is extremely flattering. Bright colors and fun pattern. It's a head turner for sure.
Not for the faint of heart!

links_Review_Title: Extremely fun, tons of compliments from strangers
links_Review_Text: This dress was tremendous. The sleeves are a bit puffier than I expected but the dress already has a ton of personality so if that is a dealbreaker you shouldn't rent it. I got compliments everywhere I went, from men and women, from friends and strangers. I wore it twice: once to my birthday party and once to work.
One of my fave rentals ever. Comfortable and colorful and flowy and funky. So much fun.
Absolutely loved everything about this dress! The fit was perfect and the colors/print were amazing. I wore this for Mardi Gras and this dress was truly made for Mardi Gras!
OBSESSED with this dress! It's so bright and fun and I got so many compliments. Runs a bit large but that just meant I was super comfortable all day.
Love this dress. Fits perfect and is so easy to wear and pretty.

This dress is SUPER staticky so have Static Guard in hand, but if you want to put out some major Lisa Frank vibes this dress is here for it. The middle has no give, so while it seems huge and boxy, once it's on, it's actually quite flattering.

links_Review_Title: Get ready to be noticed in this gorgeous, colorful pattern
links_Review_Text: Love love love this amazing, colorful dress. It’s definitely not for everyone - you will stand out. The pattern is intense and bright. But it’s so gorgeous and fun and different. I got compliments all day. It’s exactly my style. Fit was TTS, with plenty of room at the waist. I could possibly have sized down (definitely not up). Loved the balloon sleeves and bold shoulders. Only con was the dress was very staticy. 10/10, would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Lisa Frank Went on a Trip And Dreamed This Dress
links_Review_Text: Very Polyester, no pockets, but all is forgiven because it was so fun and fabulous. Very static-y dress for winter so have static guard on hand.
Loved the dress. Very comfortable. Thin lightweight material. Received compliments all day. One Negative- Lots of static when I first put it on so be prepared to get out the static guard

links_Review_Title: I am OBSESSED with this Lisa Frank realness
links_Review_Text: Light weight, a little big on me, would be tempted to buy but need to size down. I feel like Carole Baskin-the tiger Queen minus the whole feeding husbands to tigers part.
A lot of fabric throughout the torso. Not flattering on my body.
so pretty! loved it with leather jacket

I rented this for a family friendly New Years Eve party. It definitely stands out in the crowd! I felt sexy, without showing a lot of skin. The material had a ton of static cling which I couldn't get rid of. Also realize that there's no give in the waistband. That being said, I loved it and would recommend it!

This dress is very very bright. It was a little bit too long for me, but I still really liked it. The material is really soft and silky. However, because of the fabric, it did stick to my tights while I was walking around. This would be better for a Spring day where it's cooler but you don't need tights.

Wore this dress twice before returning. Love it! So fun and colors are great! Very flattering and comfortable fit. My only compliant was this dress was so full of static and it stuck together the whole time. First time I wore it I didn't have a slip or anything to help and it was pretty annoying. Second wear I had a slip And a dryer sheet to help Me out . Much better! Loved the dress and so did everyone else!

links_Review_Title: My size was never available so I hoped the size up would fit
links_Review_Text: I love this dress but it was never available in my size on RTR Unlimited. Took a chance and ordered the next size up and it was too large. Would love it in my size. It's gorgeous!
Really fun dress to wear! Didn't have any issues with static. Was such an easy dress to throw on for a party!

links_Review_Title: its pretty loud. reminds me of my lisa frank binder from 2nd grade.
links_Review_Text: fit a little larger than other hunter bell items. not for the faint of heart...

links_Review_Title: The colorful animal print was very cute!!
links_Review_Text: This dress is better for warmer temperatures. It clung to my skin with the cooler wind and it was staticky. other than that i loved it.

links_Review_Title: Very flowy and longer than expected
links_Review_Text: Even with the funky fabric the length of this dress for me made it too matronly.

Rented this while working from home during corona and loved the bright flowers!!!! Dress is absolutely beautiful. Zipper up the side, easy to wear and very comfy. Would rather wear to a fancy wedding!!
Easy to wear. Very comfortable. Really pretty details.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a mid day wedding. Skirt twirled great while dancing!
links_Review_Text: Dress was a little bit lower cut than I expected but I did not to pin it. Material has a bit of shine to it which is nice. Would definitely rent again!
Definitely spices my closet. Very nice dress indeed. Love the glow and how it fits on me.
Rented this dress with out any reviews. Beautiful silk dress. I think I would've been able to go down a size.
Really pretty print and silky fabric. Needed a cami to make it work-appropriate. Not a true wrap dress, it's a v-neck with a separate belt.

I absolutely loved the colors of this dress. Photos don't do it justice. I am very different sizes on top (small) and bottom (large), so I ordered a 6 and an 8. I ended up wearing the 6. It fit great up top and bottom.

links_Review_Title: Love the pattern and the feel of the material, very smooth.
links_Review_Text: The zipper was very long, hard to get to, needed assistance.
This was a lovely dress for work and could be dressed up for an event. Ran a little big on top and in the waist for me but I was able to pin it
Fits perfectly, and the ruching at the front is incredibly flattering. So many compliments, and love the cape!
Loved this dress. The cape is so fun and the dress is high quality. It is fairly short for and has a slit so sitting isn't super flattering

Wore this fabulous dress for a design workshop and meeting. Felt filled with confidence and can do attitude all day! Fabric has no stretch but cut is comfortable. Cape bit doesn't really add warmth if your office AC is strong. Styled as shown in office and swapped the pumps out for combat boots on the commute.

links_Review_Title: I felt like a superhero in this cape dress
links_Review_Text: The fitted torso with gathering was slimming and stylish.
Wore a turtleneck underneath for winter. Super fun, comfortable and lots of compliments.
Loved, loved the style!! Material was much lighter than I expected. Was also a bit short for work, even for 5'5". Needed to wear opaque tights.
I loved the fit of this dress! Super easy to wear. I got more than one comment comparing the dress to a Scottish kilt with the draping plaid fabric. I made it work, but something to be aware of.

links_Review_Title: What a twist on a work dress!
links_Review_Text: This is the chicest dress, I just wish it ran bigger. It was tight across my chest and the slit road up.

I'm usually a 4 but went with the 2 because I didn't want it to overwhelm me. It was a perfect fit. The fabric is light with some give but no stretch. The ruching at the waist is super flattering and the cape - LOVE! Highly recommend.

links_Review_Title: Eye-catching - professional with a fashion edge.
links_Review_Text: I loved wearing this dress. The cape on one shoulder did not get annoying as I thought it might - it stays pretty well in place unless you bend over, and you can easily put it back. Lots of compliments. Comfortable in air travel and meetings.

links_Review_Title: Step into that board room with elegance and power!
links_Review_Text: Perfect work dress. Will rent again. 10 all around.

This is the only thing I've ever rented that I would actually consider buying. I loved the drama of the cape! The dress did run a little big in my opinion -- I'm a true size 0 and I pinned it in at the waist to be a bit more flattering. The draping made it easy to hide my pinning perfectly. The fabric wasn't totally amazing as it was polyester, but I liked that it was lighter so the cape wasn't heavy.

I ultimately didn't wear it because I'm just not cool enough to sport a faux cape to the office. It's a cute dress and the gathering on the side is flattering. The dress itself doesn't fit great though - the slip clung to my body and the top layer kept getting twisted over the slip. I ended up not wearing it because it was too uncomfortable. Girls with big butts or athletic shoulders should size up.

This dress ran so extremely small. I'm normally a 12/14 and I rented this in size 16 and I couldn't even zip it up all the way. There was a slit on the front that was shorter than I would have liked had it fit.

links_Review_Title: This dress is dramatic and professional.
links_Review_Text: This has a nice amount of stretch but was a little small through the chest.
I love this dress and am debating buying it. It is a modern yet classic look.

Loved this dress! Wore it for a daytime speaking engagement and loved the way it fit + felt. Although it looks like there might be a lot of fabric in the photo, in real life, the dress' ruching + cape details are very flattering and lightweight feeling. True to size with little stretch. I'm on the shorter side to where the dress hit a few inches above the knee. Highly recommend!
Very flattering
It just didn't fit me. Could not zip up.

This was the perfect dress for my after-work holiday event. I'm usually a 14 in mass-brands but a 16 in more fashiony stuff--the 16 here was PERFECT. The main body of the dress is simple and the print is actually kind of boring--but the cape on one side is dramatic and elegant and gorgeous. Felt like a million bucks. Would like to wear exclusively clothing with capes built in from now on.

links_Review_Title: The plaid, pleating, and cape made it unique.
links_Review_Text: I would size down.

I rented this to wear for a holiday party. I think it's good for a work party if not too tall. I wish it was a titch longer on me as it shows a lot of leg. I might try it again w black tights. I think it runs a bit small.

I wore this to work and a work related event. Several people stopped me during the day to compliment me on the dress! I tried the 8 first but it was a bit tight on the hips - the 10 was roomy but lays flat nicely and the cape just flows behind you. Note it does ride up a lot when sitting, so best to wear more opaque tights.
I loved the material and style but it ran small. Didn't get to wear it . Hoping to re- order in a larger size.

links_Review_Title: Won't work for a curvy girl
links_Review_Text: Too tight in the butt and boobs for me. Usually wear size 16. Going back.

links_Review_Title: This dress will make you feel like a She Boss Warrior!
links_Review_Text: This dress is amazing! I took a chance renting, as there were no reviews yet. I wore it for work and felt like Braveheart all day! Dress is TTS. I have a large chest and dress fit nicely across the chest and even had room in the mid-section. Fabric is lighter weight than I expected (I thought it would be thicker kilt-like material), but dress is lined, so warm enough for fall. Cape detail and plaid pattern make this dress worth renting if you want to stand out in the best way possible!
I am usually a size 4 but I got a size 12 because it looked the right size and it fit me perfectly. Maybe a tad baggy but nothing super bad.

This was beautiful but there is very little stretch to the fabric and it's not cut for someone with hips or a butt. This left no room for movement without the dress riding up. I don't do a lot of running around at work so it wasn't an issue but I will size up next time. Sadly, the top of this dress fit me perfectly so I doubt the top will fit well at a size up.
Beautiful fabric and unique cut. Plaid makes it conventional enough for work. Lovely dress.

links_Review_Title: So cute, but a bit short
links_Review_Text: This was so cute. I loved the draping and the pattern, but it was more a mini-dress on me. It also ran tight through the chest, but this is a common problem for me. I am triangle shape with broad shoulders, a large rib cage and bust. If you are shorter, or don't mind a short dress, this dress is super cute.

Enjoyed wearing this cami. I liked the material and print. Runs really big! I'm smaller on top so the cut was slightly low and kept having to adjust it. Wish it had adjustable straps. Length was good, was able to tick it in with no problem.

links_Review_Title: Cute and easy night out look.
links_Review_Text: I wore this with a black blazer and some skinny dress pants. This top is really easy to dress and I got a bunch of compliments! I think this would also be quite cool with a leather pencil skirt or white pants in the summer. The material is quite thick so if you're a bigger breasted gal, it might make you look bigger than you are! Overall cute and I'd rent it again!

links_Review_Title: So fun. Perfect for any occasion. So comfy. Great fit
links_Review_Text: I rented the large bc that's what was available so it was big on me, but I just tucked it in to make it looked fitted. The shirt is super soft and looks great

links_Review_Title: Nice quality but shows too much cleavage
links_Review_Text: This was both too big (M was not available so I tried the L) and showed too much cleavage. A M would have probably been the right fit but would not have solved the neckline issue. I returned without wearing.

links_Review_Title: Too boxy but cool fabric. Just not my style.

links_Review_Text: Perfect weekend day to night transition piece
Got lots of compliments on this top. Fits true to size.

Super cute top. Fitted well through the middle but was a little bit looser than I had anticipated. Also the sleeves were a little loose and fell off my shoulders sometime (you can kind of tell in the pic) but overall a great top and super flattering.
I was sent the XL which was definitely too big. Next time I would get normal size of Med or large . Sat nicely on waist and you could wear a regular bra with it
Super cute and versatile top but I normally wear a small and it was very big in the sides and on the sleeves so I would recommend sizing down!

This was perfect for dinner + a show while in Las Vegas. I wore it with cropped skinnies and strappy heels, basically the way it's pictured on the RTR model. I wore a strapless bra and felt very comfortable. I suggest this top and would rent it again.
I probably should have worn jeans with a higher waist because it was on the shorter side but still loved it for multiple occasions. Dressy or casual.

links_Review_Title: You can wear this out or make it casual
links_Review_Text: I loved this top

links_Review_Title: Perfect top for a night out!
links_Review_Text: Loved this top SO much. Sexy and flattering!
Cotton tailored top. Beautiful detail. However the lace detail on the sleeves was running very large. And constantly falling down.
So flattering, I got a million compliments. The fit was perfect and flattering. Super versatile, I wore to work and out to dinner. Bought it.

links_Review_Title: Fun top for a night out!
links_Review_Text: Wore this top with high waisted jeans to a concert and absolutely loved it! Was a bit of a tight fit when putting it on so would maybe have sized up, but it was totally comfortable when I had it on. Such a fun style and something I wouldn't necessarily buy so perfect to rent.

Loved the fit on this, but you can't wear a bra with it. Be aware that it has the potential for side boob. I just used a piece of tape to pull the girls together, one more to keep them up, and the shirt did the rest of the holding in place.
Very pretty top but be prepared to go braless
Cute and flattering. I have big boobs abs it fit perfectly without flattening then.

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on shirt! fit really well and super flattering.
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit. Wore w/o bra though. back open.

links_Review_Title: Cute with a pair of jeans
links_Review_Text: I was unable to use this top. The straps ran big. May fit better for those who have a bigger bust.
would rent again

links_Review_Title: It was a little more casual than what I wanted it for
links_Review_Text: Might rent again in the spring to wear with a denim skirt

Top fit just right. It's a little in the short side but not too short. The wide straps help keep them from falling for me because I am broad shouldered this worked well. Paired with jeans and black slacks- cute for both.
Really flattering fit if you have a smaller waste. Nice square neck--sleeves were wide but I didn't have any issue with them falling off/down. Got so many compliments. Love it

links_Review_Title: Wore out for a night with friends.
links_Review_Text: Top was a bit big but wore under a jacket so it worked perfectly. Bra strap showed with the straps, and my bra showed a bit in the back.
I love black tops and really wanted to like this one but the fit was too big. I ordered an XS and I'm around 108 lbs.
Really cute and good quality, but unable to wear due to sizing. I'm between a 4 and 6 usually, but the 6 was way too big.
boxy and too large in shoulders and waist

links_Review_Title: Ended up not wearing because it was to big.
links_Review_Text: Cute top but unfortunately it was to big so I did not wear.

links_Review_Title: Wore it for everyday with jeans
links_Review_Text: Fits well but the shoulder kept sliding down
I loved this top. I felt the cut was very flattering and the detail was great. You can dress it up or down, depending on the bottoms/ shoes you wear.

Disappointed that this fit so awkwardly. I typically wear a large in tops. I chose the xl and the xxl. I anticipated the xl might be too small because it was an 8/10 and I’m more of a 10/12. The xl was huge on the top and I’m a 34C.

When it first arrived I thought they sent the wrong dress. It's not the dress on the picture. It very similar but the dress in the picture is just elastic on the bust while the dress I received is not. I didn't like it at all.

links_Review_Title: Unique and beautiful for winter wedding in Malibu!
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to a winter malibu wedding and it was a hit! The dress details are gorgeous! I chose this dress because it was formal but still kept my breasts under wraps--don't want to steal the show from the bride! ;) It was perfect. One of my favorite dresses I've rented. Compliments all night.

Beautifully made dress. Conservative with just a bit of pizazz. Lots of compliments. The cons: the sleeves have no give. They weren’t tight, but hard to stretch out and move my arms. I ended up with my back up size (14 instead of 12) which I think is typical to size up in designer gowns. A strapless bras is a must with this gown.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous Embroidered Dress for Beautiful Outdoor Wedding
links_Review_Text: This dress was a dream to wear! I fell in love with it online & it was everything I hoped for: flattering cut, beautiful embroidery & rich colors for a winter wedding. The length was perfect for my 5'3" frame & my usual size 8 was just right. I was worried about the length when I'd finally have to kick off my heels, but it fell just right & was fine for my Chanel ballet flats. The sleeves were a little tight, but it wasn't uncomfortable. I highly recommend this!

This dress is what dreams are made of. THE most flattering dress ever and I felt elegant and beautiful the whole night. The only downside is I couldn't lift my arms too well once it was on and I had to order two sizes up which ain't great for moral but OH WELL cuz this dress is bangin

Loved wearing this dress. It was a little tight up top due to the tulle fabric...didnt give much. But otherwise a fabulous dress and received lots of compliments. Had to wear a taller heal bc it was a little long.

Really beautiful dress that made me feel really beautiful. The dress is also comfortable (not too tight). I can't wear high heels, and the dress was long enough to cover my sneakers. The dress pops! And I got a lot of compliments.
#floral #floralfashion

Fit was great! I got a 4R, and am usually a 4 on top / 6 on bottom. It was a little snug in the hips/butt, but did not prevent from feeling like a princess. My husband captured several photos of me twirling in it. #gardenparty

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on this dress. It made a fun night even better!
links_Review_Text: This dress was so comfortable. I loved wearing it.

links_Review_Title: Tons of compliments & felt super comfortable!
links_Review_Text: I personally felt very comfortable, as I didn't have to wear a bra with the dress and I got a loose enough fit that my arms weren't terribly restricted. I probably could have gone a size smaller, but I would have felt like a sausage casing & my arms would have been unmovable. Due to the high quality, none of the material (I was worried about the neck particularly) was itchy at all. Wore it from 3pm-1am and was able to dance all night long! Loved this dress!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress and comfortable to wear
links_Review_Text: I had many compliments and the dress made a statement walking into any room.
Size: true to size, snug in the torso and arm area. Detailing: it looks expensive and well made Occasion: highly recommend for cold weather formal affairs
I got so many compliments on this dress. I did have to go with the bigger size to fit the bust
Elegant and got many compliments. Little in the arms, I had very limited mobility. But it is a lovely, well-made garment!

links_Review_Title: A perfect dress for daytime formal
links_Review_Text: I got so many compliments on this dress. Rented up a size bc the 10 was tight on the arms. I actually didn't end up wearing a bra and was fine! Very comfortable and not super heavy. (ig @beatricebierie to see how I style my rtr finds)

I loved everything about this dress! Wore it for an October wedding where ceremony was outdoors (so the length kept me warm AND beautifully dressed). Got so many compliments. The 10 fit everywhere except my chest (which is large) so was glad I had the 12. I love RTR because I love beautiful, well made clothes but don't have budget for designer dresses like this for fancy occasions, plus I never have to wear the same thing twice! Definitely recommend!

I felt great in this dress! I'm usually between an 8 and a 10 and the 10 fit perfectly. Usually self conscious about stomach area and wore spanx but probably didn't need to, it was comfortable and I felt totally supported. It's a little long- I'm 5'4 and wore 3 inch heels, anything smaller and the dress would have dragged.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! I got so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fit perfect! Wore this to a friend's wedding and got so many compliments! The embroidery detailing and ruffles around the neck and sleeves make it so unique and stunning!
Got so many compliments. Only issue I had was the sleeves were a bit tight so it was hard to raise my arms overhead.

links_Review_Title: I was in a work cocktail in NY with a lot of famous people. I braid my hair in a fish tail
links_Review_Text: Was a success every single person say something about my look ... the quality it's incredible. Because it's a high neck line I've decided to braid my hair to the back with a fish tale great combo I wearing just earring and a bracelet it's all you need ... lenth is perfecto it's a maxi dress so hills need it.
All night compliments! Never felt more confident and beautiful!!

I wore this to a fundraising gala and it was perfect! Comfortable with a little give in the fabric. Embroidery is beautiful and nice ruffled lace detail around the neck and sleeves. I am short (5’1”) and wore 3 inch heels and the length was perfect. Flattering for a pear figure. Didn’t want to return it!
Gorgeous dress!! Wore this for a wedding and felt great in it. The detail is stunning and the fit is beautiful. Will definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Got so many compliments and felt like I was wearing a fun, different, unique and flattering dress.
links_Review_Text: Fit fine, but I agree with some of the other reviewers that it runs a touch small and you feel the sleeves when you lift your arms. it didn't stop me from dancing all night at the wedding and having a great time.
A little long almost tk the floor Soooo pretty
It was a wonderful dress for a formal winter wedding. I received many compliments. I usually wear a 10 or 12 but wore the 10 as it was a little more fitted in the top.

links_Review_Title: I returned this dress because even in the correct size it is uncomfortable. It's too stiff.
links_Review_Text: Even in a larger than my regular size, the arms are tight, and the overall feeling of the dress is uncomfortable and stiff. I returned the dress without wearing it because just trying it on was uncomfortable. Also, the zipper is a real challenge. The dress was a bit big for me, and I still couldn't get the zipper to zip up. I ended up taking the dress off, zipping it halfway and then pulling it on over my head.

links_Review_Title: Such a flattering dress! I haven't worn it to my event yet but it's so comfortable. Runs small.
links_Review_Text: I loved the fit of the waistline and the length is perfect for me at 5'4". I would definitely recommend this dress, especially for an hourglass figure.
The dress is made for someone taller. I am 5'3 and it was to long for me
such a pretty dress. dainty, classic and as feminine as it gets.
A great fit, beautiful details, got a lot of compliments
Beautiful dress. Great option to show off arms and décolletage but with light cover. Gorgeous, unusual.

links_Review_Title: I chose this dress to wear to church on my birthday. I was a hit. I loved sharing the story.
links_Review_Text: This dress fit great. It was floor length on me. It didn't have any give in the upper arm area, but was ok since I wasn't needing to move too much.
All the embroidery made me fool so fancy, the dress felt great, was worried it would be scratchy but it wasn't a bother at all. Got plenty of compliments and rightly so, the dress was beautiful.

links_Review_Title: Loved the look of this dress and got compliments all night.
links_Review_Text: I normally wear a 14 but ordered the 18R in this and it was exactly right. That said, as a short lady, know that it will bubble a little bit in the back and of course will look longer than on the model.

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress and would rent it again! Got so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fits true to size. I'm trying to lose my baby weight and the 8 fit perfectly.

links_Review_Title: My friend and I had both rented this dress for the same occasion! It was a gala in a horse barn.
links_Review_Text: This was a little tight in the shoulders, but I loved it. I got so many compliments.

Can't say enough positive things about this rental. It was perfect for this an early evening black tie optional wedding. Strangers kept coming up and saying how much they loved it. It fit pretty true to size, maybe a bit on the small side. The only downside was that the arms were very tight, so I couldn't lift my arms above shoulder height. Small price to pay for such a beautiful dress!
This dress is gorgeous and fits true to size throughout, however, it's impossible to raise your arms more than a couple of inches and the neckline is rather scratchy. Wanted to love it/wear it.

I had to get this dress last minute because my previous order was canceled when RTR had issues. I was lucky to find this dress, it was beautiful and I got lots compliments! I will say that I have a small bust and didn't quite fill it in, which at times made the chest area look droopy, but because of the design it was mostly not noticeable. On another note, if you plan on dancing this is NOT the dress for you--it was impossible to lift my arms even to shoulder height because of the sleeves.
Flattering for curves!!
Great color and print and fun cuts all over the dress! Very soft and stretchy

Wore this to the Aerosmith concert. Dress is fire!! A little snug, had to wear the spanx....and any tighter the snaps on the side would have started popping! The ruching is held together by snaps which you cant see in the photos. Loved the print and material. Not as shiny as i was expecting. But overall loved it.
Stretchy fit and helps if you are curvy to accentuate your body type. Super silly and smooth. Can dress up or down!

Compliments galore and ultra flattering while being skin tight with the perfect area and amount of ruching. Drawback is the head hole is super tight, so put your make up on after you get dress on. Loved the differing sleeve lengths and the buttons. Just a super cool number.

TTS with stretch. The fabric is GORGEOUS beyond what you can see in photos. The background has a subtle gold shimmer that takes the look to the next level. Strategically placed ruching & accent buttons make this a dress you'll want to wear more than once before returning.

Love this dress. The material is soft to the touch and fits your curves so well. Got tons of compliments all night. I detailed ruching on the side is not that visible but creates flattering waistline. I thought the dress rode up a little through the night but not too bad. I kept the dress longer so I could wear it over and over

links_Review_Title: Incredible quality fabric, eye-catching animal print, beyond comfortable AND flattering!
links_Review_Text: Wore for (very fittingly) the CATS premiere, and quickly became one of my fave rentals ever. Material is stretchy & jersey-like, but has a high quality sheen so it doesn't feel casual and was perfect for a dressy evening. Wore Spanx just for extra comfort, but the ruching across the midsection is super flattering so you could easily wear without. Loved the details of the buttons and the asymmetrical shoulders, AND being able to wear a normal bra. Love that it could also go day to night. RENT IT!

links_Review_Title: Wore this for a Zoom meeting. everyone loved it! However, I didn't like the side snap feature.
links_Review_Text: The fit was fine. Fabric very nice.
Super sexy and flattering and best of all comfy.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a night out in NYC
links_Review_Text: Dress looked awesome with a little leather jacket and booties for a cold night in NYC. Only reason I didn't give it 5 stars, is because I had to keep pulling it down all night long. I'm 5'4" and 130 lbs and wore a 36. A 38 might have worked better, but it looked hot! :)
Looks good... not great on stomach

links_Review_Title: Loved the feel of the fabric
links_Review_Text: contemporary, stylish dress with an amazing fit.
silky fabric so wore Spanx and all was smooth.

links_Review_Title: beautiful fitted dress in a lovely fabric that travels very well
links_Review_Text: the asymmetrical design ads a nice flair to a dinner party dress

links_Review_Title: Flattering with a smidge of edge
links_Review_Text: Wore this dress for NYE. Fit perfectly..possibly runs just a little big. The ruching is very flattering and it's a great material that fits closely without being too clingy. Could be styled up or down; I wore with a leather jacket, black ankle boots, and a black leather belt bag for a more casual look. Two thumbs up; would recommend.

links_Review_Title: My fiance couldn't keep his eyes off me in this and it felt great.
links_Review_Text: I was nervous about this dress at first because I'm thin, but definitely have my little mommy tummy. This dress literally made me look like I was wearing spanks without feeling constricting. It was glorious. I will probably rent this again and keep an wires out for a sale to buy this dress. My favorite piece for sure.

On the hanger it looked kind of boring but when I put it on, it was exactly the opposite. Hugs at all of the right places, snaps on the side to create a ruche. Material is soft. My only con would be having to unsnap the side to put the dress on and take it off. Would definitely rent again.

This dress is very… Interesting. It has snaps up the side which you can't really see in the photo that make it bunch up.and the sleeves are a typical which I thought looked horrible on me. it just wasn't my style. However my roommate absolutely loved it on me so I think it's a matter of personal taste. It is a long dress and I'm tall so take that into consideration.

I love Black Halo so much. This dress was perfect for my Valentine's Day. Hugs curves and accentuates the right areas. Got many compliments (and a spot on comment that it had major Betsey Johnson vibes.) Indeed!! BH runs small so go a size up if unsure.

The print on this dress is so pretty, the pink and red is offset with a bit of lilac or green, don't remember but I loved it. It fits well, just needs more material lol. I'd say rent one size up to be comfortable if you're curvy. This is one of my favorite dresses for early spring, styles here with a Josie Natori pink fur jacket. Rent this one!
I loved this dress so much! It was comfortable, 14 fit better than the 12. I got so many compliments! I wore and older pair of spanx, hence the belly, but I would still wear 'this dress again!!!
Wore to a garden attire wedding. Loved the fit, great construction and quality fabric. Got tons of compliments!!
Fit like a glove. The colors are so vibrant and beautiful and the fabric is such high quality. I seriously might just buy this dress. So many compliments all night. Just an overall well made garment.

links_Review_Title: Got lots of compliments, loved this dress! Very flattering fit.
links_Review_Text: I’m usually a size 8 or 10 and the 10 fit perfectly! I’m 5’ 6” 150 lbs with a small chest but large rib cage/wide shoulders.

I love this dress, it's the second time I've rented it and would get it again. It's fits really well, it's comfortable and the print is so pretty. I got compliments all night. I also like that the straps are adjustable and that I didn't need to wear a bra. The fabric is pretty thick too so I didn't feel like I needed to wear shape wear to smooth anything out.
Very pretty dress but unfortunately was too wide in the hips/body.

Wore this to a friends wedding & i absolutely loved it!!! Definitely would recommend If i had time i probably would have returned for a size 6 but the 8 was still flattering but a little loose - I'm a 34 DD and the 8 was perfect on my chest
This dress is so freakin cute!! I also loooove the material, it is fitted but it has just the right amount of stretch! It's also a super soft material. 10/10 recommend!!
Gorgeous dress!! Love the flower print! Wore last week on my honeymoon in Barbados. Received many compliments! Comfortable, but minimal stretch.
The dress fit like a glove and had a thick material which was super stretchy and comfortable. Got tons of complements and would rent again!
Loved this dress, it was perfect for a Mexico beach wedding. Didn't have much difference in fit from the 6 to the 8, went with the bigger size for a little more room.
Hugged my curves and looked great on.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a rehearsal dinner or wedding!
links_Review_Text: Absolutely loved the stress. It was a stunner. I was at a very small rehearsal dinner but I got lots of compliments from everyone. I would love to rent us again for another occasion

I loved this dress! It fit like a glove. It does have some stretch to it so if you have some curves it stills works! I ordered it in a size 2 & 4 and ended up liking the 2 best. If the dress didn't have any stretch I definitely wouldn't have fit into the 2It's a very fun print and I would definitely rent again. I just didn't end up wearing it because I liked a different RTR dress better for that particular occasion. Would absolutely recommend especially for a summer event/wedding!
Loved this and great for curves. I'm usually an 8, sometimes a 10, but was comfortable in the 12. Glad I sized up!

I absolutely loved wearing this dress! I'm usually an 8/10. The 10 mostly fit, but I went with the 12 for a little extra room. I usually don't wear this cut as I'm worried about my tum tum, but I felt incredible in this one. Cheers!

links_Review_Title: High quality, bright colors, OK petite fit
links_Review_Text: True to size, high quality fabric, got a lot of compliments on the style and colors. Only OK for a petite frame (which is one of the filters I selected)- the fit around the lower waist bulged a bit. Other than that, it was great. Didn't even need to wear a bra!
The fit is perfect and the dress is pretty while being a little sexy. Very high quality fabric on the floral pattern and also the pink lining
I wore this dress to a September wedding and got so many compliments! It fits true to size and the material is very comfortable! Love this dress!!

This dress hugged every curve & gave a very retro/pin-up vibe. The color is vibrant and fun and the fabric is thick & substantial. No bra needed - plenty of support without. Enjoy standing out in the crowd in this fun dress.
Soft and stretchy material felt great for a humid late summer wedding. The length actually made me look taller and the material was thick enough so no bra was needed. Loved this dress!
Only complaint was it was big in the waist area but fit perfect everywhere else! I received a lot of compliments on the color and print!

links_Review_Title: Great dress for wedding or formal event! Love it!
links_Review_Text: Love this dress! Didn't love it at first and then fell in love. Great for a formal event or wedding! The fit was perfect and not too tight! Love the adjustable straps.

The fabric of this dress is nice and thick; doesn't show every dimple and wrinkle. And the colors and patterns are amazing. I'm a pear shape, so I was pleasantly surprised when this fitted dress fit well on top and bottom. That said, a complaint I never thought I'd have is that it's too roomy in the stomach. The dress looked nice and smooth pulled down to my knees, and then I'd take a few steps, it would ride up, and give me the appearance of having a belly. But I did get a lot of compliments.
Loved this dress. Flattering fit and a fun color to pair with red lips. Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Retro Palm Springs themed engagement party dress
links_Review_Text: Fit great and received lots of compliments!
This dress is everything! Great quality, colors, fit...super comfortable and sexy. I got a ton of compliments and seriously considered buying it afterwards! Highly recommend!

Perfect for a curvy girl!! The material is super comfortable and hugs you at all the right places. It does run a little small but once you get the size on that fits it's comfortable for all night wear and dancing! Tighter on the bust but nothing too flashy or over the top up there! Got so many compliments on the length and print. Would definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Fun dress, order a size up!
links_Review_Text: Loved the pattern of this dress, got a lot of compliments. I normally wear an 8 and RTR suggested a 10 which fit snugly, order up!

links_Review_Title: Fantastic POP of color, so cute!!
links_Review_Text: Vivid color pop, show stopper!
LOVED this dress for a late summer wedding! So many compliments. I'm 5'4" 125lbs and wore a size 2. Loved it!!

links_Review_Title: Form fitting without being too tight. I got lots of complements and felt beautiful. Love this dress.
links_Review_Text: Has adjustable straps which helped the fit with my long torso. If you are self conscious you many want to wear shape wear with this gown, but it's not truly needed. Length was great for dancing as it only bunched up to a bit above my knees. Very comfortable dress with some stretch.

A little on the small side- I'm usually between 6-8, but this dress is awesome! Sooooo sooo pretty, maybe meant for taller girls, it was a little long on me at 5'3. Also to note- I wore a size 10 due to my bust which is around 40", so the bottom was bigger, but that was fine as it made it more comfy. Definitely would rent again!
What a fun and sexy dress! Had a blast wearing it and received tons of compliments. I decided on the 2 because I wanted a tighter fit. Perfect length and very flattering!

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments (even next to my stylish man) and felt so great. I want to buy it!
links_Review_Text: Fit like a dream, felt so confident, hugged me in all the right places, compliments all night. Not only would I wear this again, but I want to buy this! Ordered the 4 and 6, wore the 6, and probably could have squeezed into the 4--but the 6 was comfortable and the straps were adjustable so I think it was the right choice.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous, comfortable dress but size up!
links_Review_Text: This dress is stunning in person. I was very comfortable all night and got lots of compliments. The colors and the neckline are fabulous! Usually I wear a size 6, but I had to size up two sizes in this dress. The 10 fit like a glove!

I'm currently in between sizes 6-10. I feel like this is a true size 8 but the tie makes it easy to fit anywhere between a 6-10. If you are a true size 8, this is perfect for you! I'm also 5'7 so the length was great. Love this so much!

Are used one of my spots so my daughter could have a cute Easter dress to wear. We loved it so much and if it had not been so expensive we would totally purchased it. It is definitely more of a younger luck I am 50 and my daughter is 21. It was totally appropriate for her as it seemed a little short. The fabric was first class and she looked amazing in it.
Tons of compliments from a very fashion-forward crowd. A little awkward across the bust, but made it work. I loved it :)

links_Review_Title: It was pretty and comfortable. Great texture for the masquerade banquet.
links_Review_Text: True to size. Good fabric. Highly complimented.
The dress was so beautiful. It was comfortable and elegant! I wore it on a date night to Carnegie Hall, the perfect dress for and elegant evening for a classical music concert.

Wore this to a concert and I loved this dress! I normally do not like high low gowns but this one was absolutely stunning. The colors were beautiful and when I walked the train would come out behind me so it made it very dramatic which I loved! Would definitely buy this to add to my wardrobe.
A little conservative for me, but very comfortable and the fabric was beautiful. The ribbon belt feels a li'l cheap, to be honest.

I LOVED this dress but ain't would have sized down if they had my size available. Gorgeous material, perfect for a December wedding. Although my husband did call me McGonagall as I was getting dressed. 🙃

I wore this dress for a holiday party. It was beautiful and such nice quality. It's a wrap dress so it ties inside and then the bow ties it on the outside. I'm about 5"3' and wore some heels and length was good but on the border of long. As a warning, the chest area can be tight and if you're chesty it might be very low cut. Used a lot of double sided tape! Also is slightly high low but in a very tasteful way! I'm self conscious of my legs but didn't feel that way all. Overall, recommend!
Looove this dress! I'm 5'0 and I wore very y'all heels and it was still long. But since it was just for a photo shoot it was perfect!

I loved so much about this dress. The velvet feels luxurious and it flows beautifully when I walked. The sleeves are elegant. Unfortunately the chest area gapped and didn't lay nicely no matter how I arranged it. It showed my chest when I sat down. Just didn't fit me right. Maybe you'll have better luck!

I had high hopes for this dress, ordered an XL and XXL as I'm very busty. Tried on the XL was soft seemed comfortable, did not cover my chest at all. Thought for sure the larger size would be the ticket. That one was smaller!!!! Luckily the event I was going to was canceled, I would have had nothing to wear.
This is a fun dress. I love how different it is. It's very low cut and was too boobilicious for a family wedding. But would be great for a date night.

links_Review_Title: It was a nice dress but I didn’t end up em wearing it. (It was my backup)
links_Review_Text: Fabric was nice velvet
The dress fit perfect except in the chest area. I have a larger chest and I had to pin the top closed so that it wasn't so revealing.
The fit is good and the look is understated but nice.

The material is even prettier in person than it appears in the photos. Nice length for dancing. Front is low cut but stayed in place on my small bust (36A) and was flattering. Very comfortable, yet fairly formal looking and just sexy enough for a middle aged gal.
Love the look and feel of this dress, fit well everywhere but the bust. There is one small hook there that will be holding on for dear life if you are busty.

links_Review_Title: Awesome dress wore to a winter black tie.
links_Review_Text: Wore a small. I'm 5'3 and with heels it was perfect. Hi-low is not too dramatic and makes the length a bit forgiving. Was receiving compliments from strangers.
It was lovely.
I love the whole system; it got here on time, a size up just in case (for free) and easy to return. I’ll be coming back to this site a lot now :)

Wore this to a New Years' Eve party and received tons of compliments! Fits true to size, if only a bit too large in the busy for me (38C). It was slightly long on me, but I was also wearing short heels.
This dress would be great for those with a tiny waste and smaller top. I couldn't even comfortably tie this up.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous, elegant backup dress. I would size up for a C+ cup.
links_Review_Text: This dress is gorgeous. I would have worn it rather than my primary rental if I had been prepared with a proper chest undergarment - otherwise was too much cleavage for the event I was attending. Either way, if you have C+ cups, plan to size up for "girls allowance." Now that I know, I hope for an occasion to wear it another time!!

Loved this easy slip on and go spring dress. Sleeves and print are on trend and beautiful in person. I found it ran a little big for Ganni, more true to size. I probably could have sized down but it wasn't overwhelming. It looks as good with sneakers as it does with heels.

Love this brand. This dress was so flattering and comfortable. I wore a cami under it for work since it was a bit low for the office. There are little snap tabs to hold your bra straps in place. Received several compliments. Definitely planning to buy.

This dress was very 90s boho chic. If you want to have a shape, i definitely recommend throwing on a belt or a jacket. I personally wasn't a fan of the sleeves, but with a leather jacket and tights, i felt much more comfortable

links_Review_Title: Cute, slightly sheer even with lining
links_Review_Text: Even with the built in slip lining this felt a little too sheer and I didn't feel like wearing a slip under it. The fit and flow and sleeves were cute though!

links_Review_Title: Wore this on a Saturday for brunch and it was comfy but still polished.
links_Review_Text: Looks amazing with a belt, tights and boots.
This dress is lightweight and flowy and hides everything! Fits true to size and has some stretch to it too. I ordered a 0 and it fits comfortably.
Loved the movement of this dress - so breathable and flows with every step you take. It was a little tight around the chest for myself but otherwise true to size from the waist down!

easy breezy in spring and summer but also a great base for colder months. top with a leather jacket, blazer or even throw a sweater on top to wear as a skirt. flattering neckline pairs well with the voluminous skirt and bonus, pockets!
Easy dress with pockets, perfect for a beach wedding. It's a navy/dark purple, not black. Very comfortable, probably could've sized down for my second size rather than up

links_Review_Title: relaxed, can wear to work with a T-Shirt underneath, loved the fit
links_Review_Text: This dress was very comfortable and easy to dress up or down

Wore this to a small, more casual fall wedding that took place on a boat in South Florida. Loved the soft material and pockets - very comfortable and flowy with more of a slightly fitted top which was flattering. Loved the ultra thin, adjustable straps. Would definitely recommend and will rent again in spring/summer!

links_Review_Title: Light and airy with adjustable straps
links_Review_Text: Wore this a couple times on a beach vacation. Perfect for petites.

My daughter wore this dress to an outdoor wedding last weekend and was surprised it had pockets! I personally loved that feature but she was meh on it. It definitely was loose on her as a 2 and she is a 4-6 most often. The dress was the perfect length and spaghetti straps were adjustable and helped customize the fit. It can be worn with heels to look formal or with flats for more casual. Great versatile dress! Sadly I don't have any good pictures of just her alone with the dress.

links_Review_Title: Lightweight fabric, fun flow, cute pattern.
links_Review_Text: This was perfect for vacation. If you want it to be more form fitting, size down because it's a little loose on the waist. However, it gives it a more casual relaxed look to keep it true to size! Very comfortable!
Great fit and perfect for summer or when it's starting to get a little cold. I wore this dress out shopping

links_Review_Title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_Review_Text: Wore to a rehearsal dinner. Great fabric! Its crinkled so it doesn't show any wrinkles. I ended up buying it. Plan to wear it again casually with sneakers and a jean jacket.

Being 5'2", I was nervous that this dress would be too long, but it was actually a perfect length. The material is great for summer, keeps you cool. Both the size 0 and 00 fit fine. Best part, it has pockets!
I loved the super skinny straps
Perfect dress for vacation. Comfortable and easy to wear. The fabric was soft and looked elevated

Loved the fabric, flowy, I'm a true 0 but I went with the XXS and didn't regret it. Not particularly fitted through the waist, has more of an empire cut than I was expecting. Made it more pretty / less sexy. I loved it and paired with a burgundy croc bag.
Should have order a 6 bc the waist area was very loose. Still was comfy and pretty. Liked the lightweight fabric and the cut of the skirt. Pockets are always a plus. Seems true to size.

links_Review_Title: One of my favorite Unlimited picks!
links_Review_Text: The dress is so comfortable, but keep in mind that the chest runs small! I am normally a 6 and the 8 was a little snug and I am smaller on top. Recommend sizing up. Do it because this dress is SO beautiful when you wear it

links_Review_Title: Loved the fit and feel of this
links_Review_Text: Fabric is thin so it was perfect for a summer baby shower in the Texas heat. Fit like a glove - I'm an hourglass with a 32DDD.
8 months pregnant and worked great. Was a tad snuck in the chest but I made it work and wore it to a friend's baby shower. 5'2 and the length was fine for flats or heels.

This is the perfect summer dress. Fit is perfect and true to size- slim through the bust and waist , flowy through the hips so workable for many body types. I paired with wedges for work but would also do white tennies for the weekend

links_Review_Title: Cute for spring but nothing special
links_Review_Text: This dress was easy to wear on vacation - very breezy and no work required. Not the most flattering dress - I found it to be very big in the body but a bit tight in the chest.
So comfy and great to wear day or night
Too big.

links_Review_Title: Lovely pattern and liked the fit but too long for 5' 3"
links_Review_Text: It was great except too long on 5' 3" height. Also very note it's more full on the bottom
Once again, pockets. Also, super flowy and fun.

I've rented this dress twice now because it's beautiful and perfect for in transitional weather. Both times I've worn it I've paired it with a jacket (jean or leather) and its perfect for day to night. I am usually a 4/6 and I've ordered both sizes due to availability. The only difference that I noticed was that the 4 was a little tighter in the chest but not noticeable.

links_Review_Title: Flowy, comfortable, can dress up or down.
links_Review_Text: I loved how the body of this dress fit, and how the skirt just flowed. It was casual enough to pair with a jean jacked during the day, and cute enough to go with a leather jacket at night. The fit is also very forgiving—great if you're sick of ordering things that end up too big or small.

links_Review_Title: Love everything about this dress. Flattering and classic.
links_Review_Text: Perfect fit!

links_Review_Title: So beautiful and perfect for a tropical vacation!
links_Review_Text: Fits a little small in the bust -- not much give. I would size up if you have a larger chest. Really pretty!
Not the most flattering dress ever but it was comfy and flowy and perfect for a beach vacation!

Wanted to wear this with an oversized cardigan and booties/flats as an easy weekend dress. Unfortunately, it was unflattering on me. Tight on my chest, ballooning on my hips. Would not recommend for an hour glass shape. However, lovely material.
Fits well - I dressed it up for fall with a blazer, oversized coat and dark heels.
Wanted to love this dress, but definitely size down!

links_Review_Title: Great fit - perfect for postpartum wedding dress
links_Review_Text: Perfect dress for 6 week postpartum wedding (or any other time!) was easy to pump in, forgiving in all the right places and bonus it has pockets!

links_Review_Title: Do not wear if you have hips
links_Review_Text: This dress accentuates hips in a very unflattering way. Made me look way larger than I actually am. I thought the dress was so cute and wish I could have worn it.
Great, comfortable fit. Wish the size down was available but still was able to wear it. Perfect for any occasion. Can dress it up or down. Loved it!
The length, fabric and print were great but this for snug in the chest despite being small just Ed and was far too large every where else.

This dress makes you feel like a million bucks! So pretty, classy, subtlety sexy, comfortable. Very versatile I have worn it to work, out to dinner, and a baby shower. I rented it twice and finally broke down and bought it from the Vince end of summer sale. Rent you won't regret!
Love this dress!! I'm short, but it was perfect, midi length. Made my top half look tiny and was great for a hot summer day.
Wore this dress with flats for an cocktail party. I got so many compliments and it was so comfortable!

links_Review_Title: This piece is AMAZING...especially for us short girls!
links_Review_Text: The most gorgeous romper that fits like a glove and is TTS. For reference, I am a petite 5'2", 140 lbs with large bust. This has a back zipper so I sized up from my normal small and it fits perfectly. The best part is you don't even need a bra! I want to live in this even if I am stuck at home right now!!! Rent this, because it will make you SO happy!

I rented this jumpsuit for Easter. Though we aren't going out anywhere, this outfit is bright, cheery, and comfy for an event at home. I am a size 4 and rented the medium which says size 4/6, it's definitely big but workable. Next time I'll rent the small 2/4. I'm 5'6" and the medium just grazes my toes. This definitely has a Frida vibe to it in the best way possible. My daughter said I look like a fancy garden, so I guess that's good? Will rent again.

Print and cut are gorgeous perfection. Light cotton poplin fabric, nice deep pockets. My only complaint is that I wish it came or was cut a bit smaller - the XS is still way too big which is fine in all places except the width across the shoulder/bust, and the sleeves wouldn’t really stay on my shoulders (especially when sitting down).
This is gorgeous but GIANT on my 5'5 135lb frame, like falling off my body giant. Definitely size way down, the fabric is gorgeous and sturdy.

links_Review_Title: Unfortunately this was huge on me on top and shoulders kept falling sown
links_Review_Text: Amazing print!! Comfortable cotton material. Runs huge

One of my favorite rentals yet. Such a flattering fit, cinches the waist & fits like a glove! Material is very thick and smooths every curve. Obsessed with the puff sleeve detail & straight cut across the chest. Not sure how this would fit someone with larger boobs but I am a 34 C & it was great for me. Well done RTR ;)
Heavy fabric -- may be too warm for a hot day
I rented the small and the medium, I prefer the small though, it fits better. Very good quality, very warm.

I looooved wearing this on top of a deep V, sheer blouse on a very cold date night. It's very warm and even buttons up. Runs a bit big like other reviewers mentioned. I would've been better in a medium but it wasn't available so I went with the large because I loved it so much.
Love the color especially!
Such a pretty color - got so many compliments. Perfect for a winter wedding.

Most fun piece ever! So comfy and really does glam up any outfit. Wore this to a black tie wedding over the cutest black jumper. Got so many compliments!! It was the perfect accessory for a NYE wedding outside, that was a little chilly. I was warm, comfy, and glam! Can't beat it!
I really wanted to love this coat but it was way too big to wear.
This jacket was really warm and exactly what I needed. Highly recommend getting this for a party, a night out, or just something fun to wear!

It was fun to rent. It's pretty warm and the material is semi soft. It's very square so it's shorter on length and it's naturally wider because of the intensity of the material. The color changes in the light as well. Go for it, make a statement!

It's extra. It's a lot for everyday. Who cares?! It's amazing. The color is gorgeous. A friend asked if it was real fur - great quality without being real fur. Obsessed. It's warm. Great winter statement jacket.

links_Review_Title: very warm and cozy. makes you look like a linebacker.. but every fur coat does
links_Review_Text: since it's faux fur it doesn't breathe, but still looks super fabulous and feels luxurious
This jacket is over the top! It's phenomenal. It's totally huge and a little ridiculous- but in a really glam way. Also SUPER warm. Loved wearing this jacket.

This jacket is fun! The length didn't quite cover my butt, but the little longer length made it more flattering because it's wasn't so wide and cropped. Size down (even if you're wearing a sweater underneath it).

Was hoping for a cute and warm furry jacket for a weekend trip, but I could not pull it off. The collar is giant. I'd suggest sizing down, but it might be right in the shoulders then. Just not whah I expected!
Boxy and unfitted , I didn't bother wearing it.
It was nice, very soft and warm, but just not for me. I felt like I was screaming for attention in it. It was so puffy and big. I felt like a cartoon pimp.

links_Review_Title: It was very warm and very comfortable in cold weather. Got tons of compliments.
links_Review_Text: Big furry black/green coat.

links_Review_Title: Took to Vegas worn out one night and had many compliments
links_Review_Text: A little large in the fit. Not black it is more of a teal color..
This is a fun coat, very big and furry. It kind of ate me up but was a good choice for the party I attended.

Our weather has not been chilly enough to get much use out of this but I did a few days and it was fun to try a "fur" look. Was very comfy, warm, and cute. Probably not my new everyday look, but so fun for a while and loved the dark teal color.

I wore this to two different winter weddings over the course of a few weeks. It's a standout, and definitely garnered a lot of attention. The color, though subtle, is distinctly green, so keep that in mind when coordinating. Very warm and comfortable.
Fun AF, cozy as can be, and surprisingly really warm. Yes, it's really large - but that's kind of the fun of it. Embrace the giant fluffy coat, it's lovely :)
It's definitely a look! Note it is VERY VERY WARM. I guess I shouldn't be surprised given that it's 100% plastic !
I debated on whether to wear it, and I'm so glad I did. It's big and obnoxious, but adds such a statement.
too puffy and too boxy. did not like it. returned
Very boxy, not flattering for my small frame. Enormous on me. Beautiful color and feel. I would definitely order one to two sizes smaller than your normal size.

Wore this number to celebrate my grandma's 103 bday! It was super cute and comfortable but the front slit is NO JOKE. I had to use safety pins to keep it together or else it would have been inappropriate. I didn't have any fashion tape, that could have been one way to fix it but i didn't want to wear a bra because the back is totally open.
Very flattering! You have to be okay with your bra back showing (wear a black lace one) and pinning the front. Soft and light fabric that moves with you. Just loved this!

This dress raised my snackability! I was looking like a lunchable but when I put this on...I was a whole midday picnic. You should definitely wear a tank dress underneath since it's not opaque. Also size down.

links_Review_Title: Fits nicely, except top is awkwardly gaping
links_Review_Text: I really wanted to like this dress, but the other reviews are right when they say this top's keyhole is gaping. I thought I would just wear a lacy bandeau under it, but it still shows part of my stomach in a weird way. I had to tuck it in into this belt and keep readjusting throughout the day. If the top situation was fixed it'd be really cute. Also, this is navy and white, not black and white like I thought based on the photo!

links_Review_Title: Flattering dress for a night out
links_Review_Text: Loved the fit! It is very flattering but slots in front and back are very deep.
The dress is great, I did pin the front because the slit pretty much goes down to your stomach. So if you bent over enough your boob could show! But otherwise, totally obsessed.

links_Review_Title: so weird gap on top. Did not like it. material is good.
links_Review_Text: so weird gap on top. Did not like it. material is good.

links_Review_Title: It's a sexy beautiful dress, the front slit in the bodice was too revealing for my event
links_Review_Text: Will rent another time for a party or date
I tried it on, loved it (though it's far more open in the front than you'd think) but you could see through the back. I did not end up wearing this piece.

links_Review_Title: It was a simple beautiful wedding. This dress was perfect.
links_Review_Text: The dress hangs well. the opening in the front does move around. I wore a black slip under and it worked well. I did get a ton of compliments.
Loved it
Keyhole in back and front is way too revealing even for small breasts.

Dress was cute but didn't end wearing it as I ordered it for work. The material is lightweight and a little sear. I didn't notice this in the pictures but both front and back keyholes go all the way to the waist. Would rent again to actually wear at a different occasion.

links_Review_Title: Front is jaw dropping, back is just NO
links_Review_Text: The zipper is too heavy for the material it makes weird lumps over your butt.

Love the fit and style, especially when trying to hide winter pale skin or extra lbs. Probably could have sized down but was very happy with the fit. Vibrant colors and comfortable to dance all night. Would rent again.
The sleeves were a little itchy, but it fit great and the colors were so vibrant in photos. It was also very comfortable other than the slightly annoyance of the sleeves when I first put it on.

This dress was perfect for the wedding I just went to in Minneapolis because it still is kind of winter like but with a hint of spring! The only thing I did not love was that you can feel all the embroidery on the sleeves but I still loved the dressed!

links_Review_Title: AMAZING DRESS!! I got compliments the entire night and it fit perfectly!
links_Review_Text: School auction and gala

Loved loved loved. Considering buying it. I wore it for a company award ceremony. Although it's a little short, I would recommend thick tights to pair with it. I'm 5'10 so if you're tall, keep that in mind :-)

links_Review_Title: This dress is a show stopper!!
links_Review_Text: Typically wear a 10, but was unavailable. Great details on the dress, worn it all night and danced the night away.
The fitting of this dress is impressive and so are the colours. Unfortunately, as far as renting it for $140 goes for just a one time wear, it is not worth the bank.

links_Review_Title: The Colors, fit, and cut of the dress was perfect.
Perfect for a Holiday Work Party
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for a winter holiday work party. The embroidery details and colors are so pretty and classic. The skirt was a great length to show off your legs, but still felt modest and not too revealing. I could have worn either the 4 or 6, but the 4 was tight in the bust (and I am small chested), so the 6 just felt more comfortable for dancing. The sleeves were not as stiff as I thought they might be, and the material was not at all itchy. So happy I picked this dress. I got so many compliments, and I would definitely consider renting it again for a future event.

links_Review_Title: Had so much fun in this dress!
links_Review_Text: I wore this to my 40th birthday party and it was perfect! I'm 5'2" and a 34D bra. I ordered the size 6 and 8 and wore the 6. I was a little nervous it would be a tad long (aka frumpy) but it was actually pretty short... which I loved. Received so many compliments and danced the night away in it and felt amazing the entire night!

This dress is GREAT. I got compliments all night, and it was incredibly comfortable. I was a little worried about the fit and the mesh sleeves (some reviews say they're itchy), but I found them to feel like normal sleeves and the fit was true to size and very flattering. I would wear this again and again and I was super sad to return it.

This dress is stunning in person! Online, it looks like there are silver accents in the florals, but they're really more of a muted gold-ish color (affected my choice in shoes, but oh well). If you're flying solo, it's a little difficult to zip up, but it's doable. I'll definitely be renting this again - so many compliments!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for my nurse pinning ceremony!
links_Review_Text: The dress was gorgeous! I can't say that I got TONS of compliments but I definitely got a few. All the other reviews are correct - the fit is flattering and the colors are vibrant and beautiful. The sleeves are indeed scratchy, but I literally only noticed it when I first put it on, and not once since - and I wore the dress for 12 hours. It had a few loose threads coming off of the embroidered flowers but it was almost not noticeable because the dress is so colorful and busy in the first place. I usually wear XS or S, or size 2, and size 2 in this dress fit perfectly. However, if you are busty, you might go for a size 4 since I am a 36 A in bras.

links_Review_Title: Fits like it was made for me!
links_Review_Text: I didn't end up choosing this one for my event, but I love it so much I wore it to work with navy tights and boots. I received a lot of complements on this one! It is a really good weight for fall or winter. You won't be disappointed!

links_Review_Title: Love this dress that I've rented before!! Great customer service and product in perfect condition!!
links_Review_Text: Love this dress! Super easy to wear and very comfortable! Perfect for a fall/winter event!!
This dress is gorgeous! I am usually a 6 but had to size up and the 8 fit perfect. It was very comfortable and perfect for the winter wedding I attended!
I rented this dress for a formal affair and it fit like a dream! Compliments all night. I wish it came in different color ways so I could wear it for other occasions!

links_Review_Title: So many compliments on this dress
links_Review_Text: This dress was stunning, I'm afraid pictures don't do it justice. I had a ball dancing the night away in it and I received so many compliments. Such a fun statement dress! 10/10 recommend!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a November wedding!
links_Review_Text: This dress was beautiful and I felt so confident in it all night! Got sooo many compliments from people. It also was extremely comfortable and fit true to size. Definitely recommend renting this dress!

I loved this dress for a high school reunion on a chilly night. The long sleeves were great, although a tiny bit tight. I still wore my normal size, but I could see sizing up if you need more room in the arms. I loved the embroidery detail on the dress and the sheer hem line. I wore black shoes with this dress, but I could see wearing a fun color for an additional pop.

Perfect for the winter wedding I attended. Fun, modest, yet showed a little leg, so still sexy! Sleeves were itchy from the embroidery but hey, you can't have it all. There was a small hole in the seam of one of the sleeves, but it was on the I side of my arm so you couldn't even see it. I got TONS of compliments from my family, people I didn't even know at the wedding, and from people who saw my pics on social media. Highly recommend!

I wore the 18 since I couldn't get the 16 and it was everything I hoped for. Tons of compliments. The comments about the sleeves being itchy are true but after a while you don't recognize it. I would rent this dress again and again.

links_Review_Title: The most compliments ive ever gotten on a dress
links_Review_Text: I sized up from my true to size, which left me with a loose fit in the sleeves, but all other aspects of the dress were perfect! it was the perfect dress to wear for a barn wedding reception in november with very little heat!

I sized up twice to make sure it fit well. It did, a little loose even because I'm usually a 16. I got so many compliments. The fabric on the skirt got really bunched up and wrinkly. I had to steam it to lay nice.

The detail is exquisite. I carry my weight in my stomach and this dress did a good job of covering that up. Bonus that you don't need a strapless bra or spanx. I'm only 5'3, so the length was good for me, but it definitely would be short on taller women.
Runs true to size--very flattering fit!
