The dress fit true to size and was comfortable. The size 2 fit fine, but I opted for the size 4 because it was just a little more roomy around the chest/back area. The colors were vibrant and the pattern made the dress unique. Received a fair amount of compliments. Would totally recommend!

links_Review_Title: So many compliments on this dress!
links_Review_Text: The sleeves were a hair short on me but everything else fit great. The colors were vibrant. Perfect for a chilly fall wedding!
I loved this dress! It was very comfortable and beautiful. I rented the 12 and 14, could have worn either but the 14 was more comfortable. I got lots of compliments.

I love this dress! It's vibrant and cozy! It was perfect for a chilly fall day wedding...in Texas. The arms were a little itchy but not in a distracting way. I'm a women of size and I felt comfortable and sexy all night.

This dress was great for a near-fall wedding in the country. The embroidered flowers are very bright in person, which is a cool pop of color on an otherwise dark floral. I was worried about the dress being too short- but it wasn't at all. One thing to note- the sleeves are pretty small without much give, which was fine for me because tbh my arms are like twigs. But if you have bigger arms the sleeves might not fit bc they don't stretch!
Rented this for photos with my husband. Dress is absolutely gorgeous and photographed so well
loved this dress! wore it for an event and it was flattering, comfortable, and gorgeous! highly recommend! fun to dance in too as the picture shows!

Rented this for a late summer wedding and it could not have been more perfect. Lightweight fabric and breathable so I wasn't too hot. I got soooo many compliments! Seriously considering buying this one.

This dress is pretty but not for me. I chose another RTR dress. Both 12 & 14 fit but the hemline on the 12 was not straight. Also the material bulges at the zipper in back for both sizes. I think that this was not the right dress for my body type.
I didn't end up wearing this dress, it was a bit too short for me, and long itchy sleeves on a hot summer day did not seem like a good idea.

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress. I have a very large chest and it fit perfect.
links_Review_Text: True to size.

links_Review_Title: A Show Stopper - you will receive a ton of compliments.
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress for a party in July in South Florida and with a/c, I was fine. This dress is beautiful. The picture does not do justice to the vibrant colors. I sized up for length and was glad I did.

This dress is incredible. It's super comfy and makes a huge statement. I felt great in it all night. I got tons of compliments. I loved that I could wear a regular bra underneath. This was also after my first three dresses did not work out, and customer service got me this replacement in less than 24 hours. What a great experience!
This is one of my favorite rentals! The details are so pretty and the long sleeves are perfect for chilly days. So many compliments! I will definitely rent again.

links_Review_Title: Wore this to the White House and got several compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fit is great, a little loose on top, very versatile - can be worn as a one sleeve or 2 sleeve dress. Color would look great on any skin tone
Love the fit and the cut in the dress. The color made the dress special and flattering.

Avant-garde without being uncomfortable, odd or stuffy. Loved this dress and got so many compliments from friends and strangers. Fairly conservative but still sexy. If you're large-chested like me, watch out for a little side boobage on the sleeveless side. And if you're hippy and between sizes, size up.

links_Review_Title: A very interesting dress that makes people do a double take
links_Review_Text: This fit me very well. It was a little odd in the hips but I belted it so that your eye didn't see that. It's a super comfortable dress. The color is interesting and I was worried about it but I got so many compliments. Very easy to wear.
Got so many compliments and so so comfortable. The color is so flattering and great for fall/winter weddings. For reference on fit I am 5'3, 180ish, 36DD. Loved it, would definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Classy and sexy. Perfect for a night out with the girls!
links_Review_Text: The draping can be worn in different ways. I chose to wear it up on my shoulder instead of hanging off. The bodice fit snugly (not tight) on my 36D chest and the skirt allowed for movement. Received so many compliments! I would totally rent again!

I've rented this dress twice and loved it both times. Fits true to size. The material is thick, and there's also a lining. You do need to wear a strapless bra; or I wore a bra with adjustable straps and was able to remove one (one side has a normal sleeve). Definitely rent this dress! You won't be disappointed.

The material is heavier than you think, but not in a bad way. Love the design and color! There is this weird ruching at the stomach, but you can't really see it cause the material overlaps. 100% recommend!

links_Review_Title: This color is unique and beautiful
links_Review_Text: I loved wearing this dress! It gives you the casual easy going drape vibe. The color is stunning, I got so many compliments. I was surprised that it fit a bit loose but not to the point I needed a smaller side. The drape arm sleeves was not annoyingly at all thankfully! Highly recommend renting this dress

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress for a holiday Gala
links_Review_Text: The color, fit, and cut of this dress was phenomenal and I felt really comfortable wearing this to a semi-formal holiday gala. The only issue I had was that the exposed shoulder side nearly exposed my strapless bra a few times, but it was easily adjusted. I received multiple complements and one woman tracked me down at the end of the event just to tell me how much she liked the dress.

links_Review_Title: Wow factor once you're all dressed!
links_Review_Text: Honestly when I put this on I wasn't sure how I felt about it but once I had it paired with my heels hair and makeup I realized I LOVED it. I got so many compliments. The one shoulder was very flattering. It's also such a great fall/winter color.
I liked this dress more than I expected to. Fully lined, it fell past my knees. Lots of compliments.

This dress fit like a glove!!! I am so happy with this rental and wish I could keep this dress and continue to wear it! The color and style is so unique and trendy! I felt incredibly comfortable the entire night and received so many compliments!

Very comfortable if you need to be able to move around or dance! The only problem I ran into is that it was a little tighter on the chest area so if you are large chested it may not be an option! Other than that I got lots of compliments and was comfortable the whole night!

links_Review_Title: Great dress but too small around the bust.
links_Review_Text: Heavy material , great dress for a dinner out but was too small around the bust. Could not zip up.

This dress fit well, but the arm hole was kinda tight. It's a great color, and a fun option with such a unique cut. I ordered it when I was feeling very brave as it's not my usual style. When it showed up, I wasn't a HUGE fan of it, so I actually got two replacement dresses overnighted to me. I ended up wearing this dress after all because the more I tried it on, the more I liked it. I'm so glad I did because after I got all dressed up in it, I felt so confident. It was easy to dance and move around in, I didn't have to wear a bra, and with the draping it made me less self-conscious about overindulging at dinner.

links_Review_Title: Beaaautiful color especially for dark/olive tone skin.
links_Review_Text: Order up a size if you want the loose, falling fit like the model has. I ordered my size but it was little tight, especially on my chest.

As a busty lady, the fitted top did not accentuate things. The bottom was probably a size bigger than most true size 6, but I simply used the sash to accentuate my waist by keeping the tie snug and not loose. I love this dress and will rent again!
Love the style, shape, but sadly it didn't fit. Apple shape and wish this came in a true plus size where the waist was larger.

links_Review_Title: Didn't fall like it does in the image
links_Review_Text: Maybe I ordered a size too small, but man this dress looked weird when it was on. Everything was pulling and falling in the wrong places.

links_Review_Title: RTR was VERY easy to work with. I will definitely be using RTR in the future.
links_Review_Text: The zipper appeared worn upon use and did split, so I sent it back. Otherwise, they were a DREAM to work with. I will definitely rent from them again.

I rented this dress for a November wedding and loved it so much I rented it again for another wedding. It's so great - the design is cool and different, a really great modern color, and hides a bit in the tummy area and not revealing too much while still being sexy.

I'm a pear shape, 6-8 on top and 8-10 on bottom and the 8 was way too big to wear! This is great for fellow pear shapes, it's very forgiving and has a really cool shape, but fit according to your top size!
Chić, flattering, and unique. Considering buying. Great for a cocktail or holiday party.

I ordered this in a size 4 and I couldn't even wear it to my event because of how large it ran (but luckily RTR customer service was so helpful and sent me another option immediately. Unfortunately, smaller sizes were out of stock at the time!) Such a gorgeous dress with a lot of potential and great quality- would def give this dress another chance in a different size.

The color was perfect for a fall wedding. The length was perfect as well. It ran tight around the chest and stomach. Would recommend a size up! Overall loved the dress and note that you can't take big strides with this dress.

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous color - not so sure about the fabric.
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for work purely for the color - I'm a sucker for any form of pumpkin orange! Seeing it in-person had me even more excited - it's exactly the same color as the photo! The neckline is super interesting and the tie at the waist was a great touch - it helped keep everything cinched in nicely. The zipper is a little snug at the armpit, but nothing too unbearable. The only qualm I had with this piece was the fabric quality. It was soft and didn't wrinkle on my commute, but it really screamed "bridal party" rather than "designer" - if that makes sense. That being said, I think it would work great for a wedding or other special occasion.

As other reviews have mentioned, the cut of this dress is very flattering ... from the front. From the side, the multi layers of fabric bunches up and made me look like I had a baby bump. Maybe someone with no tummy at all could pull it off but I couldn't. The fabric is smooth, like a brushed cotton, and could be dressed up or down.
This dress fit great! TTS. Super flattering
Loved it! Teeny tiny small in the waist area but it is my apple-shaped body that is problematic. Great dress
Fit perfectly. Draping was flattering and the colors were perfect for the Greek islands.
Tailoring on this dress made stripes surprisingly flattering. It sits right across the chest, so no need to wear a bra. Like the asymmetrical edge that had a bit of flare.
Top was a little too big. The straps were long. It was different , and covers up a food belly. I liked it so much I wore it twice.

This is such a fun, sassy dress that's perfect for vacation or a night out!it was so comfortable. The ONLY issue-- sometimes when you're walking, the split in front flies open and you have to hold it down to avoid flashing. Wasn't a major issue.

This dress was perfect for last night in Miami. Flattering fit on top and wrap feature in the lower mid section helps hide my hips and butt. Tons of compliments, looks great, only drawback if it's windy wrap feature may blow open a bit, but thankfully it wasn't!
Thought it would be tighter. I would size down if in between sizes. Love the color. Would be super flattering if a bit tighter.
Comfortable, classy and flattering!
This dress was perfection. I felt so great wearing it, and my husband said I looked stunning. I received so many compliments. The fit was perfect and the fabric felt fantastic. I'll be renting again.
Perfect vacation dress. Comfortable and flattering. I wore the dress alllll day long and by the end of the day it got a little loose but that's expected.

links_Review_Title: Adorable to dress up or down!
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress and it can be dressed up or down. I wore it on vacation in Italy and it was perfect. My only complaint is that the straps were a bit too long but were only an issue when I sat down. The dress is also prone to blowing open in the middle with any gusts of wind, so I'd recommend wearing shorts underneath to prevent any mishaps.

Wore this to the US open while 20 weeks pregnant. The wrap has enough room for a bump and the fabric was nice and breathable. I had to safety pin the straps because they were a little long but it was easy to hide the pins. Loved this look!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for the blue domes
links_Review_Text: I brought this dress on my Greece vacation. It was perfect for a summer day in Santorini. Love the fit and the slit. Although the material is a bit on the thick side, it is definitely high quality. You can wear it with sandals or heels.
Comfortable and flattering. Slightly high cut in the front and the should straps fell down a few times, but would rent again!

I received so many compliments when I wore this dress for my friends rehearsal dinner. It's super comfortable, flattering and very light weight. The colors are more vibrant in person. 10/10 Would recommend.

I love the bold colors of this dress though they are deeper than shown in the model picture. I wore the 00 (not sure why RTR doesn't make 00 a choice in the review or have more 00's stocked for other styles!). I'm short so the length came right down to my ankles but I didn't mind. Would have been perfect if the straps were adjustable. Chest and waist were a bit roomy but given the sarong style my waist was still defined and it looked good. Definitely needed a good steam.

This dress is super flattering due to the draping in the front. I could have sized down to a 2 but made the 4 work. The material is light weight. The dress wraps around from the waist down so it opens easily in the wind or when walking

I wish I owned this dress. I got so many compliments; I wore it on the first day of my cruise. I walked onto the ship with sandals then dressed it up so I could wear it to dinner that night with jewelry and wedges.
I loved this piece for vacation! The bunching in the tummy area makes it so forgiving. I am usually between a 4 and 6 in dresses and the 4 fit really well.
Loved the color, fit, and length of this dress! Could wear with flats or wedges. Dressy or casual depending how you style. Will definitely rent again!

Great fit with flattering stripes, perfect for a vacation in Hawaii. As other reviewers noted, the skirt can fly up a bit in the breeze but not a big deal. I'm 5'4" and the straps were almost a bit too long. Worked well with a strapless bra.

This is a fabulous dress, but unfortunately it was way too roomy up top. I wish it had been an inch small around the top of the dress, as it would have been perfect. It looked silly, so I couldn't wear it.
I felt beautiful in this dress. Do not need to wear a bra. The slit exposes your thigh when sitting and really cant be covered. It's perfect to hide my postpartum belly.
Fitted around the waistline so you need to be in the right size.

links_Review_Title: Nice fit! Unique dress for a baby boy's shower --
links_Review_Text: Only complaint is that the straps are a bit loose. Not adjustable would've liked to been able to tighten them :)

links_Review_Title: Love dress, but straps too long.
links_Review_Text: I tucked the straps in and made it the dress strapless and loved it! I got so many compliments.
I'm curvier in the hips and smaller on top. Because of this the dress fit my bottom half but was way too big on top. Sadly had to return this pretty dress.
This dress was dressy and casual at the same time. It was a perfect summer time date night dress. I thought about wearing it for brunch but didn't get a chance.

links_Review_Title: It was just an ok dress.
links_Review_Text: As mentioned the straps are very large to I tied them together in an x on the back. The gather gives a little pooch look to the abdomen. I am small chested so it was a little big in the chest, but not really an issue. When it first arrived and I tried it on I really didn't like it. I made myself wear it to an event and liked it better than originally thought, but it was not a favorite of mine.
Ran large in the chest. Fabric is cotton like. Seems more informal in person.

I wore walking around town on a vacation day, and to a summer afternoon party. I was able to go braless, although the top was a bit big on me, so the straps slipped off a lot - fuller chested women will probably fill out the top much better than me. The detail at the waist hides any tummy woes, and photographs really well. It's a true wrap dress, so beware a breezy day!
Rented this to wear to a wedding but also wore it during another weekend with sneakers. Love this dress and just rented it in another color.
Awesome dress, received many compliments! Flattering, well made, great all around different but pretty dress.
The sleeves are a great statement piece! Loved this dress.
Fun dress! Fit true to size. Love the cotton light weight comfortable fabric

Loved this dress! It was very comfortable and fit perfectly. I got tons of compliments on it. I loved the matching strings on the zipper that made it easier to zip on my own. Perfect for muscular yet curvy girls like myself.

Just like the other reviews, if you love Ulla you will love this dress. I wore it to work and out to a dinner. I am keeping a week longer because I love it so much! I can't wait to rent the other color!
My bf said it's Halloween color orange and black(actually navy) and I look like a witch, I take it as a compliment and put dark lipsticks on.

I saw this dress walking down the streets of the New York one day, and absolutely had to find for my bff's big day. RTR had it! Love the fit and could be worn any time of year. If I bought this I think I would go for a smaller size. But love!
I wore this to my company's holiday party and it was so perfect! This dress was super comfortable and flattering. The print was stunning, and I received so many compliments
Wore this dress for thanksgiving in Florida. Got really well and was super comfortable. Accentuates your waist! Only annoying part was the puff sleeves. I was constantly pulling them down
You can size down and it is the perfect fitting dress with the best shape. Accentuates the waist and lovvve the sleeves
Great dress with a beautiful print. Definitely an interesting shape but is still really nice. This was ankle length on me, as I'm pretty short but I got tons of compliments and really loved!

So this dress has a lot going for it. I unfortunately didn't wind up wearing it or liking it on me because of the sleeves making my shoulders look huge, but it made my waist look way small! The print is beautiful for fall

Completely obsessed with this dress. Between the print and the sleeves (especially the sleeves) it's a strong look in the best way. Really flattering cut and super comfortable. Perfect fall colors. I wore it to work, out to dinner, and even on a Saturday wandering the city.

links_Review_Title: Well made and perf for fall
links_Review_Text: I rolled the sleeves up cause they were just a little too puffy so that toned them down a little. I typically wear a 2-4 and the 0 fit perfectly but would def recommend for taller people because I'm 5'1 and it was almost a maxi / a little matronly on me

This dress was really fun and comfy to wear. Wore it to work on a day when I didn't have to be *too* formal and I loved it, and it transitioned really well to drinks after work. The pockets are clutch. There's some wiggle room in the fit because of the elastic waist; I'm between two sizes and I'm glad i went with the smaller one.

links_Review_Title: If you love ulla johnson you'll love this dress
links_Review_Text: Puffy sleeves, comfy. Lots of material. If you know that's what you are getting into, you will love it.

links_Review_Title: A little flowy, a little poufy, super cute
links_Review_Text: Liked this piece - lovely colors/pattern, a bit fitted through the ribs but flowy through belly and trunk. The sleeves move and shift a bit becoming poufy as they ride up so I did keep adjusting through the day. Would probably rent again!

This is a terrific dress for summer-fall. The style of the dress accentuates a small waist. And the material is not too thin or think. It would look terrific with a denim or leather jacket and booties !!!

links_Review_Title: Loved it so much I kept it!
links_Review_Text: This was my first rent the runway experience and I couldn't bring myself to return this fabulous dress! Fits true to size, comfortable, great pattern, and cute cut with a slightly exaggerated sleeve. Length is great for day to night. I wore with boots and a Levi's Trucker for work and switched to heels to go out in. I've only worn the one time, but expect I'll get a lot of use out of this dress.

links_Review_Title: I think this dress is adorable and trendy
links_Review_Text: A few coworkers said I looked ready for "Little House on the Prairie" but they just don't get #fashion. A lot of compliments too!
I am obsessed with this dress. I was walking down the street and heard people talking about how much they loved it. Perfect for girls with a thin waist and curvier bottom.
Fits so cute! Very flattering. I received so many compliments wearing this to church.

This dress was so flattering and insanely comfortable. Wore to work with cork/light suede platforms and received so many compliments. Crisp cotton, breezy, and has pockets! Lovely dress. Oh, and has a nice long zipper catch, so no need to ask someone to zip you up!
I loved this dress so much I kept it. Cinched waist and full skirt is my go-to and the extra poofy sleeves were an added bonus.

links_Review_Title: LOVE!! Puff sleeves are back, ya'll!
links_Review_Text: It fit me just like it does on the model pictured. Hits below the knee, cute sleeves and the elastic waist stayed put all day. I wore it with brown heeled booties and received many compliments. It is voluminous so I don't think I would have worn it in 80+ degree weather. Perfect for Autumn.
Loved this beauty from Ula Johnson. Amazing print. Fit is TTS. Cotton, comfortable to wear all day and night.
Fits TTS or maybe a tiiiiny bit small. The print is gorgeous and the cut is very flattering, as long as you don't mind poufy sleeves. Can't wait to wear to an upcoming holiday party!

I waited a while to get my hands on this dress and it was totally worth the wait. Very flattering and great for fall transitional wear. I'll be holding on to this one for a while. I normally would need an 8 but for this a 6 worked perfectly. I guess it just depends on your bust size- I'm a 34C
Love love love. Much better when wearing! Picture doesn't do justice.

links_Review_Title: LOVED IT - great colors and styling
links_Review_Text: Awesome, love the puff sleeve. Makes my non-waist look waist

Absolutely loved this dress! Received so many compliments. I wore it to work with sandal heels and after work as well. I am usually a 2 or 4 but I got a 4 in this. It doesn't have stretch in the waist but it is a lot of fabric so I could have gotten away with a 2 and still had room in the waist. It's a great shape and very flattering for a dress with so much fabric. Love the pattern as well! It is perfect for fall.

links_Review_Title: The sleeves are super puffy. While the quality was great, the sleeves overwhelmed my frame.
links_Review_Text: The fit was spot on. Beautiful fabric.
Got TONS of compliments it was almost embarrassing.
dress up or dress down...boots or sandals.

Rented for everyday wear, it is SO comfortable around the waist without being super super elasticy. The sleeves are a bit extra but I tucked them up rather than keeping them fully down and it was perfect. The big sleeve contrast does make your waist look tiny, major pro!

links_Review_Title: Leg slit is fire, so is the top, but beware if you are busty.
links_Review_Text: I thought this dress was amazing, except for the fact that the cups were way too small for comfort. Didn't wear it because I didn't want to risk a nip slip.

links_Review_Title: This dress was all around perfect and comfortable, great way to make a subtle statement.
links_Review_Text: The fit is true to size, the zipper gave a little trouble in the med section.
This dress was PERFECT! The fit was so flattering, the was sexy without making you feel to promiscuous, and it made me feel absolutely fabulous for my night at the theater!
The dress felt amazing and looked amazing. The top runs too big for a 10 but the waist felt good. Got compliments all night & the slit wasn't too much
The dress is definitely sexy, but not for large chests. The bodice does not hold up the girls AT ALL. Also, the slit is reeeeeaally high. I couldn't wear this out.
Sexy, gorgeous dress! The details make the dress unique. The high slit and see-through corset really make it sexy. It does run a tiny bit tight through the torso but I probably wouldn't size down.

Beautiful dress well made. I have a small chest and larger bottom so always a challenge to find the right fit with more form fitting dresses. The 4 was too small for my bottom half and the 6 was too big for my top. Luckily some strategic maneuvering made the 6 fit comfortably and well!
Pictures do not do justice....black lace, high split, made everyone say oooOOOooooo They did not have my exact size but fashion tape kept the top in place.
This dress was a little too revealing for my event, but it was gorgeous. The 6 fit well at the waist, but revealed too much cleavage. The 8 was better fitting at the bust, but too loose at the waist.
Great dress, a sexy take on LBD. Slit isn't too high and was a comfortable fit. The zipper was a little tricky and tight around the Waite band but otherwise completely perfect!

Danced the night away in this sexy number at my friend's birthday masquerade party! It gave me an hourglass figure where I normally have none-a miracle! Never had to tug at the strapless top, super comfy (if you don't mind showing some skin) highly recommend!
Beautiful dress, but far too revealing for what I needed it for. More appropriate for a bachelorette party in miami. Maybe I'll rent again when it's the right affair.

links_Review_Title: The most classy yet sexy dress ever!
links_Review_Text: This dress was incredible and I felt amazing in it. The neckline in the front is so sweet and different. Beware of the slit! This dress also runs small. I'm a solid 4 and could barely zip the size 4, yet i had trouble filling it out in the chest area. The 6 was more comfortable but still felt snug everywhere but the chest.

Beautiful lace dress that got compliments all night. The skit is VERY high (had to pin it about an inch) and the top is a little see though so will need some tape to hold it all in. Otherwise a beautiful, flattering dress that can be worn all year long.
Great quality dress! The dress doesn't have any stretch but has room in the hip area. If you have a small bust A/small B you might have a problem without using bra cup inserts.

Wore this for a masquerade party. Slit looks more dramatic in this photo but was not an issue aside from when sitting down and crossing your legs. Does run small around the waist. The breast "cups" don't cover your underboobs well if you have more round breasts but not distasteful. Loved the dress overall!

links_Review_Title: Sexy yet classy at the same time.
links_Review_Text: I originally rented this a size up and it was way too big. The cups didn't fit and the corset wasn't tight to my body. If you're between sizes, size down. The slit is very revealing goes all the way up to your underwear line so be prepared to show some leg.

links_Review_Title: Didn't fit, slit is very high.
links_Review_Text: The dress looked a-line, but it was very tight across my hips. The slit comes up very high and gapes if your hips are bigger. I wouldn't recommend this dress at all if you have wider hips.

links_Review_Title: Wanted to wear this in Vegas at my best friends bachelorette party
links_Review_Text: Dress is super cute and fit true to size. If you have a large bust, this dress is not for you. I have a 36 DDD bust size and there was no way I could wear this . I was spilling over the top and underneath into the "peekaboo" area. Unfortunately a common issue for me and I can usually work around it, but not with this one.

This dress is amazing. I got so many compliments. The wire on the sides poke out of the dress and was uncomfortable. I have several scratches near my arm pits and on the inside of my arm from it rubbing. Maybe just this one is done since the wires kinda stick out. I still felt like a million bucks in it, too bad the beauty was painful haha. Also the slit is high, but it was the perfect coming of sexy and classy!!!

links_Review_Title: I wanted to love the dress ..
links_Review_Text: Way too small

links_Review_Title: It was PERFECT, enough sexy, but classy too!
links_Review_Text: Fit tights on the breast but was a great pick for my bachelorette party.

links_Review_Title: I didn't get to wear it, but the dress was beautiful.
links_Review_Text: The dress was gorgeous, it was just large in the chest area.
Wore it to a haunted Halloween cocktail party and it was SLAMMIN! Little big up top so I needed to wear a strapless, but I'm VERY flat chested.
Another great red dress that is super easy to wear / flattering and sexy!

I love reformation but this dress is a nice fit... until you get to the lower buttons. One of them annoyingly pulls and makes the dress look too small, even though the rest of it fits like a glove.. disappointing for sure.

Rented this for my sisters baby shower. It's comfortable and very brightly colored, but not very flattering. The belt also was very curled at the end making it lay awkwardly. I would have worn it if I didn't find a better option, but I wasn't wowed.
I'm 5'4" 140 pounds and 34D. I wore the small dress and the medium size belt (I ordered the backup size). The dress went well with my burgundy heels
Looks great on the model! Just not flattering on my body. Pretty colors.

links_Review_Title: Should have read the fabric description first
links_Review_Text: It's a great pattern, but I didn't read closely enough to see it was a cotton dress. It ends up being a lot of material, especially on shorter ladies if you're not wearing heels. I used a gold belt instead of the one that comes with to break up the pattern.

Loved the pattern on this dress, definitely perfect for the spring. Waist is elastic so you are able to size down, I had plenty of room. Material is more linen like. Was more of a maxi dress on me than a midi dress.
Loved this dress! Perfect for vacation. Very flattering for anyone self conscious of midsection. No bra needed #win
Totally see through as others have said. I would have used as a beach cover up but it was SO tight. I'm a 6/8 and ordered a 2. The chest and waist were very small.

links_Review_Title: i should have bough it! loved this dress
links_Review_Text: runs small, go two size up. it fits nice
This dress is casual yet charming, got so many compliments wearing it - at brunch in NYC and out in Ibiza. Def will rent again.

links_Review_Title: All white, simple and comfortable to run errands in style.
links_Review_Text: Fits very well specially over my waist line, it was a bit too short for my taste but that's because of my xtra long legs.
Loved this dress, perfect length, gorgeous flow - a bit see through and ran smaller than I expected but would rent again!

Beautiful dress with lots of delicate lace detail and really soft airy fabric. I got lots of compliments! It’s see-through, so a nude bra is needed. It is low cut, and I found that it gaped a bit, even though it fit well at the waist (30G). Wrinkles a bit, so be sure to keep it hanging. Would love to keep it if the price goes down!

I sized up based on other reviews and thank goodness. One size up fit perfectly, and was even slightly snug around my ribs at first. This dress is almost completely sheer, so I wore with a pink slip underneath which worked perfectly. Got lots of compliments and I felt very pretty wearing it :)

I LOVED THIS DRESS!!!!! Everyone did, for real- I got so many compliments on it. Fits true to size. I am 5'4 and it was a perfect calf length. I wore with low heels and a nude strapless bra. I wore it to my bridal shower at a winery and it was really comfy yet cute. Would definitely recommend this.
Beautiful fabric, great length, needed another 1/2-1" in chest. Almost wore it with a jacket but was worried I would be too hot today.

I wear a true 4 and the 1 would hardly zip. Wish I would have sizes up. Top is totally see through. Wore over a bathing suit one day and had to put a tank top under for dinner out- hard to do given how snug it already was! But soooo soft and great movement. Beautiful material.

I rented the 0R which fits like an Xs or a 0/2. The bodice is pretty fitted so if your busty you might want to size up. I weigh 122-124 lbs with all the weight in my lower body. I have a slim rib cage and no fat what so ever in my upper body. I measure 35-25-37. I wear a 32D or 32DD depending. I would recommend the OR size only to people with a 32 band and a bust size C or smaller. This is a beautiful breezy light weight dress perfect for summer. The bottom is lined but the top isn't so keep that in mind. You won't be able to wear this bra less because of the sheerness of the top and the holes in the lace. Sorry about the red bra I'm wearing here (that's what I had on when I tried this on,I would wear a nude bra if I was leaving the house). Very pretty dress. Highly recommend.

We had to postpone our wedding but my fiancé and I still wanted to make the day special. We wrote out some quarantine vows, baked a mini wedding cake and got all dressed up. This dress would have been perfect for the occasion - if I had been able to put it on. I'm usually a 2, sometimes a 4 and so ordered the 2 and the 4 thinking I was playing it safe and that was just not the case, especially in the arms. The dress is beautiful but definitely size up!

links_Review_Title: Rented this for my baby shower
links_Review_Text: Extremely small. sized up and still could zip up. Maybe try sizing up 3 sizes! Absolutely no stretch
I wear an 8 and it said to order a side 3R. It wouldn't zip up
pretty dress.

links_Review_Title: Love this dress. Amazing material and quality but sadly was too small for me.
links_Review_Text: Runs small
Pretty dress but was way too small so couldn't wear it. Size up for sure!

links_Review_Title: I wore this for my outdoor rehearsal dinner for my wedding and it was perfect!
links_Review_Text: The side zipper is really tight around my ribcage and I needed to order a size up. I am small-chested and slender so it really is meant for women who have a very skinny ribcage!

links_Review_Title: Size runs small, but it was a really pretty dress.
links_Review_Text: This dress is really kind of charming in a simple way. The fabric is very sheer but once it's on, somehow it works. Unfortunately it runs small and so I couldn't zip it up to wear it. Bummer!

links_Review_Title: couldn't wear I ordered the size recommended to me by rtr and it was way too tiny
links_Review_Text: too small

links_Review_Title: Spent a lovely evening in New Orleans for my husbands birthday.. The dress was perfect.
links_Review_Text: Dress fit well. It is super sheer so maybe have a slip. Personally I am a little busty and the plunge neckline was a bit showy. great dress all together.
Pretty dress but couldn't wear it because it was too small.

One size down from my regular size fit perfectly – I am small chested and large hips. It's a bit see-through but not inappropriate. For an evening fall look I paired with a short Jean jacket and got a lot of compliments

links_Review_Title: Runs small from waist up - not meant for women with anything greater than a b cup.
links_Review_Text: I normally wear a medium and sometimes a small in tops and I don't have a large bust and while the dress fit perfect it was so tight around the arms and bust. I had to wear a bra with this (see through) but I could barely zip it up when I tried.

links_Review_Title: If you have larger breast don't rent this!! Runs very small on top

links_Review_Text: didnt wear
Holy moly this was bite sized. I'm a 2-4 in dresses and there wasn't a chance of this thing zipping, and the arms we skin tight. Could have been cute if it fit
This dress was too tight and too sheer to wear.
This dress is fun and flattering hand sexy all at the same time. Loved it.
Incredibly small and tight in arms and ribs/side zip. Hoping to try size up bc it's so cute! Def sheer but seems doable for summer.
Super cute, however I did not wear. I have larger bus and it was too small in chest area. Size up.
Received compliments all over the place. My husband said I looked like a gorgeous bride. Perfect day dress that can cross over to day party.
I usually wear a 4-6, this said it was a 6-8 and still didn't fit.
Beautiful fabric and cut but too small across the bust. This was so nice and slimming in the hips and the fabric was amazing but it wouldn't zip across my chest. So sad I loved it.

links_Review_Title: Got it for a trip to Wyoming (pair with jean jacket and boots) but because of sizing coukdn’t wear.
links_Review_Text: Completely see through (need slip) and much too small. Couldn’t zip at my bust.

Coming from someone with a small bust and small ribcage, this dress runs extremely small. I'm typically a XS-S and had to return the size 1R. I read the reviews of the dress being extremely sheer and not suitable for a formal event and was planning on wearing it to a pool party. I'm hoping the size up will become available so I can try again
Really liked how light this dress was. The top part had sheer panels but with a nude bra it was fine. Fit true to size!
Breast area was to small and completely see through.
I'm typically a size 4 or 6...went to try on and was WAY too small and realized I was sent a size 1. Didn't fit so I didn't wear.

Such a romantic dress with a really elegant feel to it! Compliments all night! One of the comfiest dresses I've worn! Perfect fit on the body. I'm pretty average height 5'5 and the length was more at my ankles as opposed to tea length like the model. Didn't bother me so much. Really well-made dress. Highly recommend!!!

Not only did I love this dress, so did everyone else! It was super lightweight and easy to move around in (i.e. dance the night away). It's perfect for spring weddings. I will say, if you're trying to be more modest in the chest area, this dress isn't for you but I loved it!

I loved this dress! It was so comfortable and perfect for a February Wedding. It looked so elegant but also fit the cocktail dress code, so I didn't feel out of place. The shoulders were a bit big but I wore a normal bra which was great! Really recommend

links_Review_Title: LOVED THIS DRESS! - It was totally comfortable and i got so many compliments.
links_Review_Text: Loved wearing this, fit perfectly like it was made for me. I have a bigger chest (34DD) and it fit perfectly throughout. Breathable but comfortable and kept warm at night.

links_Review_Title: Countless compliments so elegant and unique
links_Review_Text: Wore to the opera and felt like a goddess. Size 2 was slightly too big for me I'm usually between 0-2, but still worked. Size 2 made me look a bit bigger than I am but still worked, size 0 would have been perfect
2R is true to size. The v-neck is low cut but you can wear a bralette under to make it more modest. The material is delicate with beautiful warm colors.

links_Review_Title: You won't believe the silkiness of this dress!
links_Review_Text: First, you can feel the quality of this dress just by the silkiness of this fabric!!! It is amazing. I am between sizes 4-6. I chose the 4 for this dress and it was perfect-I wore it all day and was always comfortable with room to move around. I will say if you are unsure about this dress, try it! My husband thought it was too 70s in style but loved it once I had it on. It is pretty low cut, though, so if you are big busted, have a plan. I had to wear a buttoned cardigan to be work appropriate.

Gorgeously crafted dress that I had been eye-ing for awhile. The cut-outs on the sleeves make this a breezy dress so if you're wearing it in cool weather, plan for a jacket. It's very flattering and looked great with nude heels since the print is the highlight.
Absolutely loved wearing this dress. The colors are so stunning and I received compliments all night. I felt so feminine, yet comfortable all night long. Highly recommend 100%.

I LOVE this dress! The fabric is dreamy and so unusual. Strangers were complimenting this dress all night. It is a little booby (I'm a 36DD) so if you're shy about cleavage, it might not work for you. I will definitely rent it again!

links_Review_Title: Very elegant, perfect for a christmas dinner or night to the theatre.
links_Review_Text: Very elegant, perfect for a christmas dinner or night to the theatre. I did not notice the sleeves cut-outs from the photo but I got used to them. Incredibly comfortable and great material. Would order again.
Perfect dress for a winter wedding. Comfortable, flattering, to a of compliments. Was a little longer than it should have been but still looked great.
I wore this for our anniversary dinner and felt so beautiful and elegant! Received so many compliments!
Loved everything about this dress!
I got SO many compliments on this dress. Loved the cut of the neckline and how flowy and beautiful the bottom of the dress was. 10/10

links_Review_Title: Love this beautiful feminine dress! Lots of compliments!
links_Review_Text: I usually steer clear of anything with a full skirt because it's typically not figure flattering for me, but made an exception with this dress. So glad I did! Wore this to church and received too many compliments to count! Fyi, it does run a bit small, so I recommend sizing up like I did...especially if you're busty.

links_Review_Title: Lovely dress! First time renting and I was blown away. Very fun to dance in!

links_Review_Text: This dress was so pretty and feminine for a swanky fall wedding! It'd be great all through the winter months as well. It wore a little longer on me as I'm 5'2, but it didn't look oddly long by any means. It covered my mommy curves well. The top was definitely a little larger/looser fit, despite my larger bra size of a D-cup, and I definitely showed more cleavage than I usually do. A little fashion taped kept everything in place. Overall, it was really comfortable, and I felt so, so pretty!
Loved the way this dress fit like a glove. Perfect for a chilly wedding! Draws the waist in and the neckline is perfect in all the right places!

I rented this for a black tie wedding rehearsal & it was the perfect dress! It was a bit too tight on my rib cage, but it didn't impact my breathing. Beautiful & romantic fabric, I felt amazing in it!
I'm a true size 12, fits great. It is pretty booby so be aware of that.
wonderful for a formal event. wore this to my office's fall gala. felt perfectly dressed. definitely size down though!!!
HIGHLY recommend this dress for any formal affair! It was absolutely stunning. The fit was true to size and was absolutely beautiful. I received so many compliments all night long!
This dress was flowy, romantic, and very Kate Middleton-esque. Fit TTS, except the bust area was a little big on me, who has a smaller bust.

Such a gorgeous dress, even had a woman follow me into the bathroom to tell me how much she loved it. A little snug in the chest, and I am smaller on top. Went without a bra so that I wasn't popping out and it worked great. Print and colors are even more beautiful in person.
I was SO excited to rent this dress and it does not disappoint. It's hugs the body perfectly and made me feel beautiful.
Rented for a cocktail attire wedding and loved this dress! Beautiful and flowy, and comfortable! I wore a regular bra and this dress was also great at hiding my post parturition belly.
The top was way too big. The dress is also more Boho, my husband thought I looked like a gypsy

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress and very flattering. A must rent for curvy gal with small waist.

links_Review_Text: It was a little loose around the waist (I wish the tie there was actually adjustable, but it's just decorative). I ended up using double-stick fashion tape to make it fit better
Gorgeous dress that was also quite comfortable!! It fit like a dream and it looked very glamorous.

links_Review_Title: The fabric, fit and colors are phenomenal!
links_Review_Text: It was a great fit, but definitely showed a lot of cleavage.
I liked it. The length wasn't as long as expected. Defensively needs to be worn with heels.z

links_Review_Title: very cute, fit well, flattering, well made
links_Review_Text: very cute, fit well, flattering, well made
Rent this for your next wedding! It was absolutely gorgeous and true to size :)
The dress runs very big on top; there was no way I could have worn it. Further, it just was not flattering on me. I alerted RTR and they graciously sent me a replacement. Thanks RTR!

links_Review_Title: Love that RTR has more Marchesa pieces
links_Review_Text: I did not end up wearing this, but only because the dress code changed. I loveeee all things Marchesa and I am so glad RTR has so many of their pieces. This is a stunning dress, just like the pictures. I love that it is obviously formal but is also playful and comfortable. It may run a teeny bit small - I am almost always a size 8, and this was a tough one to zip up. I'd definitely rent it again to actually wear it this time!
This one was incredibly hard to return. I worn it four times. Perfect for date night, cocktail parties and a birthday party.

This dress was not for me. The slits in the arms made it so my arms looked rather large. It created an odd optical illusion. The dress looks as pictured, and the length seemed true to size, I am 5'1 and it hit me a few inches below the model photo at the bottom. The material is nice, and the colors are pretty, the arms were just the issue for me.

links_Review_Title: Stay at home Love this dress
links_Review_Text: I will happily rent this dress again when I can go somewhere because it is fabulous. Simply cut, elegant, soft and beautiful.

I generally love and immediately rent everything by Anna Sui. This dress was pretty but didn't live up to the photos. The colors are beautiful and the hint of sparkle is nice, but it felt very elderly and older in style. It ran large in the waist and hips, making me feel frumpy, but it is well made and comfortable.

Great flow! Beautiful colors! Beautiful print! Perfect length! Waist has no stretch so stick to your size or size up if you want to zip all the way up. Definitely a statement piece that will render plenty of compliments. You won't be disappointed!
I wore this out on the weekend with a black crop top and then wore it with a black turtle neck to work and got countless complements for both. Will 100% rent again and highly recommend!!

This skirt was an easy fit. It was out of my wheelhouse in terms of the bright fabric, but also the length. But I got tons of compliments. I had a lot of fun wearing this skirt. It was classy for work!

A coworker described this skirt as a rainbow python (and how fitting for a systems administrator to wear). It's made of a luxurious-feeling fabric and it's so beautiful. Because it's so many colors, it goes with a lot, including a zebra print top. It's no surprise this skirt is an RTR favorite.
I got so many compliments when I wore this skirt! Such a great item to add color to an outfit. Runs large so I had to belt it to make it high waisted
This may be one of my favorite pieces from RTR! Fun, flirty and delightfully different, I got all the compliments in this number I rented for a photoshoot.

I wore this to work (because I had nowhere else to wear it.) is it the most work appropriate item? Probably not. Was it more fun to wear than other work skirts? Yes definitely. It's also long enough that it would get caught under the wheels of my desk chair, so I had to be very careful and bunch up my skirt when sitting. But the colors and flow are so lovely and unique, and I would definitely rent this again for a more exciting event than going to work.

Skirt looks very expensive. Wasn't too long for my 5'3 frame in heels. Fit felt it ran a bit large. I'm a 6/8 bottom and there was some wiggle room in the waist, not enough for me to go to a small though. Will rent again.

This skirt is even prettier in person. It's shiny and colorful with a lot of movement. I wore it with sheer tights and booties. The waist and is not stretchy which could be an issue if you don't size correctly
This was so fun and warm! Perfect for spinning photographs! I think I'm going to wear it a few more times before returning.
Gorgeous material and so colorful. Made for such a fun night!

This is one of my most favorite rentals from RTR. The skirt is lightweight and flattering. The colors and design make it so memorable. I have a small waist so the medium day lower than I would have liked but it fit really nicely regardless. Received tons of compliments
True to fit and absolutely stunning on! I have received so many compliments! I love this high-waisted skirt and feel fabulous in it. I paired with a cite black crop top & thigh high boots.

Loved all the colors on this skirt! I paired with black leggings and a black turtleneck but would've went true to size or a size down even bc the 6-8 swallowed me in my petite figure. Really fun and trendy! Would rent a smaller size again for a night out or to work!

links_Review_Title: Not flattering for women with curves
links_Review_Text: I was inspired to try a skirt like this after seeing a coworker wear one similar. I quickly found out that this type of skirt is not flattering on anyone with curves. I have an hourglass figure and the skirt made me look really wide. The fabric is also REALLY shiny
This skirt is so fun. It has a great pattern and vibrant colors, so it WILL be noticed. Got so many compliments and loved how easy, breezy the silhouette was!
The colors and fabric are so beautiful in person. It is a full skirt so I had to pull it up and tuck it a little for my body type. Would look amazing on someone taller but it was fun to wear.

This skirt is amazing! Wore for an interview with a black long sleeve sweater. So many compliments and made me feel so feminine. The only thing was the zipper was a little tough to unzip before I even could put it on and had to get pliers to pull the zipper down and back up when getting dressed.

I loved this skirt! It was the perfect flash of color and fun for my workday outfit! I'm a true size 14, and while I was not able to zip this all the way, I was able to cover the opened zipper with my sweater and it was not noticeable at all. Definitely recommend this!

links_Review_Title: Love this brand and this skirt
links_Review_Text: Rented with my unlimited for a dinner. Love the print and the pleats. Great skirt all around. I am a 0/2 and always nervous to order an XS in a skirt for fear the waist will be too tight. I think though for this brand, it is good to stick TTS as the waist was a little big. Still loved and highly recommend.
True to size
It was definitely a showstopper! I wore it with a black turtleneck and received so many compliments. Beautiful movement and the colors were gorgeous!

This is an adorable light-weight blouse to wear to work or out. It was shorter than expected and there was a subtle swirly floral pattern I wasn't expecting, but didn't mind. Because of the wrap silhouette, you can alter the fit, but it was short in the torso and my bustier girls will probably need a camisole.

links_Review_Title: Silky, sherbet blouse - runs large you'll need a camisole
links_Review_Text: I loved this blouse with jeans and i think it would have looked great with a skirt too. It is low cut and runs a little large so i recommend a nude camisole underneath. The silk feels very nice, and was good for 60 degree weather. I would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Loved the look but the shirt fit really small in the chest
links_Review_Text: Loved the look, length and sleeves but there just wasn't enough room in the chest to cover me sufficiently. I ended up wearing the shirt once with a cute matching bra but I ended up showing much more cleavage than I originally wanted to. Great shirt for women with a smaller chest. Alternatively size up.

links_Review_Title: Fun shirt and lots of people asked where I got it!
links_Review_Text: Very fun shirt!! You'll be sure to stand out with all the colors. The arms are very balloon-y, so I rolled them a couple times.

links_Review_Title: I felt like Glinda the good witch of the west.
links_Review_Text: So elegant and fun. The top put me in a good mood when I wore it.
I am normally size M in clothes and this fit true to that. The shirt ties so would really fit a wide variety of body types.
Super cute fabric and fit, but it's a wrap so you'll have to pin it if you're busty

Rented for a concert. Wanted to wear it to work that day too but it was a little more loose and low cut than I was expecting. I would've had to wear a tank underneath and didn't want to so just wore it at night for the show. See more looks on my RTR insta highlights @leahgay and feel free to DM me any questions!
I had a great time wearing this. Received a lot of compliments. Great color combination. Very cheerful
What a great top! The fit is really great and the sleeves make a statement. Plus, it's just really darn cute! It's no wonder it's the most rented piece of the summer.
Beautiful, vibrant colors. Great construction, but the wrap dips a little low so had to keep checking I wasn't flashing the clerk while shopping before a date.

I'm obsessed with this top. It's something I never would buy because it's such a statement, but was a blast to wear. I wore it to a Jonas Brothers concert and felt trendy and fun in it! It was pretty warm - didn't breathe well so it's best for indoor (AC) events or cool weather and it definitely needed tape or a pin to hold the top in place.

The colors in this pastel rainbow top are GORGEOUS. I received so many compliments walking down the street wearing this! It could easily be dressed up or down. It ran true to size and was very versatile. It also has a beautiful matching skirt you can rent as well!
This blouse is a show stopper! I got so many compliments. The details are so beautiful, the fabric is high quality, all around total win.
Gorgeous, show stopper for a girls night out
Loved this and fit true to size. Great for work or for a date.

This shirt will make your day so bright and cheerful! I loved wearing this at work - the material is so soft and the wrap around ribbon stayed tied easily. I definitely got a lot of compliments and I can't wait to rent it again.
Wore this at 23 weeks pregnant and it fit well w maternity pants. Beautiful colors and fabric. I had to pin it closed though because it was just pretty much flying open.
Fun top, interesting pattern in the fabric. Tied it loose and low on my hips for work. Headed to a concert and tied it tighter at the waist. Soft and comfy, easy to wear.
The shirt is gorgeous, but I struggled with making the wrap-around tie look okay.
Definitely a crop top but throw on some high waisted mom jeans and you're good to go! The colors are so pretty in person.

links_Review_Title: The colors are GORGEOUS and vibrant
links_Review_Text: I bought this because it was way on sale and the colors were so unique. I wore it to boradcast from home but plan o wear it this summer with high waisted lavender shorts and white jeans. It is cropped FYI.

I got many compliments on this top while I was on vacation. It is perfectly draped and the colors are vibrant and fun. Paired with a great pair of high waisted white denim, this was my favorite vacation outfit!
I LOVE this top but it didn't work for my event and I felt it was too springy to wear otherwise in the Chicago winter. I will rent again in the spring!
Can be worsen casual or you can dress it up
very vibrant, tons of compliments! Even more beautiful in person
So pretty and fluttery!!! I did have to wear a cami underneath though.
Great fabric and colors. The cut is very low in the front and beware that it does ride up on the bottom. Difficult to wear for work, but for a night out, it's perfect

I was really disappointed with this one! It's so beautiful in the pictures in the material it's self is really pretty. Just when you put it on if you're a thicker girl it definitely looks like you're wearing part of the circus costume. And the fit definitely runs small!
i understand its a trend- but when u not 18, its not that appropriate, plus not so many items is high waisted, other wise fabric & color was georges ! i really wanted to wear it

I got the large and the opening was really big so you'll have lots of bra showing. There's no way to make it smaller. It's also much shorter than it looks, it's basically a crop top and hit well above my belly button. Beautiful color and fabric, but unwearable for my body type.
Definitely happy I had the XS & S because I was right in between sizes and went with the S. It was so flattering and perfect for the petite ladies (I'm 5'3").

The right amount of sparkle! This dress was so easy to wear and super comfortable. Received many compliments throughout the night. I am usually a size 6/8 and the Medium fit perfectly. I usually don't car for cutouts but these were small enough to where it added a nice sexy touch without being too sexy. Length was perfect and slits on side were appropriate and not too high. Rent this dress!

This is a stunner. Very classy and tons of personality. I wore this to a rehearsal dinner and after party, it was the perfect choice. I really considered buying it! The only critique is that the sequins can kind of stick together at times, but you're going to get that with sequins. Highly recommend!

The dress fit well. Except the slip on the inside is short and I am assuming it's because of the slits on the side. When I sat down the slip would ride up and I could feel the outer material of the dress. Also, the bottom of the dress would catch on itself and bunch up. My girlfriends had to help me smooth out the dress after getting out of a cab and after every time we sat down. However...I did receive several compliments.

wore this to a black tie wedding, felt very chic and glamorous! the cutouts are small but add some interest, and the tie waist helps draw attention to the waist. the slits on the sides are high enough to look sexy but not cheap. My only complaint is that the bottom part below the lining tends to stick to itself and bunch up weirdly, but you can just shake it out. overall loved this, would definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Can't go wrong in all black with a little sparkle
links_Review_Text: Loved! Perfect fit, length, and the cut outs on the sides really did a lot for the look. The only thing I would say is it is a heavy dress! Full sequins = more weight than the average dress

links_Review_Title: The dress was everything I hoped it would be and more!
links_Review_Text: This dress fit so great and was super comfortable! I didn't know if a sequin dress would be itchy or stiff but this wasn't at all! I got so many compliments throughout the night and felt like a celebrity. This was my first time using RTR and I was so impressed! From the way the dresses arrived to the ease of returning them, it was amazing. I look forward to using RTR again this summer when I have two weddings to attend. Awesome experience!
Go up one size

I L-O-V-E loved this dress. I felt so good without being too sexy. I was comfortable all night. I am generally a medium, but I have broad shoulders and big hips, so a medium would have been too tight, and the large fit like a glove. The waist slits hit at a perfect point where you can still wear tights and a normal bra. (The sequins did snag my tights so I had to throw them out at the end of the night, but the beautiful dress was worth the sacrifice.) highly recommend.

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a fundraiser.
links_Review_Text: Absolutely loved this dress! Fit was perfect. Very flattering.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress. Perfect for a work party that was casino themed. Received compliments all night.
links_Review_Text: Overall this dress was great. The length and slit were perfect. Cut-outs gave the illusion that I had a smaller waist than I do. Only negative was that the neck was a bit tight.
The most fun! The side slits make this dress very fun to move around in. Cutouts are a fun detail, as well, and the front tie is forgiving for that tummy area :D Loved it.
Loved this dress! So many compliments. Very flattering. I do have a broad top and ribs so it was a little snug in that area. If that is a trouble area, size up! I would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a holiday party
links_Review_Text: I loved that the dress had sleeves and wasn't low cut as the venue was cold, but still had some sass with the side cut outs and the skirt slits. The bow in the front was a bit odd, but looked fine once I figured out to tie it in a simple knot. This dress is good if you're tall (I'm 6 feet). I'm usually a 6 in dresses, but ended up wearing the LR.
This dress is gorgeous! I received compliments ALL night long. I wish I can keep the dress!

Loved this dress so much! I'm 5'7", usually wear a size 4, 125lbs and the Small fit like a glove. I will say the lining underneath was shorter than I would've liked but since the dress is dark you couldn't tell. I think I could've worn a medium as well! I feel like it runs a little small.

I loved this dress from the moment I saw it, and it did not disappoint! The sequins were soft enough that I did not itch at all, and the side cut outs were a great addition. I am 5'4" and 160 lbs with a large bust, and the large fit perfectly with just enough room!! The medium "fit" as well, but the size large just moved beautifully.
Fit was amazing. Only drawback was the lining was rather short and kept riding up. Perfect for an hourglass figure

Wore for a NYE party, so the fuller length and full neck was good for warm weather while the side slits and sequins jazzed it up for a more formal night out. Long on me as expected, but the high slits made the length more fitting. The ribs of the small was tight but the medium was quite loose so went with the small even though it was a bit snug on my ribs as length on medium was also noticeably longer on a 5'3 frame. Would pair with black or silver shoes.
Very flattering dress on. I'm between a small and a medium in dresses, and glad I went with a medium on this one. A little sexy with the side slits, lots of sparkle, and super comfy.
This dress was both glam and comfortable, I loved the short sleeves and the cutouts on the sides were an added bonus. Perfect for NYE, it stood out in a sea of sparkly dresses. Would recommend!
This was such a fun, sparkly and glamorous dress to wear to a holiday wedding. Fit was true to size, great length. Best part was I could wear a regular bra with it. Highly recommend!

I wore this dress on NYE while working for a lot of hours. It was so comfortable and beautiful. So well made with the cut outs and the side slits. Gorgeous and unique. It fits true to size and you definitely do not want it to be too tight as that is not the style of the dress. It was longer on me but that was expected as I am short. It was a showstopper for sure and I received compliments all night long.

I don't tie the "belt" - I just let it hang down, I think it's more flattering. It's a little long but very comfortable and elegant. You can't wear stockings with it tho! The sequins on the bottom ruins stockings. Festive and elegant tho.
A little tight in the ribs but great fit otherwise.

I received so many compliments on this dress and was sad to take it off at the end of the night! The dress is great quality and held up well as I danced and mingled. I'm 5'9 and 135 lbs and the SR fit beautifully. Perfect dress for any event where you need that extra shine!
I was worried the sequins might be itchy, but this dress was very comfortable to wear and I got a ton of compliments in it.

links_Review_Title: Snazzy yet tasteful dress for the holidays
links_Review_Text: This dress was a showstopper! I walked into the party and everyone swiveled to take in my nearly head to toe sequins. I felt so effervescent I this dress, and the little skits on the side made me feel just sexy enough. Tons of compliments and the sequins perked everyone up. The dress has black undertones so I would recommend black shoes rather than silver. The dress is very well made (lined) and has no stretch. Even without the stretch it fit my big girls properly. Great for hourglass figures!
This dress is amazing! So comfortable and flattering.

Loved this dress! Wish I didn't have to return and considered purchasing it. I'm 5'10 and a little curvy at the hips and a flat tummy - the bow definitely draws attention to tummy (you've been warned). The bow in the front of the dress is odd - I tried many variations before liking the version in the photo. I felt comfortable and confident in this dress. Received compliments all night at a holiday party. All in all it's a great combo of gatsby, chic, and classy. Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Super fun and comfy black tie dress!
links_Review_Text: I loved wearing this dress and received tons of compliments at the Christmas gala I wore it to. It was very comfortable and easy to move around in. The shape and cut is modest with the short sleeves and higher neck line yet totally fun with the side cut outs. I typically wear a small but wore the medium in this dress. I loved it and was sad to send it back!

I usually wear a size 10, I sized down to a Large so that it hugged my curves a little more. I easily could have worn the XL I just wanted it a little more fitted. The only call out I have is the slip / lining underneath doesn't go down very far so when I was sitting during dinner, the sequins hurt my bottom a little but nothing unbearable. I'm very happy with this rental!
Great dress with sexy fit. Only complaint is the material keeps catching on everything because of glitter.

Going into my event I was unsure how formal I needed to dress. In situations like these I always err on the side of over dressed. This dress fit the need because it could easily fit in at a black tie event or a less formal affair and not stick out at either. I appreciate that I could wear a regular bra with this but the material was a bit itchy. I usually am not bothered by something like this but sitting in the dress was uncomfortable.
Very flattering and fits true to size. Received lots of compliments! Only complaint is that the material was uncomfortable and itchy.

links_Review_Title: Pretty cute, too snug across belly, wear a slip because it is scratchy
links_Review_Text: Was too tight across the belly (which is a common problem for my build) so if you are self-concious of your belly, size up or skip this one. It looked a little less expensive and less formal in person to me.

I rented this as one of three dresses to pick from for an upcoming gala. This one looks great from the side with the side slots and cutout at the waist. Unfortunately from the front it was less than impressive...had me feeling boxy and frumpy.

This dress is sparkly and looks awesome in person, but size up if you have any bust at all!!! I have a fairly small rib cage (32 band) and it was uncomfortably tight when I lifted my arms so I did not wear it.

links_Review_Title: The event was a celebration of Black excellence and the dress was right for the occasion.
links_Review_Text: The fit was true to size. I received a number of compliments on the dress. The only con is that if you want to wear tights you may need to think twice. The material will easily snag tights or stockings.

links_Review_Title: Nice dress, but larger than expected side cutouts made it unsuitable to wear.
links_Review_Text: Rented this dress for a 1940's style event. The dress was flattering, but the larger than expected cutouts made it impossible to wear to event. Inappropriate for being with work colleagues. Runs small.
Fun top!!!
I was a little hesitant to order this top due to being bigger breasted, but it fit perfectly and got so many compliments through out the night! Need to buy it!
This top fit me perfectly and I was a little hesitant at first considering how short it actually is but overall 10/10. A must have for everyone's closet.

links_Review_Title: Cute and effortless to wear day to night
links_Review_Text: Nice comfortable fabric, need to wear braless because of the cute hole cutout but that wasn't an issue for me. Easy to dress this up or down, I wore it for a fun night out in Brooklyn

links_Review_Title: Super cute but a little too big
links_Review_Text: I loved this top and I hope to rent again in the future. I unfortunately didn't get to wear it this time around. I'm a 36D and a size 6/8, but the medium was a little loose, and I'd like to wear it without a bra.
I'm always unsure with tops because of my bust so I sized up, but wish I hadn't because I think the medium would have been fine honestly. But this top was very flattering, and comfortable!
Loved this top! Saw it on AFRM and was super excited to find it on RTR. I wear a small in most things but this was a little bit tight on the bust. Would rent again

links_Review_Title: An amazing combo of tight & flowy
links_Review_Text: I LOVED wearing this shirt. It was so flattering. The tight bodice and flowy sleeves was such a great combination. It was the perfect fit without having to wear a bra (though I'm super small chested). I paired with some high waisted leggings. I think I'll rent again but in the summer. I did find myself pulling it down a bit, so maybe with some higher waisted pants it would've been more comfortable. You're definitely showing skin with this shirt.

Colors are vibrant & the print is pretty. Note- there is one difference in the actual garment from the model pictures. The actual garment does not have the white lining on the waist sash as shown in the model photo.

links_Review_Title: Cute Pattern - Straps a Bit Big
links_Review_Text: Cute dress for a Florida vacation - a little more casual than I expected. Would have looked really cute for day with a jean jacket (collar popped) and some wedge espadrilles. Straps are a bit long - they slipped down a bit but the bust line has elastic, so it didn't cause any wardrobe malfunctions.

links_Review_Title: SWEET CAREFREE DRESS FOR ANY DAY
links_Review_Text: So adorable! Loose fit, very comfortable. I loved that the first 2 buttons are ornamental, don't open so they couldn't gap - brilliant! I wore it for every day use. Got a bunch of compliments. The fabric is so pretty, love the sash. A winner in my book. Sizing: Runs large. I wear 50/50 US 4-6. This was a 4 and was still roomy, but not huge.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for a nice dinner out in Mexico!
links_Review_Text: Omg loooooved this dress! Material was thick but also flowy. Perfect for a nice dinner out on my beach vacation. Fit perfectly!

I do not wear enough green. Very overlooked color in my closet. Loved this stand out color and the deep teal color straps and sash. Nice combination of elements come together in this light and flowery number. Flattering fit! Girly but unfussy!
This dress was perfect for a chilly summer night. I loved it with white booties to bring out the white threading on the belt especially.

links_Review_Title: Wore to college reunion - perfect for betweens seasons
links_Review_Text: Beautiful dress- lots of compliments. Needed Pressed but didn't wrinkle over the course of the evening. Will rent again
Love the print. Super flattering. Great length. I paired with sneakers . Would absolutely rent again.
Omg I absolutely loved this dress! I wish they had it in stock in size 6, but the 8 worked fine. The color and material are just stunning. HIGHLY recommend this dress

I wore this for work and a summer brew festival, and both were fantastic. Straps aren't adjustable, but it didn't pose a problem to me, and I didn't have any issues with the hem length, despite being under 5'4". The colors on this dress are so striking, and I felt like unbuttoning the bottom to let a little leg peak out for nighttime. At my corporate workplace I wore a strapless bra with it, but since I'm fairly small busted I didn't wear one for my night time event because of the ruffle, and it's just a perfect summer dress

Felt like a million dollars in this dress! Beautiful quality. 100% silk. Loved the lightweight feel of this dress in the hot summer. Really a show stopper. Only complaint was the straps were a little long. It's kind voluminous at the top. I thought maybe it made me look a little top heavy. Overall I loved this dress and really didn't want to return it. I held on to it for a long time, but it's more a special occasion dress more than anything. The silk will stain easily so just be very careful if you eat anything! A must rent!

I loved this dress so much. It's a statement piece and so different than any dress I've worn in the past. I am 5'10 and usually wear a size 4 and this dress fit true to size. I got a ton of compliments at work and would definitely rent this again!

Other than the straps being a bit too long and not adjustable, this dress is perfect. It is flattering on a full figured person like myself. The fabric is a nice weight and does not wrinkle. The dress is fully lined. The color is really eye-catching. It’s quite dressy and could be worn to an afternoon wedding, but it’s so pretty and fun to wear you may want to find any opportunity to wear it.

I normally wear a 0 or a 2 and the 2 fit well. It was almost maxi length on me. The straps were slightly long but I didn't need to pin them or anything like that. Got many compliments on the beautiful print and wore it three times!

This fit perfectly and I was in love with it! Fabric feels so luxurious and the print is brilliant. Wore it to work with a jacket over it. I did think it would be more of a midi length but it was longer.

This dress is a really fun, unique design in a stunning green color. Perfect for summer! It's very comfy and I like that the length is a little cropped (I'm 5'6 and it sat a few inches above the ground) so that you can actually walk around without it dragging or getting dirty! I received lots of compliments on it and I would rent again!

links_Review_Title: Wanted to love but was disappointed
links_Review_Text: I so wanted to love this dress. The colors are great and the material is good quality. However it did nothing for my figure. I'm larger chested and it accentuated it in a very unflattering way. It was also very slim in the midsection. I really wish it was more flattering.
The only issue that I had with it wa the shoulder straps could be a little shorter. Bout, overall an amazing dress in an awesome color. Lightweight. Felt great on.
Straps too long
Super comfortable and very flattering. The fabric is exquisite and I received compliments all night!!

The ties at the waist are awkward and don't work very well. I had to cinch mine VERY tight in order to make this dress fit but then the ties were very off and required a little coat to go over so it didn't look too sloppy up top. Just too much work in my opinion
It's a nice little dress for everyday. Nothing spectacular.
Why is there not a zipper or button so that this will fit properly? I couldn't get this down over my chest, even though I could tell it would fit once I got it on.
Super cute and fun dress for vacation. The length was great and I loved the details but it was a little awkwardly tight through the middle
Pretty colors and unique cut. Wasn't hugely flattering but was cute and funky.

links_Review_Title: Happy, fun patern and great fit!
links_Review_Text: Great length for a 5'4 girl.

I am a 29 in jeans and the size 8 in this dress did not fit my hips and the top would have been too loose if I went up to a 10. It buttons and so the buttons pulled and showed my stomach/hip area. This is meant more fore someone with a straight figure than an hourglass one.

This is a really nice dress. The shade of green is very striking and the blue trim makes a nice offset to the pattern. My only complaint is that the straps literally fall down all the time. I probably had to pull them back onto my shoulders at least three or four dozen times during the day.
Such a pretty dress! Felt great when I wore it! I did feel better wearing it with wedges...needed the height for the length to be flattering. I held onto it for a month!

links_Review_Title: Runs small and not flattering for women with larger chest
links_Review_Text: Runs very small compared to other brands. Silk fabric has no give. Women with larger chest should size up, I would recommend 2 sizes for a relaxed fit that I prefer. The colors are beautiful but the cut is just not flattering.
Very cute dress! Easy to wear, great colors.

This dress did absolutely nothing for my figure. The boob ruffle, the tie waist, the straps: as my husband said, "It's got a lot going on..." The straps hit at the perfect spot to show off my armpit fat, too. Couldn't send it back fast enough.
Great quality and color! It's very comfortable and fit great!

I normally wear a size 14, but sized up to 16 as I heard this item runs small. I could barely button the 16! It was not wearable and very disappointing. I would likely have to wear the 20 if I choose to reorder it.
Gorgeous dress! I got so many compliments!! Feels like a London summer dress

links_Review_Title: There's a lot going on with this dress
links_Review_Text: This was pretty fussy with the ruffle, dark buttons, floral fabric and striped straps. It worked really well with with a regular bra though, so it gets points for that. It was slightly tight around the stomach area after a celebration dinner while the rest was pretty TTS/ slightly large.
The buttons gaped when I sat down, which was not pleasant when I wore this to work with a jacket...but it's a very pretty dress.
Straps are long if you are short like me.

links_Review_Title: it's lovely and fit great. look forward to taking it on vaca.
links_Review_Text: very happy. great style and fun cut
Straps were a bit long for me, but otherwise fit was great. Lots of compliments and easy to wear

I loved this rental, it took me two months of spot juggling to get the set. I was going to wear it to cirque de Soleil but the event was cancelled. I can't wait to actually wear it somewhere, it's fantastic. The pants are a little funny without the jacket FYI
