The outfit was amazing in Vegas. My only complaint was that the waist runs quite big! I was pulling it up every few minutes! Thankfully I rented the matching blazer so you couldn't see the dilemma.

links_Review_Title: These pants are fun and get a good amount of attention and compliments.
links_Review_Text: I ordered a 0 was shipped a 2. The pants run about two sizes too big in my opinion. They fit like a 6, a lot of fabric in the around the waist and stomach so I paired it with a long sweater. I also hemmed them up about three to four in with double-sided tape.
Loved these pants. A touch itchy but not too bad. Fit like leggings. Not too fitted not too loose. Nice not too flashy shimmer sequins pants. I Would size down if unsure.

Pants are high waisted skinny at the waist not super flattering up top but worn with the jacket to cover they were perfect - beware I'm not the only one who's thighs touch so the material is a little worn there and the thread from one leg would catch and hook onto a sequin from the other

I rented this with the matching jacket for Christmas Eve and OMG I have NEVER received so many compliments on an outfit! I wore it to a family gathering, church and dinner out, and it was stunning at all 3. I wore in 8 in the pants and they are true to size. A cute cigarette pant cut, that looked cute with just a black camisole as well. The jacket or pants alone are lovely, but together they are super special. Rent this suit. You will love it.
Ordered 1 size up and I’m glad I did as the waist would have been problematic in my normal size.
I wore to a Christmas party. I received so many compliments. I would definitely rent these again.

I was a big gold ball of fun at the holiday party where I wore these pants. They are so perfect for a rental, no reason to own them. Not too itchy, stretchy fabric. Hit like capris since I'm 5'10. High waisted, I wore them with the matching suit jacket and with a T-shirt on a separate occasion. Highly recommend!
Waist is a little tight but it still fit. Material stretches, so was really comfortable to wear & dance in.

links_Review_Title: Rent them with the jacket, might be tough to wear alone.
links_Review_Text: With the jacket, this outfit is a 10/10. However the pants have a surprising amount of stretch in the legs and hip but no stretch on the actual waistband, making for a weird fit. They will not pull you in at all in the hip or thigh. I opted to hike them way up and leave the zipper undone a bit vs. sizing up and having the thighs look baggy. However, if you have a flat stomach and are pairing these with a long shirt or sweater, get your true size and you'll probably be fine. High quality. lightweight - not heavy. More gold in person than the product photos online. Easily snagged though, careful on that.

links_Review_Title: If you wanna feel like a stunner, rent these
links_Review_Text: These pants are GORGEOUS. I have thicc thighs so the material bunches a little bit at the top. It didn't matter much since I wore it with the matching jacket long enough to cover the bunching. Wore them for 4 hours to host an event and felt very comfortable. 10/10 would rent again.

links_Review_Title: Really make a statement but fit kinda weird
links_Review_Text: The pants fit fine in the waist but there was a lot of extra material around the lower abdomen and hips which made the pants look odd when sitting down. They really make a statement and I got so many compliments when I wore them
Fun pants - run true to size with some stretch to the fabric. They look great with the matching jacket (or any long top). Zipper on side makes them easy to get in and out of.

links_Review_Title: Super fun pants. Front is weird so need long shirt.

links_Review_Text: Pants were super fun. Loved the overall look with a black fitted top.
The inside was super itchy for the 5 seconds I had them on. Also very long for my 5'3 frame.
I rented with the jacket to wear as a suit- major complements. The pants were scratchy in the rear from the sequins but otherwise thumbs up!
Fun w/ the matching blazer for a glittery suit look. Could also dress down with an oversized sweater. Relaxed fit but true to size. Side zipper.

I rented these pants for NYE, but ultimately ended up not wearing them. Bummer. They were very baggy in the front and may have looked fine with a long shirt, but otherwise looked weird. The 2 was unavailable so I went with the 4, maybe the smaller size would've helped?

links_Review_Title: Fun pants that earned me lots of compliments!
links_Review_Text: Rented these for a holiday party and dresses them down with an oversized black sweater! They are looser than I expected everywhere but the waist - it was tight because it wasn't stretchy like the rest of the pants. They were pretty high-rise, and the front of the pants are a little odd fitting, so wearing a long sweater that covered it was necessary. They did stretch out and then meet area over the course of the day but overall they were fine and perfect for a holiday event!

I wore this suit to a holiday party and got so many compliments the whole night! I felt so confident and I loved the outfit so much. The pants run small I'm glad I ordered an additional size which fit perfectly. I normally wear a 6 in pants which didn't fit and I wore the pants in size 10.

I would suggesting sizing up on the pants and if you're tall just know that they will definitly hit above the ankle. The model's picture is a good reference for where they'll hit if you're 5'8 and above. They're also more gold in person. Looks nice with the jacket but I needed the next size up for the complete look.
Fits well with a little room not skin tight fit
Light material, really flattering with the matching jacket. Got a ton of compliments at my event. True to size, fit so well!
These pants should have been lined. Not sure how this will wear in cold weather for Holiday Parties or NYE. Such a great look with the matching blazer though!
Ok, so my best friend got married and I kid you not, I got more compliments than EVER. You look SNATCHED. One sleeve was longer than the other? Weird? Lol but runs big!

I rented this for work, intending to wear it on a Friday for a casual look, but I ordered it a few days in advance because I wasn't sure if I would like it. I was worried there would be too much fabric and the print too overwhelming, but when I put it on, I was surprised at how flattering it was and almost wore it right away! I (But I ended up waiting a few days as originally planned) I also wore it again over the weekend on a date. I think it worked because the sleeves are light and sheer.

links_Review_Title: I did not end up wearing this
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a work meeting, but it ran small in the waist, but big up top for me. It did not fit right.

links_Review_Title: This dress was very professional and stylish. I will rent again. Ran true to size. Fit nicely.
links_Review_Text: Size 2 fit me well. This is what I typically wear with Parker.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress! Perfect for dinner date or social event!
links_Review_Text: This dress is true to size. It fits perfectly. Gorgeous style with the right amount of sexiness. The fabric flows and moves when you walk. I paired it with fun black ankle, open toed booties. I received lots of compliments. It can be dressed up or casual. It's a very flattering dress!
I didn't wear this dress ,It didn't fit me and I wear a lot of Parker dresses so I don't know why this one fit differenty.
Cute dress. Comfortable. It has a tie at the neck which keeps it from plunging too low. The skirt is on the short side, but it was fine.
The perfect top to dress up any neutral pair of pants. Brought to a convention and paired it w tan, black and white pants.
Such a fun top! I love the tie at the bottom - I wore it for Nye. My bra showed on the armpit but I didn't mind it too much

Rented this top for my daughter to wear at her college football game (Go Clemson!) it looked so great on her and it was fun for her to have something "new" to wear. Fit perfectly and she looked fab! She wore it with a Jean jacket bc it was a touch chilly for small straps.

I paired this top with a denim jacket to wear the work. I liked the fit of the top, but the bow dangling felt awkward. It constantly became untied or not tied as tight. I didn't double knot it as I didn't want a huge bump but was constantly retyping the top. Besides that, this top was really cute with dress pants for work and jeans for everyday.

links_Review_Title: Very quality fabric and nice length.
links_Review_Text: This may fit someone snugly in the chest area, but for me it worked just perfectly. So that's my only caution. I'm a 32D and broad across the back as a guide. No bra needed, so a huge plus. The colors are true rich colors. Does not look cheap. The tie feature adds some great interest. I paired with a simple black skirt, but this top could be easily dressed down with black jeans or even blue jeans.
Looks exactly as pictured. Glad the straps aren't super skinny

links_Review_Title: Great way to try out the animal print trend
links_Review_Text: Silky easy and flattering!

links_Review_Title: It was super cute, perfect to dress up or dress down for a night with drinks or a date.
links_Review_Text: It is a little tight on the bust as I have a larger chest but it was perfect length.

links_Review_Title: Looks great with black jeans! Fabric is nice and silky.
links_Review_Text: This is a really cute top I wanted to love it, however I wouldn't suggest it for bustier gals or people with a long mid section, as it's almost a crop top. High waisted jeans/pants are a good idea if your not quite at your best weight or don't have a mid section like a 20 y/o anymore.

links_Review_Title: Fun shirt for a night out!
links_Review_Text: This shirt was flattering and fun! Wore it with black jeans, booties and a leather jacket. Felt dressed up but low key. Perfect for a date night. The fit was a little large so I would size down especially if you have narrow shoulders. It was a little low in the armpit, but super comfortable. Get it!
Fit was loose - in a good way. I didn't have to wear a bra and it was super flattering. This was one of those where I was realllllyyyy close to just buying it. I'll likely re-rent!
I loved this top, and I didn't want to give it back. It fit great, and shows a little stomach but is flattering with high waisted jeans.
good fit not very sexy, safe

links_Review_Title: Cute but on the lower cut / shorter side
links_Review_Text: This dress is super cute! It does have a pretty low cut top (so beware if you're on the bustier side!) and it pretty short if you're tall :) Versatile - can we worn with tights, short/tall boots, flats or heels.
Wore this out for Valentine's Day and it was a hit! Perfectly flaunts my curves.
The dress is definitely short, so be aware of that! However everything else was great. I loved the velvet feel to it - perfect for a winter wedding.

I loved the style of this dress. The sleeves are slightly puffed and the fabric looks very nice. I loved wearing it and it was quite comfortable. However I felt a little short for my taste. I still wore it and made it work but would have liked a little more lengthen overall a nice solid rental for a fun, flirty party dress!

links_Review_Title: Cute smock dress, a bit too short
links_Review_Text: Fits well, but need a cami under because the top is too open. A bit too short, so need to be careful while wearing it. Overall it's a fun dress

Compliments from strangers Wore a bandeau underneath bc helloooo low cut Very warm I wore outside in high 50s with no jacket Arms were a tad short but I have long arms No itch High quality design intricate gold detailing Wore with leggings bc short Crushed velvet is beautiful
A little medieval, a little Indian flair. Very cute dress. Pretty low cut, I'm fairly busty so I pinned it closed a bit. Didn't want too many looks...

Absolutely obsessed with this dress. It fits perfectly. It's very open in the front so you'll probably need something under. But the velvet is so rich. I received SO many compliments at my holiday party. Everyone said it has a Renaissance vibe to it. So many people told me I should purchase it but I know I won't wear it again (too many photos 😂). Love love love!!!

links_Review_Title: SO CUTE!! Definitely a hit. Wanted to keep it.
links_Review_Text: This dress is a win! It's short so just be weary of that.
I'm normally a small but I made a medium work by pinning the super low cut neckline. It's very warm and comfy. A super fun dress!

I rented this dress for a family Christmas party. I am 5'9 and it is just a bit short but I just wore booty shorts (just in case) . Super comfy. I also wore a bralet under it cause it is very low cut, which I love but not for a family Christmas party. I wore black stockings and tall black boots . But it is sexy with heels. Would definitely rent again

I loved this dress! Felt sexy in the velvet with gold details. I wore a tank top underneath as my chest would have been too exposed otherwise (but this is also because I was in the snow!) it's definitely short, but I would rent it/wear it again

I loved this dress! I am normally a size small but wore an XS. It was a little snug in my shoulder so would definitely wear a small next time. Super cute to wear this knee high boots & tights for winter.

links_Review_Title: Lots of cute details, great for fall/winter
links_Review_Text: I loved this velvet smock dress with adjustable balloon sleeves. It's a little bit low cut so I wore it with a bralette. It has a lot of cute details like embellishments and little poms poms. I got so many compliments, definitely a fun wear to a party.
This dress was so fun to wear. Low cut and short, best for a night out, tough to find many occasions it would work for day. Pretty forgiving and decent stretch, would order true to size.
So flattering with the smocked waist. I love the fit of the sleeves too. Velvet and embroidery was such a great fall look. Could be dressed up or down depending on shoes!

links_Review_Title: Not for me but definitely cute
links_Review_Text: Heavy velvet!!! Didn't expect that....short and low cut. Didn't work for my body but honestly, very cute!
This is a fun dress but a bit costumy. It was certainly a conversation piece. While my coworkers loved it, my husband commented that I looked like prince Humperdink from the princess bride. Gah!

Really great dress! Velvet was good quality and the gold detail honestly makes the dress. It is a bit on the short side (I'm 5'3 and it hit me high thigh -- mini-skirt level) but not like anything was showing underneath or anything. It's also quite low cut -- the photo can be deceiving. I opted to use tape and it worked really well to keep everything underneath in place where I wanted it to be. Really fun "updated renaissance" vibe that was a hit all evening.
Perfect for a winter wedding. Fun and flirty. It is really short so if you aren't comfortable in a mini dress this is not for you, but IMO this was perfect!

links_Review_Title: Nice, but a little odd fit
links_Review_Text: I loved the material of the dress and got lots of compliments, but note it is very low cut and I had to wear a camisole underneath. I felt the top ran very large.

links_Review_Title: I've never rented before, but I will definitely return again!
links_Review_Text: Awesome dress!!! I got so many compliments

I adored this dress! The fabric is rich, luxe, black velvet (mid-weight) with a forgiving cut. I loved all the dress details at the bodice, arms and hem. It had a beautiful retro vibe and made me feel amazing. It’s low cut, short, and beautiful.

links_Review_Title: I like my bum but don't want to show it to the world
links_Review_Text: Adorable dress. Super cute. But I'm 5'9 and I'd be giving everyone a free show without even bending over. So this got returned.
I absolutely loved this dress in theory but on me it was too short and very tight through the shoulders and around my hips.
Cute and fun dress. It's comfy and fits well!
This dress is perfect for anything, I wore it around the house as there's nowhere else to wear it right now. It's so fab, I'll definitely rent again as the shoulder detail is so gorgeous

links_Review_Title: Can this be my wedding dress??
links_Review_Text: I wore this for my bridal shower and was so obsessed. I felt so chic, classy and on trend. Although it's designer, the 6 fit TTS like a 4/6 so I'm glad I didn't go bigger! I am larger chested so I did have to use fashion tape to keep some buttons closed. Wish I didn't wear this or I would rent it again for my second dress at my wedding!
I was complimented all evening ! Such great attention to detail in this dress it's truly remarkable
This is an incredible piece. Slightly more low cut than I expected but it is extremely flattering and fashionable. Love it!

Fits great, deep neckline but stays in place so not really a flash concept. Shoulder ruffles are just enough to be fun without overwhelming my frame. A little hippie for my normal style but I'm actually really liking it!

I'm in love with this pretty Ulla dress! The a-line silhouette and deep v (but still bra-friendly) neckline make it super flattering, and the light-as-air silk fabric makes it incredibly comfy as well. I paired it with a denim chore jacket and heels with socks for a day of wine tasting, and then layered it over a thin turtleneck top for work.

I rented this for a friend's baby shower and loved wearing it. The color was beautiful and it fit really well. It was low cut, but that didn't bother me since I tend to wear a lace slip under my dresses. Would have kept it had the price been lower.
The print makes this dress. Plus the fit is super flattering and not too tight anywhere.
Give me all the Ulla Johnson!!! I always get so many compliments in her clothes. And they are always so comfortable and fit great.
So fun! Love the ease of this dress!

I chose true to size because this was neither too big or too small, but it still fit a little strange. I don't have terrible posture, but if I slumped even a little bit, a boob would pop out. I'm glad I test wore it on a date, because this is NOT in-law approved. Cute, but neeeeeed fashion tape to tame the top.

links_Review_Title: Flattering cut. Great for petite and/or short gals.
links_Review_Text: Great vacation dress - flowy, light, and doesn't wrinkle easily. Some reviewers say to watch out for the low-cut v-neck, but I loved it and didn't feel like it was inappropriately low or revealing. Maybe it's only a problem for bustier ladies. Also cute for day-to-night. I had only planned on wearing it for a day of sight seeing but was too lazy to change, so I just swapped out my sandals for some strappy heels and different accessories and it was great for a nice dinner out on the town, too!
Loving wearing this dress. The silk is utterly wrinkle resistant, so would be a great travel piece. Fits well, true to size. It's going to be hard to send back!

This was a pretty dress and a nice transition piece from summer to fall. I really wanted to love it, but a cami was absolutely necessary with this dress. Not so much because of the cleavage, but the arm holes hung so far down you could see my entire bra (see photo.). Alterations would be necessary if I owned this.

I received so many compliments throughout the evening on this dress. it's delicate, comfortable and a perfect outfit in between summer and fall. I wore it for a casual happy hour on a warm day but will keep it for a bit longer to wear it with a leather jacket and booties on a colder day. Keep in mind a normal bra might not work with this dress as it's a bit revealing.
I think this may be my favorite dress yet. It fits perfectly in the waist, and the layers are the skirt are beautiful. You do have to be prepared to show some cleavage!

I can rarely fit in a size 2 but this dress fit me perfectly. There are 2 bands around the rib cage and these are the most snug part of the dress, FYI my rib cage measures 29". The top is low and generously cut so be prepared. Easy and very comfortable dress to wear!

Loved this dress and wore it 3 times - girls night out, a weekend day with family, and to work. The neckline is very low cut which was ok for girls night but I wore a black band bra for more coverage otherwise. I'm usually a size 8 on top and size 10 on bottom, the size 10 worked great for me. I just love these UJ dresses.

Let me start by saying I love a low neckline. I'm flat chested (30A) and it's generally an elegant look for me because it can't actually reveal anything. This dress was very pretty and the quality was great, but the neckline was very low and wide, even for me. It exposed a lot of chest, so I'm sure this dress could be challenging to wear for anyone with a hint of an actual bust. I did wear it a couple times and enjoyed it, but it made me feel a bit self conscious.
This dress was so pretty! Quite low cut and the top was a little big but I didn't need fashion tape or anything. I loved the length and the fit overall and felt very pretty in it.
Love love love Ulla Johnson and loved this dress. Perfect fit all around.
Love this dress. Fit perfectly. Only issue was that it was low-cut. I wore a camisole underneath in order to feel more comfortable, but it looks much better on without a camisole.
Wore this in the fall with a leather jacket and tights and still looked amazing. The fit is great (a tiny bit large in the bust). Would definitely rent this again!!

I loved this dress! It's pretty and flowy and works for any season and any occasion. I wore it with flat sandals to work (I'm a teacher) but would wear it with heels dressed up. It would also look nice with tights and/or boots.
It was big up top so I had to safety pin even though I had sized down. Waist is stretchy so don’t worry about sizing up. Wore with white sneakers.

links_Review_Title: Comfortable dress for everyday wear, but not a show stopper.
links_Review_Text: The dress is fine. There is absolutely nothing wrong with it, but I just didn't love it. I wore a camisole under it because it is very low cut. The dress is cute and I did like the sleeves. I just didn't think it was an outstanding dress.
Fit true to size! A little low cut but still appropriate for work. Received so many compliments when I wore this!

links_Review_Title: Great dress for work or a night out
links_Review_Text: This dress worked great for a petite, curvy build. The fabric is light and the dress hit mid-calf on my 5'2" frame, so it didn't overwhelm my frame like many full skirted midis do. The neck line is very low cut, so I wore a bralette. It had ample room in the chest for a larger bust. I got tons of compliments.

This dress is adorable, classic Ulla boho. I wore it to two nice dinners. Great length, quality fabric, a bit big in the bust & shoulders (but I have no boobs post breast-feeding) but when I sat down I felt like I needed to adjust the gaping fabric. Would be great in the Fall with a jean jacket or moto (ruffles on the sleeve but not too puffy - I tried it and it still worked with a jacket!)

links_Review_Title: The print, fabric and fit were fabulous!
links_Review_Text: What an incredible dress— thinking about purchasing. Everything from the fit to the print to the fabric are absolutely fantastic. It's feminine and flirty but and can be dressed up or down. Was incredibly flattering but did highlight my chest (in a good way).

links_Review_Title: Great date night or casual weekend
links_Review_Text: Good fit but ripped near v neck
A little low cut for work -- I needed fabric tape -- but pretty colors and flowed nicely.
Lots of compliments, super flattering. Warning - it's lower cut than I expected. I'm small chested and work at a super casual company so I got away with it but was really self conscious all day.

This dress is extremely flattering and very forgiving. I think it would work for a variety of body types. TTS though I think a small might be worth a try as it was quite loose in the waist and hips. Normal size 6. Definitely would rent again for a fun work dress.

links_Review_Title: Loved the way this dress looked.
links_Review_Text: The material is more of a slinky material which I was initially surprised about . When I put it on it just transformed into this beautiful sophisticated and comfortable dress. I am 5"4 and usually wear a size 4/6 the MR size fit well although The fit is a little baggy in the tummy. I put on a simple belt and it fits like a glove. I love having a work dress that is the opposite of black! Love this dress thinking of buying it.

links_Review_Title: Quick buy this dress - I did
links_Review_Text: This dress is super flattering and made me feel beautiful at an Oscars party in Oakland, CA. I am so excited that it's in my price range.

links_Review_Title: Super comfy and cute; lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress. I was worried at first that the MR was slightly too big. But in the end I liked the fit b/c it was comfy and not too body conscious. The SR might be cuter but wouldn't have been as great for every day. I wore this with grey velvet slippers one day (cute) and other day with high heeled lace up snow boots (less cute but workable). Great dress for travel, day to night, and everyday. Material is silky & slightly stretchy. Lays very well over curves & pretty forgiving in the tummy.

the most comfortable dress i have rented from RTR in a year. I put a belt around the waist seam as it was a just a little big in that area. Other then that everything was perfect. Perfect dress for winter.

links_Review_Title: Felt like a gorgeous piece of stained glass
links_Review_Text: Wore this on a first date -- to church -- was a hit across the board, gorgeous flattering cut & fun pattern.

I normally wear a 14/16 but was unsure if there would be enough stretch so I went for the 1X. I could have definitely worn the 0x though as it was slightly too big and needed to belt it to cinch a little. But I loved it so much. The print and length is so flattering.

Originally intended to wear for a last day in office before 100% social distancing- I ended up bailing on the public transit commute in favor of a work from home situation. Translated beautifully to the virtual meeting environment with the added bonus that others couldn't tell it was a little big on me! I styled with rainbow crystal DeMerson earrings and yellow suede Manolo blahnik heels. I believe in fully dressing even when working from home!
Would rent again, looked so good with booties and got so many compliments
The fit is so cute and stretchy. A little right across the belly but still cute
Fabric and pattern are not for a formal event, but it was good for a casual brunch party

The bright colors of this dress disguise the animal print pattern. It's comfortable and flowing, esp on a tall gal. Sad I didn't snap any pictures. The first day, I wore it with a black turtleneck on top due to cold weather, which looked as good as it did solo.

Love a yellow dress and this is a great shade-no pastels of mustard here. I feel this ran just a little large-the 42 (US 4) was looser than would have been perfect. This dress also arrived with a detached button on the sleeve, but that was fairly easy to disguise
This top was awesome - more cropped than expected and the sleeves were like VERY puffy so I tried to puff them down a bit but overall loved this

I took a risk and ordered this because it looked good in the pictures, aside from the mixed reviews. And yes it looks good in a picture. But the minute you move the shoulders fall because they are too loose, and the cuffs on the arms are very like blood pressure cuff tight. It also gives you a bit of a cone shaped boob. So like overall, great for a pic but not very comfy.
Such a cute fit loved wearing it! And not too cropped

I love a good ol' "going out top," and this one is great. I first ordered a large, which was much too big. Medium happened to be just right! I love the sleeves, tons of people asked me where I got this. The precise amount of boob to reveal on a weekend eve.

links_Review_Title: Obsessed with the cut and sleeve
links_Review_Text: I love love love this top. If you have a bigger bust, prepare for it all to be out. I ended up wearing a tighter bra to constrict it a bit. Sleeve is iconic
This top is so great I may have to buy it. Received so many compliments and it is so comfy to wear. The built it underwire means no bra needed, although the cups were a little bit big for me.

I loved wearing this although it was not the most comfortable. It was snug on my waist area and large on the busy area but this is often my problem as I'm petite and small chested. The sleeves would fall down too if I wasn't too careful but otherwise a show stopper. Rented the purse in this photo too and it was also amazing

This top is really well made with beautiful fabric, but the bust corset top just fits very strangely -- you would have to fill it out perfectly for it to look right. And the sleeves don't really stay up with is challenging.
With fashion tape, you can make this work! Not a throw on and go by any sense. Great for a dinner, not great for a night "out".

links_Review_Title: Runs a little big but so cute!!
So cute but a major disappointment
links_Review_Text: I had such high hopes for this top!! I own so many for love and Lemons items and haven't had any issue with fit, but this was absolutely massive! I am very petite but the smallest size from FLL tends to fit with no issues! This top was so big in the chest and shoulders it was falling off my body! So sad because it's so cute!

This top is the most flattering thing ever. Better for small busted ladies (I'm a B cup and was just a tad snug) the arms were also a bit tight for my taste, mobility wasn't an issue but I could feel the pressure when reaching out for stuff.

I ordered a size large which i normally do with FL&L. I'm around 145 lbs and have broader shoulders so i thought it would be safe. The large was way too big for me. I feel like a medium would have been great.
I am a double D so usually have to order a large in these style tops. However, this was still too big so make sure to size down.
Like others have said, the cut is abnormal. Too loose in the shoulders with a bustier top that does not match. Love the look but sadly couldn't wear
A little big on the bust and sleeves area but if you don't mind pulling them up it's a cute top with jeans

links_Review_Title: It was a fun, not too serious top with a touch of sophostication.
links_Review_Text: The small was a bit tight but it was a great look.
The chest area was way big and the arm holes teeny tiny. No stretch anywhere at all. So ill fitting
Overall fit was HUGE and the boob cups were very cone-shaped... no idea who could wear this but I look forward to seeing their pics! Design and material were super cute tho, nice try!
This dress worked great for a 20s style auction and was different than most. Insulation wear a six, so it ran a little small. My only complaint is the bow wasn't ironed in the back.

links_Review_Title: Great evening, but not in this dress.
links_Review_Text: Took advice from reviews and got one size up, but it wasn’t enough. Dress is lovely but shoot 2 sizes up if you are tall at all!
I wore this to my husband's work party. The stitching and sequin details are gorgeous! It was comfortable for sitting and dancing. Definitely recommend this dress!

links_Review_Title: The dress that is the life of the party!!
links_Review_Text: This dress was such a great fit. I had enough room to move in it. The sequins made it super fun to wear and perfect for my office holiday party. I got a ton of compliments on it and asked where I bought it!

links_Review_Title: I can't even count the number of compliments I received!
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress. Loved it!

links_Review_Title: Loved the sparkle! Lots of compliments on this fun party dress

links_Review_Text: Absolutely loved this dress!!! I rented it for a NYE party and it was perfect. I will say it runs a little small and short... I am typically a 4 and I wore the backup size 6 which was still a little snug on me. So maybe size up and get an extra size up as your backup size. I got so many compliments and I didn't want to send it back!

This dress is really pretty. I received a lot of compliments. Back bow adds nice detail. One thing to note, if you have slender upper arms, and sufficient arm gap, you won't have any issues. If you have softer arms with wings, the sequins may irritate when dancing. I still give five stars.

I rented this dress for a holiday night out to dinner and a show with girlfriends. It was a perfect dress - I felt beautiful and unique, and several strangers came up to compliment the dress. It was so fun to wear, definitely recommend.
Perfect for my company holiday party! Got lots of compliments

Really loved wearing this dress! Wore this to my company holiday party, and received many compliments, a few saying I looked like a mermaid. It was a little short on me since I'm tall, but didn't ride up even when dancing. The bow detail in the back is super cute

I felt so glamorous in this dress! It was great for dressing a 4 month #babybump. I dressed it down for Thanksgiving with tights and a sweater, and wore a fancy blazer on a cold night. It is a little short when you sit, but that is mostly due to the bump! I was able to wear my normal size, even with a larger bump. Was a little tight at 17 weeks, but a size up would have worked great. #maternity

I wore this dress to a great Gatsby themed cocktail attire event. The size 4 was a little too body slimming for a family party so k went with the 6 for a looser look. Paired it with marchesa earrings and a faux fur from RTR. Perfect!!

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress. Would rent again.
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress. More flattering than I had expected. Was not able to wear, as the event was canceled due to COVID-19, but hoping to rent again.
Love the material, however, but awkward cut and fit.

Unfortunately, this dress is not made for tall women so I could not wear it. I am 5'11" and it hung like two inches below my bottom. Very disappointed that it didn't work out by the dress is stunning!

links_Review_Title: This dress was such a show stopper! Compliments all night.
links_Review_Text: Wore it to a 1920s themed event at an art gallery. The 0 fit but it was a little snug on the hip area so I wore the 2. I wanted more room and to be able to dance so consider sizing up if you've got hips. The bow detail in the back is super cute though I couldn't tie it by myself so grab a friend to help you out!

links_Review_Title: Gorgeous dress, need specific body type
links_Review_Text: This dress was beautiful, however, I ended up trying 3 sizes before I gave up. I am pretty curvy (wider hips/butt and small waist) and this shift dress just didn't work on my body type. It got bigger and bigger up top and in the waist and didn't seem to get any looser in the hips. So bummed!

I wore this dress for a NYE Roaring 20s party, and I loved the updated flapper styling. Compliments all night! The fit was flattering and I could still move around and dance. True to size - I usually wear a 2 but only the 0 was available. It was a little snug, as to be expected, but I was still comfortable. Fun dress!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress but I didn't wind up wearing it because we did a more casual NYE.
links_Review_Text: High Quality

I rented this for Christmas Eve dinner at a steakhouse and it was a hit. The bow at the back is a very elegant touch. This dress sparkles beautifully in the light and I got lots of compliments. Only issue was the inside lining kept bunching. Side note, if you don't like your dresses short this may not be the one for you. Very short when I sat down.
Love the bow in the back
The dress was great, I wish I had gone down a size. It was quite big on me and I didn't end up wearing it.
Love this dress! Fit perfectly. It made we feel fabulous. I got so many compliments I can't even count. Will definitely buy it one day.
Fit great. Loved the bow in the back. Photos well
Lovely and elegant and most importantly Comfortable! It is chic and yet a simple cut that is flattering for everyone.
Dress looked fabulous on the hanger, but not flattering on me. My usual size was form fitting and tight across the middle. Size up if you want the true shift look as pictured on RTR.

links_Review_Title: Everyone loved this dress (except for cats, they hate everything)
links_Review_Text: I wore it to a burlesque show and one of the performers came off stage to tell me she loved my dress. The fabric is woven with metallic threads, so that was cool! The print is fun, the fit is sleek, and it pairs down well with high-heel Ralph Lauren style knee boots.
Perfect fit and very comfortable! I’m 5’5 and 123 lbs. Would definitely wear it again!
Very pretty but the material is extremely harsh, there's no stretch at all in the arms, it was tough to put on and take off. Didn't wear it

I love love loved this dress! I felt so great in this dress, it accentuated all of the right places and made me feel like a million bucks. Only complaint was that this dress had no stretch to it, so you can't really eat in it... but still an amazing dress that I will definitely rent again
Apologies for the horrible photo, I just loved this dress. It fit so well. Feminine and sexy with the high slit. I am normally a size small so size down.

Loved this dress - was super comfortable and just stood out with the one shoulder detail. Enough coverage to wear a strapless bra but not necessary and the lines across the dress are super flattering. I am typically a 6 and the 8 was a little loose but was totally fine. Length was great for me and I'm 5'4''. Would highly recommend!!

links_Review_Title: I felt so good in this dress! It was perfect for a festive rehearsal dinner.
links_Review_Text: Fit was great. Wore it with a strapless bra and jean jacket for layering, since it was a lighter fabric and the party was outside. Looked great and I got a lot of compliments!

This dress was perfect for the fundraiser we attended, felt gorgeous and fashionable. It initially was too snug to fully zip but thankfully the day of the event I finally got it. So definitely size up, maybe even two sizes. I would have been more comfortable in a XL but it wasn't available. I have a thicker rib age and am a 34C/D, was almost too tight in the chest too. Still loved it though, highly recommend!! The slit makes it sexy but not too much.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress for semi-formal rehearsal dinner
links_Review_Text: This dress is cut so beautifully! It was perfect for the occasion.

Loved this dress! And now looking back at photos wish I had worn! Really flattering fit and the leg slit ads some sexiness that is necessary with this print. Fabric isn't heavy so, I guess just a heads up about that.

links_Review_Title: Nice dress for dancing, not revealing
links_Review_Text: 130-135lbs @5ft 5-6in, athletic built with straighter hips. Dress size small. Worn here with 3in heels. Dress fits a little on the loose side but here I was probably close to 130lbs. If you are looking for a little space in the stomach area buy a size up. If you are looking for a skin tight perfect fit, buy a size down. The dress may have been harder to zip if I had brought XS. It’s thin and flowy, made me feel beautiful! I wore it for a winter wedding.

links_Review_Title: Great dress for any fun party!
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to a Friendsgiving party and loved the fun pattern and one shoulder look! It could be dressed up or down and would definitely recommend it to anyone looking to dress up!
gorgeous flow and cut. very fitted waist, so size up. pretty neckline and perfect midi length.

Would def consider buying this dress as i got so many compliments! Wore it to my friends bridal shower with boots to make it a little more casual. I am 5'6, 125lbs, 34B and found the dress to be long, it hit me at the ankle so anyone shorter and it'll be more like a gown.
I wore this to a party I was hosting and got so many compliments! Very flattering and just a little different!

links_Review_Title: Light fabric but still looks sharp
links_Review_Text: Wore this for a black tie optional wedding. Moved really well, got lots of compliments. Great balance of formal but interesting and flirty. Paired with some oversized Lele Sadoughi earrings and simple pointy toes heels. A little but billowy in the torso like puffy in sections like they didn't cut the fabric perfectly in the torso, but still loved.

The pattern is summer, but the colors are more fall/winter. The band on the sleeve was tight on my arm, but there is a button that you can undo to make it more comfortable. There's also a slit on the side that you can't see in the model's pictures. The fabric was cut a little weird, so it very slightly puckered in some places. This was a replacement dress that I got for a wedding. I ended up liking the original dress more than the replacements, but I still wore this for the rehearsal dinner.
I wanted to love this dress - it's beautiful to look at, and a really interesting design. The waist fit a little snugger than I would have liked, and the next size up would probably be too large.

Dress was gorgeous! Got lots of compliments. The dress was a little snigger than I would have imagined. I'm very busty and practically had to fight the dress to get it to zip. But I won and had a great night in it.
The one shoulder made it easy to wear but a little daring look good for a date night

links_Review_Title: Great dress for a dinner out
links_Review_Text: great fit. comfortable

This dress is very flattering and runs true to size. The color is beautiful and perfect for fall and into the winder months. I paired the dress with tights and black booties for a dinner party and it was perfect.
Comfortable and flattering! Had lots of fun wearing.

Rented for a November baby shower. This came ankle length on me which made it very formal so returned Dress is beautifully made, fabric flows nicely. No stretch in fabric. There's also a high slit in the dress that goes up thigh There's no note of this nor do you see it on the model. I noticed this in another reviewer's photo FYI

This dress was perfect for a Fall rehearsal dinner. It runs a little big so size down. I'm usually a 6 but the medium was too big. It ended up hitting me at my ankles instead of mid-calf (I'm 5'6") but I was OK with that. Beautiful pattern and nice, flowy material! Looked great with a leather jacket and black accessories.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress, interesting but not over the top
links_Review_Text: Runs very small! I tried this on in the NYC flagship and could barely get the M zipped. Definitely size up! Typically I'll order a6 or 4 if there is a flowy skirt, but I wouldn't have been able to use the S or M.
This is beautiful, sadly just a tad too small for me to be comfortable. My husband loves it!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful - step up from all other LBD's
links_Review_Text: I rented this for a charity gala and felt so beautiful in it. It's not your average LBD - such a different fun style. The fabric is thick and comfortable. I'm 5' 1" and a size 4. This fit perfectly.

links_Review_Title: Super fun and stress free, easy.
links_Review_Text: This dress was really fun and really comfortable. I wore it to a stylish LA wedding. At first I wished I went more fashionable but in the end really happy with it. I'm 6 months post partum so the fabric made it very easy to feel comfortable in and hid any problem areas especially in the tummy with ease yet the cape created a great style and statement. It's not sexy but very chic. If you're between sizes probably go smaller. Perfect for feeling sexy without being self conscious.
Perfect for any body type!

links_Review_Title: Wore this to a classical concert in Vienna. I felt like an edgy, minimalist queen.
links_Review_Text: I love the cape feature paired with a flattering, fitted waist. It was even more elegant on.

links_Review_Title: The drapes of the sleeve were unique!
links_Review_Text: Fit was phenomenal!

Loved this so much and got a ton of compliments!!! The cape part added such character. The dress itself was very flattering. I have a tummy and felt comfortable in this. The slit made it super sexy. Wish this came in EVERY color!
I wore the larger of the 2 dresses because I wanted to be comfortable. It was super flattering and I could move around in it. I got a lot of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Very flattering fit, cape made it not super functional
links_Review_Text: Loved the shape and cut of this dress, but the cape was just too long/too much on my short frame. I felt like it'd get caught on things and dipped in my salad dressing or something on accident so I didn't end up wearing it. The slit is also rather high, I'm short so it wasn't a problem, but I could see it being a bit high for someone with longer legs.
Rented for a cocktail party. Fun, different LBD. Fits great and was comfortable to wear all night. Got lots of compliments. A great rental.
This dress is so flattering. Great find for my holiday parties.
really tight in the bust area

links_Review_Title: Wore it to a Christmas party.
links_Review_Text: The dress is so flattering on and fits true to size. The cape is such a fun detail.
The cape and fit were flattering and the dress was unique. Paired it with chunky gold earrings to glam it up.

links_Review_Title: I attended a friends wedding in San Francisco the day after I found my dress from RTR.
links_Review_Text: It was a great fitted dress and the half cape really made the dress stand out. It was super comfortable, great for when you needed to hit the dance floor, and overall was super sleek and modern looking.

This LBD is next level - from the rushing to the cape and asymmetry! I am 5'8 and the dress was the perfect length, although the slit does go a little high once you're seated. The size 16 fit, but was just a tad snug (disclaimer: I'm wider on top and narrow in the middle) for it to be 5 stars.
Loved the fit, was cute and classy but also sexy because of the tight material.
Perfect for this concert in an hip venue

links_Review_Title: I wore this for an evening out on the town with friends.
links_Review_Text: The shirt is extremely comfortable. The flap was a little bit of a hassle as I kept having to tug at the flap in front because it kept wanting to ride up, but it was still very comfortable and I got lots of compliments on the shirt all night, from both, women and even men! I would definitely wear this again.
stays in place without too much adjusting, little tight in the torso

So I generally rent what I'm wearing for family pictures, this top was super cute and comfortable and looked great in our pictures this year. I'll probably be renting it again for another occasion, I liked it so much. It was very tight on the body part, and I went with a medium instead of a small just so every imperfection didn't show.
Love the fabric and the fit. Didn't have to adjust too often. Felt so incredible, definitely a confidence booster piece

links_Review_Title: Felt great in this for Valentines dinner at a nice restaurant

links_Review_Text: I usually order a large. I ordered an extra-large and still wasn't happy with the fit.
I wore with a pair of velvet tuxedo pants and a white necklace. I put some sparkles on my shoulders and a white vintage choker of white crystals. Fun and easy. Good strapless bra a must.
Was pretty and easy to wear
Snug fit which I expected. Definitely size up
excellent condition and bright color

links_Review_Title: When it came, it was wrinkled in the bag.
links_Review_Text: I called RTR and tried to get a refund, as I could not wear the shirt wrinkled. The associate was very friendly but insisted on trying to overnight the item to me. It would be cheaper for the company to just issue a refund but they are committed to pleasing the customer - which is very nice but again, the refund would've sufficed as I had little hope in the "overnight" process. I live in a remote mountain town and things are rarely delivered on time. The garment eventually came but wasn't delivered to my house until after I left for the event. Next time, I will not choose something that could potentially wrinkle in transit.
Material clings like spandex in the mid-section. It was not flattering for anyone without a flat stomach

links_Review_Title: Beautiful color and love the off-the-shoulder look
links_Review_Text: I rented this top to wear to a nice dinner on a trip to Las Vegas. The material was nice and thick, and I love the bold, red color. The off-the-shoulder cape was very flattering and fun. The top was pretty fitted through the torso so I wore a body shaper underneath to smooth everything out. I would definitely rent again.

links_Review_Title: loved it, if you are busty it does not lay flat
links_Review_Text: great color
Loved the color.
This knit had a great off the shoulder neck, dramatic cape, but was not kind to my tummy zone.

links_Review_Title: Haven't had a chance to wear it.
links_Review_Text: I like the design, color, and fit.
Although the overall fit was nice, the shoulders were too tight and when I moved my arms at all the shirt slid up.
Fit true to size, comfortable to wear.
fits tight in rib and hip area, a little shorter than expected , beautiful color and amazing fabric

links_Review_Title: Perfect date-night top for a nice night out!
links_Review_Text: The fit was flattering and the color was even better in person. Loved this unique, high-quality style.

links_Review_Title: Not for me. Looks a bit like a cape in the back.
links_Review_Text: I wanted to like it but it was a bit too superwoman.

links_Review_Title: Fun formal red top - need a slim waist
links_Review_Text: This is a very fitted top so you need to have a nice waistline to pull this off. I loved this shirt- it has a wow factor. Would rent again. Would be great for the holidays.

Fabric was really nice and thick. I wore this too tucked into high rise pants and was really please with the look. Otherwise I would have worn it with leather leggings or tight pants without pockets bc when I tried it on with jeans it looked funky. Definitely a dress top!

links_Review_Title: I traveled in this top and got compliments at every airport!!
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly! Extremely comfortable.
This top was flattering. I have nice shoulders and this piece totally gets it! The only thing was that the weather has turned cold for this style. Can't wear it outdoors.
Comfortable, cute, lightweight. All around super spunky and fun. Would rent again.
Wore with RTR sweater for date night and were so comfy. Very flattering. Would rent again!
I usually don't wear high-waisted pants, but these were so comfortable. They were also surprisingly warm. The pockets are also quite roomy. Big enough for a phone!
Needed an outfit I could wear to work and then Christmas Eve. These pants are comfortable but still so flattering. Very tempted to buy!!

links_Review_Title: Super comfy and wore it everyday
links_Review_Text: Looks fancy and stylish for others Feels amazing and comfortable for the wearers Can match with all kinds of styles Pretty warm in the winter I rented it while i was traveling and i literally wore it almost everyday.

links_Review_Title: Casual, yet dressy. Relaxed, yet edgy
links_Review_Text: Loved these pants. You can totally dress them up or down. I wore this for the family thanksgiving dinner and everyone noticed and gave compliments! Also, I love that it's animal friendly with being vegan leather, yet the quality feels premium. It didn't feel faux at all!
Love these, super comfortable and soft. Perfect fall look.

These are so comfortable - they feel like sweatpants. Great for a chic, casual weekend look with sneakers & a sweatshirt or dressed up with heels/booties . I've worn to work with a white button up and multiple weekend days & nights
Super thin and not stiff. Loved the fit. I'm also intimidated by leather pants but these were great. Wore them on the weekend and to work

I really liked these pants a lot. They are a big baggy which is a cool style but some days i wished they were tighter to pair with a baggy shirt. But loved. Would rent again during warmer months when i could rock it with just a t-shirt and heels

I NEVER fall in love with pants and I bought these the hours after putting them on. Great fit, super soft and comfortable, and got so many compliments! The ties are adorable. They can be dressed up or down easily, look just as good with heels or slides or sneakers.

Vegan joggers with a twist- cute detail at the bottom. Super comfortable, could dress up or down. My goal was to keep them high-waist but they were just a little loose. I may size down the next time I rent to see how that fits- but no one else noticed. I layered an oversized blazer, you could easily do a graphic tee, chunky sweater- so many options!

links_Review_Title: Comfy, chic pants for work or play
links_Review_Text: Easy to style and comfortable. I'm on the taller side (5'10") so they hit me mid-calf, but that look worked. Really enjoyed them!

I found these pants to be like fancy sweatpants for fit. Although comfortable I did not find them to look or feel polished. On me they were too long-waisted, not a problem I usually have. Also they were loose everywhere but fitted in my calves ( I do have big calves). Bottom line if you have thin calves and want a slouchy fit, you might like these. Too casual for work or going out.

links_Review_Title: Super lux and great to dress up or down
links_Review_Text: Greta leather pants! Fit really well, great length for a petite, love the waist detail. Wanted to buy them but too expensive.... super easy to dress up or down!
I was worried since I'm short these would've be cute on my but wow I loved them so much!! And they fit around the waist perfectly!

links_Review_Title: Lovely, could be dressed up or down!
links_Review_Text: Nicely fit, little high waisted which is nice!
Super comfortable and very cute. You can dress up or down.
Got compliments every time I wore them. Comfy, chic, perfect!

I received a lot of compliments on these pants! I paired them with a silver sequined shirt for NYE. The fit was good I did have to pull them up a few times so could have probably gone down to a 4R but I loved them regardless. The only issue I had with this pants is there are supposed to be 2 metal clips above the zipper and the pair sent to me was missing one of them so it looked a little weird to me though no one noticed.
Perfect fit!

I love this pant so much! I've worn it day and night and do not want to send it back. The elastic waist didn't bother me. you can put a belt over it if you don't like it. These are cute with sneakers, booties, mules or heels.
a fun spin on the vegan leather. Ties on the bottom were a nice touch. Fit was a bit off though. Maybe not that flattering but definitely got complimented all over.

Very on trend and comfortable to wear. I wish my regular size was available. I was forced to size up and the pants, while wearable, danced a bit of a number on my waist and derrière. Would love to wear these again this winter in my regular size. Can be dressed up or down.

links_Review_Title: So cute, casual or dressed up!
links_Review_Text: Loved this for, wore it with a sparkly crop and heels for a sexy night out, and a graphic tee with vans another night to hit the bars for Sunday night football! Super versatile! Might keep them a while!
True to size and very comfortable. Paired with a low sandal and received many compliments.
Super cute and comfortable pants for a night out. The fit was looser than expected but still looked good and the material was really soft. Will definitely rent again

links_Review_Title: Too big on me. Didn't like the elastic waist and really didn't like the ties at the ankle.
This was only ok, wrinkles easily
links_Review_Text: Insulted that this is an almost $1000 top. It's nice and the drape is unique though when implemented makes one arm a batwing sleeve and one regular which I don't think was actually necessary. The v neck is not revealing which is great. Good with a nude bra. The sleeves are too long but can be pushed up to a 3/4 sleeve which is my preference. The wrinkles are what annoys me. You will never get them all out and they don't look like they're part of the drape so it appears sloppy. Fit was good
I'm glad I read the reviews and ordered a size down. This fit perfectly. It made my whole day at work better. I'd rent it again.

links_Review_Title: High quality material, but wrinkles easily
links_Review_Text: Fit was large overall. I think 1 or 2 sizes down would have been better. Beautiful shirt with unique style, would rent again.
One of my favorite rentals to date! I felt so glam. Gorgeous fabric that flows beautifully. Fit true to size and was long enough for me.
If you are petite on top, size down. High quality too but unfortunately wrinkled very fast.

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on this top!
links_Review_Text: This top was super cute and flattering. It was a tiny bit low cut in the front but was still formal enough for work. The sleeves were a tiny bit too big as well but no one noticed and the zipper helped make it fit like a glove everywhere else!

This top is beautiful - but even for someone with really long arms the length of the sleeves was prohibitive. The side with the draping was large and hung longer than the sleeve without. It was so flattering at the neck and waist! I just wish it had worked for me.

This blouse is super low cut and not appropriate for work. Even with a camisole underneath it didn't look right because so much of the camisole showed. I am usually need a 6 in blouses but this is a generous cut and looked too big. May be better in girls with large chests as long as they have small waists as the top is definitely more fitted at the bottom. Two stars for the draping in back and fabric quality.

links_Review_Title: A little too big for petites
links_Review_Text: I ordered this in the smallest size (34) to wear to work. The draping is really beautiful (although I will say that my boyfriend wasn't that into it) and the crepe fabric feels very high quality. But even the small size just looked too big on me, and I felt like it overwhelmed me a bit. The V-neck came too low, and the sleeves were too long. I tried to make it work, but in the end I didn't wear this because I looked like I was playing dress up.
Light material and very cute

The model wearing it in the picture is tall. If you are short, this skirt will be "floor length" on you. I am 5'4" and this was unexpectedly down to the floor. It is otherwise a lovely skirt. I did not wear it.
This dress was a huge hit for me. Perfect length, comfortable, true to size - received MANY compliments!
The material is super soft and comfortable. Loved the pattern and how it fit. Wore it for Christmas Eve.
This dress is so cute and very flattering! It fits true to size. The sleeves were a little short on me but I do have long arms. Overall I was very pleased with this rental!

Fits like a typical RT dress, sleeves a bit short on me and skirt slightly shorter than I'd prefer for work so I'd size up next time for length. Still appropriate with tights. Bodice fit well, has shirring/ smocking on the sides so there is wiggle room.
Amazing fit. Cute print. Perfect for work or play. Absolutely loved this rental!!
This dress looks great with black tights. It was a bit too form fitting for work (size 6, 34D) so I added a jacket.
This is a really light, easy-to-wear dress. The elastic on the sides makes the fit nice. The color is black, not navy blue

The dress is a bit more formal looking in-person as the fabric is shiny/satiny. There are stretchy panels at the ribcage, so larger busts probably don't need to size up. It runs a little bit large to size, I probably could have gone a size down for a more fitted look. The fabric weight was perfect for a summer/fall transition, or winter/spring.

Great, easy dress for fall. I wore it once with flats and once with booties. The button up front and zipper back made it easy to wear, even though I'm 6 months pregnant. The floral pattern is sweet but not overpowering, and the fabric's texture looked nice all day.
This is a nice dress, but it didn't wow me. The cut seemed matronly and was not super flattering. Comfortable to wear with tights and work appropriate.

Fit perfectly - well tailored so that with zipper and stretch panels it will fit a lot of body types. Usually I am scared of prints but this one was small enough and neutral enough to be just right. Sleeves were a little long and flouncy but it was so comfortable I kept wearing it.
nothing special, soft fabric
Rented for work and wore multiple times. Loved wearing it and the look of it.

Wore this for work with tights and booties. It was comfortable for a whole day of facilitating training. The pattern is sweet, and the cut is flattering yet conservative enough to be work-appropriate.
Easy dress, perfect for a family party! Will definitely rent again

Loved this silk dress - paired with tights and booties - wore to a work meeting as well as to church. Very fitted look with elastic on the side which is form hugging but forgiving and extremely comfortable. The silk gives it a very elegant look. Would rent again!

Wore this to a memorial service on a gloomy, rainy afternoon. Paired it with black tights and black suede low heeled booties. The dress fits true to size and is comfortable. I liked the full cut hem in the back.

Fits very well, work appropriate or would be good for a semi casual event. Thin material, although the skirt is lined. Color feels like it's good for winter or fall but it would not be good in cold weather

Rented with my unlimited and this was a big success. I am a 0/2 and went with the 0 based on other Rebecca Taylor items. Fit perfectly. And looked great with black tights and heeled mules. A great fall dress - highly recommend.

This was surprisingly tight in the waist, despite its loose/relaxed fit everywhere else. I think it's cute, though nothing extra special, but decided not to wear since it pulled slightly at my waist which wasn't comfortable or flattering. I'd recommend going up a size, unless you have an extra small waist.
Easy to wear. If you have a larger bust there is smocking around the rib cage area so it will fit!! Yayyy!
Really great silhouette! Fabric is light and scarf like and will be better to rent in the winter when I can wear thick black tights.
Fit perfectly and was very comfortable! Work appropriate but could be worn day or night. I would definitely rent again!
Loved the flattering fit, soft fabric, & abstract floral print. I wore this dress with black tights & boots & received tons of compliments. A great LBD for work that isn't boring!

links_Review_Title: Very comfortable for a work day
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress for an office environment and felt very comfortable due to the stretch at the back waist allowing the buttons up top dome room and no gaping. My one concern was the length was a bit shorter than I usually rent for work.

links_Review_Title: Very flattering! I really like this dress
links_Review_Text: I really liked this dress and plan to rent it again.

This dress fits like a dream, is super comfortable, and incredibly flattering. It fits very true to a RT 4, which is the size I wear in most brands with the exception of HVN & Reformation. Will rent again!
True to size, perfect dress to throw on for work. The material doesn't seem to wrinkle so I think it would also be great for traveling.

links_Review_Title: Nice dress but made for taller women
links_Review_Text: The dress is pretty but it would fit a taller woman better. The sleeves were long and extras material on the shoulders.
Very pretty dress. True to size and comfortable. Be sure to remove from hanger once received to help with “hanger humps” on the shoulders. Tried ironing them out, not much success. Will rent again.

links_Review_Title: Love the look. But fit is funky
links_Review_Text: The way the pockets sit and the weight of the fabric means it can bulge at your hips depending on your proportions. i'm pretty long waisted but the top seemed like it needed an even longer waist. I adjusted where the waistline sat on my to get the pockets to not puff (and make me look really bulky), but it definitely looks better from some angles than others.

Loved this dress! Floral print gives it just a bit of spring while black still makes it appropriate for cold weather without going into full pastel mode! Super comfortable and very forgiving in mid section! Will rent again!

I am a pear shaped size 8-10 and I usually don't have trouble with clothes being tight on my waist but the size 4 was definitely too tight for me. I will get the size 5 next time. It is a beautiful feminine dress with pockets!

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments! Loved the pockets! Wore it to a fancy auction at my daughter's school.
links_Review_Text: I am petite and typically wear a size 6. I wore a 4 and it fit perfectly. I have a larger rib cage area and the dress hit right below that-but it was fine. Very comfortable!!

links_Review_Title: This dress made me feel beautiful!
links_Review_Text: First, it has pockets!! I got so many compliments. The fabric was soft and the dress was so comfortable. I'm only 5'0 so the dress fell a little below my knees but with heels it still looked good! I wish I could buy that dress!

links_Review_Title: Rented for my mom to wear to a fundraiser- she LOVED it
links_Review_Text: This Ted Baker dress is beautiful and comfortable. I got it for my mom to wear to a cocktail event because she is always cold. This dress is great for an hour glass figure because the skirt is full and the knit top has plenty of stretch. In the pic (I tried the backup size just for fun...we did NOT wear the same dress to the function!) I am wearing the size 1 and my mom is in the 2. I'm usually a 0 or 2 and my mom wears a 4 usually. If you have a winter event and don't want to freeze, rent this!

I usually wear a 6-8 dress size and wore a 3 that seemed to fit perfectly! I wore it for a black-tie event for work. It was comfortable, stylish, kept me warm, but also was breathable material so not too warm. And always a bonus (for me anyway) it has nice sized pockets so you can carry your phone, ID, & lipstick - no purse necessary! I loved wearing this dress and would recommend for all the ladies out there!

I love Ted Baker dresses. This was no exception. I got tons of compliments. I went with the size 3. The waist isn't very forgiving, so because of that I went with the 3 rather than the 2. There is no stretch in the ribbon band around the waist. The top was still tight and form fitting with the 3, so that was good! I would absolutely rent this dress again and would consider buying it. Soooo beautiful and classic.
Wasn't too sure about the sizes but the 2 was perfect. The waist was a little snug when you sit but fit tight which is the effect you want.

Worn for my brothers wedding on NYE. Forgot to take a picture at the actual event, so this is the trial run. Check the sizing for this dress- I am normally a 6, but I wore the 2 for the ceremony, and then the 3 for the dinner/dancing portion of the event for comfort, lol. Totally recommend.

This dress came avaliable and I rented it for my husbands warrant officer reception it has pockets which was amazing to put my phone into and not carry it around, it fit great and was so comfortable I could have sized down probably being that it's just fitted up top but I did like the fit I did wear a regular bra with it I would probably make sure u have a seamless strapless bra before ordering as I could see a bit I got so many compliments I want to buy this dress!
I am normally a 4 and wore a 2. This is great for a cold weather event as the top is thicker material.

This is the rare dress that is both super comfortable and really flattering. The top is like a sweater and the bottom is like a stiff, silk skirt. I rented it for a party that I was hosting, and it was perfect for running around the house in. I received many compliments and the dress didn't bother me once. I would definitely rent this again.

I usually wear a size 8 which I guess equates to the 4. It fit perfect! I received lots of compliments. The pockets were amazing for stashing lip gloss, money, and phone. No need to worry about a purse or clutch.
Loved this dress for a nice dinner date night
Fit great. Comfortable. Pockets!!!! So many compliments. Great long zipper in the back.
This dress is such a fun change up for work. It's conservative but still so playful. I got so many compliments!

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a formal wedding!
links_Review_Text: This dress is high quality, fit perfectly and had plenty of stretch for movement. Received so many compliments and loved the pocket details! For reference, I am 5’10 and wore a size 1.

links_Review_Title: This dress is STUNNING and perfect for weddings! I got a lot of compliments and its super flattering
links_Review_Text: It was super flattering and having pockets was a plus! I would definitely rent again!

links_Review_Title: Comfortable and Unique. It has pockets!
links_Review_Text: You can dance, drink and eat in total comfort in this dress. There are unique details on the back and sleeves that you might not be able to see in the pictures. It has pockets. Lots of compliments.
I wore this dress to the theatre on a trip to London, so I felt that Ted Baker was especially appropriate. The fit is flattering and it's great for colder weather. The skirt has a 50s elegance to it.

links_Review_Title: Fantastic Dress, Great Material, beautiful Details. It has a pocket that gives it a special touch...
links_Review_Text: Fits perfect it's True to Size...... Love this Dress!

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments on Thai dress. The fit was so flattering on my "mom bod"!
links_Review_Text: Christmas mass. This was the perfect dress for any mommy. Comfortable, elegant, stretchy......love love loved it
Great fit for my pear shape. The detail was beautiful - received a ton of compliments. I used the back up size which was a size smaller than I usually wear. Loved the pockets too. Rent it!

Fit runs a little tight, Im between 0 and 2, I got size 0 and I feel like 2 would've been more comfortable. Since I'm short, it was almost a full length dress but not complaining as it didn't look awkward

I love this dress! If it was not for the expensive price tag, I would have purchased it. I received so many compliments on it. My Content Manager like it so much we did an impromptu photoshoot at our holiday party.

Rented this for a bridal shower tea party theme and it was PERFECT. The dress is absolutely stunning- I received tons of compliments. It's also very warm and perfect for winter. The quality of the dress/ material is exceptional. I wish RTR had a larger selection of Ted baker items. This is by far my favorite piece I've rented so far and will definitely be renting again!

I needed a dress for my husband's 20 year reunion, and this one was a perfect find! So happy I followed the reviews and sized down, I got a perfect fit. The dress was effortlessly beautiful and I didn't have to worry about being cold with the long sleeves. I was comfortable and felt great in it.

The Ted Baker 1 was perfectly snug, without eating much beforehand. The 2 was a bit too bunchy in the arms. It needs to be tight to look good. Pockets were a savior, no purse necessary- danced, sat, stood without worrying my gloss and cell would fall out, perfectly deep functional pockets. Thinking about buying!

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress! Great details
links_Review_Text: The fit was perfect, pockets, and bow details

I received so many compliments on this dress, my husband loves it wants me to buy it! Runs very big, i usually wear a 6 but wore a 2. Very flattering. It made me look like I had a tiny waist (I don't). Pockets were a plus!

Got so many compliments at work. The "skirt" looks almost 3D, and the shape of it looks fluff. A lot of people think it's a skirt without realizing it's a dress. Worn it so many times and loved it! It was sent to me as a brand new piece so definitely a plus!
Heavier material than expected. Was quite tight around the waist and generous in the bust. I loved the tie at the front. A fun wear!

links_Review_Title: I love this dress!! Received many compliments
links_Review_Text: Size 2 UK equals Size 4 US
Just lovely. Light wight. I'm a 6/8 and did a size 4. I think a three would have fit at the top better but overall great dress for any event or work.

links_Review_Title: Fun for an at-home dinner date (COVID-19)
links_Review_Text: I love the floral skirt on this dress; the sweater-like top, less so. Was fine for an evening but the sweater part would have been itchy to wear all day. I wish RTR would carry more of Ted Baker's floral dresses; I think that's what the brand does best and the RTR selection is limited.
It does run a bit large
I loved this and definitely will rent again a little looser than I would've liked and a lot of boobage. But it's super sexy and such a win
Not for work. Too low cut, as you can see from the pic. Also, the XL was too big, but reviews said it would fit. Insert shrugging emoji.

Whatever print it is, I loved it!! I wore it for Valentine's Day and I'm bummed I didn't get a better pic in it! Only downside was when I was sitting at dinner the slit on the slides was so high I felt like I was flashing a lotta hip. Otherwise it fit great and I'd rent again!

links_Review_Title: Too baggy through shoulders and chest
links_Review_Text: Color and print is amazing. Love the sexy low cut, really high slits and the thin lightweight material. But the shoulders and chest for this dress are too large. It droops forward exposing a lot of chest, but not necessarily in a good way. More in a 'at any moment there could be a nipple slip' kind of way. That being said I paired it with a baggy shaglike sweater and loved it as a skirt. I suppose you could put a cami under it but I personally think it would ruin the chic look.

links_Review_Title: This dress speaks before you do when you walk in a room
links_Review_Text: I got a large in this dress though I normally wear a medium but Im glad I did. It gave me a little extra room to dance comfortably. The buttons take TIME so leave a few minutes to button up. It is a tad bit sheer but I wore black biker shorts underneath which were perfect. I would buy this dress! it was a hit
I wore a slip dress under it otherwise my chest would have been very exposed. Fabric is light and not super high quality but it's a cute cut.

links_Review_Title: I can't wait to rent this again!
links_Review_Text: I adore this dress and got so many compliments on it. This was actually worn for my xmas card photo with my dog. The color is vibrant and eye-catching. The neckline runs deep but it made my smaller chest look great. Instead of a bra, I used KT tape. Any stick on bra that doesn't have a front closure would work though. The three slits run pretty high but a pair of opaque black tights keeps the look from being too revealing. The sleeves are wide enough for women who have bigger arms and typically struggle to find dresses that fit them. I love the balance between the length, the deep v and the full coverage of the sleeves.

I had to winterize this but still enjoyed it. I don't usually wear an xl but the app recommended it and it worked out. I really liked the dress but after all the layers I added I wasn't so sure however was surprised by the amount of attention the outfit garnished; people loved the dress.

Was hoping to be able to wear this one for work but it's definitely more of a summer party dress due to three very high slits along with it being a very deep V. The button closing makes so it takes forever to both get into and out of the dress
I loved this - it was definitely too big for me though, I wish I'd been able to get a Large rather than XL. Loved the slit up the side and got tons of compliments.

This dress is very pretty and fit true to size. It is a bit too low cut to wear with a bra (which is fine for me, but perhaps not for others). As other reviews state, the side slits are very high. I felt great in it when standing up, but sitting felt like a challenge, especially getting in and out of a Lyft. I felt a little too conscious of potential wardrobe malfunctions to feel super comfortable or confident in this
Pretty color and print. Love the style but so sad I wasn't able to button up all the way. Too small for my curves.

links_Review_Title: A little big up top, needed fashion tape

links_Review_Text: Amazing fit. Great Color.

I say "sexxxy" because I absolutely loved the dress, and felt VERY sexy in it (hello three slits and plunging neckline). The dress is low enough in the front that it shows your bra, so if going for that look, I recommend a cute lacy bralette that you don't mind people seeing, or pair with a camisole underneath (which is what I did).

I wanted to wear this for a holiday party but could not get it buttoned up. It runs EXTREMELY small. I am usually between a M-L and from other reviews knew to size up and got the XL. It has no stretch. Would be a great dress for thin frames but I wouldn't recommend if you are curvy.

links_Review_Title: Cute but not for big boobs
links_Review_Text: I thought the dress was super cute and love everything about it except my boobs were just too big for it. It showed way too much for my liking. If you have smaller boobs it would look AMAZING! But if you have big boobs you would have to wear a cami underneath (which I don't like to do).
It is gorgeous! High drama low neckline and slits to your upper thigh! Very sexy, vey stylish. Wore if for my bday dinner and got SO many compliments!

links_Review_Title: Fit everywhere except the chest - be prepared to go braless
links_Review_Text: I really loved this dress and spent a good 30 minutes trying to make this dress work. This dress fit everywhere except in the chest/shoulder area. It would have been perfect if I could take binder clips to the top of the dress (where the dress sits on top of your shoulders/collarbone area) to pull the dress up about an inch on each side to keep my chest from falling out of the dress. I don't think I could have sized down as it fit me perfectly around my ribs and through my arms - and the slits were already very high as it was so a shorter dress would have exposed all sorts of things. I maybe could have worn a bralette underneath but it is very, very low-cut and so I think even the bottom of the bralette would have been exposed. Plus, it still would have been noticeably gaping so not really sure a bralette or cami would would have worked that well. I wore this dress for all of 3 hours and that was all I could handle. Otherwise, the dress was beautiful and a great color. I just don't think my chest was large enough to fill it out.

Currently, I'm 5'5, 155lbs, athletic build, and 36DD, typically in a size 8... I ordered the XL because I was worried about the waist and chest area on this dress, but it was worse than I could have imagined. There is no zipper; the front of the dress completely buttons.
