The dress fit fine in the hips, arms, even the waist, but would not button at all over my chest, not even close (so bad I couldn't even take photo to show you). I get that some dresses are made for smaller chested women, but this was the XL! I wouldn't order this dress unless you're a B cup or smaller.

Love this dress! I'm seeing a ton of negative reviews about the low cut/slits in the dress but I think it's obvious you have to wear a slip underneath. It's also super thin. I loved how it looked with a black slip underneath! I'd definitely rent again.
Beautiful fabric and style. It just didn't fit from my ribs through my chest. I have a wide ribs and big boobs on a petite frame. Usually medium accommodates but not with this dress
Loved the color and style but very very very small even though I ordered up (XL). I mean it fit my 11 tr old daughter just about right....
Wore to date night dinner and loved this look. The only con is that the side slots are pretty high so my upper thigh close to my butt was visible when I sat for dinner

links_Review_Title: I'm not sure where the appropriate place to wear this would be.
links_Review_Text: Super low cut, so you can't wear a bra and there are slits up both legs that came up almost to my mid thigh.

links_Review_Title: I wore this dress for grad pics. It was so cute in pics and I got so many complements!
links_Review_Text: I am a size 8 and wore the L, it fit well. I had to wear tan spanx under neath since it was a little short on a windy day. It was true to size, comfy, and fit how it looks in the pic.

Absolutely loved this dress for a February wedding. I received so many compliments throughout the evening. The quality of the fabric was amazing, super comfy too! The sizing is European so a little hard to judge. It was a bit large at the top and I felt like I had to keep pulling it up. No complaints though, would definitely rent again and try a size down!
This dress is so pretty!! It made me feel amazing and it was so comfortable. Follow me at @ami.mystery on instagram for more of my RTR looks.
Trendy and fun left dress. Wore this at 28 weeks pregnant and felt like a goddess. Great fit except runs a little short.
I rented this for an elegant thanksgiving dinner out. You could wear it for a number of reasons. I loved it. No bra necessary for me.

This dress was a beautiful material that had an expensive quality to it and was fun to twirl in all night. It was very flattering and fit great! Beware of the European sizing though. Lovely color and perfect for a wedding at any time of the year.

Note this is UK sizing so a US 4. I got this dress as a backup in case I was having a bad bloat day... definitely a lot of extra room. Too much fabric for me. Added volume to my hips and lower abdomen, and way too much volume around the shoulders--thought it was a weird choice to have two thick layers of ruffles around the top but cut it for just part of the back. I still gave this four stars because it's well made and could be great on others. Just not good for my body type and not my style.
I received so many compliments! I should have ordered one size smaller but it ended up being fine wearing the larger size. Very comfortable

This item runs small. If your short like me wear the highest heels, it's long. Got so many compliments. Wore with drinks with my husband. Love the one shoulder and the print very in season. Would rent again. I should buy this.
Nice fabric and very comfortable but a little short.
Such a beautiful dress! It's on the heavier side but it didn't both me at all on a 80 degree day. I'd suggest taking sizing down; I wore my normal size and the top was slightly too large.

I was DROWNING under the ruffles so My stylist at RTR told me to try it on backwards, and WOW! Probably my favorite piece to date- compliments all night long, so fun to dance in, I didnt want to take it off!
I thought the ruffles were overwhelming, so I turned it around and wore this dress backwards and added a belt to break up all of the pattern! Loved it!
Pretty dress that works great for a daytime wedding. I would definitely size down as it runs big, but the style is loose and floaty, so it doesn't matter if it is a little larger.

I LOVED this dress. My friends wouldn't stop with the compliments which helped, hah. Fits smaller than what I would have expected, but I guess most formal dresses do. I was probably a bit overdressed for the event I wore this to, but the dress is amazing. Super comfortable and flattering if you get the size figured out. As reference, I'm between a 12-14 in dresses, and a bit busty 36DD. The waist for perfect in the size 16R, bit the top was a smidge loose though I wasn't wearing a bra - that might have helped. I would say this dress is more appropriate for a semi-formal event or to wear to a wedding.
I love prints. This print, however, was overwhelming. Too much going on with the ruffle and flare on top of the print. I chose not to wear the dress because it was too busy.

I wore the 12R because I was in a crunch and the 10 was not available. Really needed the 10, but I made the 12 works. This dress fits true to size. Originally worn to a night at the opera (Aida) and cocktail party after. Soooo many compliments and so comfy and unique. I wore the dress backwards per another review so that the big ruffles were on the back. Worked great! I then ended up wearing it to a black tie optional gala the next weekend when my original attire plan didn't work out. This time, I turned ruffles to front and wore big rhinestone and rose gold drop earrings with it. Again, a hit. Love this dress and would rent again.
This dress was so soft and comfortable and definitely true to size! The fit was very comfortable and just an easy date night dress!

I love this dress..but...like someone the others mentioned..the ruffles are intense. They are Heavy. I bought it thinking I could wear a great jacket or something when it was cold, but you really cant. Great for weather/events where you wont need a jacket..
I loved wearing this

This dress is really beautiful in person! Love the animal print and was very on trend. Unfortunately I was sent a size 8 which I could not fill the top out on. I have a smaller chest and the dress just wouldn't stay up.

links_Review_Title: Weird fit. The ruffle does not go all the way around the dress. The chest is a little tight too.

links_Review_Text: It runs small through the chest but other than that very very comfortable and felt amazing!!!! So many compliment!!!

I'm not a snakeskin person but I'm a RTR unlimited member so I viewed this as a very low risk situation and thought, why not? I got this dress to wear to a wedding. When it arrived the first thing I noticed was the volume and fabric -- it looked much more high quality than I originally expected. I was worried about the volume up top but after trying it on I'm sold! The voluminous top actually makes the dress really elegant and is a nice juxtaposition with the print.
Too big - I didn't wear it. Size 16 was sent - I could have used a 12

links_Review_Title: This was the greatest dress! I was at a fancy wedding in Italy and it was perfect.
links_Review_Text: Fit perfectly throughout!
Does not look as well as in photo
Zipper was a little tight across chest because of how it's made Otherwise great quality Unique look and stylish More dressier than expected

links_Review_Title: not right for me - runs small, as i wear a 10. it's a lot of dress - overwhelming.
links_Review_Text: heavy, too much dress for me.
I should have ordered this dress in a 4R instead of a 6R :(. However, I still wore it to dinner and loved it! I received so many compliments.
Loved it - tone it down for work with a jacket, tone it up for party with jewelry. Wishing was cheaper to buy ;).

links_Review_Title: I loved this red and I definitely recommend this outfit
links_Review_Text: The only qualm I have with this was it was a little big in the crotch, but aside from that I think it looked stunning
Loved the color and cut of this jump suit and really wanted to love it but it was too tight around the hips and just didn't have a smooth fit.

I was pleasantly surprised by this jumpsuit! I got it for a Valentine's Day date night out in New York City. I'm tall with a long torso, and it fit perfectly. I'm usually in between a 2 and 4. It has just the right amount of stretch. the jumpsuit didn't ride up on me while sitting down, and I never had to adjust the top at all. the only thing I didn't like was the crop style at the ankles. but I honestly forgot about that when I wasn't walking around outside.

links_Review_Title: Tons of compliments and it fit like a glove!
links_Review_Text: I rented this for Valentine's Day and it was an absolute hit! I received tons of compliments and my hubby loved it! True to size!
Rented this for a work Christmas party. Fun and festive jumpsuit!
Wore this for a holiday party and got so many compliments. It was a bit tight on me but it worked. Great for formal occasions as well. It's a bright red color that was great for the holidays.
Holiday in Florida!! Loved everything about this jumpsuit!

links_Review_Title: Sized up and still way too small
links_Review_Text: Could not even zip up past my hips

links_Review_Title: This is a standout piece! I received MANY compliments!
links_Review_Text: Because I'm only 5'3 it was longer on me then the picture, but I liked that better. The fabric is quality and it fit perfectly!

links_Review_Title: Great jumpsuit on a taller person
links_Review_Text: This is a fun jumpsuit. The fit was odd at first, but once I started moving, it fit a little better. The pants were long on me, but I’m only 5’2” so it was expected. I think this would be an awesome jumpsuit on a taller person.
It was very sexy, elegant and comfortable...a rare combo! Everyone loved it! It was a tiny bit bigger than most size 0 jumpsuits but I'd still wear it every day if I could.
I was skeptical bc it looked a bit boring but the ribbing in the mid section ticks everything in right and the slit is a nice touch!

links_Review_Title: Lots of compliments and a great transitional dress for seasons
links_Review_Text: The smocked area was very tight so I ended up sizing up to make it more comfortable in the bust which led to the sleeves being too big in the shoulders so they kept falling down but otherwise it was great wear, received a ton of compliments and felt comfortable in it!

I wore this dress for work but with the amazing square neckline and slit in the skirt - I could have worn it for anything! The slit goes a little high when seated but it's easy to tuck under and hide. The smocked bodice is really forgiving and slimming! The only reason I took a star away was because the shoulders slipped off every now and then - not a huge issue!

links_Review_Title: Super flattering but definitely runs small
links_Review_Text: Love how this dress looks, the neckline and bodice are incredibly flattering! That being said, would consider sizing up (especially if you have bigger boobs) because the elastic bodice is TIGHT.

I just loved this dress! It was really the perfect dress for a wedding I attended. I felt comfortable and beautiful in it, and got so many compliments. I could have worn either the small or medium, but decided to go with the small for a tighter fit. I didn't want to return it! I highly recommend this lovely dress!

I can't even begin to explain how much I loved this dress. Can be easily dressed down to work/day or dress up for party/wedding. It was so comfortable and flattering that I even bought it! I am a righty and my right shoulder did fall a few times over the several hours of wear, but I loved the dress so much I didn't even care. loved that I didn't have to wear a bra with it and the material in the chest helped keep the girls in place. 100% recommend renting/buying :)

I had so much fun wearing this dress. The elastic smocking at the top is really nice--I didn't have to wear a bra, but felt fully supported all night. It's forgiving on the waistline as well. The sleeves didn't stay perfectly in place when I moved around (they slipped off my shoulders), but it wasn't unbearable. I would rent this again.
I love love love this dress. It was perfect for a daytime lunch date and an evening dinner. It got lots of positive feedback. It is sooo flattering. I highly recommend
Love the stretchy top and the side slit- was his dress can go from day to night easily and is so comfortable!

links_Review_Title: Compliments all night for this fun dress!!
links_Review_Text: Wore this to my company and got so many compliments on it! The material is tiny below the chest and down the stomach but it wasn't uncomfortable. The only thing keeping me from rating it 5 stars were the sleeves.. I had one sleeve that kept slipping off. Other than that fantastic!
fit and length was great for me. felt a little over dressed for the outing but who cares. Loved every minute of it.

The sleeves on top were a little tight and naturally wanted to hang down but I'm a 32C and the small fit my chest perfectly. The slit on the leg is pretty discreet. Got so many compliments and felt so fun in it.

I love how the entire bodice is stretchy but doesn't look cheap. I'm usually a 0 or 2 but when it's another reformation dress that doesn't have a smocked top, I have to get a 4! Because of the stretch, I had so much more flexibility. I loved the slit in the dress and the length as well. SO CUTE!!!!!!! Rented this for a rehearsal dinner.

I love everything about the look of this dress and it works for fall, winter, and spring. I was disappointed that it arrived with what appeared to be a big glue stain on the bottom but was able to peel most of it off. The sleeves fall off your shoulders and it didn't stay up otherwise I would have bought it. Still, I am definitely renting again!

Loved loved loved this dress!! Wore it in the daytime with booties since it was chilly but you could easily dress it up with heels for a nighttime look. I haven't returned it yet because I'm not ready to give it up and need to wear it again!

I wore this dress to a live podcast show in NYC and loved it! Got compliments by the hosts and others. Reformation has a tendency to run small but the smocking makes this dress more TTS. I didn't have to wear a bra with this dress, which was awesome and it was double lined so it had good weight even with the longer slits on the sides. I'll definitely be renting this again!
Love this!

Absolutely love this dress. Wore it to work and a friends party and it was super comfy. Hard to find long dresses I like being petite, so this is great. Definitely size up for anything from reformation.
Would definitely rent this again. Wore on vacation in Mexico City and it was perfect.
One of the most flattering dresses I've rented on RTR
Loved this dress, wore it to work, to dinner, and for a casual weekend outing, but be aware that it's quite tight in the smocked areas (wrists and chest)
Fit perfectly. Sleeves were great length, my first size fit perfect according to the Reformation size chart ( refer to the chart and do your measurements)

Loveeeeeeee this dress so much. It was so flattering! The smocking in the bodice was flattering to my bust area, gave them a nice lift, while managing to squeeze my tummy in at the same time. The cinching of the smocking and wear it hit on the body kept my posture in check too. I was worried the smocking would irritate my skin, but it didn't at all. I loved the sleeves as well as I'm not crazy about my upper arms at the moment (WORKING ON IT). Although, I had to use fashion tape to keep the shoulder from falling. I ate, danced, and sat comfortably all night.
Obsessed with this dress but SIZE UP. I wear a 4/6 and the large was quite snug, medium would've been unwearable. Paired with sneakers for work and with sandals for an engagement party - recommend!

Wore this to a February wedding and had a lot of fun in it! The bodice was tight but comfy. I normally wear a small top but I'm glad I ordered the medium, my only complaint was the sleeves fell sometimes but it was manageable!

links_Review_Title: Sexy but not fussy. Loved it. Wore it to my partner’s work party and felt comfortable but cute.
links_Review_Text: Fits snugly so get a back up size up just in case. I have narrow shoulders and small ribcage so sm was good but just barely!
Soooooo dreamy and romantic. You can dress it up or down. Love this dress!
Loved this! Simple and could dress up or down!

Loved this dress, want to buy it! Able to dress up or down, sexy but not revealing. Does run small. I am a 6-8, and ordered the large and x-large. I could not notice a difference between the sizes on or laying flat. I wore the large and was very comfortable, smocking is fitted and bra not necessary.
Loved this dress. Slipped it right on with black tights and immediately felt ready to party!

links_Review_Title: This perfect was perfect for a barn wedding. It was quite cold so I wore it with tights and boots.
links_Review_Text: It fit perfectly! I chose the LR because it was less tight on my stomach.
this dress is comfortable and cute! lots of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Was a perfect dress for a rehearsal dinner!
links_Review_Text: Great fit for a fall southern wedding!
The elastic at the shoulders is loose and kept falling down, but the fit was great otherwise!

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress. I wore it 3-4 pregnant and it was SO CUTE!
links_Review_Text: I don't think I could have worn it too much longer because the top is so tight. However, that was a blessing in disguise since you have to wear a strapless bra with this anyway! So cute!

Very cute details. The smocking made this dress comfortable. However, the sleeves were not very secure. Be read for that if you have slightly sloping shoulders like myself. The sleeves were also a bit warped from the hanger when i received it

After wearing this dress 10+ times, I just went ahead and purchased it. I love the fit and style and it can be casual with sneakers and more formal with heels - I've worn it around the city to work meetings and then to a cocktail party all in the same day.
Comfortable dress. Got many compliments

One of my favorite Ref rentals! The material is a little scratchy but other than that it was a hit. The high slit offsets the cute prairie shoulders and I was able to wear a regular bra. Would rent again to wear with boots.

links_Review_Title: Flowy & Flirty - Lots of Wears & Compliments!
links_Review_Text: Love a dress that works for petite girls! If you're thinking about wearing this to work/somewhere more reserved I would consider sizing up if you're a C cup + and/or if you're taller than 5'5 because the slit is pretty high. I'm 5'2 and a 34B - I kept the top part up high so my tits weren't out and the slit was conservative enough to wear to work. Only annoying thing is the sleeves fell down every now and again but not often enough to be a deal breaker. That might not be an issue for taller girls. Super Versatile with sneakers, booties, or heels. I paired with the Dannijo Lucky Star Moon Hoops and got so many compliments on both!

links_Review_Title: Great for a quarantine pick me up photoshoot sesh!
links_Review_Text: I was so tempted to buy this one and only didn't because it's such a memorable statement piece.
LOVE this dress and will rent again! Comfortable and cute! Easy to dance in and made me feel so adorable and special!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful, flattering and functional for post partum
links_Review_Text: I rented this for my son's brit and it was the perfect dress. It fit wonderfully, was very flattering for my one week post partum figure and the button down front allowed for easy nursing access. Loved it, would definitely rent again
Pretty fabric and received many compliments. It is very baggy so I used a thin navy colored belt to create a waist.
I loved this dress and got tons of compliments. Fun but classy! Perfect dress to dress up or down

links_Review_Title: Very comfortable semi-formal dress depending how you dress it
links_Review_Text: I wish i got this one size down, it ran large that's why i added the belt. I usually wear an 8 if it's loose and a 10 if it's a tighter dress just because i have a very large butt. I wore it with tall shoes because, like i said, little large and was able to shorten it by pulling the top half up. Would rent again, just go for a smaller size. Very comfortable!

It hangs on your body so it does run a little large. I normally am a small but glad I ordered a x small just so it fits on my body just a little bit more. Very pretty and sparkly. No sparkles came off either! Lots of compliments!

Loved this dress, wore it for my winter birthday with black tights and boots. It's super comfortable and easy to dance in, but it is low cut so I couldn't wear a bra but it worked fine with stick ons.
This was so easy to throw on for my company holiday party. I think it would look good on a lot of body types. I got tons of compliments on it!

links_Review_Title: Would wear again and again and again
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress so much! It was comfortable and super flattering. I wish I owned it! Sometimes I order a size up just because I don't want things to be too tight or short, but the small fit perfect!

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress! Definitely more glittery and gold in person but overall very fun to wear.
links_Review_Text: The dress is stretchy and comfortable and the pleating in the front gives you a little extra room. The V is pretty deep so I would recommend wearing sticky boobs or a low-cut bra. I am 5'4 and the XS fit great. Hit a couple inches above the knee and wasn't too long or short. I wore it with black tights and black heeled boots for a more winter-y look. The pictures online might make the colors look a little muted but don't be fooled. The dress is pretty gold in person and glitters under the lights/with flash (not gaudy or too flashy tho!) Loved the dress. Would say fits TTS.
The dress was flowing yet fitted in all the right places - especially great for anyone conscious about their middle weight!
this dress was super comfortable, went on easy, and was very flattering. easily dressy, but can be dressed down as well for a weekend night! might buy at next rental...
Really wanted to like this but the saggy busy is very unflattering so I only wore once.

links_Review_Title: Rent this it's a show stopper
links_Review_Text: Wore this for a wedding got heaps of compliments I love it! Will rent again. Super comfy and cute great for dancing and looking classy.
Very comfy very cute!! I loved it. The perfect amount of glam with the metallic - not too much. For someone a little more petite than me, I would size down to an XS

I really wanted to like this for my birthday dinner, but it was much too large around the midsection. I think it should be cinched just a little more. Strangely, it was also too short while being too boxy. Would work better on someone with larger hips, but then I think that person would need to size up to accommodate for length.
It was a cute dress, nothing to write home about. Looks classy, and pretty thick, quality fabric with dark and gold accents.

Was a tad large - could have worn the small. Super stretchy, flattering, not too short. The only issue I had was the plunge neck rubbed against my chest and hurt after a while. The material is very scratchy so the inseam was uncomfortable on my naked skin! otherwise was a very pretty dress!
Wore on Christmas Eve for dinner with family. Cute with tights and booties.

links_Review_Title: Super flattering, fun and a little sexy
links_Review_Text: I loved this dress! I ended up wearing the small for the slightly smaller bust but the medium would have worked too. It's fitted enough to be flattering and flowy enough to hide all the Christmas cookies I ate 😋

This was one of the easiest / most confidence building pieces I wore in 2019! Highly recommend for any body type (w/ tights at your discretion) for a holiday/winter/sparkly party! (The sparkles are actually more subtle than you think!)

links_Review_Title: Ended up wearing this as a shirt at one point!
links_Review_Text: Wore this around the house during WFH and enjoyed its straight, loose, low-cut camisole style. Looking to pattern mix (well aware that this print comes as a tank that I may have to try in the future!), I ended up enjoying this dress just as much when styled as a shirt tucked into a thin silk Equipment skirt. Strongly recommended for any other loose low-cut cami lovers as myself!
Beautiful color it just did nothing for me

TTS but I didn’t end up wearing . The concept was interesting - sweetheart neckline, ties on the sleeves & ruching on front - but it didn't work for me. The ruching, which was not adjustable, made it bunch up both in front & back. On someone with an Athletic or Straight & Narrow frame, this might help to add curves?
The dress fits so well. The style is flirty and sophisticated at the same time. I wore it to my company holiday party but this could work for many different occasions.

i love all the details of the dress. it's actually a plus size dress, so i got XXXS and it fits me perfectly. hugs hip, and shoes the neckline. very attempted to purchase this --- as Rodarte usually only does couture and runs for thousands dollar per dress.

links_Review_Title: Lovely dress but not meant for average size women.
links_Review_Text: Was way too loose to wear without looking sloppy - for this size at least.

I'm closer to a 14 than a 16, but this dress in S (14/16) was huge. Like almost everything else it's made for a super tall person, but also it's kind of baggy. Would probably look more straight cut than curve hugging even if I sized down--like it's meant to be sort of flowy maybe but I don't think that makes sense for the style of the dress. My bust and hips are both 44" and going off of US's size chart this shouldn't have been so big. Also hated the material, seemed cheap.

links_Review_Title: Hideous but customer service was amazing.
links_Review_Text: Ugh. Pretty disappointed in the way the neckline on this dress was cut. The material and fabric also looked and felt pretty cheap. I described it as a show choir dress when I put it on. The large was huge and the xs fit but good grief it was and ugly dress on my body. Not sure how this would look on other women but I would caution if you have a large chest. Also, the ties were...er...confusing. Of course, customer service was, as always, really helpful and amazing in making this all better.
There was just too many strings, the length was too long and it just was not flattering
Very cute and comfortable. I would advise to wear a strapless bra because the straps will peak through.

This dress fit wonderfully, except the arms, on which I couldn't really get the hang of all the drawstrings. I like asymmetry and the flamenco style skirt, but the material of this dress was too thin/delicate to be casual, while the cut almost felt "club" like. Nothing really "wrong with it," but it felt like a mash up of too many things for a simple LBD, which is what I was seeking in the rental.

links_Review_Title: Rented it for a date, but I unfortunately got the size wrong.
links_Review_Text: I'm a size 10-sometimes-12 and unfortunately I was swimming in the XSR (US 10-12). For a proper fitted look with this dress, SIZE DOWN. Other than that, I loved the shape and the fabric is great quality. I'd order it again in a smaller size for the next date night.
Fits tight around the butt area. True to size no matter what anyone says! I always wear an XS and I got that and it fits perfectly.
Loved this jumpsuit. Only down side is it wrinkled very easily.

links_Review_Title: I wore this to a music festival and got tons of compliments! Love the color
links_Review_Text: Other reviews are accurate. It does fit a little snug in the hips so recommend going a size up and the fabric is stiff, but once you move around a bit, the fabric loosens and it's really comfortable

links_Review_Title: Wrinkled. Beautiful color and nice fit after sizing up.
links_Review_Text: This arrived extremely wrinkled - I had to press. The fit was perfect after sizing up. Normally a size 8 and wore an XLR. I wore a strapless bra and the jumpsuit held the girls fine (I am a 34 DDD.). Received lots of compliments.
I'm busty, short and curvy. The straps on most items are too long for me, but that's ok. I loved this jumpsuit. My boyfriend loved it too. It's revealing when you're chesty.
I'm usually an XS or Small and the Small was perfect. No bra needed and I almost always need a bra. Not the most flattering in pics but I got a ton of compliments. Super comfortable to dance in.

I sized up in this a little bit which allowed for the top to fit better. The tie does make it adjustable. I would say the waist was too large but there is another piece of material that ties around like a belt. I did not get any good standup photos to share, but I thought it was cute enough to wear around our resort on our honeymoon! Fun color and print, It felt casual and cool :)

This jumpsuit is on the smaller size and was definitely a bit small in the bust, but the tie allowed me to adjust it as needed. Super comfortable and got lots of compliments! I was debating whether or not to buy, but ended up deciding it was too expensive. Highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: Showed more busy than I Like
links_Review_Text: Tight at the top. 145 pounds and 38dd. Xl just fit.

links_Review_Title: Just didn't fit right. Not adjustable. Straps too long for a short person.
This was really cute. I wish I could have worn it.
links_Review_Text: This was really cute. I wish I could have worn it. The length was ok for my 5'3'' frame but the chest was so small there was no way I could zip this up. I don't think I could have even gotten a large to fit. It fit fine everywhere else, just a bummer they didn't fit this for a woman with any sort of chest, I'm only a 34B.
Perfect for my height! Straps are not adustabable but they fit great. The print is so fun and the front tie is easy to work with. Can't wait to wear this on my cruise! Size up, I normally wear a M!
Very comfortable! To many ties! Go up a size!

links_Review_Title: Would have been beautiful if it hadn't seen the dry cleaner 100 times
links_Review_Text: Nice fit, comfortable. Needed to be ironed when it arrived. Only downside is it had been worn 100 times so colors had faded a little. Didn't look very fresh
Comfortable and cute. Perfect day outfit for Miami. Love.
It fit fine and was very cute but the torso was SUPER small. Didn't wear and returned

This was a nice jumpsuit unfortunately it didn't fit me right. Was tight in the waist area and couldn't zip all the way. Going a size up I think would have been too big. But it's nice and Colton great for vacation if it fits you right.

This was one of my favorite rentals to date. I rented it honestly not expecting much, but the fit is just great. You can get away without wearing a bra. My boyfriend that never has any comments about my clothing loved it as well. The straps were a bit long so i safety pinned them and threw a denim jacket over it for a more casual look. Will definitely rent again. Would purchase if it wasn't so pricey!!

links_Review_Title: Best jumpsuit -- so comfy and stylish
links_Review_Text: Loved this jumpsuit - wore it for a vacation. I have a long torso and a butt and usually, jumpsuits are tight in those areas, but this fit so perfectly.

links_Review_Title: Too short in the torso and not adjustable.
links_Review_Text: Too short in the torso - so it gives me a wedgie and looks awful. Not wearable.
I felt so cute in this! and i didn't need to wear a bra because of how the front ties - it's super supportive.

This was fun to wear but I really don't understand the front waist ties. Runs very small in my opinion- usually 10/12 with hips and bigger thighs and it fit just right but I had to wear on the first vacation day to ensure it still fit.
This was so pretty. I really wanted to wear but I'm tall.... it was short.... small is my size... if I go up to medium it will be too loose.
This runs so small - I couldn't even zip it

links_Review_Title: This dress perfectly complemented my sister’s wedding in the woods.
links_Review_Text: I am super short so the tea length dress was actually floor length on me but it worked out perfectly! I got a ton of compliments on how unique the dress was on the dance floor

links_Review_Title: Obsessed! Gorgeous intricate detail and super flattering fit.
links_Review_Text: I am a 0 to 2, and the 2R fit well. I am 5'1 and had 3-inch heels on to make this work. But this is the most gorgeous dress (other than my wedding dress) I have worn. I am going to buy it - I can't part with it! The moment my husband saw me in it, he told me I had to keep it. We wore it for an at-home date night during COVID-19 because the wedding I rented it for was canceled. It was a fun and special night for us and the compliments I got from people on social media from the photos were abundant. I can't imagine what they'd say in person!! There is definitely a bit of wiring in the bodice that does stick you in the side on occasion, but I am going to fix it since I will be keeping.

I am obsessed with this dress. Pros: It is the PERFECT dress for renting because it's super interesting/memorable but you probably wouldn't want to wear it again after everyone has seen it. The wedding I was going to was supposed to be more formal but then got dressed down. This still worked because of the laidback silhouette and shear bottom. Cons: straps were a bit big and kept falling off. I have this issue a lot though so maybe it's me and not so much the dress. Was a bit long, too.
Wore this as a wedding guest and everyone sent compliments all night. I'm 22 weeks pregnant and this dress fit me is all of the right places. Wish I could hav slept it forever!

links_Review_Title: Fabulous and fun for a Mexican wedding!
links_Review_Text: LOVED this colorful dress! I rented this dress for a wedding in Mexico and got so many compliments - it truly was a great dress for the occasion. Ordered the 14R and 12R (backup). While the 12R fit well, I chose the 14R (to be more comfortable and limit any pouches). Very fun dress to twirl the night away in!

links_Review_Title: Wish I could've kept this dress forever!
links_Review_Text: Obsessed with this dress! I had been eyeing it on RTR for a while, and finally had an event come up to wear it too (black tie optional wedding). The colors and embroidery were beautiful and it felt so unique! So many compliments. It was also pretty comfortable. My top half is usually a 2/4 and my bottom half is usually a 6. I got the 4R and 6R, ended up wearing the 4. The 6 was a little loose on top. Usually a 4 would be too tight on my bottom half, but this one fit great!

I am 5' 8" and 170ish. I've got a smaller waist and larger bust/hips, and this fit me like a glove. I wore a strapless bra with tall undies underneath, so the corset didn't chafe at all. The corset helped hold everything up well. I was very comfortable and got a ton of compliments.

Love the embroidery, florals, and length! It does run a bit small in the chest and waist. The chest is very low cut, I couldn't wear a strapless bra with it. The straps kept slipping as well, not sure why! The waist has bodice type wires all around and they were poking through and killing me all night! I tried mole skin to help but they kept poking through 😥 But, beauty is pain!!! 💕💕💕 Gorgeous Gorgeous Gorgeous!

links_Review_Title: Constant compliments - perfect for a spring formal
links_Review_Text: I rented this dress to attend a City Hall wedding on Valentines Day. I needed something formal, but wanted an option that had personality - not your typical floral dress. The dress fit perfect, and the embroidery is next-level beautiful. My only complaint was that the plastic boning of the bodice (I didn't need to wear a bra, it stayed up all day) started to poke through the lining of the dress . I stuck some fashion tape over those spots and it made it more comfortable. LOVED IT!

The floral embroidery is gorgeous and the colors are beautiful. It is very flattering and incredibly eye catching. The ribbing in the bodice can be uncomfortable at times, but not too bad. The straps are not adjustable, so having a longer torso makes it more comfortable. Would definitely wear again!
I got so many compliments. It was great for a wedding or formal event.

Great dress for tropical gala! The bust is small, which worked for me, but is probably why others needed the next size up. The boning on the left side is coming out so pokes a bit. Loved the bottom half - short skirt covered by sheer longer black skirt

I wore this dress to officiate my brother's destination wedding and got a ton of compliments! The embroidery detail is beautiful and loved that I didn't need to wear a bra. Note this is semi-sheer, with a slip that comes to the knees. I'm just over 5'1", 125 lbs and I needed two wear 2-inch heels to keep this from dragging on the ground. The A-line cut was very flattering - I'm hour-glass shaped with wider hips. Would rent again!

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress - I wanted to keep it!
links_Review_Text: The fit was great - very flattering. I did wear 1 size up from what I normally wear, but I was between sizes. It was very comfortable and so many people asked me about it. Looked great for a black tie wedding! Would rent it again.

This dress was my replacement when my original dress didn't fit and it was absolutely stunning! It fit pretty well, may run a little small I got a larger size than usual and it fit great. The straps do fall down they're not adjustable but it was fine. The dress is so beautiful and I got a lot of compliments! It is very forgiving and hides any little areas you may not want highlighted. I would recommend this for hourglass body types.

links_Review_Title: This dress was a DREAM! It was so comfortable and perfect!
links_Review_Text: I received SO many compliments in this dress! It was so comfortable. I usually ALWAYS have to wear a bra, and I didn't! It has wire built into the top so you don't move around, it's great! The length was right above my ankles and just overall it was a total hit!

Okay so I loved this dress!! I'm 5'4, 32a, 120lbs and this dress was a ~little~ tight in my stomach area. I'd suggest sizing up if you have similar measurements. BUT overall I loved this dress. It twirled beautifully and photographed wonderfully. I didn't feel the metal rubbing against my skin so I guess it varies on how often the dress has been worn. It came up to my ankle so my heels were showing. Just be mindful in case you want something longer or even shorter. Rent this dress!
Really cute and I got allot of compliments on the pattern.

links_Review_Title: Perfect dress for a formal winter wedding!
links_Review_Text: I absolutely loved this dress! I wore it for a black tie winter wedding, and it was perfect. I received so many compliments on it throughout the night! Super unique and fun.

Definitely wanted to keep this one! How beautiful the design was, super easy to wear and flattering! If you are a little on the shorter side this will be full length or basically there. Received so many compliments, a fun alternative to the normal black dress!

Holy compliments!! This dress was a hit at a fancy wedding in NYC. I sized up one so I could leave room for wedding cake ;) Also, other reviews complained of the metal boning being too sharp so I decided to not take the chance with the size smaller. Short girls beware, though! I'm 5'3" and if I hadn't worn heels, the bottom of the dress would've been toast. All said and done, this was an incredible, no bra, statement dress!

This dress is absolutely stunning. I received so many compliments on it, I want to rent it for another wedding! It is extremely flattering and was comfortable too! It was a little big up top, but I made it work!

I usually wear a size 8 but this dress fit a little snug around the top (so I went with the 10R) but otherwise very comfortable. Received so so many compliments!! Wanted to make a statement and this dress did that.

Gorgeous dress, loved the floral overlay, got lots of compliments! My boyfriend said it was "a summer dress" but all the girls complimented it, so what does he really know anyway. The boning came out from bottoms and middle part of the top and poked me a lot (I wore shapewear to help with that.)
The only con about this dress was the little plastic wires poked through a little. Other than that, everything was PERFECT!!!!
I loved this dress and did not want to return it. I felt comfortable and glamorous at the same time. The dress flowed beautifully. I would def rent again. Quite possibly my fav rental ever!

The embroidery on this dress is absolutely amazing! The inside wiring was poking out but I used some basic athletic tape to cover up where it poked out and didn't feel a poke once the whole night. It fit perfectly and was very comfortable. I definitely recommend this dress if you want to make a statement!!

Went up a size from my normal 8 to 10 because upper back wouldn't zip. I'm 5'8 165 with a D chest. Got so many compliments and dress met my requirements- could wear a a strapless bras easily, it was comfortable to dance and walk in, and the print stood out. Very flattering- highly recommend.

Excellent choice as I wore this for a SoCal October wedding that was outdoors. The fit was great for anyone with a larger bust, no bra needed but I was held in and up just fine. Length was perfect and got lots of compliments on it!
This dress is so unique and intricate, I got so many compliments and felt great all night!

This dress is gorgeous! I got so many compliments on it. I wore it to an October wedding and it was perfect. So much fun twirling around in it. The size 8 fit perfectly but because of my height (6'2") the straps weren't long enough and they were way too tight so I went with the 10. It has a belt so you couldn't even tell it was a little too big on the top. Fun dress to wear for the night!!
I was a little worried about the length of this dress since I'm 5'0 but it fell perfectly with heels! So beautiful for a black tie wedding. I received so many compliments.

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on this dress and it was a blast to dance in!
links_Review_Text: I could've used a size up, but I added spanx and opted out of a bra to make the 6 fit more comfortably. Straps aren't adjustable, which wasn't an issue for me but something important to note. I wish I could buy this dress and wear it every day ...it was amazing.
I sized up based on reviews and it was too big. It's true to size. I'm 5'2"ish and the regular fit perfectly to the ground with 3 inch heels.
Loved loved this dress!! I am a 6'4 female and it fit me perfectly and wasn't an awkward length! Such a unique dress and got a ton of compliments!

This dress is gorgeous! Some reviews about the bones said they were uncomfortable but I didn’t find it uncomfortable at all. The under skirt provided plenty of coverage and didn’t rise on me which is hard to find because I’m curvy! I wore a strapless bra but I think I could have gotten away with not wearing but I liked the extra coverage. My only complaint is that it was a little long on me and my stiletto heels kept catching on the dress when I walked but I just held it a bit which was a little annoying. Looking back I would have worn different shoes. I would recommend walking in the dress and shoes around the house if you’re short to make sure the shoes won’t catch on the dress. Other than that no complaints and I would definitely rent again! I’m 5’2 138 lbs for reference and ordered a size 6 which fit perfect!

Was SO sad when I had to return this dress! It is so beautiful, fits like a glove and is actually very comfortable! My only "complaint" is that the straps are not adjustable and one fell off my shoulder a few times, but never reached the point where it became a big problem. I would recommend ordering this a little in advance. When I went to pick it up, the woman told me that this dress can be hard to get because everyone wants it!

This dress is absolutely gorgeous, the type of dress where random strangers in NYC stop you and tell you how good you look! It is flattering and I felt confident and beautiful! The embroidery is breathtaking (much more beautiful is real life) and the colors were so much fun to play with. I did a red lip and yellow nails and it all pulled together perfectly! However, I was in this dress from 2PM until 2AM, and by the end of the night the boning in the sides of the dress had rubbed me raw! I would definitely recommend trying in your size and the next size up to avoid the pain of the sides of the dress. Unfortunately, the next size up was not available, so I just dealt with the pain. I am only taking away 1 star because I still loved the dress and am glad I rented it, even though there is residual pan!

links_Review_Title: I received so many compliments!!!! Love this dress
Perfect for a Bat Mitzvah party
Great for the girls with the bass....
links_Review_Text: Great fit - I wear a 36 A , small to med tops but medium pants (6/8). Wore to casino party and got lots of compliments!!
This dress is comfortable and stretchy, but that is also the con. You must wear a shaper to smooth those curves.

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress and tons of compliments! I sized up just Incase and should have gone with a medium.

links_Review_Text: The most chic and comfortable dress ever!
Love this dress super comfortable and beautiful details. A little long for a petite woman but if you wear nude heels it works!

links_Review_Title: Showstopper dress in cold Park City
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress to our film premiere at Sundance. It was perfect for a chilly day to night and I paired it with chunky boots. It was warm, fitted and felt awesome. I could see this working for a broad range of events and weather conditions. Would rent again!
This beautiful Alexis dress is true to size and hugs your curves perfectly.

Rented this "Show Stopper" for a wedding, and it did not disappoint! Comes with a light slip under that stayed put, and the length was perfect- falling a little under the knees. Paired it with animal print Louboutins and received compliments all evening. You can comfortably wear your shape wear under if needed, but the dress defines your body well without any. I highly recommend this dress for any formal events you are invited too; you will feel confident and comfortable.

I wore this dress on NYE and to the opera. It's very flattering and comfortable. The color is stunning. I really enjoyed this rental, got tons of compliments. The slip straps can be easily adjusted and the slip doesn't ride up.
I LOVE this dress! Rented it for a gala and ended up wearing it to another gala 2 days later. Very comfortable AND flattering. Comes with a slip which is nice. So many compliments!

links_Review_Title: Fabulous look. Fantastic fit. Compliment factory. Great in cold.
links_Review_Text: Doesn't run small, but it's a fitted style. Nice that it has a red slip dress for underneath. Really beautiful. Wore with Spanx tights so I could still eat a big dinner. :) All my friends fell in love with it and kept asking the brand. Long sleeves are great if it's for a cooler occasion where you don't want to be sleeveless. Prettier in person, even though it's great in photos. Definitely rent; you'll love it.

I'm usually a small/6, so I rented the S with a M backup. Ended up going with the S for a tighter/sexier look. The dress is gorgeous and the slip worked great. I didn't need any spanx- it was tight enough and there were no lumps. The sleeves drove me nuts at first until I realized it's 3/4 sleeve. The ruffles were very flattering and I got tons of compliments. Would definitely buy!

links_Review_Title: Great material, great fit, great color, great style
links_Review_Text: This dress is super flattering! I have an hourglass-shaped body, and the fit was a little tight since I have a larger chest, but it still looked amazing.
Super flattering and warm - great for the winter!

links_Review_Title: holy CRAP is this dress HOT!
links_Review_Text: I am usually a size medium, but with how form-fitting this dress looked I opted to size up - which was a wise choice! This is by far the sexiest dress I've ever worn and I absolutely LOVE it! I wish I could give 500 stars - this ensemble is to die for - really accentuates your every curve!

Rented this with my unlimited and ended up not wearing because I also rented another Alexis dress that I decided to wear instead. I just love this brand. Fits so true to size and so flattering. This dress does have a lot going on with the ruffles and pointelle and fishnet. As long as you feel you can pull that off - rent this dress. I would definitely rent it again for another occasion.
Fit small and didn't sit well. Had a fun time in it anyway!

links_Review_Title: Loved the style but wish I didn't size up
links_Review_Text: I sized up based off of reviews but wish I stayed with my original size - the dress was a little too long and loose-fitting in some places. Since there is ruching at the waist, I was able to fold in some of the fabric to make the length less awkward. Other than that, loved this dress! Esp the puff sleeve detail!
Fits great. Perfect with sneakers and heels

links_Review_Title: Wore this to an "industry"-type party in LA during Grammy Weekend 2020.
links_Review_Text: Loved the "punk" look of this dress. Sleeves were a bit too exaggerated for my liking (that's just personal preference though), so I paired it with a leather jacket. Ruching was super flattering to the stomach, but was a little baggier down lower by the crotch. I couldn't tell if this was because the fit had loosened because I'd been dancing for a while in a packed (i.e. hot) area, or if it meant I should have ordered the Size 4. (Honestly though, I don't think I would've been able to zip a Size 4 up over me lol, and if I had been able to, it likely would've been too short/skimming my butt).
another perfect dress fro tanya taylor, love the plaid for holidays but still a stand out cut
Ruching was flattering. If you are between sizes - go for larger if slightly pear shaped.

Between the volume on the shoulders and festive plaid I loved this dress. Next time I rent, I'd probably order a size up (2). I'm usually in between 0 and 2 because my top half is petite but my bottom half is round. This caused the dress to be too short for a work event but passable for a night out.

links_Review_Title: Great dress, but not so comfortable
links_Review_Text: I got lots of compliments all night, and it looked nice. I love short dresses, but it's very, very short. Also, it's very tight around the ribcage. I felt like it didn't necessarily flatter my least favorite area (stomach). I wouldn't buy it, but I'm glad I rented it.
Could have sized down since I wore tights but just a fun and easy dress. Really loved it!
Wore to a Christmas party....fit a little snug around the booty but was baggy around my back- however, received tons of compliments

Wore this to a parade vip event for corporate sponsors. It's hot in Texas so it was nice to wear something festive that was also light. If you're somewhere cooler it could easily be layered, no problems. Dress is pretty fitted through the mid section all the way down through the hips. If you have wide hips or a booty you may want to consider sizing up, I did feel like I had to keep pulling it down.

I'm a curvy girl and this dress had a great mix of girly details like rushing and puffy sleeve with cute flounce in the skirt hem. The material is more like a dress shirt so it wrinkles quite a bit. It looked more edgy with a leather moto jacket than worn alone. I would recommend. Length was good if your comfortable with dresses above the knee.

I am a pretty true 4 but got a 6 based on reviews and i'm glad I did. It fit perfectly and was such a fun flattering piece. I was nervous it would be a bit much because of the pattern but it wasn't at all. I loved it!

links_Review_Title: Super cute and stylish. Paired with sheer tights and doc martens :)
links_Review_Text: Was almost too short for work. Would suggest sizing up

Rented this dress for work/everyday. Loving the plaid trend this fall and this dress didn't disappoint. It has A LOT going on....puffed sleeves, rutched skirt, ruffles and plaid.....and somehow it all works! It was long enough for the office, but short enough to transition to dinner/drinks. It is not stretchy so if in between sizes definitely go up - I rented the 2 (usually wear 0-2) and it fit great. Highly recommend to spice up your closet :)

Great Fall Dress! I am 10 weeks pregnant and didn't realize I had a bump but this dress defiantly emphasized it! Or maybe it's just because the picture was take after a big dinner.... regardless, the ruching will show off what ever your have going on there!
Loved this dress for work!
Tight in the stomach, but the ruffles make it still flattering. Love the print. Definitely will be very short on taller girls. This dress definitely stands out and I received a lot of compliments!
Loved this. Perfect fall dress. I wear size 6-10 so i never know what's what and the 10 worked well.
The only thing is a lil extra fabric right behind the neck area.

Such a cute style and SO flattering! One of the most flattering dresses I've ever rented, but I felt like a Christmas present in this plaid pattern/color. Runs true to size, was a teeny bit short for my long legged 5'9" frame, but I wore it to work without a second thought because it was so cute.

links_Review_Title: Super cute dress, but for very slender frames, not curvy ones; sadly, I couldn't wear it.
links_Review_Text: The dress is very cute and well made. But it has zero stretch/give in the fabric. I am a true size 8/Medium and am 5'8" tall. I have a full chest and curvy waist/hips. It was not a good fit for a curvy figure. A straight figure would probably look great in this, but it's definitely not for anyone with any curves at all. Unfortunately I couldn't wear it.
It does run small I am a 6 and typically a 6 in Tanya Taylor but glad I got the second size in an 8! Got a lot of compliments on it!

links_Review_Title: Simple and cute, great for work

links_Review_Text: Got compliments. Felt great.

links_Review_Title: So cute, and fit is so flattering.
links_Review_Text: Runs true to size. I got so many compliments on this! So flattering, girly, and cute. It is on the shorter side of length and I'm only 5'2". But I loved it and wish I could own it.
The dress has cute details. The material is a lighter cotton and required slight ironing before wear.

links_Review_Title: I love this dress but it came a little shrunk!
links_Review_Text: It is a great dress but too short! I think it may have shrunk from being dry cleaned.
Wore w leggings and booties and got compliments. It's a fun dress to wear. I'm usually a 8-10 and the 10 fit comfortably. The 8 would have been snug in the torso (my problem area).
If you're between a 4 and 6 get a 6 because it's pretty short. Lots of compliments and can be dressed up or down.

I had a lot of hope for this one but it just didn't work out. Definitely don't size up. I had tons of extra fabric in the waist that kind of just hung into the pleated ruffle at the bottom. Not flattering at all. Went right back with no wear.
I was between sizes but went with the dress that was a little more snug because it was more flattering overall. Complements all night.
Wore to my company holiday party and felt pretty trendy. Got many compliments. Fit true to size.

Runs a little short, so may be problematic if you're really tall, but I wore dark tights and high boots and it was great! The only negative is that the seam was a little itchy on the shoulder, but not enough of a problem to not rent again.

I was concerned about the reviews to size up, I always wear a 14 and this was true to size. I wore it with tights & black boots for family Thanksgiving dinner and received lots of compliments. The material was think so not too hot.

links_Review_Title: PLUS SIZE REVIEW - Sexy School Girl Done Right
links_Review_Text: PROS I felt comfortable throughout the day wearing this outfit. It was not short at all, and very much work length appropriate. My arms fit like a glove and covered all problem areas. CONS -None- HIGHLIGHTS -There is ruching in the front, but the pattern hides any tummy consciousness. I would definitely rent again.

The quality of the dress is fine. It is just really unflattering on a short, chubby woman. Shoulders looked huge, body looked extra wide. The ruching just sort of sagged at the top of the ruffled skirt - not cute.

links_Review_Title: Work party for my husband, dress was perfect.
links_Review_Text: I'm a 36C and a true size 6, this fit perfect. Very fitted with minimal stretch but fabric & lining were soft & I felt forgiving enough. Loved this for a cool Fall evening & worked great with boots which helped keep me warm. A great rental. Very on point with current fashion trends.
Loved this dress. It's just the right amount of edgy. Only con is that the fabric is thinner and cheaper than I was anticipating.
I wanted to love this and sized up from some of the reviews but it was much too big for me. I'm a 10 and ordered a 14. I might re order in a 10. It wasn't as cute as I hoped.

Midi length. Light weight fabric. Perfect for vacation. The tie in the front is low cut but the tighter you tie the bow, the move covered you are. I never felt on display. Still wondering if I should buy it because I loved it so much.
Super cute and fun. Rented for trip to Florida. This has a very low plunge neckline. Feel like if I had a big chest it might not work.
The bust was definitely more revealing than I thought but overall great dress
I didn't realize the material would be so breathable - it was perfect for vacation but still looked fancy. Loved the front detail - I used some boobs tape for extra lift.

This dress was beautiful but unfortunately it's just unnecessarily low cut and open. Luckily I wore it to a tropical island so it was semi acceptable, but I had to cover the front with my hair for pictures lol.

I rented this for a vacation in Mexico, and it was perfect for strolling downtown. The pattern and colors are beautiful. The x-small fit my waist (26 in) but I could have used more fabric in the bust.

links_Review_Title: Plunging neckline helps to make this less dowdy
links_Review_Text: This all cotton dress was perfect for walking around town-be careful if you have a big bust because the may fall out. The colors are striking IRL and the dress was easy to wear. It is great for camouflaging hips and tummy if you are worried about those areas
Sleeves were puffy and kept riding up, and my boobs aren't big enough. BUT I still feel beautiful in it. Went to a brewery and vineyard. It got kind of tight after a few beers and wine.

links_Review_Title: Pretty but not for bustier chests
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress that received compliments however I felt a little self conscious with just how much chest was showing. Definitely needed all the double stick tape!
Loved this dress! The print was beautiful, and the fabric was lightweight, which was great for a summer wedding. It has a very plunging neckline, so probably best for a smaller bust.
Fit was great added a tank that I had under bc it is low cut. Many compliments!
Great transitional dress from day to night that felt classy and sexy.

links_Review_Title: Very pretty but watch out for bust
links_Review_Text: Very pretty dress and forgiving for new mom bod HOWEVER was constantly adjusting my bust and was revealing too much. Thank god I had boob covers underneath

Fun and summery red and blue dress with gorgeous puff sleeves! Running true to size, I recommend sizing down as a backup (especially for short girls - I'm 5'3" - as this looked more like a maxi than a midi on me - loved it just the same). With a deep V you might want to use fashion tape to keep yourself in place although I don't think it's a necessity (I didn't). The top fit nicely and the puff sleeve had an elastic at the end to keep its shape. The waist down was very airy and comfortable. I styled it with black heed mules and simple jewelry to let the dress speak for itself! I wore this dress to a summer party and got tons of compliments - will rent again!

links_Review_Title: PERFECT for a smart-casual event. So many compliments!
links_Review_Text: The perfect blend of dressy and casual summer dress; would highly recommend!

links_Review_Title: Not made for girls with a chest
links_Review_Text: Dress was really pretty but the other reviewers on here were right and I should have listened- there is no way to appropriately wear this dress if you have a chest. It's wayy too low cut, and there's not enough fabric to tie it tighter and make it work. Not even in a sexy boobalicious way, it was just totally impractical. If you're pretty flat and like the severe low cut look then it could work for you!! Loved the colors.
I wore this dress to an outdoor concert and it was perfect. Just the right amount of boobage and light enough that I didn't melt! Would definitely wear again.

Flattering and unique dress. The front is quite low cut so may not be as easy to wear on larger chests. Dress is flowy and bright and can easily be dressed up or dressed down. Wore for a beachy wedding and received lots of compliments.

Wore this to an outdoor concert at a vineyard and it was perfect! Sizing I felt like the small was a little tight but the medium was to big. I went with the smaller version to make sure everything stayed in place. It does have a deep neck line which I loved but at times had to be careful to make sure nothing was falling out. I loved this summer dress and received so many compliments!

I love everything about this dress! the puffy sleeves and the soft shine to the fabric, the flow and the length, the deep cut tie front. I wore this twice in one week and will rent it again for vacation or something fun in the summer to dress it up.

links_Review_Title: Effortless chic dress up or down!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress, definitely low cut with a C-cup but manageable if you can wrangle the tie the right way. The large was slightly too big as I typically wear a s/m or a 4/6 but it still was great. Fabric is woven but decently breathable as I wore it all day in the sun. Loved loved and length was still tea length on me which I loved since I'm 5'4"

I loved this dress, it was perfect for a Memorial Day weekend wedding on Long Island. My only peeve with the dress was that it was much more revealing in the chest area than anticipated. I ordered the M and L and had to up the size so there would be a little more fabric to play with. Still loved it though!

A little snug in the chest area, I don't have a larger chest so I think that's why it worked for me. I can't imagine this working for someone with a much larger chest! It fit well everywhere else though

links_Review_Title: Not for new mom/post baby hips
links_Review_Text: This exaggerated areas that definitely didn't need extra attention. The pattern was cute and overall fit was comfortable, just not for me.

Love this dress! However I typically wear a size S and ordered a size M per the reviews. I should have gone with a S because the M was too big and low cut in the bust. Other than that, this is a favorite rental of mine!
I wore this dress to a wedding. It was so comfortable! I have a smaller chest but broad shoulders, so the top was a little loose. But honestly, so minor I didn't even notice. Highly would recommend!

links_Review_Title: Pretty print but sleeves didn't work for me
links_Review_Text: Liked the neckline but the puffy sleeves didn't look quite right on me. The fabric is very pretty however.

I rented this dress to wear on vacation in Mexico when it was 80+ degrees. It was perfect! Light and flowy, it was the perfect weight and look for exploring the city and staying comfortable. As others have said, the tie in front is a little awkward, but I ended up tying it around my bra and it was fine.
Cute, but very small around bustline

links_Review_Title: puffy sleeves & low cut but cute
links_Review_Text: This is the only dress I ended up wearing. The material is really nice and the pattern is beautiful in person. I put a cami underneath to make it work appropriate. It is more puffy on then pictured.

links_Review_Title: Chic, elegant, stands out. I LOVED IT. Got so many compliments.
links_Review_Text: The cleavage was hard to deal with. Had to use LOTS of boob tape.

links_Review_Title: This great was so comfortable and flattering!
links_Review_Text: I'm small chested so I didn't feel exposed. The tie in the front also made it a bit adjustable, which was great.

links_Review_Title: Casual and sexy, perfect for a night out in Tulum
links_Review_Text: Got lots of compliments, especially on the puffy sleeves. They were a fun contrast to the sexy deep v neckline.

links_Review_Title: Great dress. Like other reviews said, very low cut in the front.
links_Review_Text: If you're larger in the chest be aware- super low cut. I sized up from a medium to a larger and that was the right move, it runs small. Otherwise, very fun dress! Got a lot of compliments!
I love the fabric and the print and the fit of this dress but my boobs were so on display my husband told me to go change. If you are a dd or above, might not be the dress for you
Loved the fit! Pretty colors

links_Review_Title: Awesome dress, but a bit low cut!
links_Review_Text: This dress is beautiful, and fits extremely well. It is very low cut, though, and I didn't have the right bra with me to pull it off.

links_Review_Title: Small and high in the waist - size up

links_Review_Text: Besides being tight in the rib cage this dress was pretty close to perfect. I got a lot of compliments it's very eye catching and the colors are beautiful. I wish it had pockets but I guess you can't have everything
The dress looks different as it looks on the photo to me. I didn't like it much.

Loved this blouse. The details were lovely. I was unsure about the puffed sleeves but it was super flattering. The top is a bit low; good for going out or date night. If I wore for work I'd have to wear a cami underneath

links_Review_Title: Super fun for a night out!
links_Review_Text: The lower neckline is so fun for a night out! Loved the fit and would definitely rent again!
Top is tailored at the waist but super low cut - tank NOT optional even w hook and eye closure. Sleeves are beautiful and tie makes it interesting.

I rented this for work (my uniform is jeans and an interesting blouse). It's cut a little low but with a nice bra it looks great. The v-neck fastens with a hook and eye (the cut doesn't lend itself to an additional safety pin) and I would have rated 5 stars but the thread "eye" for the hook was ripped and I had to do a speedy repair to wear while kn vacation. Lesson learned--check the quality of your delivery before packing for a trip. Otherwise, perfectly delightful blouse with sweet details.
Runs a little big. I needed fashion tape and couldn't seem to tie front right...might've looked a little sloppy. Overall, a good work shirt. Got lots of compliments!

Sized one size down and it was perfect. I love this top!! Would potentially buy if not so expensive still. Fabric is beautiful and the colors are great. Cute with pants or a skirt. Definitely had to wear a cami underneath- would've been way way too low cut otherwise.
Love this shirt for work, however felt a bit more fall as opposed to summer. Has slight shoulder pads which I thought was cute but something to beware of.

links_Review_Title: Pretty, but does show some cleavage
links_Review_Text: It's brighter green than I expected by I got several compliments on it. It's a bit lower cut and shows a bit more cleavage than I'd normally prefer, but I'm typically very conservative so take that as you will. Overall a good rental.
Love this top. Wore it to a bbq and got so many compliments. Wore a bralette underneath and tucked front into high waisted jean shorts. Could be worn well with white jeans too.

The fit of this top was very flattering. I received a lot of compliments on it. You have to wear a cami underneath because the top will expose your boobs. Since I wore this to work I ensured I covered up. This could also be a very nice top for a date of night out. Will be renting again!
I thought this top was very flattering but it came already safety pinned - which I appreciated as it would have been too low cut without it.

links_Review_Title: Nice blouse but maybe should've gotten smaller size.
links_Review_Text: Comfortable and soft but I would've liked it better with a more shapely fit.

links_Review_Title: Great for St. Patrick's date night
links_Review_Text: Had to pin the chest but loved the cut very flattering
Love this blouse, cut perfectly and great color! It is low like the other reviews say, but I wore it out to dinner and not work!

links_Review_Title: Vibrant floral with a bit of sexy!
links_Review_Text: Such a gorgeous, silky top! Super low cut, but with a small hook to keep it from being too low. Can wear the front ties, tied or loose and look great either way, IMO. The floral print, vibrant color and deep V offers the perfect balance of class and sexiness. I'm usually a pretty steady Sz 2, the 4 was the only size available so I went ahead and grabbed it. As you can see from the pic, the 4 was loose on me. So I feel like it may run on the larger size of TTS...Will order again in a 2 for sure!
Loved this top for the vibrant color and style - just know that you will have to wear a cami underneath if you don't want to show your bra.
You'll need a bandeau bra underneath if wearing for work but it's a gorgeous top!
This was a very pretty top, however the tie and the snap on the front created a strange neckline that was unavoidably low and not in a sexy way. I'm fairly chesty and it just didn't work.

links_Review_Title: Cheerful green top to combat the dull January weather.
links_Review_Text: Pretty bright green color and pattern. Deep v-cut front with a clasp. I had to wear this with a black tank top for modesty to keep anything from being exposed. I thought the arms were kind of long but I am petite and lots of items don't fit me correctly when it comes to arm length. The material is soft and comfortable and I would consider wearing this out to work or lunch again. Currently 34 DDD, 5'2", petite and curvy, weight 148.
Great fit and loved how it felt but I felt like it was a little dingy, either the color faded or it's not as bright as in the pictures
Cute top with black pants
This blouse is very pretty but it runs big. Order a size smaller than you usually wear.

links_Review_Title: Great color and style, but low cut and adjusting it all day
links_Review_Text: Loved the green color and style, but its very low cut so had to keep adjusting it all day

Beautiful color. I thought this would be my favorite piece out of my shipment but it ended up my least favorite. Too low cut for me, the bow tied weirdly leaving a gap in the front of the shirt. Maybe just not for my body style, but great color.
Such a fun top, perfect for work, dinner, drinks or anything! Love the fit and how versatile it was.

links_Review_Title: Cute work to going out outfit
links_Review_Text: Good fit, a bit low so you need a cami underneath
weird tie in the front. It didn't look good with the undershirt

links_Review_Title: I don't want to return it.
links_Review_Text: I love this top. It does run large so I decided to order the next size down and was so glad I did. It is very flattering from every angle. I dont have a large bust so I didn't have a cleavage problem like other reviews stated. Nor did I need to wear a cami.
Cute! Must wear camisole, Very low-cut and the way the hooks are in the front too much flash was showing for my taste.

links_Review_Title: Love the color and the fit
links_Review_Text: flattering waistline, a bit low but not unprofessional
Great pattern and color, unfortunately very loose in the bust. Was fine with an undershirt but a less polished look.
fit true to size

This top doesn't disappoint! Wore twice to work events. Once without a cami (that's a little more skin showing) and with a black cami. Got compliments galore. If you love VB you'll love this too. Wish it was discounted more; I'd buy it!

links_Review_Title: It's nice fabric but too big to wear
links_Review_Text: I was so sad this was too big to wear

VERY cute too but I should have ordered the smaller size. Sleeves were too long and the cut was extremely low (but probably would've been better in a smaller size). I'll try again with the 0 since I couldn't wear the 2

The print on the shirt is beautiful! It is a very feminine top that can easily be a transition piece from work to night out. It does rub large though. I'm 5'2" w 34D bust and there was a extra fabric to grab in the shirt. A 4 would have fit more snug and shapely.
Super low cut.

This fit beautifully around the bodice and I loved the puff sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons. My only challenge was that is was extremely low cut and in addition there was a gap underneath the knotted tie... so potentially major bra exposure.
The fit on this shirt was very roomy / bulky. Size down

I loved this dress! So versatile, very easy to dress up or down. Wore this to work and to a birthday brunch with white sneakers and the coat in the picture (sorry, no full length mirror). Will definitely rent again! Straps can be adjusted. Material is silky but thick

links_Review_Title: Comfy, chic dress that can be dressed up or down
links_Review_Text: This dress fit very true to size and was made of a beautiful thicker silk. It didn't static cling to my legs like some thinner silk dresses have I. The past, it perfectly skims over your body and is very flattering. Perfect to go from day to night, very easy to dress up or down. I almost kept it because it's the PERFECT wardrobe basic.

links_Review_Title: Not a dress for curvy or well endowed women
links_Review_Text: The fit was just very off. I have a shapely figure and this dress worked to not flatter any of it. I would recommend for a slim or straight figured woman as it'll function as a laid back slip dress. This just truly didn't work for me.

This is a thick silky fabric which is cut very straight. I have an hourglass shape and it was right around the hips and baggy in the waist. Not flattering. I also found the length to be a bit longer than I would have liked (I'm 5'6 for reference).
This was perfect for a dinner party for work. I paired it with a cute jacket. Very comfortable and slimming!

I wore this to a girls' night out to dinner and dancing at it was very comfortable. I chose this picture to show that the top was a little bit too big (see the extra fabric near the armpit) but the bottom fit perfectly. The cut is pretty low so I was a little self conscious I was showing too much during the night, as well. Overall it was pretty good, but I'm not sure I'd rent it again. It's easy to get in and out of, at least!

I sized up a bit in this jumpsuit bc I'm 5 months pregnant but talk about flattering! The fabric is a beautiful velvet but also so comfy and stretchy- I actually can't wait to rent again post pregnancy in my true size!

Sexy, comfortable and easy to wear, this jumpsuit is versatile enough for a work event or a costume party, depending on the accessories. I wore this at a roaring 20's shindig to differentiate among the flapper dresses and the Gatsby lookalikes. It was a smashing success and while the decolletage is the show on this one, your butt and legs will look great with this rich, flattering material.
So easy to put on myself & slip into! I was even able to wear a regular bra!! I got several compliments on NYE! Love this jumper!!

This jumpsuit was so flattering and also so comfortable! I got a ton of compliments and the velvet pattern was great. It was slightly large, I could've probably sized down but the 12 was perfect, also being on the taller side the length was great. Definitely recommend for any formal occasion!

I originally rented this for a seasonably warm Christmas party and am renting again for a cocktail party fundraiser. I sized down this time and I think it's a more flattering fit. It's simple but I got so many compliments. I felt pulled together while also feeling trendy and comfortable. And the best thing - the zipper is NOT frustrating when you need to go to the restroom or take it off. It is very low cut but I wore a blazer over it and it felt less scandalous.

links_Review_Title: Too big, front was too low, a little worn.
links_Review_Text: I didn't love this. It was way too low in front and overall baggy. A smaller size may have worked, but the velvet was a little worn.

links_Review_Title: Not as dressy as I'd hoped
links_Review_Text: The velvet on this is ribbed, and it makes the whole look much more casual. Also one of the straps on the one I got had been mended, and there was a noticeable bump where it had been reattached. In person, I had a hard time envisioning what event this would work for.

links_Review_Title: easy to dress up and down!
links_Review_Text: only reasons I didn't give a 5: slightly too short (but my legs are super long as I'm 5'10) and a little tight in crotch area, and would have liked adjustable straps for both alleviating tight crotch and adding some length as well as being more revealing up top. Got lots of compliments but was hosting a party so didn't take any photos... wish I had though
Perfect length with heels. I have short legs and long torso...was almostttt too short in the torso. A little baggy in the chest area. Wore a bralette and it looked perfect.

I ended up renting this for new years, and at the last minute wore another item I rented that was a little more funky. This jumpsuit was KILLER though. Super soft and comfy, makes your booty look incred, and very sturdy straps :)
Super cute but too big. Would rent again in a smaller size.
Beyond comfortable, ran a bit large overall so I probably could have gone down another size. Lots of complements!

I wish I had a better picture, but I recommend this sexy classy dress! So many exceptional details, the sleeves and wrist details are a work of art. Sumptuous fabric with a hint of sequins to highlight. A true wrap dress so you can size up or down. Lovely
The fit is a little funky on the top, not a lot of fabric for the chest area, but that works just fine for me! Super flattering and I felt really great in it. Highly recommend trying this one out!
Loved this dress so flattering and fun Everything reformation is great and this one didn't run small like much of this brand

links_Review_Title: Beautiful and classic piece for dressing up or down!
links_Review_Text: The 0R was a perfect fit, length and all. A perfect piece to layer a sweater over for a casual look or wear on its own for a more statement/romantic look.

Got a bunch of compliments when I wore this dress! Would definitely go with your bigger size if you are in between. The straps do tie so you can adjust, this ended up being uncomfortable by the end of the day but overall liked the dress

links_Review_Title: Classy and chic dress for vacation
