links_Review_Text: It was a classy evening dress for the vacation in Fiji. It flattered my figure, and made me look elegant. Would rent again!
I loved this dress! It fit like a glove and the thick band on the waist was super flattering. I got compliments on it all night!

links_Review_Title: Fit so well I wore it 3 times!
links_Review_Text: I'm a huge reformation fan and this dress did not disappoint. There is some stretch in the back that made it super comfortable. I was able to dress it up with heels and down with flats. This was true to size.

links_Review_Title: An awesome dress for a fall wedding
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a very nice wedding rehearsal dinner in a gorgeous wine cellar. Reformation dresses usually have no stretch and run SUPER small. I had to rent a size 4 and I almost always wear a 0 or 2. Even the size 2 I couldn't breathe in! This dress in a size 4 was comfortable to wear. The straps are fully adjustable (ties) and there's a stretchy ruched panel in the back that helps with breathing room.
This dress was amazing! I loved the fit and the feel of it. Was great for the ceremony, dinner, drinks, & dancing!

links_Review_Title: Super cute and easy to wear
links_Review_Text: It took me a few times with reformation but I think 8 is my size. I'm normally a 4 so it was difficult to guess how much to go up.Loved this dress, was cute and it was great in different California temps. My only issue was the straps dug in to my shoulders by end of the day. I wore nipple covers bc my strapless bra kept peeking through. It provides enough coverage/support, but unless I wanted it significantly low and chest bearing the straps has to be tied to a point that it hurt after a while.
I think this runs a little small in the bust. I'm a 32C and I felt like I was spilling out. The dress is super flattering though and was a good mid-length on my 5'3" frame.
Loved the smocking/ruching along the bust, loved the adjustable straps too! Wore with a denim jacket and boots to make it appropriate for cooler weather
This was a very comfy dress and just so darn cute! The straps were a little hard to adjust because you just tie and untie them to adjust the size. Otherwise it was a very fun outfit to wear.
I am a 36C and the boob area was not quite big enough in the 8R. However, I loved the dress otherwise and got compliments on it!
This was stunning on. There is stretch in the back so it fits better. I run between an 8 and a 10 and went with my larger size, which was perfect.

The sizing on Reformation dresses can be all over the place, but thanks to the smocking in the back by the zipper, this had enough give and fit perfectly. It was a bit low in the front, but over all, it was great for a formal, late fall wedding.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress for smaller chested person
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous dress but the chest area is ridiculously small. I read the reviews stating such so I ordered two sizes up. The body of the dress fit like a glove but I was spilling out of the top! Luckily I was only hanging out with old friends so I was not that self conscious but it was borderline showing too much cleavage.
Runs small - couldn't wear

Every part of this dress was TTS, except for the bust. I am a C-cup and don't consider myself to be large chested by any means....but this bust area of this dress was super tiny and therefore way more revealing than it looks on the model.
The dress is beautiful. The straps are adjustable because you tie them to fit you. I loved how it was sexy but not in your face sexy. It was a good rental.

I now want all my dresses to be skirts! Absolutely loved this fun outfit. Long but not too long, fell just above my ankles. I wore it for Easter Sunday, somewhat dressy but still has a casual look to it with the built in skirt. I want to buy this so bad!

Saw this and it looked super fun and had to try it. It was gorgeous fabric and the design was very fun. However the top would need to be pinned because the wrap didn't stay up. One thing to be warned on though... the skirt is really full and it's floor length so it looks really fancy. But it's also a skort underneath. It's an odd mix of casual and fancy and I'm not really sure what setting you would wear it in.
Beautiful print, but is a little too short
Could have certainly gotten the medium and that would have given me a bit more support up top since it was hard to wear this without a bra. Such a lovely dress definitely renting again.
Wore this in Bahamas, so many compliments. Comfortable and flowy!

links_Review_Title: Make a statement while being comfortable
links_Review_Text: So comfortable! I'm 5'7" 160 lbs and the medium was perfect! Didn't feel too short with heels. I received so many compliments. If you're thinking about renting this dress do it!!!

Loved almost everything my about this dress, particularly the way it photographs. The only downsides were that it was a little short, and that it was difficult to wear a bra without the strap showing in the back. If you going in knowing that, then it's great!

links_Review_Title: Cute dress for vacation or a summery night out
links_Review_Text: Fit well and cute short length. Loved the colors.
I LOVED this dress. Comfortable, sexy, and fun. I wore it twice at the same resort, same week just because I enjoyed it so much! I should've bought it

Cute dress that was short, but not too short on my 5'10" frame. It is pretty low cut but I didn't mind for a beach vacation. The fabric is thicker than I expected but was fine considering it was January and pretty windy.

links_Review_Title: Flowing, colorful fun! A vacation must!!!
links_Review_Text: This was a perfect vacation dress to the beach. The light material, low cut back and gorgeous floral print! It's a do over for me, one of my favorite rentals!!!

Loved this dress and got so many compliments. The colors are amazing and it's a fun vacation dress. It was light and comfortable. Initially I was worried it would feel too short but I never had any issues.
Such an easy wear! Comfortable, flattering, vibrant and unique! Checked all the boxes!
Super easy to wear- rented a med since the small wasn't available. This dress is so easy to wear and adjustable tie in the back. Tons of compliments. Rent it!

links_Review_Title: Love love loved this dress. It was perfect for my dinner date on the beach!
links_Review_Text: I didn't wear a bra with it, which wasn't an issue for me but may be for some others. So cute and flirty!
The exaggerated babydoll was too much and I thought it showed too much cleavage. It was cute enough and I almost wore it but decided it wasn't worth holding onto for an appropriate occasion
It accentuated all of the right places and was bright and colorful for a brunch!
Perfect length dress (I'm 5'6"). Was such a fit pattern and fit. I am normally a size 14 and the XL fit perfectly. Low cut but still tasteful!

I rented this for my recent vacay to Puerto Rico and it was perfect. I listened to reviews and size down to a small even through I'm top heavy. Bra looks funny because of the low back but gaffers tape did the trick to pick the girls up. Would definitely rent again
Classy but very cute, comfy and unique dress, would rent again

links_Review_Title: Perfect Miami rehearsal reception dress! So comfortable and flattering I want to keep it!
links_Review_Text: It was low cut in the front, you can adjust it if you wanted it more modest, the long sleeves and the length allow for the cleavage. This dress really fit easily, I never once worried about the dress. It was a great color shape etc.

links_Review_Title: One of the cutest dresses EVER! And comfortable beyond measure!
links_Review_Text: This dress was so tempting to keep! I got SOOO many compliments and women stopping me to ask where I got thus dress. It's so darn comfortable you can't imagine. It's forgiving in every single part of your body. It's a bit short on my 5'7" but great for vacation. The colors and fabrics and first quality and expensive looking. There isn't a single negative on this dress.
Got a lot of compliments on the dress in person but in pics it isn't super flattering. Overall worth the rent with the unlimited package.

Ordered this for a warm weekend getaway and loved it! Wore it to a nice dinner but could be dressed down too. The back is a little open so a regular bra isn't great for this dress. Overall loved the colors, fit and flowiness and will rent again!
Loved this dress and it was not too short for me but at 5'6" I am not super tall. It was fun and comfortable

This dress was perfection! The colors will make you stand out; many people complimented me at the wedding I wore it to! The long sleeves are super fun and the v neck at the front is not too revealing. I was actually able to wear it with a strapless bra and it didn't show in the back. You could definitely get away with not wearing a bra, though! Absolutely loved it this rental!

links_Review_Title: Loved but never got to wear
links_Review_Text: This came after I got home from vacay. Still tried it on and love the fit. Would definitely rent again. Fit comfortably
Loved this piece. It's sexy without being too much. Flirty is a better word. Fits nicely, no zipper and is adorable for day to night. Very flattering.
Was a little short, needed to wear flat sandals. Got lots of compliments!
Will definitely rent this dress again! I am tall fora girl and the medium was the perfect length on me. Its the perfect combo of classy and sexy! Wore it to a vineyard wedding.
Very cute, flirty dress. The print is beautiful and the material very light so it's great for a Summer party

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress. It fit very nicely and was comfortable to wear.
links_Review_Text: the fit is true to size and so much fun to wear. It is low cut but I wore a cami with it and it worked great. I'm short so the length was perfect on me.
Fun dress to wear!
flowy, light weight, bright color and all around AMAZING! highly considered buying, rent it!

This dress is super fun! Great color and fabric. It's very light and was perfect for a hot day in Orange County. I felt great wearing it and got many compliments. Definitely need to wear a bra with it and it does make your chest look big.

I wore this dress while on vacation in Vegas. Any other destination and I probably wouldn't have felt comfortable with the plunging neck line. I did receive a ton of compliments and the colors were amazing! The dress was light and great to wear both outside in the heat while walking and inside the casinos where is was a bit cooler.

This dress is AMAZING! I rented it for the weekend and ended up wearing to an early dinner with friends, drinks after then a date! It's very flowy, but the semi deep neckline and short length together helped me not feel like a blob. So cute, I want to rent again before summer is over.
Loved this dress so much. High recommend. True to size and very flattering.

links_Review_Title: Loved this bright and flattering dress!
links_Review_Text: Wore to a wedding. Very flattering fit and beautiful bright colors. Wish I owned this!
Rented this for my Hawaii trip. It was fun and very comfortable. Definitely an easy thing to throw on and look like you made an effort.

links_Review_Title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS DRESS! Wore it on Vacation/Moms Birthday and it was a perfect fun summer dress!
links_Review_Text: I'm 5ft 7 1/2 size 4 and the small fit perfectly! Length was good but I definitely had to wear sandals with it because if I wore wedges I think it may have been a little short? I will definitely rent this dress again because it was so fun and I got a lot of compliments on it! The colors were amazing
Loved it say no more! I'm usually a small and i ordered an XS and it fit perfect.

This dress was a little light for the transition from Winter to Spring, but I wore this on a very warm NYC day with boots. I received so many compliments and I was so happy with how flattering the dress looked on :)

links_Review_Title: Great neckline. Comfy but still a little sexy.

links_Review_Text: Sexy slit, conservative top, sleeves for warmth. Perfect going out dress for the winter when you need a little more coverage. Wore with suede boots and white tennis shoes for two different looks. Loved.
It fits really well. I'm pregnant and it would have been very cute for both pregnant and not pregnant people. Only drawback is its slightly see through.

links_Review_Title: One of the best fitting and most comfortable dresses I've ever worn
links_Review_Text: This dress fit like a glove and afforded easy mobility for a day of holiday playing tour guide around DC. I loved how it flowed and would easily rent it again

links_Review_Title: The pictures don't do this dress justice!
links_Review_Text: The square neckline is super flattering and the slit is fun and flirty without being too much for a work event. You can dress up with shoes and jewelry and down with a denim jacket.
This dress is only going to work for you if manage to stay out of any light. The material is super thing and you can see everything!
This was completely sheer with no lining. Dress was cute, but it didn't say that in the description so I was not prepared with a slip or liner for it and was not able to wear it

I rented this for a dinner event in California. The dress is super comfortable, and the slide slide adds a great detail. The only criticism is that the fabric is pretty sheer. I wore it with black tights and it was OK since the event was in the evening. More of a warm weather dress.

I love this designer so much I rented this unlined dress in the middle of winter. I channeled some 70s vibes with tights and boots underneath and actually really loved it. The shoulders can be worn up or off-the-shoulder. Would def rent again in spring/summer.

This dress was very lightweight. The chest was a little snug (34 DDD) and the length a little short (5'7"). The slit came up to the knee so it wasn't overly revealing. I did love it. I wore it with black booties and some colorful jewelry.

I wore this dress to Christmas Eve, a date night, and work. It's extremely versatile and and comfortable. I found the sizing spot on. Depending on chest size you could go braless (although it's bra friendly!) because there is amazing support. Will rent again!

Rented as an option for my rehearsal dinner. I really wanted to love this, but the camel toe was unreal. I am a small size 6 and don't particularly struggle with jumpsuits, but this one just looked ridiculous. No pockets, which is annoying in jumpsuits. The color was phenomenal and the cutouts on the sides weren't too revealing. The back is completely open so no bra is feasible, but there are bust cups that worked well for my 36Bs. If an 8 is available, I'll rent it to see if that fixes the short-waisted issue.
Beautiful color, but fit and sizing all off- I am 6 foot, but the torso was way too small and very tight in hips while all other areas fit

This is one of my all-time favorite rentals. Wore to wear for Christmas in Vegas, and it was a KNOCKOUT. Incredibly comfortable, very flattering with the front tie (so no tummy problems!), and sexy without being too revealing. I would've kept it if it weren't such an occasion piece. You won't regret this one, promise.

Loved the feel of this jumpsuit but I had to pin the chest area as it was super low! (My husband loved it though!!) if it had not been so low cut I would have given it 5 stars and I would have purchased. It was super comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Classy, comfortable and perfect for our 70's "Love Boat" auction night!
links_Review_Text: I was very happy with this jumpsuit! The difference between the XL and the Large was minimal. I wore the back up size XL because the Large front deep-V clasp was hanging on by a thread and the elastic on the wrist of one of the sleeves was no longer there so it appeared like a bell bottom and the other wrist was cinched so it looked unbalanced. The length of the wide legs differed by an inch from the two sizes and just tied the belt at the waist tighter. It was amazingly comfortable sitting at dinner, and also dancing!

links_Review_Title: Beautiful color- runs large for petite frames
links_Review_Text: The velvety color is gorgeous, but the jumpsuit ran large for me - chest and length specifically. I used fashion tape to temporarily hem it plus wore high heels. Lots of tape used to make it fit my 5'0 frame overall and I tied the knot in front very particularly to make the chest work for me, but I loved how it looked once adjusted.

I wore this for my birthday and am so glad I did. The clasp in front had seen better days, and my friend tried to re-stitch it but I ended up using a safety pin to keep the front closed. The velvet is soft, a gorgeous color, and the fit was perfect. I am normally a size 8-10, 5'9" and the XLR worked for me. I was nervous about renting a XL when I normally wear L but I am glad I stuck with what was recommended to me on the size chart. Would absolutely rent again!

I loved this jumpsuit! I wore it to bartend a special event.l and it was very comfortable. Compliments all night, including many people wanting to "pet" me, lol. It was quite true to size, but I sized up just in case. If you're similar in size, I would drop down to the XS. If you are taller than me (5'8) and will be moving around a lot, I might pass on this jumpsuit. It was already a bit short in the torso.

The fit was great and SO comfortable. I wrapped the ties to the back for more waist definition. I was happy to wear it to a Christmas party with a bunch of conservative types who barely noticed the deep neckline.
I got so many compliments in this jumpsuit!! I absolutely loved it. Super comfy as well.
This jumpsuit was the most comfortable jumpsuit I've ever worn. The compliments didn't stop & it fit like a glove. The material is so breathable & easy to move in all night!

I wish I could have kept this jumpsuit - it felt like wearing pajamas. The jumpsiut I rented had a few missing details (the elastic on the sleeve came apart and a clasp broke, which RTR customer service and I worked out). Other than that, daaaang. I got so many compliments on this. I felt like a legit queen at my holiday party. Would 100% recommend this jumpsuit.

This outfit was so comfortable! I'm 5'4" and the length was perfect (I wore 3" heels but could have done flats). The neckline is a DEEP, but has a class that joins it together. I was able to turn my sticky bra upward so it didn't show - every other bra option was visible. I'd rent this again in a heart beat!

links_Review_Title: compliments all night! Super comfy like a onesie!
links_Review_Text: Size was a little big but there were not a lot of reviews to go off of. I could have gone down a size. Wore a bra that had a small burgundy strap - there's a large gap that will show off the girls so have a cute bra. The clasp stayed put. Wore with shirt heels and a fur vest as my coat. Loved it.

I wore this to a Halloween party, but my friends said that they would definitely wear this for a holiday event. You can clasp the front to not be as revealing, but I wanted the low plunge for the 70s theme (tip: use fashion tape). I'm curvy/athletic, which can sometimes make finding a flattering jumpsuit hard. I felt very comfortable and attractive in this one. It wasn't too tight, but it hugged in the right places. The tie also helps hide your stomach if you're self conscious with that area.
Would rent again!

I took a risk. There were zero reviews when I rented this but I'm happy I did. It is sexy, cozy, warm. My sister said it was one of her favorites on me. I was doing acro yoga and hand stands in it. I gave it four stars because I am 6' tall and the torso was too short for doing active stuff. It rode up in front and back slightly. Also the inseam was a little short for my long 36" inseam legs. So if you are under 5'10" probably will be perfect. Definitely worth the rent! Loved it.
Rented this for a Halloween costume idea and it was so comfortable! Normally I'm a Large but wasn't sure if this was going to be stretchy XL was larger on me but super comfortable.
The fabric is so beautiful. It fit perfectly. I'm 5'9" and had to wear flats; if I were any taller it would not have fit through the torso. Super comfortable! I got TONS of compliments
Loved it to stay home. If you're tall don't go for small. Medium was fine
I love the jumpsuit, fit perfectly but, I forgot to get a pics.

I loved this jumpsuit but I couldn't wear it. It was too large and there was no front clasp so it was completely open in the front. I would definitely order in a smaller size. It was very comfortable and was a beautiful color. It was also very flattering.

links_Review_Title: This jumpsuit was perfect for attending a winter wedding!
links_Review_Text: The jumpsuit was very comfortable. I got a ton of compliments on the style and color. I used the clasp in the front and tape to keep everything in place. No wardrobe malfunctions, even on the dance floor. This garments is one of my favorite RTR rentals!

I didn't end up wearing this because it was a bit fancier than my event's dress code, but I would love a chance to wear it again. It is so soft and a bit stretchy. The other thing that kept me from wearing it was that the bust is a bit open - wish the hook was attached more tightly rather than gapping slightly at the front.

links_Review_Title: I loooved this jumpsuit! It was so flattering, incredibly comfortable, and I got lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: I'm ~140lb, 5'6", 36A chest. This fit sooo well. I did notice that my jumpsuit was missing the elastic on one wrist, but you couldn't tell (one was cinched, one was not, so I'm assuming the elastic snapped.) I felt soooo comfortable all night!

Con- misleading re: plunging neck. Hook inadequate for coverage as it left a gaping keyhole effect on the upper abdomen between the hook + the seam. I had to safety pin to excess so I had coverage. Pro- stylish, soft, comfortable, very flattering to curves.

links_Review_Title: Everyone loved this Jumpsuit. And I loved It too!!
links_Review_Text: fit great! a lot of compliments form men and women everyone wanted to buy it or borrow it. very comfortable and sexy yet not too revealing and I wasn't cold in the November cool air. I will probably rent it again or try to buy it.

I am a true size 8 and this fit well. Torso length was fine, but the inseam length was too short to wear heels and I don't have any winter fancy flat shoes or sandals that worked. With the hook clasped, my bra was covered, which was great. The hole between the hook clasp all of the way to the waist made me nervous for a wardrobe malfunction. It was very comfortable. I ended up sending it back unworn with tags for someone else to enjoy.

links_Review_Title: It feels and looks like pajamas - I think it would be best with someone tall and super slim.
links_Review_Text: This didn't work for me at all - it runs very large and RTR suggested an XLR size for me - I could have used a M.

links_Review_Title: I didn't get to wear it but I will rent it again!
links_Review_Text: Im all about this dress. But sadly my event was cancelled so didn't get to wear it. Very fitted. If you don't want to flaunt it, don't get this dress. Loved the color and the print. Will definitely try to wear it for something else!
Loved this dress. Comfy and breathable fabric. Wore to a night out with friends. Length was sexy but not too short. Shoulder pads added a fun edge. Would rent again!
A little itchy but I got used to it. I love the thick fabric it helps hide flaws.

Great fit a little short but it works well with the padded shoulders. Amazing pattern. Effortlessly stylish. I felt like a super model. If your considering renting do it! I may have to purchase this one. It pairs well with the See By Chloe black and gold belt bag.

links_Review_Title: The dress is a looker and standout in a crowd.
links_Review_Text: I love the stitching and gold metallic thread of the dress! I am a bit large breasted so it was a bit tight around the chest area. I knew that there was a chance it might be. but it was perfect for a club birthday party , I felt all the way sexy in this. wish it came in xl , but it was perfectly fitted everywhere else.
Loved this dress! Worn to holiday party. Perfect fabric weight for the winter. Compliments were flying! Fabric has stretch, fit like a glove
80s shoulder pads were fun!

links_Review_Title: Great look for my company holiday party
links_Review_Text: Had a great time loved the dress fit like a glove
I usually wear a size small. 5'7", 138 lbs. Got the XS and it fit like a glove. Went on a night out. Definitely a unique and expensive looking dress. Loved it! And so comfortable!

links_Review_Title: Loved this but was missing the shoulder pads?
links_Review_Text: I really liked this and even though it was missing the shoulder pads, would have worn it. Event was just cancelled. Good length for a short lady.
It is a sexy dress. I should have sized up.

I wore this for my moms birthday dinner in February. Super flattering, thick fabric, hugs the curves. Comfortable for a winter gathering. With the sparkle and shoulder pads, definitely great for a night out. I wore it with nude tights and heels but would like nice with boots as well.

links_Review_Title: Shoulder pads were too small on my broad shoulders
links_Review_Text: I have broad shoulders, and the shoulder pads in the dress (while I love the shape they give most people) looked silly on me. I would've needed either no shoulder pads, or bigger ones. These ended up looking like weird lumps instead of giving me the fun shape I was looking for.
did not wear for fear of looking too hoochie mama

This dress is a true standout! The gold metallic woodgrain pattern is subtle but impactful, and the shoulderpads gave it nice structure without looking 80's. The material is stretchy and quite thick so it holds up well throughout the night - does not stretch out or become wrinkled looking - it truly hugs every curve in the most flattering way. I wore this with thigh high black boots to a fundraising dinner/dance and out afterwards to see some live music at a local bar. I got SO MANY compliments from both women and men. I loved this dress so much, and my only regret is that I didn't get a picture wearing this beauty. Highly recommend this rental.

links_Review_Title: great fit, just the right about of shimmer and shine.
links_Review_Text: love the sillouette and shoulder pads.

I wore this to my Galantines fancy dinner and a show. It was perfect. Just sparkly enough but not too over the top for a night out. It's snug in all the right places. I'm petite but curvy, and this dress really made me feel sexy.
Loved the dress! It has a super cool silhouette with the shoulder pads.. It worked perfectly for the rehearsal dinner I attended.

links_Review_Title: I rented this for a New Year's Eve party as part of my "refresh" subscription.
links_Review_Text: I loved this, exactly what I was hoping for from the picture. The knit is thick and gives you some support, I was almost worried I would be too warm it. I could have probably sized up to a medium and been fine - I would recommend going to a medium if you have more going on upstairs then I do - it was tight in the chest which was fine for me and my 36As but might not be that comfortable on a bigger bust. The little touch of shoulder pad is perfect, kinda 70's/80's glam vibe. The pattern is cool and the gold lamé detailing adds a little sparkle but it isn't so over the top that it screams "THIS IS MY NEW YEARS EVE DRESS I ONLY WEAR ON NEW YEARS EVE." I kinda wish I had bought it but, as it's now the new year... I'm trying to pretend to save money.
The dress was a great fit for my daughter. The pattern has just the right amount of sparkle.
It has shoulder pads that are difficult to seat right. And almost shows my bum - I'm 6ft with long arms - sleeves were way too short on my as well.

Fit true to size. It’s bodycon but very flattering and hugged in all the right places. Wore to a holiday party and it was festive, warm, and super cute. I am short so it might ride up a little extra on others

links_Review_Title: wore this for a night out in Vegas. SUPER comfortable and got lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: This dress is SO comfortable. I'm thick and and it's a pretty forgiving dress. Short enough to be fun but not so short that you're not pulling on it all night.
I got so many compliments within a few minutes of walking into the office! With high waisted pants, this shirt can def go from work to dinner or drinks. I recommend it for sure!

It felt nice and silky on, but the size was a touch too baggy for me. As mentioned in other reviews, the front exposes quite a bit of skin but you could get away with a pair of high waisted jeans and a cute bra.
All pros! More skin than I expected but I liked it!

links_Review_Title: Cute, but definitely not your mothers black silk shirt
links_Review_Text: I wore this out to dinner with my girlfriends. It's very flattering just know there is a lot of exposure, it didn't bother me but I could see how someone else might be uncomfortable in it. I got a lot of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Love this. The silky material gives it a very luxurious feeling!
links_Review_Text: The particular blouse I ordered was missing button but no complaints otherwise.
loved it

links_Review_Title: Perfect black top for a NYE Party!!
links_Review_Text: Wore this top with sparkly pants for New Years Eve Party and got so many compliments, cut a little low and I didn't want my stomach showing so I did wear a black tank underneath, but so cute!!
Wore this for our family photos. The fabric is beautiful, but I was recommended an 8, and a 6 would have been perfect.

Gorgeous material. Had a bit of a puff sleeve on the shoulder which is very chic. I have small waist, wide hips, so the opening slit below the buttons was definitely more visible than it would be on a narrow body. I liked it though!

links_Review_Title: Nice heavy fabric, well made , sleeves are very long
links_Review_Text: Fit beautifully however it does show a little of your tummy if you are not wearing very high waisted pants.
It's a bit more structured than I realized, and the collar area fell oddly on me. I think it's a well-made top, and super pretty, but not really what I was expecting.

I would say this top runs true to size. I ordered an 8 to be safe because my experience with RTR is everything is always small! However, I didn't end up wearing it because I think the size was one too big so the shoulders (that are designed to puff out a little) made me look a little too boxy. But the shirt is nice material. Don't rent if you are not wanting a "crop top" because where the buttons end, it will show your stomach a little even with high waisted jeans.
Super comfy and sexy. Wish I had rented the smaller size though- maybe a 4 or 6 next time. Perfect for hot date night with jeans :)
This is just the perfect black blouse that can be dressed up or down. I found it so flattering. Really loved it!

links_Review_Title: great top, runs large in arms
links_Review_Text: This was a very well made top and the material felt great to wear. I could have sized down to the 2 as I am pretty flat chested. The arms were roomy as well, but that is part of the look. I wore to dinner with high waisted jeans and heels. This does show your stomach a bit as it only buttons to the waist, so it may not be appropriate in a more conservative setting. I will rent again!
I didn't wear this - the waist was flattering, but the sleeves were too long and loose. They went past my fingers. Neeext!

links_Review_Title: An update on a classic black dress
links_Review_Text: This dress has a unique fabric that feels comfortable and breathable. To the touch it is heavier than a traditional cotton or other mix. It really feels good. The side zips are wonderful if you want to let out a little to change the silhouette of the shift. I paired it with heels but it is equally cute with sneakers. It also has pockets which I love.
Flattering length (I'm 5'3"), stylish, substantial and well made. Fits well even if larger in top.

links_Review_Title: Classy dress, I wore it as work attire.
links_Review_Text: It can get very hot since dress is pretty thick but I love that since you do not have to wear spanx to conceal panty lines.

links_Review_Title: What to wear to your own witch trial
links_Review_Text: I am a fashion maximalist and still found this dress to be a lot. While it’s basic black that almost makes it more ridiculously dramatic - the square neck, the queen-Elizabeth shoulders, the very long length. The details are GORGEOUS but even in the smallest size it was a little big, and I really would have loved it to be maybe 4 inches shorter. I really found the only way to style this was with sneakers - otherwise I felt like I was wearing a costume. I got compliments galore though.
I'm 5'11" so I was concerned about the sleeves, but they ended up being fine, just long enough to hit my wrist. Length was good as well since I was going for something a little more conservative.

Very nice dress. Would be great for a funeral or just a day at work. The waist was a little high, but I'm tall I rented a size 6, and I am currently a 4/6, based on the fit, I think a 4 would have been too small.
Loved this dress! Got it for a Wild West night and it pairs super well with cowboy boots. Definitely recommend
Love the lace details on this Shoshanna dress! This did not have any stretch so I'm glad I went up a size.

links_Review_Title: I liked the long sleeves for a December wedding.
links_Review_Text: I needed 12 but it was not available so I ordered 10 and 14. I didn’t love the material or fit.

Great dress overall! So many compliments on the lace. I loved that I didn't have to wear a blazer to have a professional look for my speaking engagement. The buttons did pucker a bit in the chest when seated so may not be ideal with a larger bust. I wore a bandeau to minimize the bust area and to keep the button issue to a minimum.
I wore this to a work Christmas party and it was great. It fits true to size and is pretty conservative but cute and got compliments. A little boring being black but nice look overall.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful lace LBD. Tight in chest.
links_Review_Text: I really loved this dress, but I did have to pin the chest area (34 DDD.). Perfect for my Christmas party.
I really enjoyed this dress for a work holiday party. It runs large. I initially received a size 4 and had to get a size 2 instead. No bra needed.
Stunning lace detail! Love how feminine this dress feels.

I wore this for a rehearsal dinner and it was beautiful. A fun take on a LBD. Fit like perfectly but wasn't too tight on me and I loved the sleeves with the open lace. You do need a strapless bra for this one also.
Snug fit through the waist and hips, but really liked the lace detail and the way the top portion fit. A little shorter than expected (I'm 5'8).

links_Review_Title: Flattering, modest but with a flair
links_Review_Text: Flattering, modest but with a flair

links_Review_Title: Super cute, sad I couldn't wear it.
links_Review_Text: Runs VERY small.
Couldn't wear, too small. I'm a 10, regularly wear Shoshanna dresses in a size 12 and they fit perfectly. This one was still too small.

links_Review_Title: I rent this over & over again. Perfect dress for work-to-drinks.
links_Review_Text: I've rented this a number of times and truly love it. It's a super high quality dress that's hits the middle of the venn diagram of cool, chic, lady-like, edgy. I often wear to work and then out for dinner drinks. Paired with huge colorful earrings for a Saturday night and it looked good for that too. I think I am right between sizes 6 and 8, in that the 8 is a bit big and the 6 is a bit snug. I have rented the 8 and flipped the waistband over to cinch the waist and shorten it, and also worn the 6 with control top tights. Great flattering dress for a range of uses!
Fit well could be dressed up or down, would rent again.
Too, too small. I'm a size 4 and I was unable to try this dress on even with it completely unbuttoned. Sadly I couldn't wear it because it was oh so pretty.
This dress fits true to size but beware if you have a larger bust, as there is zero stretch in this dress and could be difficult to actually put on.
I wore to funeral. It is a bit dressy for to wear to work on a daily basis. Great for party/professional style.

I am reliably a Size 12 in Shoshanna. In fact, part of the reason I rent so much Shoshanna is BECAUSE her size 12s fit me so reliably. So when RTR suggested I size up, I ignored them. Big mistake. Huge. I couldn't get the 12 over my shoulders. My sister, who is a size 8, could get it on but it was still pretty tight on her. Bottom line -- pretty dress, wonky sizing.
Loved this dress. Buttoned it up a little for work, and unbuttoned a little for dinner date.

links_Review_Title: I felt festive & beautiful but not over the top or too fancy.
links_Review_Text: This dress fit me perfectly and it was so flattering. I absolutely adore this dress. I wore it with Oroblu nude fishnets and black booties for Christmas Eve and it was perfect.
Dress fit and looked great. Only down side was it was hard to zip.

Love the look of this dress, however the fit was off for my body type. I have a smaller top with wide hips and this dress did not work for me. It fit from the waist up, but was too tight for comfort on my bottom half.

links_Review_Title: Perfect for my "festive attire" Christmas party
links_Review_Text: Loved this dressed. Loved it so much I looked up if I could buy it. It fit very nicely and I felt great. The side zipper was a little sticky, so I needed a second set of hands to get it up because I couldn't get the angle right. Other than that I was so happy I chose it!

Wore this to dinner with my mom out in the city. The length hit just above the knee so it was relatively conservative. The silhouette is borderline something I'd wear to work but the lace sleeve/top gives it a nice twist.

links_Review_Title: Not worn, very small, not true to size
links_Review_Text: Loved the look of this dress but could not wear it . Not true to size closer to a 10 than a 14. I'm a 38c and could barely get it over my chest and could not button. Very disappointing it is a beautiful dress and only goes to size 14.

I rented this for a baptism and then the mom requested I not wear black. I didn't think this looked like I was in mourning. The lace is fun and the dress is very beautiful. I will definitely rent again for another event.
Straight, tight fit. Puffy sleeves at shoulder and sleeves overall too long. Not flattering on me. I did not wear.
Rent one size up. I could barely even get this dress on let alone zip it.
This dress looked so great on. It fit beautifully. I’m 5’5”,118 lbs (just got on the scale) and the size 2 was perfect. I got lots of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Absolutely loved it. Classy and unique.
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size. A bit hard to pull over your head, but worth it one you get there.
It can be fancy or work appropriate depending on how you style it. Fits amazing, comfortable and so many compliments.

links_Review_Title: Runs small, fabric wasn't what I expected
links_Review_Text: This dress looked so cute online, but just didn't work at all for me once I got my hands on it. I'm usually an 8 in dresses, but find this designer to run a bit smaller overall and sized up to a 10. In this particular dress, I probably could have gone up TWO from my regular size. The zipper was too flimsy for the multiple layers of fabric, especially at the waist). I was surprised at the summery weight of the fabric. Definitely not a fall/winter dress - more like a sundress.

The best dress I've rented so far. Beautiful, quality lace, and soft. Very elegant and classy. I wore it to a charity dinner/cocktail party and received many complements. Will definitely rent it again.

Even though we are in quarantine, I wanted to rent a shirt that made me feel beautiful on my birthday. Unfortunately I didn't take any pictures, but I loved this too so much! I'm between L and XL & I wore the L as it seemed to fit tighter and be more flattering. I received many compliments from my friends on FaceTime :)
Loved the fit. If you are larger busted this may be snug on you. Long enough for me with high waisted jeans. Gorgeous color!

links_Review_Title: Fun top for a night out in NYC
Sultry vibes in this emerald top
links_Review_Text: The neckline of this emerald green top was so unique and fun to wear. Paired with the ruffled shoulder detail and peplum waist made it stand out. The color was vibrant and had a subtle print to it.

It's a great top! It was a little hard to lift my arms and it would probably be a bit tight through the chest for the larger chested ladies! Definitely need high waisted jeans because it's on the shorter side.
I'm a 32DDD and had no problem fitting into the Small thanks to the side zip. Love it!
Great top. Nice material and Structure. The peplum was very cute

links_Review_Title: Wish I had gotten a small
links_Review_Text: Wish I had gotten a small. Will order again a size down because I really like it! Also looks cute tucked in if your pants/skirt comes up high enough

Glad I had this in my closet over the December holidays as it was an easy choice for any party. Dressed down with black leather leggings or up with a believer skirt. It was fine...like a decent cut and color, but no knock my socks off look

This top is cute and the peplum shape is really flattering. I liked the color and the print. The material is fairly thin on the arms, so don't count on a lot of warmth from the sleeves. I wore this to work with black jeans and black flats. Would recommend.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments and very flattering!
links_Review_Text: I love this top!!! I might rent it again just because. And the green color is so vibrant yet sophisticated.

This was my first rental post-baby. I was 5 months postpartum and was a little concerned that the more form fitting style wouldn't work, but it fit just fine. The fabric doesn't have much give, and it was a little snug, but not uncomfortable in the chest and shoulders. If I wasn't breastfeeding, it would have fit better. I am 5'10" and the length was a tad shorter than I would have liked. Overall, it is gorgeous.

This dress was super cute and perfect for a post Valentine's Day date with my husband. My only complaint was that the top was too baggy. You'll definitely need a strapless bra for this one as a bra with straps did not look good under the lace top.

Nice dress. Not too warm because of the lace which also means you need a strapless bra. There's a hook and eye at the top of the neck/zip that continuously caught in my hair, pulling it out of my high pony. I had a rat tail of hair down my back by the end of the day in the office.

links_Review_Title: Wore this to host Christmas dinner. It was perfect.
links_Review_Text: Comfortable and flattering.
This lined dress was modest but also fit in a such a flattering way.

links_Review_Title: Very pretty color and great quality fabric
links_Review_Text: Really loved the color and quality of this dress! Got a ton of compliments but it definitely ran small for me. It was tighter around the hips/stomach than I would have liked.

links_Review_Title: Beautifully constructed- a little too short for work if you are a tall girl
links_Review_Text: This is beautifully constricted- but be wary if you're tall. Also, ML runs a little small, so size up if you are curvy.
Runs a little small but it fit my shape perfectly. I loved the color
It was fitted through the waist and a little on the short side. But flattering overall! Ran slightly small.
Rent this the shoulders are super fun! Lots of compliments!
Love the sleeves! Dress is very well-made

links_Review_Title: It was a very cute dress that was very comfortable.
links_Review_Text: It fit very well and I got great compliments.

I'm a size 16 across the board for the most part. When I've rented Badgley Mischka I sometimes do an 18. I got this on but the under-dress was so tonight. It clung in all the wrong places. Beware plus size gals. I got a 20 and it still was too tight!

I love this dress! The combination of the bold color and the modest cut make it classy and stunning, I got compliments all night. Like others, I went one size up and it fit perfectly. My normal size would've been too tight on the arms as the material has no give. At 5'1 it was also a perfect length. I would definitely recommend!

links_Review_Title: Nice holiday dress for the office
links_Review_Text: I thought this ran a tad small, it was a little tight around the waist but fine with tights. I wore it to work in December and got a lot of compliments.
My regular size was too tight but probably would have been ok with one size up. It is pretty short but the overall cut is conservative. Pretty color.

Overall the dress is super cute. The cut is nice and flattering and the color is a great almost pomegranate red color (it's a little darker in person than in the photo) but really a pretty shade. The only thing is I feel it runs a touch tight and the dress has zero give. The bigger backup size didn't work because then it was boxy and lumpy; just wish the dress had a touch more give to accommodate a more muscular build.

links_Review_Title: I ended up not wearing this dress.
links_Review_Text: The dress is a pretty color red but overall it was just not very flattering. It was longer than I expected and snug up around the armpits and shoulders. The lining on the inside of the dress up on my torso cut me off in a really strange way. Just an OK dress. Did not look that expensive either. I passed.
The bottom of the zipper was broken. Would have been the perfect dress...
Great quality, but it was too small. I usually wear an 18 or 20 for RTR, but this 20 was too tight.
Runs small. I sized up, but at 5'8" it felt both a little too slim and short for my comfort. I can do one or the other, but not both. Gorgeous color and style though.

links_Review_Title: I was not able to wear the dress.
links_Review_Text: I loved the dress, but the 4 was too tight in the rib cage and stomach area. I usually wear a 4 or 6, at 5'5 128lbs. I returned the dress and would have tried the 6, but it wasn't available.

links_Review_Title: Great dress. The details on the dress are very pretty.
links_Review_Text: Really good quality. very flattering and easy to wear.
Fit small and a little short for my liking. I would suggest size up. The color is pretty and perfect for fallz

I was hoping for a unique dress to wear into work. As I am a short girl at 5'1" usually i can get away with shortER dresses (as they don't look short on me). This was not the case with this one! It also runs small for 18W! I am usually an 18R or 16W. The 18W was too tight on me! I recommend sizing up at least 1 size for sure!

Although I only rented this for a tiger king inspired insta post during quarantine, I'd wear it out in a heartbeat. The straps are adjustable, the material flows - it's purrrfect for a night out (had to).

links_Review_Title: I was complimented so many times on this outfit, the fabric is stunning in person!
links_Review_Text: So I read on the reviews that this runs small and to size up, since I'm usually between 0-2 in dresses and maybe a 4 in tighter dresses I went with a size small and it fit perfectly! Also, I can't get over how soft the lining is! Would definitely recommend for your next event.
I wanted to love this outfit for a Sangeet but the sizing was just so off. I had a XS and the bottom was slightly big and the top was TINY. I couldn't even get it on. Really disappointed.

links_Review_Title: Unwearable because even the Large top is TINY tiny tiny tiny
links_Review_Text: I am an 8/10 and usually wear a medium in tops but this was so small that I could not even get it over my head, but less onto my torso. Such a shame since it is gorgeous. Bottom fits normally so the discrepancy is kind of bewildering honestly.
Great summer dress, fits true to size.

links_Review_Title: So cute! would've worn but COVID ruined my plans!
links_Review_Text: Very flattering love the sleeves! It was def shorter than on the model. I am 5'8 and it was very short on me still cute!

This top exceeded my expectations. It's difficult to tell in the photos but there are sparkly threads running throughout this blouse. I love the shimmery color. Super flattering cut. The thick band at the hem dresses this up and doesn't require tucking. Very pleased! Bought this for a night out but also works for the office.

links_Review_Title: Rented for work but wore on a night out!
links_Review_Text: Light fabric. Cute gold details. This is cute for a dinner or drinks out but I Also want to wear it to work. I'd consider buying!
I wore the shirt for NYE and it was a perfect fit. The beautiful detailing and silky fabric were a dream!

Nice, lightweight top with a sparkling gold fabric. The elastic waist & flared sleeves created a flattering look. The gold fabric elevated my black pants just the right amount for my office Christmas party and a Christmas Eve Eve Dinner Party. It came in brand new with tags and I liked it so much, I bought it!
Really liked the fit with high waisted jeans - runs TTS. The top was more sparkly than I expected, and the sparkles came off some on my clothes/furniture throughout the day.
If you have a Long torso, this may not be the right shirt for you. I could wear it. It's beautiful fabric and feel though.

links_Review_Title: Pretty but rides up in the waist
links_Review_Text: I liked this too but found while wearing that it rode up along the waistline which was not flattering. I do have a slight tummy so maybe that's why!

This top is very thin. It has a cute shape but I didn't wear it because it runs very short. You will need a very high-waisted skirt or pants. The material is not high-end, so consider this more casual.
Looks great and is right length with high-waisted pants. snags pretty easily on things like velcro, but overall very cute.

links_Review_Title: Sexy silky pink polka dot dress!
links_Review_Text: Medium will fit big breasts little waist but if you have a booty and hips you might want to size up?! Wore this around the house, it's a little short.
I loved this dress! I wore it to a family brunch and got lots of compliments. The only downside of the dress was that because I am petite the bust area was a little big.
This dress is true to size. I usually have to size up with Love and Lemons so I ordered a medium but wish I would have ordered a small. Super comfortable and flirty dress. I'll rent it again.

links_Review_Title: A little tight in the rib cage
links_Review_Text: Luckily my friends were around to zip me into this. It fit fine, but the zipper was a little hard because it's so small. You need to be a bit of a contortionist it get it by yourself

links_Review_Title: Hip playful and a wee suggestive
links_Review_Text: Super cute very playful and fit snugly. Falls at the ankle. There's an odd scrunching around the lower ab area like there would be pockets. Also the zipper in the back is stubborn and definitely requires someone else to zip it up - not because it was too tight! Just a super stubborn zipper.
I wore this for my anniversary and absolutely loved how it fit and wish it was cheaper so I could buy it!
I wore this to a work event so threw a sheer T-shirt underneath. I got a million compliments and was so comfortable. It fit perfectly and looked great. Will definitely rent again.
Loved this jumpsuit . The zipper was an issue . So had to bring my friend to the ladies room all night . Got complimented a lot

Fit absolutely perfectly and was so comfortable for dinner and drinks on NYE. I am typically not confident in strapless pieces, but it fit like a glove and didn't slip at all! Rubber grip helped to hold the jumpsuit in place. Looked super cute with a leather jacket to brave chilly Florida weather. The velvet and crystals were super festive and it had the exact look I was going for. Would 100% buy it if it wasn't $300!

Wore this for New Years Eve, and I did not expect to love this jumpsuit like I did. It fit perfectly, first of all, which was amazing. The ruching around the stomach was so flattering, and amplified the hourglass shape the jumpsuit provided. It also had boning throughout the waist/bust, so it gave the entire look a very corseted-like look. However, it was super comfortable, and the velvet fabric was warm and soft. Love it!
I rented this for NYE. It runs slightly small so if between sizes, I'd size up. Got a lot of compliments. Definitely an elevated but subdued look!

links_Review_Title: Wore this for cooking, cleaning and feasting on thanksgiving and it was so comfortable!!
links_Review_Text: I would have given it 5 stars had it not been for the inside hanger strap that rubbed on my back and left a mark. Otherwise, I felt great wearing it and got lots of compliments.

I wore this to an upscale dinner. Very chic with the velvet and tiny studs. It was also very comfortable as it had some stretch...but it didn't stretch out. You could probably make it more casual by throwing a big cardigan over it.
This was too tight for me

I felt super cute and sexy, received tons on compliments. The side ruching is what makes this 5 stars, but i couldn't rate it a full 5 stars because the top is bigger than the bottom and not sure how long this has been in RTR rotation but, the zipper kept sticking making it hard to zip up and down and there's boning in the top like a corset that was sticking through and poking me all night. My husband liked it so much, he was going to buy for me, but I couldn't pay for a sticky zipper. Definitely recommend and would rent again.

links_Review_Title: I am a solid 14/16 and it would not zip?? I even sized up thinking it was arriving just in time and
links_Review_Text: Did not fit me

I wanted to love this and wear it - but needed a size down - bust and waste just too baggy. It was like it needed pockets. Top has white beads - I thought they were silver from the photo. Even my husband said he liked the idea of it - just did not work.

I read other reviews and chose to size up this time. Unfortunately it was just too big for me all over, so next time I would rent in my normal size. It is super cute though, so I was bummed that I wasn't able to wear it.
This jumper is stunning unfortunately it's not made for taller women or those with longer torsos. I'm 5'10 & wanted to wear this to a cocktail work party

links_Review_Title: I did not end up wearing the outfit
links_Review_Text: Just runs a little short/small for someone who is 5'8 with a long torso. I am typically a size 4 but purchased a 6, it seemed to ride up a little.

links_Review_Title: Was great if you don't move
links_Review_Text: So I put this on and it looked great. Fit perfectly. Then I went to host my Christmas party. I took it off and changed in less than an hour. I don't know why, but could not bend at waist. Even to pick up something off the floor. It was not too big or small up top. Not riding up in the back. So all I can say, is if you don't bend at the waist or sit comfortably. Then It was fine.

This is a great outfit for a holiday or winter party. It's a nice quality piece with a touch of whimsy with the metal studs. I am usually a size 10 in a pant and this definitely ran small. I would order one size up from your typical pant size if you have an hourglass shape.

links_Review_Title: Rent it - but FYI torso is a little short
links_Review_Text: Stunning, got tons of compliments. Hard to see in the photos online, but it's polka dotted with silver studs. It fit my pear/hourglass shape very comfortably, but beware if you are tall that the torso runs average to short, which is important in a strapless jumpsuit!

I usually wear a size 6 in most things. and was planning on renting this for a holiday party. However when I went to try it on it was snug around my hips and thighs and it wouldn't zip all the way up. Disappointing because it is sooo cute. But just a warning for anyone with any types of curves go up a size.
I liked this and got a lot of compliments but not my favorite thing of all time

links_Review_Title: Such a great dress, simple and flattering
links_Review_Text: This dress was perfect for my best friends bridesmaid luncheon! I got so many compliments on it and it fit perfect! The top was a little bit low cut and had a few incidents when my bra was visible. This could be easily fixed by some fashion tape (I didn't have any on me). I would definitely rent this again for another occasion like this.
Very flattering
I love this dress!! It was so perfect for our night out while on vacation. Just the right amount of skin showing... Felt sexy in it!;)
Love this dress! Wore it a few times and it was very flattering. No spank needed. It's light and airy. The ruffles give it the perfect look. Loved this one!
Very pretty flower design and quality material. However... I'm almost 5'8 and if I bent over, there would be no hiding what's underneath.
I really loved this dress, top fit well, but I'm small through the waist and shoulders and it was fairly snug in the hips. I still wore it but if you are debating sizes go up.
Wore it out with flat sandals! Was super comfy the whole night and loved the breezy skirt for the hot summer temps!

Definitely a cute and sexy dress! Loved the print and color as well. Like others have said, it is on the smaller end so if you are on the higher # range, size up. I'm a size 4 so M would have been perfect. I barely fit into the S, also may not be for curvy people either as the hip area was tight as well.
This dress was cute and the fit was good, but it was WAY too short. Unable to wear.
Love this dress and the fit on my torso. It was definitely on the shorter side though! Bending wasn't an option but if wearing to an event and not for a whole day, I think it's fine!

The dress is nice and fit well. I didn't mind the fact that it was short because I am short and wore it with flats. I wasn't crazy about how much cleavage I had showing in this dress. An hour into the party I left and changed into a different dress because I found myself hiding due to the fact that I just didn't feel comfortable with the amount of cleavage I had showing.
Obsessed and purchased. Short dress, but the slip hold shape with the wind so you don't Marilyn even in Chicago!
Big on top for me
Shirring at hip was weirdly tight and not forgiving AT ALL. Strange fit overall, did not wear it.

links_Review_Title: Wore this to a formal area at the racetrack.
links_Review_Text: Fit like a glove. I am petite but a bit curvy with a bigger chest. I didn't have to wear a bra which I loved. It was a little low cut, showing cleavage, but not in a distasteful way. Awesome dress, thought about buying it from RTR!

links_Review_Title: Very flattering, the right amount of leg to chest ratio.
links_Review_Text: This could be dressed up or down or even worn with blazer or cardigan for work. The length was perfect, not too short or too long and the patterning and ruching helped hide areas. Had some minor gapping if i leaned over in the chest area but overall an amazing fit. I'd absolutely rent this again - even thought about buying it! If you had a large chest, this would highlight the girls!
Didn't wear, it was too short. Very cute, though!
This dress was cute but ran way small. The neckline has a weird cut as well. It is more of a square than a true v neck
Loved the way the dress fit. Very flattering and sexy with a lov cleavage. The patterns adds to the fit of the dress gorgeous.
The dress is way too short. Might as well have been a shirt… Will definitely be returning
I tried two different sizes in this dress, the top was way too large in both. Returned. Too bad, the print was interesting and I liked the way the skirt fit.

This dress was very disappointing. I have been an unlimited member for a long time and a reserve customer even longer. I ordered this on Reserve for vacation...it was small and the fit was weird! VERY short. Sent back immediately and was not able to wear! :(

I rented this to wear to a bridal shower but ultimately it ended up being a little too short for my liking. I wore it out on a nice summer night. The sleeves are amazing. Beautiful pattern very comfortable

links_Review_Title: Received so many compliments. Love the fit!
links_Review_Text: Runs small and short! So I was constantly making sure I wasn't showing too much but the details and design are amazing~! Received compliments all night and friends wanted name of designer.

The fit of this dress is odd. I went with a large given the reviews and the length. It was too big all over but I could have made it work except it was just too short. Sometimes I can pull off 34 inches or the item is actually a big longer but not with this. It covered everything but I thought it was too short for work. I knew from the picture I would wear a cami. I wouldn't have had to if it was a social event but work, definietely.
Beautiful & fun dress for a special occasion. It is a little on the shorter side for anyone with long legs like myself; however I did not feel like I was pulling it down all night.

This dress was so comfortable and extremely flattering. I felt so glamorous and received compliments all night––from women and men both! I'm 5'5" and 130 lbs, usually wear a size 4, and this fit true to size and was not too short. 100% recommend, especially if you have some curves!

links_Review_Title: Everyone loved this dress! It was a show stopper
links_Review_Text: Gorgeous fit and beautiful color! Very true to size and super comfortable. If you're a big Boone's girl like me make sure you have some sticky tape available so you don't fall out but other than that it was perfect
Drag Ball. Tons of compliments! Hugged everywhere perfectly!
Loved everything about this, was the perfect Valentine's Day dinner outfit!

The dress was a tad too short for me and the top half of the dress was a bit too big, but the bottom was perfect. I tried the 18 and it was just too short which was a shame because the top was perfect. I still loved the dress and received a ton of compliments. Hey

I recently just had a baby and still have some pounds around my tummy I wanted to conceal. The style of this dress did just that and gave me a waist! No spanx! It was very comfortable to wear, easy to nurse/pump in, and still made me feel sexy. Highly recommend! One note is that when you sit down it can be a bit short. But with tights it was no problem.

links_Review_Title: This dress made me feel amazing!
links_Review_Text: Extremely flattering! I stepped out of my comfort zone with this dress to wear to my husbands formal work party, and Im so glad I did! I rented the 10&12.. I could have worn either size, but I opted for the 10 because it fit my chest(36DD) better. The 12 made the chest area a little more baggy and it wouldnt stay clasped. It wasnt too over the top with the sparkles. Only thing I would have liked if the shoulder pads were removable.

links_Review_Title: Felt like a million bucks in this dress! Didn’t want to send it back. Wore to my husbands 50th!
links_Review_Text: Lots of stretch and super comfortable. Got so many compliments!

This dress was perfect for a birthday party in NYC. Curve hugging, with nice stretch to the fabric. Great for curvy or pear ladies. The wrap like top has eye hook closure to protect the girls. Got a ton of compliments, tempted to purchase!
This dress was perfect! Super sparkly still comfy. The only con was that it was a little short when sitting. It was so pretty I didn't want to return it!
Fit perfectly, was so comfortable and got an insane amount of compliments. I'm naturally curvy and this made me feel amazing all night. Would rent again!
I wore this for a semi-formal fire department installation dinner Perfect for the occasion, fit well, flattering on a more hour glass figure, received many compliments

This dress was comfortable and gorgeous. Glitter gets everywhere but whatever! A small price for an awesome, unforgettable dress. It felt a little short for a work function so I paired it with panty hose.
Great fit! Great dress! Ordered size 2 and 4. The two was perfect!

This dress fit perfectly! I'm 5/10 and 36DD and the 14 fit great! I will say the slit up the leg is a little short, but added some pizazz to the dress. It's stretchy so it was very forgiving. I loved the dress!

Perfect for when you need a shiny dress. The 18was very short, so I ended up with a 22 because the 20 wasn't available. It was a bit big up top but it worked. I got tons of compliments and I felt great. Beware though, you'll leave a trail of glitter everywhere you go!
This dress had been unavailable in my size for a while but I was so thrilled when it became available again! One of my favorite dresses I've ever worn

links_Review_Title: I AM OBSESSED. SO SAD TO GIVE IT BACK
links_Review_Text: Rented for nye and it was perfect. Sparkly but not so in your face/ over the top. Soooo flattering too

I'm usually a 4, but ended up wearing the size 6 because it fit my lower body best (the top was a little too big but not super noticeable). Paired it with Steve Madden gunmetal rhinestone booties and it looked fabulous. The only cons: the dress tends to appear more blue in photographs than in person and it does shed quite a bit of glitter. Overall it was comfortable and a great rental for NYE!

I rented this dress for NYE....this dress is everything and more! The fit is incredibly flattering and makes you feel incredibly sexy without having to suck in or wear Spanx. I rented the 6 and the 8 and the 6 just felt like it clung to me better, but I could've worn either. Tons of compliments! Despite what other reviews say, I did not notice a trail of glitter at all. The only slight con is that the cleavage hook did not stay hooked all night and I had to fix it a few times. Rent this dress!!
I was complimented all night!!! It was perfect! It hugged all the right places and was the perfect length

links_Review_Title: NYE Wedding ::: I was told by several women and men that I had the best dress of the evening!!!
links_Review_Text: This dress was so comfortable and loved the fit and overall design and detail!

links_Review_Title: Perfect for new mama night out
links_Review_Text: Nursing and trying to feel attractive in my post baby body. This dress fit well, was comfortable and made NYE perfect

I think this dress runs a little big but still deserves five stars because it is INCREDIBLE!!! The fabric is super comfortable, the sparkle is fabulous, the dress creates an overall great shape. I would definitely rent again; received so many compliments while wearing. 🙂!!!!
Loved the fit of this dress. Very comfortable, material was forgiving and moved with me. Little large for me on top so I went with the smaller size.

links_Review_Title: Amazing dress! Perfect for the holidays.
links_Review_Text: It has a great fit! Not super tight but hugs you in the right areas. Inside is very comfortable and sparkles don't itch like other dresses. It's not super tight, so it is great for people also in between sizes. I'm 5'5, 34B, and I usually am in between 2-4.

I loved the material, it was sparkly without being over the top. The cut was flattering but it was a little too loose for me on the top, it sort of gaped a bit. Overall though it was comfortable and I felt confident in it!

This is such a gorgeous, flattering dress. It makes your waist look teeny and accentuates the other areas. The fabric is sparkly in a classic, elegant way and has great weight to it- you can tell the dress is expensive and it glides over any areas you may want to conceal. It also has considerable stretch. There is a built in latch at the bust if you want to conceal your cleavage more. I wore this to a work party and received compliments all night. I was so sad to return this- rent if you can!!

links_Review_Title: OBSESSED. Wore this for a Christmas party. Such a fun dress, ordered it again for NYE!!
links_Review_Text: Fit true to size, padded shoulders, low cut front with a eye hook closure. Had a plethora of compliments. Rented it again for NYE 2020! A must if you are looking for sparkle and want to stand out.

Perfect for a holiday party! The color is definitely more dark blue, not gray, with silver sparkle that sheds everywhere but oh well. Large in the chest (even for my breastfeeding boobs), but nothing a little fashion tape can't help. Such a flattering cut, you'll love it!

links_Review_Title: Perfect amount of sparkle ! Comfy too
links_Review_Text: Great for concert. Had a perfect hook and loop closure for cleavage area so no mishaps. Not as short as other festive dresses I tried on here. Good amount of stretch :)
Very comfortable and flattering!

I usually wear a 10, so I ordered a 12 and it was too big. The material stretches a lot so I could've worn an 8. RTR was great and sent me two other options in my size, but they were too small. I ended up wearing this one and just pinned it at the chest. My husband said I looked hot and I received many compliments. I didn't feel overexposed or cold, but still felt sexy.

The fit was great, and was flattering for a non-flat stomach. It even has shoulder pads for some extra height. However, the dress was a literal glitter bomb. I had to put a towel down in the car so I wouldn't get glitter on the seats, and everywhere I went I left a trail. Took a few showers to get it all out of my hair.
Loved this dress! So many compliments and so comfy!
This dress is beautiful and so flattering! I received so many compliments and felt so comfortable all night!
This dress was very flattering - pulled in all the right places. Some stretch- forgiving over the tummy and arms!! Shoulder pads are fun and I received many compliments. Comfortable. I recommend

Loved this dress! I wore it to my birthday dinner. It's super comfortable. I would wear it again. Glitter will follow you everywhere. It does stretch and runs pretty true to size. There's a hook to conceal you boob s a smidge but you will show cleavage.

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on this dress! It fit every curve just right!
links_Review_Text: Runs slightly smaller (I had to go one size up). It was painful to mail the dress back! I absolutely LOVED IT

links_Review_Title: Very flowy, perfect for a dinner at the beach!
links_Review_Text: Very flattering and slimming. Perfect for my work party in Hawaii. Would be great for brides rehearsing on the beach, as well! Dreamy material.

Wasn't sure about this but ended up being my favorite rental of the weekend! The pleated legs look like a dress and are partially lined. I could wear a plunge bra and it didn't show. Bright white in color!

Fun & flattering wide-let jumpsuit. Only odd element is the under layer (almost slip-like) in the legs. Helps it from being completely see through, but tends to bunch up and can make it hard to get everything to be perfectly seamless/flat

links_Review_Title: Seriously debating just buying this jumpsuit!
links_Review_Text: I loved this jumpsuit! It was so comfortable (pockets?! Yes please!), fit me beautifully and was just super fun, I'm trying to justify to myself why I should buy it. The 2R fit very well, though anyone who is bustier than me (which is likely most people) may have some difficulty finding the right bra to wear with it - I'm lucky (?) enough that I could get away without wearing one, so just a note for you more "gifted" gals.

I love the overall look of this jumpsuit so much! The pleats and how white and flowy it is. It's difficult to comment on the size, I think this would work better on someone a few inches taller than me with a smaller bust. The groin was low on me and the length to around my ankles so the legs were very baggy. Pretty much everyone I saw complimented my "dress"
Loved the way it fits my curves. I was pleasantly surprised when i tried it on and realized it was. Pantsuit. Very comfortable and easy to wear.
Wore this jumpsuit for our post-wedding party and it's so fun! It's very flowy so doesn't show much of your body but it was the perfect jumpsuit for our occasion
I'm almost 6 feet tall and this made me look really short and frumpy. The bodice is cut very strangely so that the breast is really high so I don't recommend this if you're bigger than an A cup

links_Review_Title: Loved that it was different and comfortable.
links_Review_Text: Wasn't the most flattering for me but loved that it was a jumpsuit. Low cut and wouldn't have worked for me if I had large breasts. Great outfit to try!
This jumpsuit was just an awful fit on me. The material and the color is pretty but if you have any curves, it just doesn't work.

links_Review_Title: Loose at bust for someone with a small chest.
links_Review_Text: I loved the cut and design of this dress. The material felt very comfortable and dressy. I was sad that it didn't fit the way I wanted in the chest area, it was to large.
I didn't end up wearing this however very cute romper.
Bump friendly if you size up. Love this outfit!!

links_Review_Title: Rented this to possibly wear for my rehearsal dinner
links_Review_Text: Loved it so much. Super cute and fun. Very comfortable. I have a small bust and it was a little large on top for me. I didn't actually wear it because I rented something else that I wore instead.

links_Review_Title: Fits my hips, huge on the bust!
links_Review_Text: Though I typically wear a 12, only the 14 was available. It fit my hips well, but gaped on the bust. If you are large chested, there is no support and sticky boobs would likely be required and probably show. I did not end up wearing.
This is such a glamorous and classic take on a romper. I work for my birthday dinner and layered it with a jacket scarf it was beautiful.
it fit true to size
I am a size 6 in lulus and 34DD in bust. For like a glove. Beautiful dress for a beach event. Classy but sexy.

Pretty comfortable. I love one pieces that don't require a bra. The cut of the breast is odd so my boobs took on a funny shape but the hubby said he didn't notice so ...eh. I still felt awkward about it all night. Overall, would not rent again.

links_Review_Title: Only wore once and not again.
links_Review_Text: Was hoping this would be good for vacation but it had too much fabric. Not very flattering, makes you look bigger than you are.
This dress looked better in person. Loved loved this dress. So versatile!
Length, size perfect and pockets were perfect add on! So comfortable.

links_Review_Title: Loved this look! Felt confident and cool on a warm night. Recommend.
links_Review_Text: Flattering and fun piece. Easy to zip made trips to the bathroom simple.

links_Review_Title: If you don't have curves, then it's perfect
links_Review_Text: I was so excited about this but it was so frumpy for a curvy girl like me. Just be advised

links_Review_Title: Bought for white wedding, couldn't wear.
links_Review_Text: Lining for thighs really tight so if you have curves size up. I could have made it work but overall it wasn't very flattering so I skipped it.

Beautiful material and vivid white color, but the pleated chiffon pant area is much more billowy and wide than expected or shown in the photo. Almost unable to tell that this is a jumpsuit - fits and feels like more of a dress, and is a bit more formal vs summery than expected.

I would rent this again for a vacation or a semi formal event where I could wear white. It's a little too formal for everyday. The jumpsuit itself is beautiful and I love the way it moves. It runs slightly big up top. I could have taken a 2 instead of a 4
Fit is nice and dress is well made. Little dressy for everyday but perfect for a party
Nice bright and crisp white color. I wish you could tell it was a jumpsuit. It simply looks like a tea length dress when you're wearing it

Great jumpsuit! Fits true to size tending toward snug. The straps are long and it sags in the front if you are more petite, which was a bit of a pain. Paired it with a cropped blazer and belt for work and it was amazing

links_Review_Title: Very cute but the top is small.
links_Review_Text: Loved the flowyness of the jumpsuit but the top is a little small. It's hard to see but there are triangles for your bust and if you are bigger chested, getting yourself to fit in those small triangles is hard and if it isn't there perfectly, the fabric isn't forgiving and shows you popping out of the bottom.

This was a beautiful jumpsuit that looks like a dress due to the pleated, flowy bottom. If ur thick on the bottom, it may be tight in the hips and thighs due to the undergarment lining, but none of this will show. The best was cut a bit deep, but was very tasteful. Was able to wear a strapless bra with it just fine. Loved the material, simplicity and sophistication of this jumpsuit, will rent again
Flowing
Very cute and comfortable. A bit long for my 5"2 frame. Fabric is not see through.

links_Review_Title: Not made for girls with boobs
links_Review_Text: Fit was very off in the bust. Seams didn't fit in the right spot. I am a 34C so not huge, but it wouldn't work.
I love this!! I do wish that the chest triangles on the bodice were a bit longer bc they felt slightly off place and too high, but it was extremely comfortable and very cute!

links_Review_Title: Good fit yet made me feel a bit thick.
links_Review_Text: Pretty. Fit my curves. Yet the white plus the short length perhaps wasn't as flattering as if hoped. Didn't wear it.

links_Review_Title: Loved the flow of this jumpsuit.
links_Review_Text: This jumpsuit is gorgeous. I'm a 34DD chest so the low cut made it pretty revealing but the bodice was tailored enough to go bra less if you want.... the pleated legs almost gave the impression it's a skirt. Loved the pockets! Very comfortable!!

Loved this dress! It did take some time to figure out how to pin and tape the top of the dress so I wouldn't flash everyone - but once I figured that out, it was a very easy and comfortable dress to wear. I was sad to return it.
I wore this to an outdoor black tie wedding and received so many compliments. Beautiful mini sequins with a subtle pattern. It was so comfortable, could use sticky tape on chest if needed.
I loved this dress! It fit me well and was so beautiful. The only problem I had was the top. I had to safety pin it so be aware of that before you order.

links_Review_Title: Didn't wear, but I really like this dress
links_Review_Text: I rented this for the opera — not sure what I was thinking! I ended up going with (what I believe to be!) a more appropriate dress, but I would probably rent this again for a different type of occasion. It's very pretty and fun: shiny but not too shiny, and unusual and eye-catching but not too out there. I think this dress is basically TTS, but if you're around 5'5" or 5'6" and planning to wear a substantial heel, I'd go with the longer length. I also didn't find it particularly slimming.

links_Review_Title: tons of compliments - beautiful! Subtle sparkle.
links_Review_Text: 5' 9" - Regular length was perfect with 3 inch heels. needed tape and a pin to keep covered up top.

Was surprised this was 1) long enough for me to wear 3" heels and 2) still very gape-y up top. I'm a true 0 on top but a 2 on bottom & the shape of this dress works well if you have a similar situation! Very flattering as I was extremely bloated!
