Highly suggest tape if you don't fill out the top. I kept having to hold my dress when bending over and was limited on some dance moves :) My dress also seemed to have shrunk (see how the liner is showing in the photo). Great with gold or silver jewelry

Amazing dress and a great way to wear sequins in a different way. I'm just under 5ft2in and about 117lbs, I wore 2.5in heels and the zero was perfect, the back of the dress just barely hit the floor. The straps were a bit long and opened up completely when I leaned over so I had to use 2 safety pins to keep the top closed.
Loved everything about this dress except having to adjust it in the bust area. (Needs to be pinned or taped if you are busty) Tons of compliments, would recommend.

This dress runs a bit large - and likely works best for larger busts... I'm a 30B and it worked but I needed to be very careful sitting and could not lean forward 🙃 but the floral sequins are gorgeous and the dress adds curves! Overall it's stunning and was so fun to wear on New Years!

I got soooooo many compliments on this dress. It's sensational! It fit perfectly. I used fashion tape so that the neckline didn't expose too much bc it goes pretty low. I'm usually a size 0 or 2 and went with the 0. I wore it with 3 inch heels and it didn't touch the ground. Would 10000% recommend!

Has a black tie quality because of the sequins. Pretty with a simple design. Slit is not too much/high. MUCH lighter than I thought it would be. Runs large, that could be because I have a smaller chest. The other thing is when you walk, you constantly see the black lining which annoyed me. Decided to wear something else.
I didn't end up wearing but will definitely rent again for another wedding or occasion . Fabric is beautiful and fits comfortably

links_Review_Title: Beautiful dress to wear if you want to stand out. Got compliments all night.
links_Review_Text: Dress runs large. I'm usually an 8/10 and wore a 4 in this dress. The straps aren't adjustable and were a little loose but it wasn't noticeable. The top was very open so i used a pin and a lot of double stick tape. It's hard to tell from the picture, but the split is super high on the dress. If you aren't comfortable showing a lot of leg and boobs, then this isn't the dress for you.

links_Review_Title: I felt super flirty and still classy in this dress! I'd definitely rent it again.
links_Review_Text: As others have said, the top definitely is super plunge and gapes a bit, but it wasn't anything a safety pin couldn't fix. I am 5 feet tall and the back just skimmed the ground in 3-inch heels. I wore it for a fancy work party and got so many compliments!
Have fashion tape for the top. Received many compliments and simply stunning!

links_Review_Title: Could not wear. Top was stretched out.

links_Review_Text: This dress was so beautiful in person and I would have loved to have worn it but the size 8 was slightly too small for me. I was unable to zip it on my own and my husband struggled to get the zipper past the waist band. I think it would have fit well if the zipper would have been better. I didn't want to chance not being able to zip it the day of the event so I didn't end up wearing it.

As other reviewers have indicted, the dress is very low cut up top. And it is not forgiving through the tummy area. I think it would be difficult to wear Spanx given the high slit. Do not recommend this dress until you are very thin.

This dress was super fun! A bit more shiny than I wanted but it's great. The fit is really nice and I would have definitely worn if it the other dress was not in my cart that was a better fit for the Roaring 20's themed party I was going to!
This dress had all the makings of a formal gown but leaned more to the lingerie side of thing. Fit was flattering but very low cut. Pretty colors.

Hey I am all for showing skin, but this dress accomplished much of the same without and inch of reveal. I felt sexy! The velvet caught the light and bounced off my curves. I could wear statement earrings and a bold lip without them fighting my neckline. It also kept me warm on a cold winter evening. My date was grinning ear to ear, too! Yay, dress!
Fit perfectly. True to size. A little stiff at the back of the neck because of the zipper but other wise, PERFECT. Super comfortable!! I wore it with knee high boots. LOVE LOVE LOVE
Loved this dress! Sexy yet comfortable. Perfect for a company winter cocktail party.
I love this dress because the zipper was fully functional and I was able to zip it up entirely on my own. It's a great dress, especially for winter. Hugs in all the right places.
Wore this to my work holiday party. It was perfect! Super flattering and fit true to size. One of my workers was also wearing it 🤣.

links_Review_Title: Comfotable, warm on a cold/snowy night
links_Review_Text: Pre-measure on the length landed where in measured.
I really liked wearing this dress. The fabric is beautiful and the cut is very flattering.

links_Review_Title: Feel sexy but also work appropriate
links_Review_Text: Wore this to work and then to a burlesque show. It's rare to find something that can do both! The material has a bit of stretch to it and the dress was super comfortable to wear. I got a lot of compliments and arm grabs since it's so soft to the touch.

So, I ended up wearing my first choice--this was my second. I really liked it--fit like a glove. The only issue I had was the bottom seemed loose...kind of "belled" out. I'm skinny so it just looked a little awkward. Other than that, gorgeous dress!
Wore this to a work holiday party and LOVED IT! Comfy but so cute!

links_Review_Title: This dress is absolute FIRE! I wore it for a semi-formal sales banquet and got a ton of compliments!
links_Review_Text: I am 5' 8" tall and wear a size 2/4, with an athletic build. I wore this dress in the 4 and it fit perfectly. It has a zip back closure which makes it super easy to get into. The material is very comfortable and the turtleneck height is perfect- not too high. It's classy and sexy all in one. I got a ton of compliments all night long. I'll rent this dress again for sure. ♥♥

This dress was everything. I wore to a black tie charity event and it was perfect and stunning. I wore shape wear underneath (although not totally necessary). It was perfectly form fitting while at the same time stretchy and comfortable. I would wear this to all formal events if I could.

links_Review_Title: Sophisticated, stylish, comfortable, and hugged me everywhere I wanted it to
links_Review_Text: Woah. This dress was amazing. So simple and elegant but also subtly sexy. I looked and felt amazing in it and got so many compliments. Would love to rent again. It hugged me in all the right places. Fit was pretty TTS - I’m usually a 6 and rented the 8 because it was available and it fit just right, but the dress is meant to fit tight.
This dress is perfect. It was so soft, hugged in all of the right places but was not too tight or revealing so super comfy. Great for a date or work party. Will definitely rent again.
This dress was fitted without being tight. I received compliments all night long. Not to mention, its very soft to the touch.

links_Review_Title: The dress hugs every curve, true to size it makes you look sexy subtly
This was probably one of my favorite dresses that I've ever rented!
links_Review_Text: I typically am a 12 but with designer dresses I always order a size up just in case. I would have gotten away with a 12 here, but because it was a fitted dress with some rouching, the 14 was fine - probably didnt make too much of a difference! It was perfect for a formal winter wedding - paired up with some nice big formal earrings - perfect!

If you love velvet and if you tend to always be cold, this is the perfect dress. It's absolutely beautiful and warm at the same time. It runs slightly small- I'm usually a 0 or a 2, and the 2 fit really well, while I imagine the 0 would have been too small. Overall, highly recommend! I will definitely be renting again.

links_Review_Title: Beautiful velvet, perfect length for a holiday work party
links_Review_Text: No complaints. This dress fit great! It would be flattering on many body types as there's plenty of stretch and cinching detail. Rent it now you won't regret it!

links_Review_Title: Perfect pick for a winter wedding...and if you’re expecting!
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a winter wedding and received a ton of compliments. I was 19 weeks pregnant with twins and I ended up wearing a size up from my usual. The fabric is super stretchy and forgiving and very comfortable. It’s an easy dress to accessorize as well. Recommend renting again!

I loved this dress. Very dressy and formal. However, the fit was very snug. I wear a 4 or 6, and ordered both through RTR. I didn't even try the 4 as the 6 was very snug. I was not going to wear it, felt that it was too tight. However, I had no other options. Luckily the material was stretchy and gave a bit,and actually comfortable, but I would have liked to have tried an 8- not a normal size for me. It was too late and the weekend, to get a replacement. The material helped hide areas most are self conscious about- stomach & butt. I wore with black heels and dazzly/dangly earrings- no other jewelry - and got many compliments. It is heavy material and was perfect for a cooler winter wedding venue, though very hot after dancing several hours. I would rent again. Beautiful dress.
Amazing fit. Long enough, if you aren't into super short cocktail dresses. Ruching made the velvet super forgiving. Loved it!!

This was my second dress. Was curious to see what it was like. You definitely need to size up, maybe even two sizes to be comfortable. They only had my regular size so it was too small. Material has no give. I probably would have liked it if the fit was better.

links_Review_Title: Wore this to a holiday party and got so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Fit is very flattering, great quality velvet, really comfortable and easy to dress up!

Loved the extra warmth and softness of the velvet, and the fitted cut was very flattering. Material is gathered on both body and sleeves, giving it interest while being forgiving. Only small complaint is zippered back feels a bit stiff when sitting.

This dress was absolutely beautiful. Extremely flattering fit, and still felt sexy but also work appropriate. Also very comfortable, would live in this if I could. Cons: the back had a zipper unlike the picture. I'm assuming it's a replacement for the original buttons. Still looked great, but it did bunch up a little while wearing it. Only a minor inconvenience overall.

links_Review_Title: Really comfortable, flattering and second trimester friendly
links_Review_Text: Wore this to an end of year work holiday party in Boston. Mock neck is a nice modern touch. Very flattering. Worked for second trimester by sizing up. Looks great with a statement earring. Can't wait to rent more from Nicole Miller.

links_Review_Title: The crushed velvet is sumptuous and looks fantastic.
links_Review_Text: Looooove this dress, very flattering

links_Review_Title: As comfortable as it was cute
links_Review_Text: I wore this to a cocktail event for an award. It was perfect because it's not too formal but still elegant. Lots of compliments. Really easy to wear and fit perfectly. I normally shy away from anything too contour but the style is very forgiving.

I wore this to a last minute charity dinner on a cold evening and it was perfect. Not the softest velvet but it hugged in all the right places. Was appropriate length and coverage for a work-crowd but still felt cute. Paired it with black tights, black heels and a gold necklace.
Really pretty. Not lined and had to iron before could wear but liked it. Would buy if less expensive.

This top would be perfect if the cups sizes were bigger. The print of the fabric looks beautiful and would be perfect for a smaller chest but if you have big boobs you'll be showing some MAJOR under boobs in this.
Beautiful pleats and colors will def order again in a smaller size
Perfect work from home dress!

links_Review_Title: This is the worst/cheapest dress yet!
links_Review_Text: CHEAP, the fabric is see through and the material just cheap it is like something you would find in forever 21. Definitely not a designer dress! The first dress I haven't been impressed by.
Pretty loose fitting. Size down because it's stretchy material.
Length wasn't cropped or regular length on me, also didn't expect it to be sparkly. Would be cute to wear out.
Glam and comfy! I just wish it had a zipper rather than being a pull up. Also, my brawl was visible in the back, but I'm sure there are bras that work well.
Very stretchy and runs large. The pictures dont show it but it's so shiny it's basically a disco ball. Tried it on and sent it right back.

I wound up wearing this to a holiday party and on Christmas and loved it both times! It's so comfortable and the glitter was the perfect touch for the holiday season. I wore it both with doc martens & a pair of heels, and it looked great both ways - also roomy enough to fit a turtleneck underneath!
Rent it, you won't regret it

links_Review_Title: The perfect match of patterns and silhouette Amazing
links_Review_Text: Wore this to a women's empowerment conference for work and got tons of compliments!

The dress itself is beautiful, the silk feels nice the pattern and quality is good. The fit wasn't all there though. The back zipper sticks out. Almost made me have a c on my back as it doesn't lay flat. I couldn't have gone down a size as the waist was the right fit. I liked it but won't rent again. Also there was a lot of static.
Wore this to work, and it was a huge hit. I'm usually a 4 or 6, and the 4 fit perfectly. Will rent again!

This is definitely a bold print, but the class of the lines makes it work so well. I found that the waistline had generous enough space for my broad back/ribs, which was fortunate because there was no give. The material is lightweight and moves so beautifully. The flowers are a bit of a vermillion red (brighter than I would typically wear, but again, just lovely).
I personally should have sized down but I love this dress. It is incredibly comfortable and the little leopard details give it a nice pop

I'm usually between an eight and a ten and got the eight, which fit. It was a little right in the rib cage but not uncomfortable. I love the high-low hemline and the cut of the dress is very flattering. Only con is the leopard tie. I couldn't get it to look right in front so just tied it in a bow in the back.

Oh how I love this dress! The fabric is so light and the print is beautifully unique. I usually stay fairly conservative in prints, but so glad I went out of my comfort zone with this rental for a statement piece. Fit was true to size, although I think I could've worn a 4 as it was ever so slightly loose in the waist. I'm 5'8, 145, with a 27" waist for reference. 10/10 would rent again.

I swooned over this pattern mixing. The fabric is very light which is why I wore black tights with it - and a slip- to stay warm! There also was a fair amount of static cling action with this dress. Other than that this is a great dress and if you like pattern, this dress DELIVERS.
Got so many compliments in this dress, love the crazy power pattern clash! Wore with leopard print booties to embrace the wild
If you want to feel like a million bucks rent this dress.

links_Review_Title: I wish every dress could be this dress
links_Review_Text: Pros: this dress was more gorgeous in person. The colors just sing, and you can easily coordinate w accessories and shoes to jazz up or tone down. Can suit for work or a night out. It is comfy, not see-through but light-weight, and has lovely feminine touches without being matronly. Cons: Grabs static which can cause skirt to bunch or cling.

I wore this twice- to a friends birthday dinner and work and it functions for both types of occasions. It's very comfortable and I received a lot of compliments on it. The one thing I would have changed, is to make the bow look more attached to the dress- it kinda flapped around and I would have liked it to stay around the neck area.
Wore it for Christmas Eve! Fun dress !
blousy sleeves pair perfectly with a nipped waist. ties at the neck for a pulled-together look. quality silk flows beautifully.

The pattern play is delightful and received many compliments. The fit is flattering especially if you have a bit of a tummy. The fabric is lightweight and silky in feel. It can get a little static going in the winter. Will rent again.
I got so many compliments! Gorgeous. Could be a little tight in the waist depending on how weight is distributed

This dress is so extra. It is a lot but it’s gorgeous. The colors are rich, the fabric is a beautiful silk, and the fit is fantastic. I didn’t love that the tie around the neck was just loose - I would have preferred a real high-neck instead of being able to see skin between the neckline of the dress and the tie. Waist is fitted with no stretch - there was a scant bit of space in the 2 for me but I was happy to have the wiggle room.

I love pattern mixing and this was everything i hoped it would be! The fabric is 100% silk and feels luxe. Colors are bright yet not not overpowering. It fit true to size, however another review made comment on the zipper proofing out in the back - it does! Makes you look a little hunchback. If you can get over that it's a beautiful dress!!
I am one to dress like Ms Frizzle all the time and I loved this dress! Wish I owned it! The perfect fit and flare with flare!
Absolutely stunning dress. The print, the material (100% silk), the silhouette. Wish I could wear it everyday!!!
Fits great! Super comfortable! The floral and leopard prints complement each other perfectly. Slight High low hemline is super flattering. Get so many compliments.
Wore this dress all day with no issues. Arrived with a ton of static so I had to work that out but otherwise the dress was so fun to wear and I loved the mixed pattern details! Definitely also TTS.
I'd buy this dress if I could. Perfect length midi, trendy yet still classic. Tons of compliments.

links_Review_Title: Bold print! Lots of compliments! Loved this rental!
links_Review_Text: The zipper in back laid real strangely. Made me look hunch backed. I attached with safety pin to bra and problem solved!

I rented this for my sister's rehearsal dinner. This dress was so comfortable and absolutely beautiful! It was a little snug around the waste, so I had to size up. I wish I wouldn't have because the top is so blousy it felt to large. Regardless it was beautiful and I'd definitely rent it again!

I love a bananas outfit, but this dress was too much for me! I blame the sleeves. They are extremely voluminous. I initially liked the tie at the neck but it ended up feeling a bit fussy. I love the flow of the skirt and the colors of the print were eye catching. The material is pretty thin and a little static prone,. This look got one night on the town and then I shipped it back.
Cute dress with leopard details. My dad said it's a church lady dress, which, yeah it is but very cute anyway

The silky smooth satin was perfect for this warm fall day. Very comfortable. I had to keep pulling the back down since the back zipper would perk up and create a "hump back" on me. I'm short so the dress came above my ankles. Would rent again.

links_Review_Title: I held this for so long; so hard to send back
links_Review_Text: I'm not sure what convinced me to rent this dress as it's quite bold with its multiple patterns, but I loved it. I held onto it for so long hoping it'd go on sale. Alas it never did and I'm sure I'll be renting this again very soon.
I love this dress and if it weren't for the leopard trim I think I'd buy it. Its that great. Perfect day length. The silk weight is good for year round wear. Very flattering.
I wore this to work - Tons of compliments! You will not regret renting this dress!!!
The puffy sleeves and waist counterbalance each other in a good way. There is not any give in the waist however. Don't push it. Fabric was much thinner than I had anticipated.

This is my new favorite dress. Hunter Bell is amazing and comfortable to wear. I love this fun print and would consider buying it. It's a bit staticky, but other than that is absolutely stunning and perfect.
light fabric, very figure-flattering. Different dress that will get attention. Looked great with black pointed-toe heels. Totally recommend.
This dress is so beautiful and I got so many compliments. It fit me perfectly and I am a usual size 4 with a 26" waist. Only con is that it's completely unlined so it's quite thin.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments and so comfortable!
links_Review_Text: Loved this dress. So comfortable and easy to move in. Details such as the pleats are stunning. Received a lot of compliments as it is such a beautiful and unique dress!

links_Review_Title: Headturner! Unique contrast in prints. Fashion forward!
links_Review_Text: Made for tall ladies. Sleeves are 3\4. Lightweight without lining. Note: blue undertone/background. This is not a black dress. I was pleasantly surprised. Headturner and loads of compliments!

links_Review_Title: Dress was great, comfy to wear and vibrant colors.
links_Review_Text: So, I loved this dress. BUT I am only 5'0 tall, so the dress was ankle length and the waist hit me at my natural waist, so the dress flowed over the leopard detail at the waist. It was fine and I loved the look BUT, this dress will not look like the model in the picture if you are not tall. I got tons of compliments, however, knowing that it was going to look different on me would he been helpful.
Ran a little big. Received a ton of compliments!
This dress fit so oddly. I could barely get my hands through the wrist openings and I couldn't do the zipper by myself. It also felt incredibly staticky. Couldn't wear it.

RTR has this saloni silhouette in a few different prints. this print was the only one available for my event, and wasn't my favorite but the dress feels so good on that it worked anyway. it looks best when it fits snugly, i tried on the 8 and it had more room but didn't look as good honestly. the material and cut is so comfortable that even with a snug fit, it's still comfortable. it should be noted that there is not any stretch though so with saloni you just need to find your right size. mine is a 6.

links_Review_Title: I'm totally keeping this for valentines!!
links_Review_Text: I've been renting red and pink dresses this month and this one did not disappoint! I was surprised I could fit my chest and bum in it and still have it flatter me! I can't wait to wear this again! Love the print. The feminine ruffles perfectly placed and the length is perfect for work.

This is the 4th Saloni dress I have rented and I am a true believer!! It's like they made this dress for me :). I am a 0-2 and the 0 fit with not an inch to spare. There is no stretch so be mindful of that when choosing size.....but don't delay, rent this dress TODAY! You will not be disappointed and may even feel slight euphoria at work, cocktails or brunch knowing that you are definitely the best dressed ;)

links_Review_Title: This is maybe the best work dress ever created!
links_Review_Text: I have never received so many compliments on a dress! It's perfect for someone with curves, extremely flattering, comfortable and a stunning pattern and color! I would wear it every day if I could!
I wore this to an outdoor party on a chilly night. I loved the color and paired it with a leather jacket
Rented this for a baby shower in the fall, absolutely beautiful!! I am between a 4-6 and the 4 was unavailable so the 6 is great. The print is beautiful. Highly recommend!
Loved the ruffles and how flattering this dress was. The color & pattern are fabulous

This dress was perfect for a work and then after work networking event. The material is light and goes from inside to outside perfectly! Fit like a glove and was super figure flattering around the mid section. Would rent again!

links_Review_Title: So many compliments and very flattering!
links_Review_Text: Body con but easy to move.
Great colors, fit perfectly. I walked into work and the receptionist gasped and showered me with compliments. Felt confident all day.

links_Review_Title: I loved this dress. This is the second time I rented it. I may have to buy it.
links_Review_Text: The dress fit beautifully. I got lots of compliments. Loved the waist and the way the top fit. Very flattering.

links_Review_Title: So many compliments....seamlessly went from work to a cocktail party!

links_Review_Text: Runs just a touch small. Love the details. Buttons at wrist, high neck, ruffles. Very flattering and feminine. Color and print are also gorg.
Great fit. True to size
Saloni runs small. I usually wear a size 2 but always a 4 in Saloni. Beautiful fabric.
Fun dress - very comfortable and fits like a glove. Would buy!

I ordered my usual size (4) and backed up with a 6 based on some reviews. This dress fit TTS for me and I loved it! I'm considering purchasing. The length was a perfect midi length, even for short people like me. The fabric is thin and has some light stretch. The lining is super comfortable and doesn't move or ride up as you move. One of my favorite rentals to date!

links_Review_Title: Extremely flattering. Great for work or a special dinner.
links_Review_Text: Fits well through the waist, very flattering and slimming despite the layers.
I wore this with a Gucci belt and black heels for work. I'm really petite and have trouble finding clothes that fit but this dress was perfect

The size 4 fit me perfectly: if you're small-busted, size down. This was so flattering: modest enough for work but perfect for a bender or party, too. It's a little thin for winter temps, but would be great for spring or fall. Would buy if it were cheaper.
Very flattering and a lovely conservative dress for a wedding!

Back up size fit as it was snug around the hips in my regular size, but that meant the top was a little too blouse-y since I have a small bust. Fabric (pattern and color) is pretty. It's an interesting cut - kind of matronly so it was just okay for me (I ended up wearing something else) but think it could be styled in an edgier way.
Normally a 4R, the 6R fit perfectly in Saloni. Dress moves beautifully.

This dress style (I've tried in several patterns) is so comfortable and flattering. Though I worried about the ruffles amplifying my ass[ets], the effect is the opposite. It's also somehow stretchy, so super comfortable.
Fits nicely. Not a lot of give. Very high quality fabrics and details.

links_Review_Title: Loved this dress so much--wore it multiple times to dinner
links_Review_Text: True to size, very flattering. I wore it with heels and a belt.
I loved everything about this dress. It absolutely fit like a glove! Tons of compliments, probably a little dressy for my office, but would totally wear it again!

I've worn the yellow dotted version of this dress before in a 6, but this was so tight (in the same size 6) that I couldn't wear it. The shoulders also seem more puffy (wider) than the yellow dot version.

The bottom is festive, and looked good on curvy body. The top is school marm, and looked terrible on curvy body. The two parts of the dress just didn't look like they belonged together. Would work much better with no boobs. Side note, the tiny buttons on the back of the mandarin collar were almost impossible for me to undo when it was in the bag. I would have never been able to unbutton them on my own while wearing. Ended up sending it back because it just looked wrong on my body type.

This was ok. The pattern is really cute and unique but the fit didn't win me over. It had a very straight up and down silhouette that didn't compliment my figure, but you could spice it up by unzipping the zipper. Unfortunately, due to COVID, I won't have a chance to wear this for a while so returned it.

This dress is super cute, I received a ton of compliments. I wore it over a long sleeve shirt with knee-high boots to a winery. I considered keeping it. The fabric is nice, definitely a little bit thicker but has some stretch to it. I would recommend for a number of occasions, can easily be dressed up or down.

links_Review_Title: Doesn't photograph as well but I loved!
links_Review_Text: I want to rent when it's warmer so I don't need all the layers but I liked it! Def size down- I'm typically a medium and the small fit with room

links_Review_Title: Fantastic Dress!! You will love it!!
links_Review_Text: I wore this dress for a meeting at work and got tons of compliments all day. The fabric is soft and there is a lining in the dress so it lays perfectly. It's a great quality-made dress. I ended up wearing it with a black long-sleeved top because of winter but it looked like it was part of the dress. I want to own this dress and might have to buy it.

links_Review_Title: Mod/trendy dress that gets lots of compliments
links_Review_Text: Wore this in New Orleans for dinner and cocktails and got lots of compliments on it. Super comfortable and I love the adjustable zipper on the thigh that you can zip up or down depending on mood and also if you're sitting/standing. Will definitely rent again.

Awesome sheath dress, fits true to size for a straight sheath. I prefer dresses more form fitted so I might size down next time I rent it. It was a very straight fit, in this photo I have extra fabric sinched in the back of my harness. However it's stunning and the embroidery is so fun. I'll be renting again soon

links_Review_Title: For when you're late for class
links_Review_Text: Nice to throw over leggings to run out the door but not flattering. Runs big.

links_Review_Title: My first subscription item and it's going to be hard to beat!
links_Review_Text: Love this dress! It's winter in NY so I Styled it with a long sleeve turtleneck, tights and over the knee boots. I work in retail and the dress was a hit with the customers! It runs a little big in the nice way. Very comfortable, the embroidery is super fun and the zipper on the leg was a nice touch (if you do wear it with tights, just note that the zipper did cause some pulls and I think would cause a run in sheer stockings). Great dress overall!

links_Review_Title: Wow so cute so many compliments!
links_Review_Text: Paired this with a black turtleneck. Fit true to size and received so many compliments on the evil eye!!
I'm a 4 top 6/8 bottom and usually get a 6 in dresses. Shifts are always a gamble, but I was swimming in this, top and bottom. Size down.

I liked this dress but wasn't crazy wowed by it because it was a little bit big in the top for me. I did really like the style of it though. But my husband LOVED it on me and said he was so happy that I'm using RTR because it's so fun to see me try different dresses everyday.

links_Review_Title: I got so many compliments on this dress! I wore it to work and was comfy all day
links_Review_Text: a little big, but very comfortable
great fabric, and the embroidered eyes were great! I wore it with a magenta blazer that matched some of the stitching & loved it. The zipper detail is great - I'll be wearing this again!

links_Review_Title: Loved it!! Very fun, flattering, And easy to wear
Loved this dress, on the shorter side
links_Review_Text: I ended up wearing this dress about 5 times but somehow forgot to take a pic every time. Overall a cute dress! The material is a little more durable than I expected. I will note that the dress is on the slightly shorter side and the zip on the front side of the leg tends to come undone very easily so expect to wear this with tights in most situations. It fit well on my larger bust and I could comfortably wear it without a shaper
Loved the colorful eyes. I wore this with a navy blazer to work. It's extremely comfortable.

Wore this with tights for dinner and a night out. A little baggy around the mid section but I think if I sized down it would be too short. Love the zipper detail at the bottom. Wore with a more fitted leather jacket to help with the shapelessness. Would rent again.

I wish I could have bought this dress - I wore it to a work conference and got so many compliments! The shape is stylish and classy and the eye motif adds a playful element. I paired with chunky yellow heels.

Contemplating keeping this. It's a very versatile piece. Runs a bit big, but not unwearable. I have unzipped it all the way and worn it as a shirt over boyfriend jeans with chunky boots. I've also worn it as a dress with tights and a black turtleneck underneath. Love it.

I don't think you can see it in the pictures but there's a seem across the waist that cinches this dress in. I thought it would look good or fit like a mumu since I have wide hips but it was really large on top and too narrow on the hips. Really bazaar sizing for such a cute dress.

links_Review_Title: Loved this look. Wore with black long sleeve, tights and knee high boots
links_Review_Text: Kind of short for me but I'm 5'9. Very cute and high quality
I'm normally a 6/8. I ordered this in an M and it was huge...
This is an amazing dress! It runs TTS. It is a little big through the chest, but I think this is the intended cut. I rented it for my birthday next week. Looks great with tights and boots.

I received compliments galore for the evil eye dress! The stitching that creates the eyes is beautifully detailed with rich, vibrant colors. The rest of the dress is thickly-lined and well made. I'm usually a size M/6/8 in dresses, and the M size in this dress gave me a roomy fit. I could have sized down, but I liked how the M allowed for a boxy look. And, it was very comfortable to wear all day. I paired it with tights and velvet booties (both in a wine color), and loved the entire look. Highly recommend this dress for work, parties, dinner, whatever. It will look great anywhere.

It's a nice shift, good drop-waist fit. The Evil Eye makes it interesting. It' s hair on the short side for bare legs-- I would recommend wearing with black tights, and maybe boots. Will definitely rent again.

links_Review_Title: Runs big but cute and comfy
links_Review_Text: This was a stretchy material and was super cute, but ran really big so I was unable to wear it
Unique and mod-looking but runs big.
